column1: .de fo. I njc navi amuxtli: ytech pa tlatoa, in tonal amatl, in qujtitlanja mexica: iehoatl injc qujttaia tonalpouhque, in qualli cemjlhujtl, ioan a mo qualli: y njpan monezcaio titiuh tonalli, in nj çan mote neoa: auh in quenamjque iez que inj pan tlacatia. Auh in, y, tonal amatl occencaie mela oac, ic motocaiotiz, naoallotl, canaoalti intech povia.(1) I njc ce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc centetl machiotl: injtoca ce cipactli, io an in qualli tonalli in qnjmaceoaia, in vn can tlacatia, in to qujchti, in cioa: caniehoantin qujpoloaia, quj motlacalhujaia, y nj pampa in jntlatziviliz.(2) Nican peoa in cecemjlhuj tlapoalli: in iuh quj cecentetl semana ic mopoaia, matlatla quj lhujtl omeey motlalitiuh, injc otlato catiuh ce xivitl: Occeppa itzintlan oalpeoa in cece mjlhujtl tlapoalli.(3) A chto tonalpoalli y toca ce cipactli: vel ipeuhca, vel itzin in cemjlhuj tlapoalli, y njc vmpeuh tiuh; otlato catiuh: ioan injc on tlantiuh cexivitl. I njn matlac tetl vmei in tonalli, in iuh quj itlavilanoan muchioa, y nj tech povi: iehoatl in vme acatl, ey calli, navi cuetzpali, macujlli coatl, chiquacen mjqujztli, chicome macatl, chicuei tochtli, chicuna vi atl, matlactli itz cujntli, ma tlactli oce ocomatli, matlactli vmome malinalli, matlactli omej acatl. I njz quj tetl in tonalli: iuh mjtoaia, muchi qualli: in aqujn ipan tlacatia pilli: mjtoaia te cutiz, tlatocatiz, motlaca matiz, mo cujltonoz, motlamachtiz: Auh in tlamaceoalli ipan tlaca tia, oqujchtiz, tia cauhtiz, ma viztiz, pan vetziz, motleiotiz, on ca quj quanjiez: auh intlacioatl ipan tlacati, no motlacamatiz,

column1: .de fo. mocujltonoz, on iez in qujz, in quj quaz, tetlaqualtiz, tecoanolzaz, tetlacamatiz, ipan calacoaz, quj techieltiz in atl, in tlaqualli: ypal ihiiocujoaz, ypal ceviz injiollo, inj nacaio, in tlaihiio vitinemj tlalticpan, in iuh quj cochi, in iuh quj meoa, in jc noveve, y njc no ilama, injc nopiltzintli, in tlacno caoalli: yoan muchi neltiz, mu chi onieoatiz, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inj ciaviz, y nj tlapaliviz, atle nenvetziz, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iuh qujn pi pixaviz, ipan tepeviz, ipan tze tzeliviz y nj tiamjc. A uh no yoa quitoaia: manclivi in qualli itonal, ipan otlacat, intlacamo vellamaceoa, in tlacamo vel mo notza, in tlacamo quj cuj, intlaca mo itech qujpachoa, in atl cecec, in tzitzicaztli, y ni nonotzaloca, in izcaliloca, in veue tlatolli, y njla matlatolli, in çan tlaueliloti, tlave lilocati, in çan aie vtli qujtoca, atle onqujca, çan y nevian mopopoloa, motelchioa, mjx popoio mj ctia, mjiecoa, con mjx caoaltia, con mo cavilia, quj mjtlacalhuja, y nj maceoal iezquja, y nitonal, y nj nemac, qujteuhiotia, qujtlacollo tia, qujtlacolmjctia y ni tlacah liz: ic cococ, teupouhquj quj mo ltitia, quj moma cevia, in iuh quj cochcaiotl, iuh quj neuhca iotl, acan avia, acan vellamati, ompa onqujca in qujtzaquia tlalticpac netolinjliztli: canel omoneviiavi, y nj pampa y nj tlauelilocaio, y nj atle ipan tlatta liz, y ni aquentlattaliz, y nj tla aujlmachiliz, aiac ocon caujli, caix coian y nevian oquj mochi chivili in toneviztli, in chichi naqujztli, ic telchioalo, aoctle ipan itto, aocac qujtlacamati, aiac ic njuh quj chioa, yioca que tzalo, aocac iiel qujtta, novian tlaelitto, acan velitolo, acan tlapaqujltia, catlatto, caitto, ca ie tlaztlacolli, ie tlaitolli, ie centla itolli, ie tetenco caca, ie tetenco pipilcac, ietepan onoc: injc a

column4: mokujltonos, on ies in qujz, in quj kuas, tetlakualtis, tekoanolsas, tetlakamatis, ipan kalakoas, quj techieltis in atl, in tlakuali ipal ijiiokujoas, ipal sevis injiolo, inj nakaio, in tlaijiio vitinemj tlaltikpan, in iu quj kochi, in iu quj meoa, in jk noveve, i njk no ilama, injk nopiltsintli, in tlakno kaoali yoan muchi neltis, mu chi onieoatis, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inj siavis, i nj tlapalivis, atle nenvetsis, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iu qujn pi pixavis, ipan tepevis, ipan tse tselivis i nj tiamjk.

column3: mocujltonoz, on iez in qujz, in quj quaz, tetlaqualtiz, tecoanolzaz, tetlacamatiz, ipan calacoaz, quj techieltiz in atl, in tlaqualli: ypal ihiiocujoaz, ypal ceviz injiollo, inj nacaio, in tlaihiio vitinemj tlalticpan, in iuh quj cochi, in iuh quj meoa, in jc noveve, y njc no ilama, injc nopiltzintli, in tlacno caoalli: yoan muchi neltiz, mu chi onieoatiz, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inj ciaviz, y nj tlapaliviz, atle nenvetziz, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iuh qujn pi pixaviz, ipan tepeviz, ipan tze tzeliviz y nj tiamjc.
column4: mokuhltonos, on ies in qujz, in quj kwas, tetlakwaltis, tekoanolsas, tetlakamatis, ipan kalakoas, quj techieltis in atl, in tlakwali ipal ihiiokuhoas, ipal sevis inhiolo, inh nakaio, in tlaihiio vitinemh tlaltikpan, in iw quj kochi, in iw quj meoa, in hk noveve, i nhk no ilama, inhk nopiltsintli, in tlakno kaoali yoan muchi neltis, mu chi onieoatis, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inh siavis, i nh tlapalivis, atle nenvetsis, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iw qujn pi pixavis, ipan tepevis, ipan tse tselivis i nh tiamhk.

column4: mocuhltonoz, on iez in qujz, in quj cuaz, tetlacualtiz, tecoanolzaz, tetlacamatiz, ipan calacoaz, quj techieltiz in atl, in tlacualli ipal ihiiocuhoaz, ipal ceviz inhiollo, inh nacaio, in tlaihiio vitinemh tlalticpan, in iuh quj cochi, in iuh quj meoa, in hc noveve, i nhc no ilama, inhc nopiltzintli, in tlacno caoalli yoan muchi neltiz, mu chi onieoatiz, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inh ciaviz, i nh tlapaliviz, atle nenvetziz, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iuh qujn pi pixaviz, ipan tepeviz, ipan tze tzeliviz i nh tiamhc.

column3: mocujltonoz, on iez in qujz, in quj quaz, tetlaqualtiz, tecoanolzaz, tetlacamatiz, ipan calacoaz, quj techieltiz in atl, in tlaqualli: ypal ihiiocujoaz, ypal ceviz injiollo, inj nacaio, in tlaihiio vitinemj tlalticpan, in iuh quj cochi, in iuh quj meoa, in jc noveve, y njc no ilama, injc nopiltzintli, in tlacno caoalli: yoan muchi neltiz, mu chi onieoatiz, in tlem maailia, atle nenqujcaz, inj ciaviz, y nj tlapaliviz, atle nenvetziz, vel motitianqujz in tianqujznaoac, in nentlamachoian: iuh qujn pi pixaviz, ipan tepeviz, ipan tze tzeliviz y nj tiamjc.
column4: mocojltonoz, on iez in qojz, in qoj qoaz, tetlaqoaltiz, tecoanolzaz, tetlacamatiz, ipan calacoaz, qoj techieltiz in atl, in tlaqoalli: ypal ihiiocojoaz, ypal ceviz injiollo, inj nacaio, in tlaihiio iitinemj tlalticpan, in ioh qoj cochi, in ioh qoj meoa, in jc noveve, y njc no ilama, injc nopiltzintli, in tlacno caoalli: yoan mochi neltiz, mo chi onieoatiz, in tlem maailia, atle nenqojcaz, inj ciaviz, y nj tlapaliviz, atle nenvetziz, vel motitianqojz in tianqojznaoac, in nentlamachoian: ioh qojn pi pixaviz, ipan tepeviz, ipan tze tzeliviz y nj tiamjc.

column3: A uh no yoa quitoaia: manclivi in qualli itonal, ipan otlacat, intlacamo vellamaceoa, in tlacamo vel mo notza, in tlacamo quj cuj, intlaca mo itech qujpachoa, in atl cecec, in tzitzicaztli, y ni nonotzaloca, in izcaliloca, in veue tlatolli, y njla matlatolli, in çan tlaueliloti, tlave lilocati, in çan aie vtli qujtoca, atle onqujca, çan y nevian mopopoloa, motelchioa, mjx popoio mj ctia, mjiecoa, con mjx caoaltia, con mo cavilia, quj mjtlacalhuja, y nj maceoal iezquja, y nitonal, y nj nemac, qujteuhiotia, qujtlacollo tia, qujtlacolmjctia y ni tlacah liz: ic cococ, teupouhquj quj mo ltitia, quj moma cevia, in iuh quj cochcaiotl, iuh quj neuhca iotl, acan avia, acan vellamati, ompa onqujca in qujtzaquia tlalticpac netolinjliztli: canel omoneviiavi, y nj pampa y nj tlauelilocaio, y nj atle ipan tlatta liz, y ni aquentlattaliz, y nj tla aujlmachiliz, aiac ocon caujli, caix coian y nevian oquj mochi chivili in toneviztli, in chichi naqujztli, ic telchioalo, aoctle ipan itto, aocac qujtlacamati, aiac ic njuh quj chioa, yioca que tzalo, aocac iiel qujtta, novian tlaelitto, acan velitolo, acan tlapaqujltia, catlatto, caitto, ca ie tlaztlacolli, ie tlaitolli, ie centla itolli, ie tetenco caca, ie tetenco pipilcac, ietepan onoc: injc a
column4: a u no yoa kitoaia manklivi in kuali itonal, ipan otlakat, intlakamo velamaseoa, in tlakamo vel mo notsa, in tlakamo quj kuj, intlaka mo itech qujpachoa, in atl sesek, in tsitsikastli, i ni nonotsaloka, in iskaliloka, in veue tlatoli, i njla matlatoli, in san tlaueliloti, tlave lilokati, in san aie vtli qujtoca, atle onqujca, san i nevian mopopoloa, motelchioa, mjx popoio mj ktia, mjiekoa, kon mjx kaoaltia, kon mo kavilia, quj mjtlakaljuja, i nj maseoal iezquja, i nitonal, i nj nemak, qujteuhiotia, qujtlacollo tia, qujtlacolmjctia i ni tlakaj lis: ik kokok, teupoukj quj mo ltitia, quj moma sevia, in iu quj kochkaiotl, iu quj neuka iotl, akan avia, akan velamati, ompa onqujca in qujtzaquia tlaltikpak netolinjlistli kanel omoneviiavi, i nj pampa i nj tlauelilokaio, i nj atle ipan tlatta lis, i ni akentlattalis, i nj tla aulmachilis, aiak okon kauli, kaix koian i nevian oquj mochi chivili in tonevistli, in chichi naqujztli, ik telchioalo, aoktle ipan itto, aokak qujtlacamati, aiak ik nju quj chioa, yioka ke tsalo, aokak iiel qujtta, novian tlaelitto, akan velitolo, akan tlapaqujltia, katlatto, kaitto, ka ie tlastlakoli, ie tlaitoli, ie sentla itoli, ie tetenko kaka, ie tetenko pipilkak, ietepan onok: injk a

column4: A oh no yoa qoitoaia: manclivi in qoalli itonal, ipan otlacat, intlacamo vellamaceoa, in tlacamo vel mo notza, in tlacamo qoj coj, intlaca mo itech qojpachoa, in atl cecec, in tzitzicaztli, y ni nonotzaloca, in izcaliloca, in veoe tlatolli, y njla matlatolli, in çan tlaoeliloti, tlave lilocati, in çan aie vtli qojtoca, atle onqojca, çan y nevian mopopoloa, motelchioa, mjx popoio mj ctia, mjiecoa, con mjx caoaltia, con mo cavilia, qoj mjtlacalhoja, y nj maceoal iezqoja, y nitonal, y nj nemac, qojteohiotia, qojtlacollo tia, qojtlacolmjctia y ni tlacah liz: ic cococ, teopoohqoj qoj mo ltitia, qoj moma cevia, in ioh qoj cochcaiotl, ioh qoj neohca iotl, acan avia, acan vellamati, ompa onqojca in qojtzaqoia tlalticpac netolinjliztli: canel omoneviiavi, y nj pampa y nj tlaoelilocaio, y nj atle ipan tlatta liz, y ni aqoentlattaliz, y nj tla aojlmachiliz, aiac ocon caojli, caix coian y nevian oqoj mochi chivili in toneviztli, in chichi naqojztli, ic telchioalo, aoctle ipan itto, aocac qojtlacamati, aiac ic njoh qoj chioa, yioca qoe tzalo, aocac iiel qojtta, novian tlaelitto, acan velitolo, acan tlapaqojltia, catlatto, caitto, ca ie tlaztlacolli, ie tlaitolli, ie centla itolli, ie tetenco caca, ie tetenco pipilcac, ietepan onoc: injc a

column1: .de fo. quen tlatta, injc moquatlaztine mj, mj vintiti nemj, canel otlauel caoaloc, otlaellelaxiti, otlaxilla quauhtili, otlatzonte con quauh tili, otlatzonquauhtili in ic auel monotza, caiiolacic, iiellelacic, quj maxilti, y njc tlaueliloc. A uh in aca vel ma ceoale, ilhujle, ipan otlacat: nj man quj toaia inj tahoan, inj naoan, caqualli tonalli inj pan otlacat, oie coc, otlalticpacqujz, omo tlalticpac quj xti, ce cipactli: manj man mal ti, ic quj tocamacai, ie quj no tzaia, cipac: anoço itla occentla mantli, icolhoan in toca in quj macaia, etc. auh tel canteiollo tlama; in acoc conchololtizque, acoc contlalizque occentetl to nalli, ipan maltiz: caie quj cen vica in ce cipactli, camuchi qualli tonalli. A uh in tlaoqujchtli otlacat: inj quac caltiaia, chi maltontli quj chichiviliaia, ipa temj navi inj totonti: auh itech qujlpiaia inj xic, in techquj caoa ia, intech quj piloaia in tiaca oan, iaopan concaoaia: vel on can in necalioa, in tlaiecolo, y nj apaniocan contocaia. A uh intlacioatl otlacat: y njc caltiaia imalac, ich cauh, itzaoalcax, ioan ipopouh, ioch panoaz ipan contemaia y nj nealtilcax, inj nealtilapaz: yc quj nextiaia, in acampa ianj cioatzintli, çan cali ichan: ic çan metlatitlan, tlecujl nacazco contocaia y nj xic. A uh in in tonalpoalli, iuh mjto aia: ie hoan intlanextil, iehoan quj te macaque, in vmentin teneoalo, intoa Oxomoco, ioan cipactonal: in Oxomoco cioatl in ic quj cuj lo aia: auh in cipac tonal oquj eh tli: in tonalpouhque catca, y njn tonal amauh qujiollotiaia, ynj mjxiptla y nepantla quj ntlalia ia, injc quj cujcujloaia: ca iuh mj toaia; vncan tlatoque muchi oa y nj pan ixqujch tonalpoalli.(4) I njc vme capitulo: itech pa tlatoa, injc vntetl ma

column3: quen tlatta, injc moquatlaztine mj, mj vintiti nemj, canel otlauel caoaloc, otlaellelaxiti, otlaxilla quauhtili, otlatzonte con quauh tili, otlatzonquauhtili in ic auel monotza, caiiolacic, iiellelacic, quj maxilti, y njc tlaueliloc.
column4: ken tlatta, injk mokuatlastine mj, mj vintiti nemj, kanel otlauel kaoalok, otlaelelaxiti, otlaxila kuautili, otlatsonte kon kuau tili, otlatsonkuautili in ik auel monotsa, kaiiolasik, iielelasik, quj maxilti, i njk tlauelilok.

column3: quen tlatta, injc moquatlaztine mj, mj vintiti nemj, canel otlauel caoaloc, otlaellelaxiti, otlaxilla quauhtili, otlatzonte con quauh tili, otlatzonquauhtili in ic auel monotza, caiiolacic, iiellelacic, quj maxilti, y njc tlaueliloc.
column4: ken tlatta, inhk mokwatlastine mj, mh vintiti nemj, kanel otlawel kaoalok, otlaelelaxiti, otlaxila kwawtili, otlatsonte kon kwaw tili, otlatsonkwawtili in ik awel monotsa, kaiiolasik, iielelasik, quj maxilti, i nhk tlawelilok.

column4: quen tlatta, inhc mocuatlaztine mj, mh vintiti nemj, canel otlahuel caoaloc, otlaellelaxiti, otlaxilla cuauhtili, otlatzonte con cuauh tili, otlatzoncuauhtili in ic ahuel monotza, caiiolacic, iiellelacic, quj maxilti, i nhc tlahueliloc.

column3: quen tlatta, injc moquatlaztine mj, mj vintiti nemj, canel otlauel caoaloc, otlaellelaxiti, otlaxilla quauhtili, otlatzonte con quauh tili, otlatzonquauhtili in ic auel monotza, caiiolacic, iiellelacic, quj maxilti, y njc tlaueliloc.

column3: A uh in tlaoqujchtli otlacat: inj quac caltiaia, chi maltontli quj chichiviliaia, ipa temj navi inj totonti: auh itech qujlpiaia inj xic, in techquj caoa ia, intech quj piloaia in tiaca oan, iaopan concaoaia: vel on can in necalioa, in tlaiecolo, y nj apaniocan contocaia.
column4: a u in tlaoqujchtli otlakat: inj kuak kaltiaia, chi maltontli quj chichiviliaia, ipa temj navi inj totonti au itech qujlpiaia inj xik, in techquj kaoa ia, intech quj piloaia in tiaka oan, iaopan konkaoaia vel on kan in nekalioa, in tlaiekolo, i nj apaniokan kontokaia.

column3: A uh intlacioatl otlacat: y njc caltiaia imalac, ich cauh, itzaoalcax, ioan ipopouh, ioch panoaz ipan contemaia y nj nealtilcax, inj nealtilapaz: yc quj nextiaia, in acampa ianj cioatzintli, çan cali ichan: ic çan metlatitlan, tlecujl nacazco contocaia y nj xic.
column4: a u intlasioatl otlakat: i njk kaltiaia imalak, ich kau, itsaoalkax, ioan ipopou, ioch panoas ipan kontemaia i nj nealtilkax, inj nealtilapas: ik quj nextiaia, in akampa ianj sioatsintli, san kali ichan: ik san metlatitlan, tlekujl nakasko kontokaia i nj xik.

column3: A uh in in tonalpoalli, iuh mjto aia: ie hoan intlanextil, iehoan quj te macaque, in vmentin teneoalo, intoa Oxomoco, ioan cipactonal: in Oxomoco cioatl in ic quj cuj lo aia: auh in cipac tonal oquj eh tli: in tonalpouhque catca, y njn tonal amauh qujiollotiaia, ynj mjxiptla y nepantla quj ntlalia ia, injc quj cujcujloaia: ca iuh mj toaia; vncan tlatoque muchi oa y nj pan ixqujch tonalpoalli.
column4: a u in in tonalpoali, iu mjto aia ie joan intlanextil, iejoan quj te makake, in vmentin teneoalo, intoa oxomoko, ioan sipaktonal: in oxomoko sioatl in ik quj kuj lo aia au in sipak tonal oquj ej tli in tonalpouke katka, i njn tonal amau qujiollotiaia, inj mjxiptla i nepantla quj ntlalia ia, injk quj kujkujloaia ka iu mj toaia; vnkan tlatoke muchi oa i nj pan ixqujch tonalpoali.

column3: A uh in in tonalpoalli, iuh mjto aia: ie hoan intlanextil, iehoan quj te macaque, in vmentin teneoalo, intoa Oxomoco, ioan cipactonal: in Oxomoco cioatl in ic quj cuj lo aia: auh in cipac tonal oquj eh tli: in tonalpouhque catca, y njn tonal amauh qujiollotiaia, ynj mjxiptla y nepantla quj ntlalia ia, injc quj cujcujloaia: ca iuh mj toaia; vncan tlatoque muchi oa y nj pan ixqujch tonalpoalli.

column1: .de fo. chivtl, injtoca ce ocelutl: ioan in amo qualli tonalli, in quj momaceviaia in aq uj que ipan tlacatia, in toquj chti, in cioa: auh tel inj ca in nezca liliz, in vel nenotzaliz patia: auh in aqujque inj pan tlaca tia, y, achi muchintin tlatla coti muchioaia.(5) I njcome moquetza tonalli: y toca ce ocelutl. I nj quac in mo quetza, mjtoaia amo qualli to nalli, tequan tonalli, quj cenvica, quj centlaca, y njtlavilan matlac tli vmei, inj techpovi: iehoantin, y, vme quauhtli, ei cozcaquauhtli, na vi olin, macujlli tecpatl, chiqua cen qujavitl, chicome xochitl, chicuey cipactli, chicunavi hecatl, matlactli calli, matlactli oce, cuetz pali, matlactli vmome coatl, ma tlactli vmei mj qujztli: auh in a quj que ipan tlacatia, y, in aco pilli, anoço maceoalli: iuh mjtoa iao mj quja, vicoia, caoaloia, calaquj loia, axioaia; ioan muchi amo qualli inj maceoal, injc nopil muchioaia, canteuhtli, tlacolli, ic mjlacatzotinemj, teuhtli tla colli cololotinemj: acan tlacaitolo, tetlaxima, tepan iauh, tetlan aaquj, cueitl, vipilli tepan cana, icioaxic ietinemj. Auh in tlanel aca tia cauh, oquichtli, tlamanj mu chioaia, vel monamacaia, mo tlaco cccoaia, tevic, temecapal muchioaia, victli, mecapalli quj mottitiaia, iuh mj toaia: ca iuh quj itonal, iuh quj iol, iuh quj ipan tlacat, iuh quj itlacatiliz: auh ca vei qujcaia in aca tiacauh, amo monamacaia, inj vian oalnemja tlalticpac: iehoatl in amo tlatziuh quj, injeel, in tlamocujtlavianj, in cochicanj, in tlacelianj, in tla maceoanj, in moca oanj, in mjco nj, in tlachpananj, in tlatzetzelo anj, in tlacujcujnj, in tletlalianj, in ioalli qujtztoc, in popoxiuh teoa, in mocujtivetzi, in amo mo teteca, in amo moxiccaoa, in

column4: chivtl, injtoka se oselutl: ioan in amo kuali tonali, in quj momaseviaia in aq uj ke ipan tlakatia, in toquj chti, in sioa au tel inj ka in neska lilis, in vel nenotsalis patia au in aqujque inj pan tlaka tia, i, achi muchintin tlatla koti muchioaia.

column3: I nj quac in mo quetza, mjtoaia amo qualli to nalli, tequan tonalli, quj cenvica, quj centlaca, y njtlavilan matlac tli vmei, inj techpovi: iehoantin, y, vme quauhtli, ei cozcaquauhtli, na vi olin, macujlli tecpatl, chiqua cen qujavitl, chicome xochitl, chicuey cipactli, chicunavi hecatl, matlactli calli, matlactli oce, cuetz pali, matlactli vmome coatl, ma tlactli vmei mj qujztli: auh in a quj que ipan tlacatia, y, in aco pilli, anoço maceoalli: iuh mjtoa iao mj quja, vicoia, caoaloia, calaquj loia, axioaia; ioan muchi amo qualli inj maceoal, injc nopil muchioaia, canteuhtli, tlacolli, ic mjlacatzotinemj, teuhtli tla colli cololotinemj: acan tlacaitolo, tetlaxima, tepan iauh, tetlan aaquj, cueitl, vipilli tepan cana, icioaxic ietinemj.
column4: i nj kuak in mo ketsa, mjtoaia amo kuali to nali, tekuan tonali, quj senvika, quj sentlaka, i njtlavilan matlak tli vmei, inj techpovi iejoantin, i, vme kuautli, ei koskakuautli, na vi olin, makujli tekpatl, chikua sen qujavitl, chikome xochitl, chikuei sipaktli, chikunavi jekatl, matlaktli kali, matlaktli ose, kuets pali, matlaktli vmome koatl, ma tlaktli vmei mj qujztli: au in a quj ke ipan tlakatia, i, in ako pili, anoso maseoali iu mjtoa iao mj quja, vikoia, kaoaloia, calaquj loia, axioaia; ioan muchi amo kuali inj maseoal, injk nopil muchioaia, kanteutli, tlakoli, ik mjlakatsotinemj, teutli tla koli kololotinemj: akan tlakaitolo, tetlaxima, tepan iau, tetlan aaquj, kueitl, vipili tepan kana, isioaxik ietinemj.

column4: I nj qoac in mo qoetza, mjtoaia amo qoalli to nalli, teqoan tonalli, qoj cenvica, qoj centlaca, y njtlavilan matlac tli vmei, inj techpovi: iehoantin, y, vme qoaohtli, ei cozcaqoaohtli, na vi olin, macojlli tecpatl, chiqoa cen qojavitl, chicome xochitl, chicoey cipactli, chiconavi hecatl, matlactli calli, matlactli oce, coetz pali, matlactli vmome coatl, ma tlactli vmei mj qojztli: aoh in a qoj qoe ipan tlacatia, y, in aco pilli, anoço maceoalli: ioh mjtoa yao mj qoja, vicoia, caoaloia, calaqoj loia, axioaia; ioan mochi amo qoalli inj maceoal, injc nopil mochioaia, canteohtli, tlacolli, ic mjlacatzotinemj, teohtli tla colli cololotinemj: acan tlacaitolo, tetlaxima, tepan iaoh, tetlan aaqoj, coeitl, vipilli tepan cana, icioaxic ietinemj.

column3: Auh in tlanel aca tia cauh, oquichtli, tlamanj mu chioaia, vel monamacaia, mo tlaco cccoaia, tevic, temecapal muchioaia, victli, mecapalli quj mottitiaia, iuh mj toaia: ca iuh quj itonal, iuh quj iol, iuh quj ipan tlacat, iuh quj itlacatiliz: auh ca vei qujcaia in aca tiacauh, amo monamacaia, inj vian oalnemja tlalticpac: iehoatl in amo tlatziuh quj, injeel, in tlamocujtlavianj, in cochicanj, in tlacelianj, in tla maceoanj, in moca oanj, in mjco nj, in tlachpananj, in tlatzetzelo anj, in tlacujcujnj, in tletlalianj, in ioalli qujtztoc, in popoxiuh teoa, in mocujtivetzi, in amo mo teteca, in amo moxiccaoa, in
column4: au in tlanel aka tia kau, okichtli, tlamanj mu chioaia, vel monamakaia, mo tlako kkkoaia, tevik, temekapal muchioaia, viktli, mekapali quj mottitiaia, iu mj toaia ka iu quj itonal, iu quj iol, iu quj ipan tlakat, iu quj itlakatilis: au ka vei qujcaia in aka tiakau, amo monamakaia, inj vian oalnemja tlaltikpak: iejoatl in amo tlatsiu quj, injeel, in tlamokujtlavianj, in kochikanj, in tlaselianj, in tla maseoanj, in moka oanj, in mjko nj, in tlachpananj, in tlatsetselo anj, in tlakujkujnj, in tletlalianj, in ioali qujtztoc, in popoxiu teoa, in mokujtivetsi, in amo mo teteka, in amo moxikkaoa, in

column1: .de fo. vmpilcatoc, injxqujch caana, in qujtemoa, inj cochca, y nj neuhca, in qujlnamjquj, in conjttilia, in con tlachielia, tleitech vmpatiz, tlei tech ontla anaz, in macujl, in matlac, tle quj monmacaz injpil hoan, çan onmacoaz, tleconcujti vetziz in ooalla cocoliztli, ic noiotl: ic noviiampa mjxtia tlanemjlia, qujtemoa, in tlein qujmonanauh tiz, in catleoatl inanauh vm mu chioaz, in tlein vel ic on nemjz, icon macoquetzoiz, icontlapiujaz itlat quj ic nopillouh. Ioan iehoatl quj caia, pan vetzia, in vel monotza, in tlacac quj, in amo quj quammati, qujtemati inonotzaloca, izcaliloca, ican itech quj pachoa, ican quj ma cuj, quj mapiquj: auh in tlaica ne cacaiaoalo, amo quj tecuepiliaia, amo quj cuepcaiotia, atle ic quj loch tia. Auh in tlacioatl ipan otla cat: no iuhquj ipan muchioaia, in tlacpac omjto, omoteneuh; in tla cioapilii tetlaximaia, quatepipi tzinjloia injc mjquja: auh çan ic noiotica, cococaiotica, in monenemj tiaia, ic noiotl, netolinjliztli qujtz tinemj, acan ixtona in tlaltipac, acan tlaltipac ca, acan motztica, acan vel oqujchpia: ic mjtoaia, ca njman iuh qujz, iuh quj iioliliz, iuhquj itlacatiliz, iuh quj itonal, iuh quj ipan malti, iuh çan tlacat, atlaca cemelle inj tonal, catequanj, te quantonale. Etc. A uh innaolin quj tonaltiaia: iuh qujtoaia, itonal in tonatiuh, cenca quj maviz tiliaia in Motecucuma: y nj quac, y, mo quetzaia naolin, tlacotonaia, tle namacaia, ynixpan ixiptla tona tiuh, quj tlaliaia itoca cue caltona meiotl: auh inmepantla tonatiuh, mjquja, mj etiloia, in mamalti: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, atle vel inezca, vme vitz qujtoa. Yn tlao qujchtli aco tlamaz, anoço iaomj qujz: in iuh quj toaia, caica mozcal tia in tonatiuh, ic muchi tlacatl tlama ceoaia, y nj quac, y, in vnca, y, cenvetzi, ipanoca, aiac mocaoa, aiac ixcavi, vel mochi tlacatl in oqujchtli, in cioatl, im piltzintli, mo nacaz tequia, inj coia, mjto aia: ic

column3: vmpilcatoc, injxqujch caana, in qujtemoa, inj cochca, y nj neuhca, in qujlnamjquj, in conjttilia, in con tlachielia, tleitech vmpatiz, tlei tech ontla anaz, in macujl, in matlac, tle quj monmacaz injpil hoan, çan onmacoaz, tleconcujti vetziz in ooalla cocoliztli, ic noiotl: ic noviiampa mjxtia tlanemjlia, qujtemoa, in tlein qujmonanauh tiz, in catleoatl inanauh vm mu chioaz, in tlein vel ic on nemjz, icon macoquetzoiz, icontlapiujaz itlat quj ic nopillouh.
column4: vmpilkatok, injxqujch kaana, in qujtemoa, inj kochka, i nj neuka, in qujlnamjquj, in konjttilia, in kon tlachielia, tleitech vmpatis, tlei tech ontla anas, in makujl, in matlak, tle quj monmakas injpil joan, san onmakoas, tlekonkujti vetsis in ooala kokolistli, ik noiotl: ik noviiampa mjxtia tlanemjlia, qujtemoa, in tlein qujmonanauh tis, in katleoatl inanau vm mu chioas, in tlein vel ik on nemjs, ikon makoketsois, ikontlapiujas itlat quj ik nopilou.

column3: Ioan iehoatl quj caia, pan vetzia, in vel monotza, in tlacac quj, in amo quj quammati, qujtemati inonotzaloca, izcaliloca, ican itech quj pachoa, ican quj ma cuj, quj mapiquj: auh in tlaica ne cacaiaoalo, amo quj tecuepiliaia, amo quj cuepcaiotia, atle ic quj loch tia.
column4: Ioan iehoatl qoj caia, pan vetzia, in vel monotza, in tlacac qoj, in amo qoj qoammati, qojtemati inonotzaloca, izcaliloca, ican itech qoj pachoa, ican qoj ma coj, qoj mapiqoj: aoh in tlaica ne cacayaoalo, amo qoj tecoepiliaia, amo qoj coepcaiotia, atle ic qoj loch tia.

column3: Auh in tlacioatl ipan otla cat: no iuhquj ipan muchioaia, in tlacpac omjto, omoteneuh; in tla cioapilii tetlaximaia, quatepipi tzinjloia injc mjquja: auh çan ic noiotica, cococaiotica, in monenemj tiaia, ic noiotl, netolinjliztli qujtz tinemj, acan ixtona in tlaltipac, acan tlaltipac ca, acan motztica, acan vel oqujchpia: ic mjtoaia, ca njman iuh qujz, iuh quj iioliliz, iuhquj itlacatiliz, iuh quj itonal, iuh quj ipan malti, iuh çan tlacat, atlaca cemelle inj tonal, catequanj, te quantonale.
column4: au in tlasioatl ipan otla kat: no iukj ipan muchioaia, in tlakpak omjto, omoteneu; in tla sioapilii tetlaximaia, kuatepipi tsinjloia injk mjquja: au san ik noiotika, kokokaiotika, in monenemj tiaia, ik noiotl, netolinjlistli qujtz tinemj, akan ixtona in tlaltipak, akan tlaltipak ka, akan motstika, akan vel oqujchpia: ik mjtoaia, ka njman iu qujz, iu quj iiolilis, iukj itlakatilis, iu quj itonal, iu quj ipan malti, iu san tlakat, atlaka semele inj tonal, katekuanj, te kuantonale.

column3: A uh innaolin quj tonaltiaia: iuh qujtoaia, itonal in tonatiuh, cenca quj maviz tiliaia in Motecucuma: y nj quac, y, mo quetzaia naolin, tlacotonaia, tle namacaia, ynixpan ixiptla tona tiuh, quj tlaliaia itoca cue caltona meiotl: auh inmepantla tonatiuh, mjquja, mj etiloia, in mamalti: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, atle vel inezca, vme vitz qujtoa.
column4: a u innaolin quj tonaltiaia iu qujtoaia, itonal in tonatiu, senka quj mavis tiliaia in motekukuma i nj kuak, i, mo ketsaia naolin, tlakotonaia, tle namakaia, inixpan ixiptla tona tiu, quj tlaliaia itoka kue kaltona meiotl: au inmepantla tonatiu, mjquja, mj etiloia, in mamalti au in aqujn ipan tlakatia, atle vel ineska, vme vits qujtoa.

column3: A uh innaolin quj tonaltiaia: iuh qujtoaia, itonal in tonatiuh, cenca quj maviz tiliaia in Motecucuma: y nj quac, y, mo quetzaia naolin, tlacotonaia, tle namacaia, ynixpan ixiptla tona tiuh, quj tlaliaia itoca cue caltona meiotl: auh inmepantla tonatiuh, mjquja, mj etiloia, in mamalti: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, atle vel inezca, vme vitz qujtoa.

column4: A oh innaolin qoj tonaltiaia: ioh qojtoaia, itonal in tonatioh, cenca qoj maviz tiliaia in Motecocoma: y nj qoac, y, mo qoetzaia naolin, tlacotonaia, tle namacaia, ynixpan ixiptla tona tioh, qoj tlaliaia itoca coe caltona meiotl: aoh inmepantla tonatioh, mjqoja, mj etiloia, in mamalti: aoh in aqojn ipan tlacatia, atle vel inezca, vme iitz qojtoa.

column3: Yn tlao qujchtli aco tlamaz, anoço iaomj qujz: in iuh quj toaia, caica mozcal tia in tonatiuh, ic muchi tlacatl tlama ceoaia, y nj quac, y, in vnca, y, cenvetzi, ipanoca, aiac mocaoa, aiac ixcavi, vel mochi tlacatl in oqujchtli, in cioatl, im piltzintli, mo nacaz tequia, inj coia, mjto aia: ic
column4: in tlao qujchtli ako tlamas, anoso iaomj qujz: in iu quj toaia, kaika moskal tia in tonatiu, ik muchi tlakatl tlama seoaia, i nj kuak, i, in vnka, i, senvetsi, ipanoka, aiak mokaoa, aiak ixkavi, vel mochi tlakatl in oqujchtli, in sioatl, im piltsintli, mo nakas tekia, inj koia, mjto aia ik

column1: .de fo. izcaltilo in tonatiuh. Auh in chi come xochitl: mjtoaia qualli, ioa aqualli: y njc qualli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacujloque, quj tlaliaia y xip tla, quj tlamanjliaia: no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiuhque, icpachiuh que, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia: ic quj tlaitlanj liaia, injc itla vel aizque inj matiz que, toltecatizque, vellalalizque, vellacujlozque: inj pan in tlamach, in tlacuilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia: auh mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; ynj quac neoalco, in vncan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aun injc amo qualli, mjtoaia, iquac intla aca tla machchiuhquj, ynecaoaliz quj tla coaia, mjtoa: vnca quj momacevia a avil nemjz, a avienjtiz, camjtoa, tlaquauh avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuhque, qujlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, quj que queloaia in in teouh catca, itoca xochiquetzal, ioan quj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciujztli, palanjliz tli: auh in aqujn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca quj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no iuh quj ipan mjtoaia, in aqujn ipantlacati, ca moch vel quj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemjliz, ioioliz matquj iez, m tlauel monotzaz; auh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on quj caia, atle icnopil, çan iaujl qujzca, iqueque loloca in quj momaceviaia. Auh in chicunavi hecatl: mjtoaia, mot qujtica, moch centlantica amo qualli: in aqujn ipan tlacati, atle vel muchioa y njnemjliz, atle vel ic tlacaloia, atle vel ic tlaana, atle vel ic tlatzicoa, atle ivel nezca, atle veli, atle veliti in tlaticpac, çan iuhqujn ecatocotinemj, avic iati nemj, conmonectia in maitlali, in maacati, çan atleli: canel iuhquj itonal, conjxtoca, ipan on mjx poa, in mapupuchtecati, in mano ce cujcuj canjti, teaachti, tetlatla vicalti, tecacamanalhuj. Etc, atle

column4: au in chi kome xochitl: mjtoaia kuali, ioa akuali i njk kuali sekkan vnka tlamavistiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlakujloke, quj tlaliaia i xip tla, quj tlamanjliaia no iejoan in sioa tlamach chiuke, ikpachiu ke, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltika, aka vmpoaltika, sempo altika in mokaoaia ik quj tlaitlanj liaia, injk itla vel aiske inj matis ke, toltekatiske, velalaliske, velakujloske inj pan in tlamach, in tlakuilol: ik mochintin tlenama kaia, tlakotonaia au mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; inj kuak neoalko, in vnkan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chikome xochitl: aun injk amo kuali, mjtoaia, ikuak intla aka tla machchiukj, inekaoalis quj tla koaia, mjtoa vnka quj momasevia a avil nemjs, a avienjtis, kamjtoa, tlakuau avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuke, qujlmach iejoatl in kamo kaia oaia, quj ke keloaia in in teou katka, itoka xochiketsal, ioan quj temakaia, ik temotlaia, xochisiustli, palanjlis tli au in aqujn vel ontlamaseoa in vel monotsa, ka onka quj kaia, ma vistia, momaviskotiaia, kana mots tika vel moietstika tepaltsinko in tpk: no iu quj ipan mjtoaia, in aqujn ipantlakati, ka moch vel quj chioas in toltekaiotl, veltotoltekatis, tla tlanemjlis, ioiolis matquj ies, m tlauel monotsas; au in tlakamo vel monotsa, atle on quj kaia, atle iknopil, san iaul qujzca, ikeke loloka in quj momaseviaia.

column3: Auh in chi come xochitl: mjtoaia qualli, ioa aqualli: y njc qualli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacujloque, quj tlaliaia y xip tla, quj tlamanjliaia: no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiuhque, icpachiuh que, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia: ic quj tlaitlanj liaia, injc itla vel aizque inj matiz que, toltecatizque, vellalalizque, vellacujlozque: inj pan in tlamach, in tlacuilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia: auh mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; ynj quac neoalco, in vncan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aun injc amo qualli, mjtoaia, iquac intla aca tla machchiuhquj, ynecaoaliz quj tla coaia, mjtoa: vnca quj momacevia a avil nemjz, a avienjtiz, camjtoa, tlaquauh avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuhque, qujlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, quj que queloaia in in teouh catca, itoca xochiquetzal, ioan quj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciujztli, palanjliz tli: auh in aqujn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca quj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no iuh quj ipan mjtoaia, in aqujn ipantlacati, ca moch vel quj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemjliz, ioioliz matquj iez, m tlauel monotzaz; auh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on quj caia, atle icnopil, çan iaujl qujzca, iqueque loloca in quj momaceviaia.
column4: aw in chi kome xochitl: mhtoaia kwali, ioa akwali i nhk kwali sekkan vnka tlamavistiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlakuhloke, quj tlaliaia i xip tla, quj tlamanhliaia no iehoan in sioa tlamach chiwke, ikpachiw ke, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltika, aka vmpoaltika, sempo altika in mokaoaia ik quj tlaitlanh liaia, inhk itla vel aiske inh matis ke, toltekatiske, velalaliske, velakuhloske inh pan in tlamach, in tlakwilol: ik mochintin tlenama kaia, tlakotonaia aw mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; inh kwak neoalko, in vnkan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chikome xochitl: aun inhk amo kwali, mhtoaia, ikwak intla aka tla machchiuhquj, inekaoalis quj tla koaia, mhtoa vnka quj momasevia a avil nemhs, a avienhtis, kamhtoa, tlakwaw avilnemha, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiwke, qujlmach iehoatl in kamo kaia oaia, quj ke keloaia in in teow katka, itoka xochiketsal, ioan quj temakaia, ik temotlaia, xochisiustli, palanhlis tli aw in aqujn vel ontlamaseoa in vel monotsa, ka onka quj kaia, ma vistia, momaviskotiaia, kana mots tika vel moietstika tepaltsinko in tpk: no iw quj ipan mhtoaia, in aqujn ipantlakati, ka moch vel quj chioas in toltekaiotl, veltotoltekatis, tla tlanemhlis, ioiolis matquj ies, m tlawel monotsas; aw in tlakamo vel monotsa, atle on quj kaia, atle iknopil, san iaul qujzca, ikeke loloka in quj momaseviaia.

column3: Auh in chi come xochitl: mjtoaia qualli, ioa aqualli: y njc qualli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacujloque, quj tlaliaia y xip tla, quj tlamanjliaia: no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiuhque, icpachiuh que, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia: ic quj tlaitlanj liaia, injc itla vel aizque inj matiz que, toltecatizque, vellalalizque, vellacujlozque: inj pan in tlamach, in tlacuilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia: auh mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; ynj quac neoalco, in vncan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aun injc amo qualli, mjtoaia, iquac intla aca tla machchiuhquj, ynecaoaliz quj tla coaia, mjtoa: vnca quj momacevia a avil nemjz, a avienjtiz, camjtoa, tlaquauh avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuhque, qujlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, quj que queloaia in in teouh catca, itoca xochiquetzal, ioan quj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciujztli, palanjliz tli: auh in aqujn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca quj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no iuh quj ipan mjtoaia, in aqujn ipantlacati, ca moch vel quj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemjliz, ioioliz matquj iez, m tlauel monotzaz; auh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on quj caia, atle icnopil, çan iaujl qujzca, iqueque loloca in quj momaceviaia.
column4: auh in chi come xochitl: mhtoaia cualli, ioa acualli i nhc cualli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacuhloque, quj tlaliaia i xip tla, quj tlamanhliaia no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiuhque, icpachiuh que, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia ic quj tlaitlanh liaia, inhc itla vel aizque inh matiz que, toltecatizque, vellalalizque, vellacuhlozque inh pan in tlamach, in tlacuilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia auh mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; inh cuac neoalco, in vncan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aun inhc amo cualli, mhtoaia, icuac intla aca tla machchiuhquj, inecaoaliz quj tla coaia, mhtoa vnca quj momacevia a avil nemhz, a avienhtiz, camhtoa, tlacuauh avilnemha, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuhque, qujlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, quj que queloaia in in teouh catca, itoca xochiquetzal, ioan quj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciuztli, palanhliz tli auh in aqujn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca quj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no iuh quj ipan mhtoaia, in aqujn ipantlacati, ca moch vel quj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemhliz, ioioliz matquj iez, m tlahuel monotzaz; auh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on quj caia, atle icnopil, zan iaul qujzca, iqueque loloca in quj momaceviaia.

column3: Auh in chi come xochitl: mjtoaia qualli, ioa aqualli: y njc qualli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacujloque, quj tlaliaia y xip tla, quj tlamanjliaia: no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiuhque, icpachiuh que, achtopa qujnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia: ic quj tlaitlanj liaia, injc itla vel aizque inj matiz que, toltecatizque, vellalalizque, vellacujlozque: inj pan in tlamach, in tlacuilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia: auh mochintin maaltiaia, maujujxoaia; ynj quac neoalco, in vncan ilhuj quj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aun injc amo qualli, mjtoaia, iquac intla aca tla machchiuhquj, ynecaoaliz quj tla coaia, mjtoa: vnca quj momacevia a avil nemjz, a avienjtiz, camjtoa, tlaquauh avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiuhque, qujlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, quj que queloaia in in teouh catca, itoca xochiquetzal, ioan quj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciujztli, palanjliz tli: auh in aqujn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca quj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no iuh quj ipan mjtoaia, in aqujn ipantlacati, ca moch vel quj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemjliz, ioioliz matquj iez, m tlauel monotzaz; auh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on quj caia, atle icnopil, çan iaujl qujzca, iqueque loloca in quj momaceviaia.
column4: Aoh in chi come xochitl: mjtoaia qoalli, ioa aqoalli: y njc qoalli ceccan vnca tlamaviztiliaia, motemachiaia, in tlacojloqoe, qoj tlaliaia y xip tla, qoj tlamanjliaia: no iehoan in cioa tlamach chiohqoe, icpachioh qoe, achtopa qojnecaviliaia, na ppoaltica, aca vmpoaltica, cempo altica in mocaoaia: ic qoj tlaitlanj liaia, injc itla vel aizqoe inj matiz qoe, toltecatizqoe, vellalalizqoe, vellacojlozqoe: inj pan in tlamach, in tlacoilol: ic mochintin tlenama caia, tlacotonaia: aoh mochintin maaltiaia, maojojxoaia; ynj qoac neoalco, in vncan ilhoj qoj xtililoia, chicome xochitl: aon injc amo qoalli, mjtoaia, iqoac intla aca tla machchiohqoj, ynecaoaliz qoj tla coaia, mjtoa: vnca qoj momacevia a avil nemjz, a avienjtiz, camjtoa, tlaqoaoh avilnemja, ma aviltiaia in tlamach chiohqoe, qojlmach iehoatl in camo caia oaia, qoj qoe qoeloaia in in teooh catca, itoca xochiqoetzal, ioan qoj temacaia, ic temotlaia, xochiciojztli, palanjliz tli: aoh in aqojn vel ontlamaceoa in vel monotza, ca onca qoj caia, ma viztia, momavizcotiaia, cana motz tica vel moietztica tepaltzinco in tpc: no ioh qoj ipan mjtoaia, in aqojn ipantlacati, ca moch vel qoj chioaz in toltecaiotl, veltotoltecatiz, tla tlanemjliz, ioioliz matqoj iez, m tlaoel monotzaz; aoh in tlacamo vel monotza, atle on qoj caia, atle icnopil, çan iaojl qojzca, iqoeqoe loloca in qoj momaceviaia.

column3: Auh in chicunavi hecatl: mjtoaia, mot qujtica, moch centlantica amo qualli: in aqujn ipan tlacati, atle vel muchioa y njnemjliz, atle vel ic tlacaloia, atle vel ic tlaana, atle vel ic tlatzicoa, atle ivel nezca, atle veli, atle veliti in tlaticpac, çan iuhqujn ecatocotinemj, avic iati nemj, conmonectia in maitlali, in maacati, çan atleli: canel iuhquj itonal, conjxtoca, ipan on mjx poa, in mapupuchtecati, in mano ce cujcuj canjti, teaachti, tetlatla vicalti, tecacamanalhuj.
column4: au in chikunavi jekatl: mjtoaia, mot qujtica, moch sentlantika amo kuali in aqujn ipan tlakati, atle vel muchioa i njnemjlis, atle vel ik tlakaloia, atle vel ik tlaana, atle vel ik tlatsikoa, atle ivel neska, atle veli, atle veliti in tlatikpak, san iukjn ekatokotinemj, avik iati nemj, konmonektia in maitlali, in maakati, san atleli kanel iukj itonal, konjxtoka, ipan on mjx poa, in mapupuchtekati, in mano se kujkuj kanjti, teaachti, tetlatla vikalti, tecacamanalhuj.

column3: Auh in chicunavi hecatl: mjtoaia, mot qujtica, moch centlantica amo qualli: in aqujn ipan tlacati, atle vel muchioa y njnemjliz, atle vel ic tlacaloia, atle vel ic tlaana, atle vel ic tlatzicoa, atle ivel nezca, atle veli, atle veliti in tlaticpac, çan iuhqujn ecatocotinemj, avic iati nemj, conmonectia in maitlali, in maacati, çan atleli: canel iuhquj itonal, conjxtoca, ipan on mjx poa, in mapupuchtecati, in mano ce cujcuj canjti, teaachti, tetlatla vicalti, tecacamanalhuj.
column4: aw in chikunavi hekatl: mhtoaia, mot qujtica, moch sentlantika amo kwali in aqujn ipan tlakati, atle vel muchioa i nhnemhlis, atle vel ik tlakaloia, atle vel ik tlaana, atle vel ik tlatsikoa, atle ivel neska, atle veli, atle veliti in tlatikpak, san iwkhn ecatocotinemj, avik iati nemj, konmonektia in maitlali, in maakati, san atleli kanel iwkh itonal, konhxtoka, ipan on mhx poa, in mapupuchtekati, in mano se kuhkuh kanhti, teaachti, tetlatla vikalti, tecacamanalhuj.

column4: Aoh in chiconavi hecatl: mjtoaia, mot qojtica, moch centlantica amo qoalli: in aqojn ipan tlacati, atle vel mochioa y njnemjliz, atle vel ic tlacaloia, atle vel ic tlaana, atle vel ic tlatzicoa, atle ivel nezca, atle veli, atle veliti in tlaticpac, çan iohqojn ecatocotinemj, avic iati nemj, conmonectia in maitlali, in maacati, çan atleli: canel iohqoj itonal, conjxtoca, ipan on mjx poa, in mapopochtecati, in mano ce cojcoj canjti, teaachti, tetlatla vicalti, tecacamanalhoj.

column1: .de fo. veliti, cantlaqualania, canneia motlatlamotla, monenencoa, mo quauhtlaca in manel tiacauhti: ano çan ompouhquj, acan ona qujlo, mjtoa: aiac itztzocujtl, aiac ica, aiac quj temoa: auh intlanel neci ic motlaie cultia, in tlanel itla ic motlatlamachia aonicoati; can uih qujn ehecatl, iuh qujn atl on quj ca, atle qujtlacaloltia, atle qujtlatzicoltia, çan nen vetzi y nj tlapaliviz.(6) I njc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.(7) I njc expa moquetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcujn tli, macujlli oco matli, chiquacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi quauhtli, ma tlactli cozcaquauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl. I njz qujtetl in tonalli, mjtoaia: qualli, ieccan: auh tel cequj iitla actiuh, itzalan actiuh, injc itlacauhtiuh, in iuh moteneoaz: vncan mjtoa inneneixcaujltoca, injc tecpan tivi: in aqujn ipan tlacati pilli, in tetzon, in teizti, in tetzieueuhca, in tetzicueoallo, in tetlapanca, in tetechpa qujz, iol, in teujtztzo, in teaoaio, in tetentzon, in teix quamol, in teezco, in tetlapallo, tlatocaiotia, oalmoteniotiaia, ipal atlioaia, ipallaqualoia, te tlauhtiaia, quj temacaia, te tech quj tlaliaia in tilmatli, in maxtlatl, in tlalpilonj, in teca catl, in nacochtli: auh in tlacan maceoalli ipan tlacatia, no

column3: (6) I njc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.
column4: (6) i njk ei kapitulo, itechpa tlatoa injk etetl machiotl, injtoka se makatl: yoan in kuali tonali, in quj moma seviaia i nj pan tlakatia, in toquchti, in sioa; au intla kamo in pan neltiaia, san ie joantin in tlatsivilistika quj poloaia.

column3: (6) I njc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.
column4: (6) i nhk ei kapitulo, itechpa tlatoa inhk etetl machiotl, inhtoka se makatl: yoan in kwali tonali, in quj moma seviaia i nh pan tlakatia, in toquchti, in sioa; aw intla kamo in pan neltiaia, san ie hoantin in tlatsivilistika quj poloaia.

column3: (6) I njc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.
column4: (6) i nhc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa inhc etetl machiotl, inhtoca ce macatl: yoan in cualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia i nh pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, zan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.

column3: (6) I njc ei capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qualli tonalli, in quj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toquchti, in cioa; auh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica quj poloaia.
column4: (6) I njc ei capitolo, itechpa tlatoa: injc etetl machiotl, injtoca ce macatl: yoan in qoalli tonalli, in qoj moma ceviaia y nj pan tlacatia, in toqochti, in cioa; aoh intla camo in pan neltiaia, çan ie hoantin in tlatziviliztica qoj poloaia.

column3: (7) I njc expa moquetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcujn tli, macujlli oco matli, chiquacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi quauhtli, ma tlactli cozcaquauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl.
column4: (7) i njk expa moketsa tonali iejoatl in se makatl, noma tlaktlomej quj vika, iejoatl in vme tochtli, ei atl, navi itskujn tli, makujli oko matli, chikuasen malinali, chikome akatl, chikusi oselotl, chikunavi kuautli, ma tlaktli koskakuautli, matlaktli ose olin, matlaktlomome tekpatl, matlaktlomei quj avitl.

column3: (7) I njc expa moquetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcujn tli, macujlli oco matli, chiquacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi quauhtli, ma tlactli cozcaquauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl.
column4: (7) i nhk expa moketsa tonali iehoatl in se makatl, noma tlaktlomeh quj vika, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ei atl, navi itskuhn tli, makuhli oko matli, chikwasen malinali, chikome akatl, chikusi oselotl, chikunavi kwawtli, ma tlaktli koskakwawtli, matlaktli ose olin, matlaktlomome tekpatl, matlaktlomei quj avitl.

column3: (7) I njc expa moquetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcujn tli, macujlli oco matli, chiquacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi quauhtli, ma tlactli cozcaquauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl.
column4: (7) i nhc expa moquetza tonalli iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomeh quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ei atl, navi itzcuhn tli, macuhlli oco matli, chicuacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi cuauhtli, ma tlactli cozcacuauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl.

column3: (7) I njc expa moquetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej quj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcujn tli, macujlli oco matli, chiquacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicuci ocelotl, chicunavi quauhtli, ma tlactli cozcaquauhtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei quj avitl.
column4: (7) I njc expa moqoetza tonalli: iehoatl in ce macatl, noma tlactlomej qoj vica, iehoatl in vme tochtli, ey atl, navi itzcojn tli, macojlli oco matli, chiqoacen malinalli, chicome acatl, chicoci ocelotl, chiconavi qoaohtli, ma tlactli cozcaqoaohtli, matlactli oce olin, matlactlomome tecpatl, matlactlomei qoj aiitl.

column3: I njz qujtetl in tonalli, mjtoaia: qualli, ieccan: auh tel cequj iitla actiuh, itzalan actiuh, injc itlacauhtiuh, in iuh moteneoaz: vncan mjtoa inneneixcaujltoca, injc tecpan tivi: in aqujn ipan tlacati pilli, in tetzon, in teizti, in tetzieueuhca, in tetzicueoallo, in tetlapanca, in tetechpa qujz, iol, in teujtztzo, in teaoaio, in tetentzon, in teix quamol, in teezco, in tetlapallo, tlatocaiotia, oalmoteniotiaia, ipal atlioaia, ipallaqualoia, te tlauhtiaia, quj temacaia, te tech quj tlaliaia in tilmatli, in maxtlatl, in tlalpilonj, in teca catl, in nacochtli: auh in tlacan maceoalli ipan tlacatia, no
column4: i njs qujtetl in tonali, mjtoaia kuali, iekkan: au tel cequj iitla aktiu, itsalan aktiu, injk itlakautiu, in iu moteneoas: vnkan mjtoa inneneixkaultoka, injk tekpan tivi in aqujn ipan tlakati pili, in tetson, in teisti, in tetsieueuka, in tetsikueoalo, in tetlapanka, in tetechpa qujz, iol, in teutstso, in teaoaio, in tetentson, in teix kuamol, in teesko, in tetlapalo, tlatokaiotia, oalmoteniotiaia, ipal atlioaia, ipalakualoia, te tlautiaia, quj temakaia, te tech quj tlaliaia in tilmatli, in maxtlatl, in tlalpilonj, in teka katl, in nakochtli au in tlakan maseoali ipan tlakatia, no

column1: .de fo. iuhquj y pan muchioaia, oallac nopilhuiaia, oal quj caia, oalne mja, oqujchtia, tia cauhtia, teca caoaia, teihicaoaia: amo mopa tzaoallanj, acan tlatzimpiloa, acan tetzacuja, acan teiccauhti, xocoioti, amo patzactzintli, novi ian mochamauhtiuh, tlacha mauhtiuh, tach cauh icatiuh, tla iacatitiuh, panj icatiuh, con qujx tilitiuh y nj nemjliz, acan pina viztlamati, atle quj mamati, aiac quj mamati, atle quitzicololtia, amo pipinonemj, acan tzin qujz catlaiecoa, atle quj cioatlamach tia. Auh in tlacioapilli: anoço ca macceoallo ipan tlacatia, no iuh maceoale catca, teoqujch tlamach ti: iuh qujn oquj chpovi, teacotlaz, atle ic tenentlamachti, amo ten machonj, amo tecuetlaxo. Auh no ioan mjtoa: in aqujn ipan tlacati ce macatl: qujlmach ce ca momauhtiaia, canjmaviz in qujmattinenca, çan imauhcac in nenja, çan mamauh canenca, vel iolmj quja, inj quac qujcaquja tlatlatzinj liztli, anoço , tlavite quj liztli, tlapetlanaliztli, tlapetlanjllotl; nj man aconiecoaia, vel quj cavia ia, quj cuj cuj tiuetziltia, quj ma vizcujtia in onotlapetlan, onotla tlatzin. Auh iuh qujtoa, in que man, in quen manjan caipan neltiaia, caimaviz contocaia, ipa ontlamelaoa, caimaviz qujtla machiliaia, cainemauhtil ipan oniaauh, vel vitecoia, ipan muchi oaia in quj macaci, in quj mamalti nemj. A uh intlacanelmo xopan tla, cantonalhujteco: no io an inj quac atlan maltia, vncan mj quja, ilaqujlo, ixtelolococopina lo, iztitlatlaxo, izticocopinalo, ic mjtoa, canel iuh quj itonal, iuh quj ipan motlacatili: in iuh quj macatl, cenca momauhti anj: çan no iuh quj in aqujn ito nal catca, vel mauhca tlacatl, ma vitzoco: ic çan yca mellaquaoa, injo aniolque, y nj taoan, aque commatia. Auh ioan mjtoa: no vncan ceppa ipan temoia,

column3: iuhquj y pan muchioaia, oallac nopilhuiaia, oal quj caia, oalne mja, oqujchtia, tia cauhtia, teca caoaia, teihicaoaia: amo mopa tzaoallanj, acan tlatzimpiloa, acan tetzacuja, acan teiccauhti, xocoioti, amo patzactzintli, novi ian mochamauhtiuh, tlacha mauhtiuh, tach cauh icatiuh, tla iacatitiuh, panj icatiuh, con qujx tilitiuh y nj nemjliz, acan pina viztlamati, atle quj mamati, aiac quj mamati, atle quitzicololtia, amo pipinonemj, acan tzin qujz catlaiecoa, atle quj cioatlamach tia.

column3: Auh iuh qujtoa, in que man, in quen manjan caipan neltiaia, caimaviz contocaia, ipa ontlamelaoa, caimaviz qujtla machiliaia, cainemauhtil ipan oniaauh, vel vitecoia, ipan muchi oaia in quj macaci, in quj mamalti nemj.

column3: A uh intlacanelmo xopan tla, cantonalhujteco: no io an inj quac atlan maltia, vncan mj quja, ilaqujlo, ixtelolococopina lo, iztitlatlaxo, izticocopinalo, ic mjtoa, canel iuh quj itonal, iuh quj ipan motlacatili: in iuh quj macatl, cenca momauhti anj: çan no iuh quj in aqujn ito nal catca, vel mauhca tlacatl, ma vitzoco: ic çan yca mellaquaoa, injo aniolque, y nj taoan, aque commatia.
column4: a u intlakanelmo xopan tla, kantonaljuteko no io an inj kuak atlan maltia, vnkan mj quja, ilaqujlo, ixtelolokokopina lo, istitlatlaxo, istikokopinalo, ik mjtoa, kanel iu quj itonal, iu quj ipan motlakatili in iu quj makatl, senka momauti anj: san no iu quj in aqujn ito nal katka, vel mauka tlakatl, ma vitsoko ik san ika melakuaoa, injo aniolke, i nj taoan, ake kommatia.

(8) I njc navi capitulo: itech pa tlatoa, inj contetl calli, inj pan, y, machiotl, injtoca vme tochtli: auh in vncan tlacatia, iehoan in çan qujx cavia tlatlaoana.(9) A uh in quj oallo qujlia vme tochtli: injtoa, in aqujn ipan tla catia, cencatlaoananj, vel qujto lina qujztlaquj, qujpitzonequj in vctli, vel ocpoca, ocxixicuj: can iee in quj motequjuhtia, ipa injxpoa, quj motequjmaca, quj motlaelmaca, aquj motlacama ca, qujtlaelnequj, canjauhpovi, ipan oaliica, ipan oalmeoa, aic mozcalia, aic tlachia, aic ixquj cuj: in nel quenman, aoc qujtla quallotia, ca iuh capan in conmo maca, aocmo qujpepechtia, ioio oac in moquetza, tlachicque incha cacalaquj, tlatlapevia, aquenma tlapohuj in jiollo, avelca in maca tleconj: auh aoc quen qujmati, a mo qujtlatzilhuja, amo yvic coa, amo quj tlaeltia, in manel caxaio cujtlatl, in çan iuh quj tetzacpol, chapantica: anoce moca caioli, caiollo, moca tlacolli, tlatlacollo, caiuh quj qujtoloa, iuh quj quj colotza, qujltequj: iuh qujn chichi motempapaloa. column4: (9) A oh in qoj oallo qojlia vme tochtli: injtoa, in aqojn ipan tla catia, cencatlaoananj, vel qojto lina qojztlaqoj, qojpitzoneqoj in vctli, vel ocpoca, ocxixicoj: can iee in qoj moteqojohtia, ipa injxpoa, qoj moteqojmaca, qoj motlaelmaca, aqoj motlacama ca, qojtlaelneqoj, canjaohpovi, ipan oaliica, ipan oalmeoa, aic mozcalia, aic tlachia, aic ixqoj coj: in nel qoenman, aoc qojtla qoallotia, ca ioh capan in conmo maca, aocmo qojpepechtia, ioio oac in moqoetza, tlachicqoe incha cacalaqoj, tlatlapevia, aqoenma tlapohoj in jiollo, avelca in maca tleconj: aoh aoc qoen qojmati, a mo qojtlatzilhoja, amo yvic coa, amo qoj tlaeltia, in manel caxaio cojtlatl, in çan ioh qoj tetzacpol, chapantica: anoce moca caioli, caiollo, moca tlacolli, tlatlacollo, caioh qoj qojtoloa, ioh qoj qoj colotza, qojlteqoj: ioh qojn chichi motempapaloa.

column3: In tlacaoctle quj tta, quj tlaoanaz, ic moccoviz, quj cujtivetzi inj tilma, y njmax tli: ic noiotl ipampa quj mottitia, aocmo vel motlacaoaltia, moiollo techioa: nj man aoqujc vellaca conemj, tlacaco tlamati, in ma oc ivian oncemjlhujti, onocuel ivin tic, te quj xocomjc, onocuellapolo, tlaelivintic, aocmo quj mati, ca mjxicquetza, motzonjcquetza, cuj tlane xiuh tinemj, ixtene xiuh ti nemj, ixchichilivi, ixchichilpul, quapopoliuhtinemj, quatzoma iuhtinemj, quapopolpol, qua

column1: .de fo. tzomapol; aoc onmomatoca, aoc onmopepetla,aoco nmoquapepetla, intlanel cana momaiavi, mj xto xaoa, moiaca toxaoa, motlan quato xaoa, motlan quaxipeoa, momapoztequj, mocxipuztequj. Etc. aocmo quj mati, aocmo quj tecococamati, aoccan tlacacemelle, aoccan tlacaiectli y njx aiac: auh injma ca cue cuechca, caviviioca, papatlaca, ioan inj tlatol aocmo mj mati, ca cue cuechca, cantl atla oan catlatoa, camuch tlaca colla tolli inj camacpa quj ca, in quj ca camacaoa, canjenemj intetzatzi lia, in tetlacaqujtia, in tepinauh tia in teaoa: much qujtoa in aito lonj oiouhtinemj, tzatzitinemj, mo quj chito tinemj, momamantine mj, mocamatzaiana in cujca; atle quj mauh caitta, atle quj mamati, much quj cuj tivetzi, cacocuj, caco leoa in tequanj, in tetl, in quavitl; iteuh iquauh ietinemj, tlacatl quj coco monja, tlacatl quj cue cuetlanja, vtli quj tzatzacutine mj: ic noiotl quj mjttitia inj pil hoan, muchipa qujn ma mauhtia, quj mj icavia, quj n cecenmana, aic tlaca cochi, motlacateca: quj nj quac quauhtenvetzi, inj ellel onacic in onmellelaxiti, aoc mo qujtoa, in tlein icontlavelneciz nochan: ca mache in jvc quj mati, catlacolli qujztoc, tequjxqujtl coxontoc, inj chan, aiac tlachpana, amo tla tla, tlaioaticac, icnoivtl qujztoc, cacanjn tetlan cocochi, tetlan mo cocochteca: ca vmpanca iiollo tla chiccan, vctlaliloia, in atle quj tta vctli, iuh qujn nentlamati y iollo, iuh qujn aco pilcac, iuh qujn aac tiuetzi, iuh qujn avic iauh. Auh in tlacana otlaipantili tlaoano ia: iuh qujn vncan motlatlalia y iollo, iuh qujn iioiolipan, iuh qujn iiollo y iztaia, y iollo cece lia, vncan moteteuhtlalia, mo tepitztlalia, mocentlalia, mopac catlalia, aoctlacaoaliztlamati. A uh in tlacana tlaoancanotzalo: iuhq ujn aocie choloteoa, ie como cacaquj, iuhqujn ce inacaz, iuh qujn onvicinj, onmotlaloa, mj ciuh ca tlaloa, momamaiauhtiuh,

column4: aokmo quj mati, aokmo quj tekokokamati, aokkan tlakasemele, aokkan tlakaiektli i njx aiak: au injma ka kue kuechka, kaviviioka, papatlaka, ioan inj tlatol aokmo mj mati, ka kue kuechka, kantl atla oan katlatoa, kamuch tlaka kola toli inj kamakpa quj ka, in quj ka kamakaoa, kanjenemj intetsatsi lia, in tetlacaqujtia, in tepinau tia in teaoa much qujtoa in aito lonj oioutinemj, tsatsitinemj, mo quj chito tinemj, momamantine mj, mokamatsaiana in kujka; atle quj mau kaitta, atle quj mamati, much quj kuj tivetsi, kakokuj, kako leoa in tekuanj, in tetl, in kuavitl; iteu ikuau ietinemj, tlakatl quj koko monja, tlakatl quj kue kuetlanja, vtli quj tsatsakutine mj: ik noiotl quj mjttitia inj pil joan, muchipa qujn ma mautia, quj mj ikavia, quj n sesenmana, aik tlaka kochi, motlakateka quj nj kuak kuautenvetsi, inj elel onasik in onmelelaxiti, aok mo qujtoa, in tlein ikontlavelnesis nochan: ka mache in jvk quj mati, katlakoli qujztoc, tequjxqujtl koxontok, inj chan, aiak tlachpana, amo tla tla, tlaioatikak, iknoivtl qujztoc, kakanjn tetlan kokochi, tetlan mo kokochteka ka vmpanka iiolo tla chikkan, vktlaliloia, in atle quj tta vktli, iu qujn nentlamati i iolo, iu qujn ako pilkak, iu qujn aak tiuetsi, iu qujn avik iau.

column4: aokmo quj mati, aokmo quj tekokokamati, aokkan tlakasemele, aokkan tlakaiektli i nhx aiak: aw inhma ka kwe kwechka, kaviviioka, papatlaka, ioan inh tlatol aokmo mh mati, ka kwe kwechka, kantl atla oan katlatoa, kamuch tlaka kola toli inh kamakpa quj ka, in quj ka kamakaoa, kanhenemh intetsatsi lia, in tetlacaqujtia, in tepinaw tia in teaoa much qujtoa in aito lonh oiouhtinemj, tzatzitinemj, mo quj chito tinemj, momamantine mj, mokamatsaiana in kuhka; atle quj maw kaitta, atle quj mamati, much quj kuh tivetsi, cacocuj, kako leoa in tequanj, in tetl, in kwavitl; itew ikwaw ietinemj, tlakatl quj koko monha, tlakatl quj kwe kwetlanha, vtli quj tsatsakutine mj: ik noiotl quj mhttitia inh pil hoan, muchipa qujn ma mawtia, quj mh ikavia, quj n sesenmana, aik tlaka kochi, motlakateka quj nh kwak kwawtenvetsi, inh elel onasik in onmelelaxiti, aok mo qujtoa, in tlein ikontlavelnesis nochan: ka mache in hvk quj mati, katlakoli qujztoc, tequjxqujtl koxontok, inh chan, aiak tlachpana, amo tla tla, tlaioatikak, iknoivtl qujztoc, kakanhn tetlan kokochi, tetlan mo kokochteka ka vmpanka iiolo tla chikkan, vktlaliloia, in atle quj tta vktli, iw qujn nentlamati i iolo, iw qujn ako pilkak, iw qujn aak tiwetsi, iw qujn avik iaw.

column3: Auh in tlacana otlaipantili tlaoano ia: iuh qujn vncan motlatlalia y iollo, iuh qujn iioiolipan, iuh qujn iiollo y iztaia, y iollo cece lia, vncan moteteuhtlalia, mo tepitztlalia, mocentlalia, mopac catlalia, aoctlacaoaliztlamati.

column1: .de fo.11. aoctle ipinaviz, aocac qujmamati, aocac quj pinaoa. Auh tel aocac notle ipan quj tta, aocac quj tlaca toca, aoccan itlacato caia, çan no viian tlaelitto, tlaqualanja, aoccan vel tetlan motlalia: novian tla pacoloa: In tlacana cenielovac: te cecenmana, texixitinja, temo moiaoa: ipan macavi, tlalcavilo, ipan cactiuetzi, yc njppaculli, ic njm moiactli. Ic ytolo: canel yuhquj ytonal, quennel chioaloz: auh ca ica ne ellaquaoalo, yca netlapalolo, ytolo: cacan vetzi tiuh, cacan´popoliviz, cacan mj qujz, cacan quauh ten vetziz: aco cana motepexiviz, motlaxapuch hujz, matlanviz, matoiaviz, a tlan mjqujz, anoço cana in mac vetziz in tlaveliloque, in mac mj qujz, qujtlacujcujlizque, qujtla cencujlizque, qujtlanamoializque, quj petztoccaoazque: yoan amo can quexqujch inj pan iauh, in quj monamjctia yavil qujzca, ynj toloca: in quenman tetlan aquj, ichtequj, tepan tepantemo, teca manalhuja, tetzitzquja: ytlaoan caio maitia, vctli quj moxaiaca tia, y vc xaiac ietinemj: in oallat huj yx pupucaoa, ixten mjmjlivi, ixquatoleeoa, ichchichitintinemj, yxovcpul, aoccan motlacaitta: achcan cochcamachaloa. Auh in amo cenca tlaoanjnj in oallthuj cenca qujcocoa, muccocoa, mucvia: no ixquatoleeoa, ixeeoa, itzonte con qujcocoa, quj tzonteconeoa, aiel meuhtoc: çan quj mjliuhtoc, cemjlhujcochi, ano yellaquaz: çan motomaoa, motlaeltia: aiaxcan in quj caoa in quj mopopololtia.(10) I njc macujlli capitulo, itechpa tlatoa: in quenjn tlatlamantiticate tlaoanque.(11) I oan mjtoa, in vctli ic motene oa centzontotochti: inaca tlaoan quj; amo quj tlaveliaia, amo ica mocaiaoa, inj tonal, amo quj cu ma in vctli, amo ipan tlanecomal tia, amo quj tlavelilotilia: çan co chti motlalia, cochtica, mjc timo tlalia, mjctica, tolotimotlalia, to lotica, motapaiollalia, tapaiolca, momalcochotimotlalia, monaoa tectimotlalia, çan mocototztlalia, cototz ca, moxoxolotlalia, xoxoloca, çan mocahutica, canjviian tetlalcavia, iviian moteca, iviian quauhtenve tzi, atle ic teix conemj, quaquala catoc in cochi, cotalotoc, icotocatoc, iuhqujn moiacatzaiana, iuh qujn qujtlamachtia cochiztli. column3: (11) I oan mjtoa, in vctli ic motene oa centzontotochti: inaca tlaoan quj; amo quj tlaveliaia, amo ica mocaiaoa, inj tonal, amo quj cu ma in vctli, amo ipan tlanecomal tia, amo quj tlavelilotilia: çan co chti motlalia, cochtica, mjc timo tlalia, mjctica, tolotimotlalia, to lotica, motapaiollalia, tapaiolca, momalcochotimotlalia, monaoa tectimotlalia, çan mocototztlalia, cototz ca, moxoxolotlalia, xoxoloca, çan mocahutica, canjviian tetlalcavia, iviian moteca, iviian quauhtenve tzi, atle ic teix conemj, quaquala catoc in cochi, cotalotoc, icotocatoc, iuhqujn moiacatzaiana, iuh qujn qujtlamachtia cochiztli.

column1: .de fo.12. aca çan ie ehoca, quj xaio vito ma, iuh qujn mocnelia, iuh qujn tzitzi cunoa, iuh qujn mop atzca, iuh quj ntecivitl pixavi, iuh qujn aca cempantli qujtoca ixaio, auel mo tlacao altia, vel iiollo conqua in tlein qujlnamjctia vctli. A uh in aca canie ipac, çan ie ivel mach, in cuj catl, in cuj qujztli: amo tlatlatoz nequj, aiel quj caqujz in camanalli, in nenonotzalli, in tlatolli: iuh qujn ie quj tlapolhuja y cuj e: in onoco njc vctli, iuh qujn quj tlalnamjc tia, iuh qujn maconapotzavia y cujc, iuh qujnconanjlia vctli. Auh in aca amo cujca, çan mache tlatoa: cain ie vnmanantlatoa, çan ie tla tlatoa, tlatetoa, tequj tlatlatoa, popolocatjca, quj quj na catica, mjtleuhtica, tecacaca, techicoitoa, mochachamaoa, motlatlanjtztia, mocicinoa, moicoaitoa, moveve ilia, moveinectica, tepapatzauh tica, xixictlatotica, moquaqua cuecuechotica, mo cujltono canectica, teicnotlacaaoatica, motachcauh nectica, machicanectica: iuh qujn accan momattica, amopatzaoallanj, amo tempanavillanj, amo tena qujllanj, aiac vel qujtlatoliloch tia: vel moieoatoca, motepanavil toca, aix nez qujn itlatol, tlein mach qujtoa, iuh quj n momoloca, iuh quj n qujmomolotza ytlatol, iuh quj n quj cuecuepotza itlatol, iuh quj n moolhuja, iuh qujn motiti tza, iuh qujn cactoc quj teteca, iuh quj n tececentlaca, iuh quj n tetoto caticalac, iuh quj n tepopouhti tlaz, iuh quj n tetotoliuhtitlali, iuh quj n tecocototztlali, iuh quj n tecuj cujtiuetz, itlatol: iuh quj n tequa cecepouh, iuh quj n acontetemoa, tlein qujtoa: canjn mach ontla toa, canjn mach ontlaana, iuh quj tlatlacxotla, iuh qujn tlaquequeca: auh in ie atle conj, iuh quj n non tli iuh quj n anaoatl, vel teima caz quj, vel mauhquj; caix qujch injc mopatia, in quj teilhuja: ca aocmo njcma, in tlein nj qujto, canj vintic, canotech motlali, nj tlanecomalti. Auh in aca tlaoa quj vel ipan chicotlamati, chichi cotlacaquj, amo iuh tlatlacaquj: mjiecpa tetech quj tlamja y nj cioauh: in acaca çan conjtta, ie cuel qujlhuja: tleic tiqujxnotza in nonamjc: vncan qujpeoaltia

column3: Auh in aca amo cujca, çan mache tlatoa: cain ie vnmanantlatoa, çan ie tla tlatoa, tlatetoa, tequj tlatlatoa, popolocatjca, quj quj na catica, mjtleuhtica, tecacaca, techicoitoa, mochachamaoa, motlatlanjtztia, mocicinoa, moicoaitoa, moveve ilia, moveinectica, tepapatzauh tica, xixictlatotica, moquaqua cuecuechotica, mo cujltono canectica, teicnotlacaaoatica, motachcauh nectica, machicanectica: iuh qujn accan momattica, amopatzaoallanj, amo tempanavillanj, amo tena qujllanj, aiac vel qujtlatoliloch tia: vel moieoatoca, motepanavil toca, aix nez qujn itlatol, tlein mach qujtoa, iuh quj n momoloca, iuh quj n qujmomolotza ytlatol, iuh quj n quj cuecuepotza itlatol, iuh quj n moolhuja, iuh qujn motiti tza, iuh qujn cactoc quj teteca, iuh quj n tececentlaca, iuh quj n tetoto caticalac, iuh quj n tepopouhti tlaz, iuh quj n tetotoliuhtitlali, iuh quj n tecocototztlali, iuh quj n tecuj cujtiuetz, itlatol: iuh quj n tequa cecepouh, iuh quj n acontetemoa, tlein qujtoa: canjn mach ontla toa, canjn mach ontlaana, iuh quj tlatlacxotla, iuh qujn tlaquequeca: auh in ie atle conj, iuh quj n non tli iuh quj n anaoatl, vel teima caz quj, vel mauhquj; caix qujch injc mopatia, in quj teilhuja: ca aocmo njcma, in tlein nj qujto, canj vintic, canotech motlali, nj tlanecomalti.
column4: au in aka amo kujka, san mache tlatoa kain ie vnmanantlatoa, san ie tla tlatoa, tlatetoa, tequj tlatlatoa, popolokatjka, quj quj na katika, mjtleutika, tekakaka, techikoitoa, mochachamaoa, motlatlanjtstia, mosisinoa, moikoaitoa, moveve ilia, moveinektika, tepapatsau tika, xixiktlatotika, mokuakua kuekuechotika, mo kujltono kanektika, teiknotlakaaoatika, motachkau nektika, machikanektika iu qujn akkan momattika, amopatsaoalanj, amo tempanavilanj, amo tena qujllanj, aiak vel qujtlatoliloch tia vel moieoatoka, motepanavil toka, aix nes qujn itlatol, tlein mach qujtoa, iu quj n momoloka, iu quj n qujmomolotza itlatol, iu quj n quj kuekuepotsa itlatol, iu quj n mooljuja, iu qujn motiti tsa, iu qujn kaktok quj teteka, iu quj n tesesentlaka, iu quj n tetoto katikalak, iu quj n tepopouti tlas, iu quj n tetotoliutitlali, iu quj n tekokototstlali, iu quj n tekuj kujtiuets, itlatol: iu quj n tekua sesepou, iu quj n akontetemoa, tlein qujtoa: kanjn mach ontla toa, kanjn mach ontlaana, iu quj tlatlakxotla, iu qujn tlakekeka au in ie atle konj, iu quj n non tli iu quj n anaoatl, vel teima kas quj, vel maukj; kaix qujch injk mopatia, in quj teiljuja ka aokmo njkma, in tlein nj qujto, kanj vintik, kanotech motlali, nj tlanekomalti.

column1: .de fo.13. in qualantli, in tlauelli, in nemjc tiliztli. Etc. I oan moch quj mo cujtia, in tlein tlatollo mjtoa: ioa in tlein vetzqujlilo, in momatica iehoatl in ica nenonotzalo, in vetz qujlilo, canjliviz inteaaoa, quj veuexcatlachieltia in vctli, in tlailli. Auh in tlacioatl: capapachiuhti motlalia, capapachca, aocmo qujmati, momemelauhtimotla lia, momemelauhtica: auh intla cenca vel oivintic, in vel oiellela cic, caitzon quj quentica; vncan quauhtenvetzi, itzonpatlaoatoc, Etc. I njz qujtlamantli in : njca omoteneuh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa: caiuhquj itoch, iuh quj ito nal, iuh quj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qujca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can quexqujch injtechqujca a qualli. I oan inj quac mjtoaia, moquetza tonalli, vme tochtli: vn can ilhuj qujxtililoia, inj mach cauh totochti: in moteneoa Iz qujtecatl: auh macivin canjcel moteneoa, caoncan quj n cemjl namj quia, in totochti, ovcti, iccenca maviztililo ia in iz quj tecatl, quj tlaliaia ixip tla inj teupan; vncan quj tlama njlia, qui cuj catia, quj tlapichilia acocotica: yoan ixpan icaca te comjtl, itoca vmetochtecomatl, ten timanj, pexontimanj, in vctli; ipa manj piaztli, piazcotimanj, ma mazco, ic conj timanj in aquj que vmpa ontlatlapaloa: tel çan ie hoan in ietlaoananj, in veuetque, y njlamatque io an in iaotlaue liloque, in mjivintia: in aquen tlatta, in qujpopoa, y nintzonte con, y nj melchiqujuh, qujtozne quj: caonvicozque in quenma, in ooalmjto iaoiotl: auh noce on quj cativi, oaltecalaqujzque, ontlamatiuj: ic momjqujz que quelotinenca: auh in vctli quja, aquenman tlamja, aqueman cactoc, in contecatimanj tlachic que, tecutlachique: ixqujch oa lacitimanj in tetlachic, yn no viian tlachicpan, tlachicoaian, ca vncan vitzmana, in tlaaca ia cujcan otlatlapan, vnca achto quj teca injtlachic: ic qujtoaia

column3: Auh in tlacioatl: capapachiuhti motlalia, capapachca, aocmo qujmati, momemelauhtimotla lia, momemelauhtica: auh intla cenca vel oivintic, in vel oiellela cic, caitzon quj quentica; vncan quauhtenvetzi, itzonpatlaoatoc, Etc.
column4: au in tlasioatl: kapapachiuti motlalia, kapapachka, aokmo qujmati, momemelautimotla lia, momemelautika au intla senka vel oivintik, in vel oielela sik, kaitson quj kentika; vnkan kuautenvetsi, itsonpatlaoatok, etk.

column3: Auh in tlacioatl: capapachiuhti motlalia, capapachca, aocmo qujmati, momemelauhtimotla lia, momemelauhtica: auh intla cenca vel oivintic, in vel oiellela cic, caitzon quj quentica; vncan quauhtenvetzi, itzonpatlaoatoc, Etc.
column4: aw in tlasioatl: kapapachiwti motlalia, kapapachka, aokmo qujmati, momemelawtimotla lia, momemelawtika aw intla senka vel oivintik, in vel oielela sik, kaitson quj kentika; vnkan kwawtenvetsi, itsonpatlaoatok, etk.

column4: Aoh in tlacioatl: capapachiohti motlalia, capapachca, aocmo qojmati, momemelaohtimotla lia, momemelaohtica: aoh intla cenca vel oivintic, in vel oiellela cic, caitzon qoj qoentica; vncan qoaohtenvetzi, itzonpatlaoatoc, Etc.

column3: I njz qujtlamantli in : njca omoteneuh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa: caiuhquj itoch, iuh quj ito nal, iuh quj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qujca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can quexqujch injtechqujca a qualli.
column4: i njs qujtlamantli in : njka omoteneu, iseseiaka itech nesi, iseseiaka itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa kaiukj itoch, iu quj ito nal, iu quj ik ipan mjxkoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoso kana ovets, mjtoa omotochvi; iejika in mjekka qujca itlachioal vktli, ik mjtoa sentsontotochti ipanpa ka amo kan quexqujch injtechqujca a kuali.

column3: I njz qujtlamantli in : njca omoteneuh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa: caiuhquj itoch, iuh quj ito nal, iuh quj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qujca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can quexqujch injtechqujca a qualli.
column4: i nhs qujtlamantli in : nhka omotenew, iseseiaka itech nesi, iseseiaka itlachioal tlaoanquj, mhtoa kaiwkh itoch, iw quj ito nal, iw quj ik ipan mhxkoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoso kana ovets, mhtoa omotochvi; iehika in mhekka qujca itlachioal vktli, ik mhtoa sentsontotochti ipanpa ka amo kan quexqujch injtechqujca a kwali.

column3: I njz qujtlamantli in : njca omoteneuh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa: caiuhquj itoch, iuh quj ito nal, iuh quj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qujca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can quexqujch injtechqujca a qualli.

column3: I njz qujtlamantli in : njca omoteneuh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanquj, mjtoa: caiuhquj itoch, iuh quj ito nal, iuh quj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanquj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qujca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can quexqujch injtechqujca a qualli.
column4: I njz qojtlamantli in : njca omoteneoh, iceceiaca itech neci, iceceiaca itlachioal tlaoanqoj, mjtoa: caiohqoj itoch, ioh qoj ito nal, ioh qoj ic ipan mjxcoa, in totochtin: ioan in tlaomotepexi vi tlaoanqoj, in anoço cana ovetz, mjtoa: omotochvi; iehica in mjecca qojca itlachioal vctli, ic mjtoa: centzontotochti: ipanpa ca amo can qoexqojch injtechqojca a qoalli.

column3: I oan inj quac mjtoaia, moquetza tonalli, vme tochtli: vn can ilhuj qujxtililoia, inj mach cauh totochti: in moteneoa Iz qujtecatl: auh macivin canjcel moteneoa, caoncan quj n cemjl namj quia, in totochti, ovcti, iccenca maviztililo ia in iz quj tecatl, quj tlaliaia ixip tla inj teupan; vncan quj tlama njlia, qui cuj catia, quj tlapichilia acocotica: yoan ixpan icaca te comjtl, itoca vmetochtecomatl, ten timanj, pexontimanj, in vctli; ipa manj piaztli, piazcotimanj, ma mazco, ic conj timanj in aquj que vmpa ontlatlapaloa: tel çan ie hoan in ietlaoananj, in veuetque, y njlamatque io an in iaotlaue liloque, in mjivintia: in aquen tlatta, in qujpopoa, y nintzonte con, y nj melchiqujuh, qujtozne quj: caonvicozque in quenma, in ooalmjto iaoiotl: auh noce on quj cativi, oaltecalaqujzque, ontlamatiuj: ic momjqujz que quelotinenca: auh in vctli quja, aquenman tlamja, aqueman cactoc, in contecatimanj tlachic que, tecutlachique: ixqujch oa lacitimanj in tetlachic, yn no viian tlachicpan, tlachicoaian, ca vncan vitzmana, in tlaaca ia cujcan otlatlapan, vnca achto quj teca injtlachic: ic qujtoaia
column4: i oan inj kuak mjtoaia, moketsa tonali, vme tochtli vn kan ilhuj qujxtililoia, inj mach kau totochti in moteneoa is qujtecatl: au masivin kanjsel moteneoa, kaonkan quj n semjl namj kia, in totochti, ovkti, iksenka mavistililo ia in is quj tekatl, quj tlaliaia ixip tla inj teupan; vnkan quj tlama njlia, ki kuj katia, quj tlapichilia akokotika yoan ixpan ikaka te komjtl, itoka vmetochtekomatl, ten timanj, pexontimanj, in vktli; ipa manj piastli, piaskotimanj, ma masko, ik konj timanj in aquj ke vmpa ontlatlapaloa tel san ie joan in ietlaoananj, in veuetke, i njlamatke io an in iaotlaue liloke, in mjivintia in aken tlatta, in qujpopoa, i nintsonte kon, i nj melchiqujuh, qujtozne quj: kaonvikoske in kenma, in ooalmjto iaoiotl: au nose on quj kativi, oaltecalaqujzque, ontlamatiuj: ik momjqujz ke kelotinenka au in vktli quja, akenman tlamja, akeman kaktok, in kontekatimanj tlachik ke, tekutlachike ixqujch oa lasitimanj in tetlachik, in no viian tlachikpan, tlachikoaian, ka vnkan vitsmana, in tlaaka ia kujkan otlatlapan, vnka achto quj teka injtlachik: ik qujtoaia

column3: I oan inj quac mjtoaia, moquetza tonalli, vme tochtli: vn can ilhuj qujxtililoia, inj mach cauh totochti: in moteneoa Iz qujtecatl: auh macivin canjcel moteneoa, caoncan quj n cemjl namj quia, in totochti, ovcti, iccenca maviztililo ia in iz quj tecatl, quj tlaliaia ixip tla inj teupan; vncan quj tlama njlia, qui cuj catia, quj tlapichilia acocotica: yoan ixpan icaca te comjtl, itoca vmetochtecomatl, ten timanj, pexontimanj, in vctli; ipa manj piaztli, piazcotimanj, ma mazco, ic conj timanj in aquj que vmpa ontlatlapaloa: tel çan ie hoan in ietlaoananj, in veuetque, y njlamatque io an in iaotlaue liloque, in mjivintia: in aquen tlatta, in qujpopoa, y nintzonte con, y nj melchiqujuh, qujtozne quj: caonvicozque in quenma, in ooalmjto iaoiotl: auh noce on quj cativi, oaltecalaqujzque, ontlamatiuj: ic momjqujz que quelotinenca: auh in vctli quja, aquenman tlamja, aqueman cactoc, in contecatimanj tlachic que, tecutlachique: ixqujch oa lacitimanj in tetlachic, yn no viian tlachicpan, tlachicoaian, ca vncan vitzmana, in tlaaca ia cujcan otlatlapan, vnca achto quj teca injtlachic: ic qujtoaia
column4: I oan inj qoac mjtoaia, moqoetza tonalli, vme tochtli: vn can ilhoj qojxtililoia, inj mach caoh totochti: in moteneoa Iz qojtecatl: aoh macivin canjcel moteneoa, caoncan qoj n cemjl namj qoia, in totochti, ovcti, iccenca maviztililo ia in iz qoj tecatl, qoj tlaliaia ixip tla inj teopan; vncan qoj tlama njlia, qoi coj catia, qoj tlapichilia acocotica: yoan ixpan icaca te comjtl, itoca vmetochtecomatl, ten timanj, pexontimanj, in vctli; ipa manj piaztli, piazcotimanj, ma mazco, ic conj timanj in aqoj qoe vmpa ontlatlapaloa: tel çan ie hoan in ietlaoananj, in veoetqoe, y njlamatqoe io an in iaotlaoe liloqoe, in mjivintia: in aqoen tlatta, in qojpopoa, y nintzonte con, y nj melchiqojoh, qojtozne qoj: caonvicozqoe in qoenma, in ooalmjto yaoiotl: aoh noce on qoj cativi, oaltecalaqojzqoe, ontlamatioj: ic momjqojz qoe qoelotinenca: aoh in vctli qoja, aqoenman tlamja, aqoeman cactoc, in contecatimanj tlachic qoe, tecotlachiqoe: ixqojch oa lacitimanj in tetlachic, yn no viian tlachicpan, tlachicoaian, ca vncan iitzmana, in tlaaca ia cojcan otlatlapan, vnca achto qoj teca injtlachic: ic qojtoaia

column1: .de fo.14. tlatoiaoa, quj manjlia itlato iaoal in Iz quj tecatl, quj tlato iavilia: auh amo canjio iquac, y, in tlatoia o aia: cacan muchi pa iuh tlamanca, in iteupan.(12) I njc chiquacen capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, cequj qualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj çan tlanepan tlaca.(13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qualli, ioan amo qualli: i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nj ciuhca, vmpoliuhtiuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moquauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqujch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qua ic moquequetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaujz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa. Navi itzcujntli, cemjlhuj tonalli: in aqua ipantlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motla camatiz, iciuhca neciz, inj tech mo nequj inj auh, y nj tlaqual, in ma canelleai cemjlhujtl: aneztica in campa tepalcevi iiollo, in vmpa pati, vmpa ihiiocuj, vmpa quj tlaca cemjlhujtl: auh ca vmpa cana tepal qujc nopilhuja, injn techmonequj ipilhoan, injc ihiio cujzque, ainemachpan in ne ci quj qua: amo quimati in cam paoallauh inenca ivtlatocaia: in tlanel çan tepiton, intla onai, itla contequjpanoa, njman neci inj neiollaliliz, itlaqujcnopilhuja: yoan iuh quj toaia in tlaitzcujn nemjti, in itz cuj ntli itonal, much vel moquetzazque: oapaoazque, in jtz cujoa, aiac cocolmjqujz, iuh quj n tlanecujlivi, iuh quj n tlate xaliuj, iuh quj n tlapipitzca, mjtoaia: quenel noco itonalecapooa, in itz cujnti, injc vel itech mochioa itz cujnnemjtiliztli, ixqujch qujnna maca, auh ix quj chtlacati, moch quach qujcaia, noic mocujltonoa

column3: tlatoiaoa, quj manjlia itlato iaoal in Iz quj tecatl, quj tlato iavilia: auh amo canjio iquac, y, in tlatoia o aia: cacan muchi pa iuh tlamanca, in iteupan.
column4: tlatoiaoa, quj manjlia itlato iaoal in is quj tekatl, quj tlato iavilia au amo kanjio ikuak, i, in tlatoia o aia kakan muchi pa iu tlamanka, in iteupan.
