column3: tlatoiaoa, quj manjlia itlato iaoal in Iz quj tecatl, quj tlato iavilia: auh amo canjio iquac, y, in tlatoia o aia: cacan muchi pa iuh tlamanca, in iteupan.
column4: tlatoyaoa, qoj manjlia itlato yaoal in Iz qoj tecatl, qoj tlato iavilia: aoh amo canjio iqoac, y, in tlatoia o aia: cacan mochi pa ioh tlamanca, in iteopan.

column3: (12) I njc chiquacen capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, cequj qualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj çan tlanepan tlaca.
column4: (12) i njk chikuasen kapitulo itechpa tlatoa, in okse kali; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toka si atl, cequj kuali, cequj tetolinj, cequj san tlanepan tlaka.

column3: (12) I njc chiquacen capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, cequj qualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj çan tlanepan tlaca.
column4: (12) i nhk chikwasen kapitulo itechpa tlatoa, in okse kali; inh pan hn machiotl: inh toka si atl, cequj kwali, cequj tetolinj, cequj san tlanepan tlaka.

column3: (12) I njc chiquacen capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, cequj qualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj çan tlanepan tlaca.
column4: (12) i nhc chicuacen capitulo itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inh pan hn machiotl: inh toca ci atl, cequj cualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj zan tlanepan tlaca.

column3: (12) I njc chiquacen capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, cequj qualli, cequj tetolinj, cequj çan tlanepan tlaca.
column4: (12) I njc chiqoacen capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe calli; inj pan jn machiotl: inj toca zi atl, ceqoj qoalli, ceqoj tetolinj, ceqoj çan tlanepan tlaca.

column3: (13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qualli, ioan amo qualli: i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nj ciuhca, vmpoliuhtiuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moquauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqujch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qua ic moquequetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaujz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa.
column4: (13) i njpan si atl tonali mjtoa kuali, ioan amo kuali i pampa in aqujn ipan tlakatia, iu mjtoaia motlakamatis, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi nesia; vel motlaie koltianj: au iese ka nj siuka, vmpoliutiuetsi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iukjn atl on kika, iu qujn atoko, iu qujn amoiaoa, aik avia, aik velama ti, kannenia motlatlamotla; san nenia mokuautlaka, akan tla kako tlamatli, neli mach inj xqujch kaana, i nj motikpi, itetepon, itla kua ik mokeketsa, san atleti, kan nenvetsi i nj siaus, injtlapa livis san monenenkoa.

column3: (13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qualli, ioan amo qualli: i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nj ciuhca, vmpoliuhtiuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moquauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqujch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qua ic moquequetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaujz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa.
column4: (13) i nhpan si atl tonali mhtoa kwali, ioan amo kwali i pampa in aqujn ipan tlakatia, iw mhtoaia motlakamatis, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi nesia; vel motlaie coltianj: aw iese ka nh siwka, vmpoliwtiwetsi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iwkhn atl on kika, iw qujn atoko, iw qujn amoiaoa, aik avia, aik velama ti, kannenia motlatlamotla; san nenia mokwawtlaka, akan tla kako tlamatli, neli mach inh xqujch kaana, i nh motikpi, itetepon, itla kwa ik mokeketsa, san atleti, kan nenvetsi i nh siaus, inhtlapa livis san monenenkoa.

column3: (13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qualli, ioan amo qualli: i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nj ciuhca, vmpoliuhtiuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moquauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqujch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qua ic moquequetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaujz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa.
column4: (13) i nhpan ci atl tonalli mhtoa cualli, ioan amo cualli i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mhtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nh ciuhca, vmpoliuhtihuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; zan nenia mocuauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inh xqujch caana, i nh moticpi, itetepon, itla cua ic moquequetza, zan atleti, can nenvetzi i nh ciaujz, inhtlapa liviz zan monenencoa.

column3: (13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qualli, ioan amo qualli: i pampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqujch itlatquj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: auh iece ca nj ciuhca, vmpoliuhtiuetzi in tlein quj monextiliaia, iuhqujn atl on quica, iuh qujn atoco, iuh qujn amoiaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moquauhtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqujch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qua ic moquequetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaujz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa.
column4: (13) I njpan zi atl tonalli: mjtoa qoalli, ioan amo qoalli: i pampa in aqojn ipan tlacatia, ioh mjtoaia motlacamatiz, in ixqojch itlatqoj, aiovi necia; vel motlaie coltianj: aoh iece ca nj ciohca, vmpoliohtioetzi in tlein qoj monextiliaia, iohqojn atl on qoica, ioh qojn atoco, ioh qojn amoyaoa, aic avia, aic vellama ti, cannenia motlatlamotla; çan nenia moqoaohtlaca, acan tla caco tlamatli, nelli mach inj xqojch caana, y nj moticpi, itetepon, itla qoa ic moqoeqoetza, çan atleti, can nenvetzi y nj ciaojz, injtlapa liviz çan monenencoa.

column3: Navi itzcujntli, cemjlhuj tonalli: in aqua ipantlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motla camatiz, iciuhca neciz, inj tech mo nequj inj auh, y nj tlaqual, in ma canelleai cemjlhujtl: aneztica in campa tepalcevi iiollo, in vmpa pati, vmpa ihiiocuj, vmpa quj tlaca cemjlhujtl: auh ca vmpa cana tepal qujc nopilhuja, injn techmonequj ipilhoan, injc ihiio cujzque, ainemachpan in ne ci quj qua: amo quimati in cam paoallauh inenca ivtlatocaia: in tlanel çan tepiton, intla onai, itla contequjpanoa, njman neci inj neiollaliliz, itlaqujcnopilhuja: yoan iuh quj toaia in tlaitzcujn nemjti, in itz cuj ntli itonal, much vel moquetzazque: oapaoazque, in jtz cujoa, aiac cocolmjqujz, iuh quj n tlanecujlivi, iuh quj n tlate xaliuj, iuh quj n tlapipitzca, mjtoaia: quenel noco itonalecapooa, in itz cujnti, injc vel itech mochioa itz cujnnemjtiliztli, ixqujch qujnna maca, auh ix quj chtlacati, moch quach qujcaia, noic mocujltonoa
column4: navi itskujntli, cemjlhuj tonali in akua ipantlakatia, iu mjtoaia motla kamatis, isiuka nesis, inj tech mo nequj inj au, i nj tlakual, in ma kaneleai semjljutl: anestika in kampa tepalsevi iiolo, in vmpa pati, vmpa ijiiokuj, vmpa quj tlaka semjljutl: au ka vmpa kana tepal qujc nopiljuja, injn techmonequj ipiljoan, injk ijiio kujske, ainemachpan in ne si quj kua amo kimati in kam paoalau inenka ivtlatokaia in tlanel san tepiton, intla onai, itla contequjpanoa, njman nesi inj neiolalilis, itlaqujcnopilhuja: yoan iu quj toaia in tlaitskujn nemjti, in its kuj ntli itonal, much vel moketsaske oapaoaske, in jts kujoa, aiak cocolmjqujz, iu quj n tlanekujlivi, iu quj n tlate xaliuj, iu quj n tlapipitska, mjtoaia kenel noko itonalekapooa, in its kujnti, injk vel itech mochioa its kujnnemjtilistli, ixqujch qujnna maka, au ix quj chtlakati, moch kuach qujcaia, noik mokujltonoa

column3: Navi itzcujntli, cemjlhuj tonalli: in aqua ipantlacatia, iuh mjtoaia motla camatiz, iciuhca neciz, inj tech mo nequj inj auh, y nj tlaqual, in ma canelleai cemjlhujtl: aneztica in campa tepalcevi iiollo, in vmpa pati, vmpa ihiiocuj, vmpa quj tlaca cemjlhujtl: auh ca vmpa cana tepal qujc nopilhuja, injn techmonequj ipilhoan, injc ihiio cujzque, ainemachpan in ne ci quj qua: amo quimati in cam paoallauh inenca ivtlatocaia: in tlanel çan tepiton, intla onai, itla contequjpanoa, njman neci inj neiollaliliz, itlaqujcnopilhuja: yoan iuh quj toaia in tlaitzcujn nemjti, in itz cuj ntli itonal, much vel moquetzazque: oapaoazque, in jtz cujoa, aiac cocolmjqujz, iuh quj n tlanecujlivi, iuh quj n tlate xaliuj, iuh quj n tlapipitzca, mjtoaia: quenel noco itonalecapooa, in itz cujnti, injc vel itech mochioa itz cujnnemjtiliztli, ixqujch qujnna maca, auh ix quj chtlacati, moch quach qujcaia, noic mocujltonoa

column4: Navi itzcojntli, cemjlhoj tonalli: in aqoa ipantlacatia, ioh mjtoaia motla camatiz, iciohca neciz, inj tech mo neqoj inj aoh, y nj tlaqoal, in ma canelleai cemjlhojtl: aneztica in campa tepalcevi iiollo, in vmpa pati, vmpa ihiiocoj, vmpa qoj tlaca cemjlhojtl: aoh ca vmpa cana tepal qojc nopilhoja, injn techmoneqoj ipilhoan, injc ihiio cojzqoe, ainemachpan in ne ci qoj qoa: amo qoimati in cam paoallaoh inenca ivtlatocaia: in tlanel çan tepiton, intla onai, itla conteqojpanoa, njman neci inj neiollaliliz, itlaqojcnopilhoja: yoan ioh qoj toaia in tlaitzcojn nemjti, in itz coj ntli itonal, moch vel moqoetzazqoe: oapaoazqoe, in jtz cojoa, aiac cocolmjqojz, ioh qoj n tlanecojlivi, ioh qoj n tlate xalioj, ioh qoj n tlapipitzca, mjtoaia: qoenel noco itonalecapooa, in itz cojnti, injc vel itech mochioa itz cojnnemjtiliztli, ixqojch qojnna maca, aoh ix qoj chtlacati, moch qoach qojcaia, noic mocojltonoa

column1: .de fo.15. ia, noic vncatca initz cuj np atiiouh, itzcujne, injtz cuj nnemjtianj, ie hica caqualoia, tetech monequja, in ie vecauh, vn manca in tian qujzco, quj naoaltemaia in chichinamacoia, initz cunjn nama coia, iuh quj n tlaten metlapilivi, iuh quj n tlatentomaoa, netlatla ttililo, netlatlamectilo, neiicoltilo, in catle onanoz; in aco tetzictic, ano co pacoltic, iuh quj n tlananalca, iuh quj n tlanenecivi, mochintin teteniaoaletoque, tlatetenjlpilti, tetenjlpitoque, in tetenpopocoqujllo ietoc: auh injc qujn mjctiaia, quj tlatataquja injntzontecon, vncan quj monpolactia, qujnteteppachoa, injc çan quj mjhiiomjctia coqujati tlan: auh in itz cujne, in ie on mj quj itz cujn, icpatl concozcatia, conpepe tla, conmapepetla, qujlhuja: xi nechalmochieli, tinechalmopa naviliz in chicunaoapan: auh in cequjnti ic quj n mjc tiaia, inj quac can quj mj chtequja, chichime, ca quj nvitonja, quj ntzonvia, movito nja, moquechtzonvia. Macujl oco matli, mj toa, qualton tonalli: in aquj n ipantlacatia, çan vel ie itequjuh ilhujtl, y nemac cat ca in tlatlaquetzaliztli, in cacama nalli, in te ellelquj xtiliztli, tecece meltiliztli, amo no ic tlaqualanja, in tlein icacamanal, inj tlatlaque tzal, injc queoa vetzqujztli, injc tlauetz quj tia, mochtececemelti, mochtlapactia, mochtepac, moch teiolipan, moch mouelcaquj, aiac qujiolitlacoa: auh in tlanoço itla teiolitlaco queman quj camacaoa, ic motenpatilia, in ainemachpan tlein quj totiuetzi, çan no ie compa tia, aneztica in tleinton, ic convella lia, ic contlamachia itlatol: ic amo tlaqualanja, ipampa iuh mjtoa canel iuh quj itonal, iuh qujn ipan tlacat, in ocomatli catea avilia, mochitlacatl ic njuh, tececemjc njuh, nenequjztontli. Chiqua cen malinalli iuh mjtoa: amo qualli, tequanj tonalli: ipampa in aqujn ipan tlacatia, çan tlai hiiovitinemjn tlalticpac, toneoa tinemj, chichinacatinemj, cococ teopouhquj, qujtztinemj: auh inj pilhoan amo ceme moquetza, a vel oapauj, amo vel mooapaoa, can moch on mjc tivi: auh in que

column3: ia, noic vncatca initz cuj np atiiouh, itzcujne, injtz cuj nnemjtianj, ie hica caqualoia, tetech monequja, in ie vecauh, vn manca in tian qujzco, quj naoaltemaia in chichinamacoia, initz cunjn nama coia, iuh quj n tlaten metlapilivi, iuh quj n tlatentomaoa, netlatla ttililo, netlatlamectilo, neiicoltilo, in catle onanoz; in aco tetzictic, ano co pacoltic, iuh quj n tlananalca, iuh quj n tlanenecivi, mochintin teteniaoaletoque, tlatetenjlpilti, tetenjlpitoque, in tetenpopocoqujllo ietoc: auh injc qujn mjctiaia, quj tlatataquja injntzontecon, vncan quj monpolactia, qujnteteppachoa, injc çan quj mjhiiomjctia coqujati tlan: auh in itz cujne, in ie on mj quj itz cujn, icpatl concozcatia, conpepe tla, conmapepetla, qujlhuja: xi nechalmochieli, tinechalmopa naviliz in chicunaoapan: auh in cequjnti ic quj n mjc tiaia, inj quac can quj mj chtequja, chichime, ca quj nvitonja, quj ntzonvia, movito nja, moquechtzonvia.
column4: ia, noik vnkatka inits kuj np atiiou, itskujne, injts kuj nnemjtianj, ie jika kakualoia, tetech monequja, in ie vekau, vn manka in tian qujzco, quj naoaltemaia in chichinamakoia, inits kunjn nama koia, iu quj n tlaten metlapilivi, iu quj n tlatentomaoa, netlatla ttililo, netlatlamektilo, neiikoltilo, in katle onanos; in ako tetsiktik, ano ko pakoltik, iu quj n tlananalka, iu quj n tlanenesivi, mochintin teteniaoaletoke, tlatetenjlpilti, tetenjlpitoke, in tetenpopocoqujllo ietok: au injk qujn mjktiaia, quj tlatataquja injntsontekon, vnkan quj monpolaktia, qujnteteppachoa, injk san quj mjjiiomjktia coqujati tlan: au in its kujne, in ie on mj quj its kujn, ikpatl konkoskatia, konpepe tla, konmapepetla, qujlhuja: xi nechalmochieli, tinechalmopa navilis in chikunaoapan: au in cequjnti ik quj n mjk tiaia, inj kuak kan quj mj chtequja, chichime, ka quj nvitonja, quj ntsonvia, movito nja, mokechtsonvia.

column3: ia, noic vncatca initz cuj np atiiouh, itzcujne, injtz cuj nnemjtianj, ie hica caqualoia, tetech monequja, in ie vecauh, vn manca in tian qujzco, quj naoaltemaia in chichinamacoia, initz cunjn nama coia, iuh quj n tlaten metlapilivi, iuh quj n tlatentomaoa, netlatla ttililo, netlatlamectilo, neiicoltilo, in catle onanoz; in aco tetzictic, ano co pacoltic, iuh quj n tlananalca, iuh quj n tlanenecivi, mochintin teteniaoaletoque, tlatetenjlpilti, tetenjlpitoque, in tetenpopocoqujllo ietoc: auh injc qujn mjctiaia, quj tlatataquja injntzontecon, vncan quj monpolactia, qujnteteppachoa, injc çan quj mjhiiomjctia coqujati tlan: auh in itz cujne, in ie on mj quj itz cujn, icpatl concozcatia, conpepe tla, conmapepetla, qujlhuja: xi nechalmochieli, tinechalmopa naviliz in chicunaoapan: auh in cequjnti ic quj n mjc tiaia, inj quac can quj mj chtequja, chichime, ca quj nvitonja, quj ntzonvia, movito nja, moquechtzonvia.

column4: ia, noic vncatca initz coj np atiiooh, itzcojne, injtz coj nnemjtianj, ie hica caqoaloia, tetech moneqoja, in ie vecaoh, vn manca in tian qojzco, qoj naoaltemaia in chichinamacoia, initz conjn nama coia, ioh qoj n tlaten metlapilivi, ioh qoj n tlatentomaoa, netlatla ttililo, netlatlamectilo, neiicoltilo, in catle onanoz; in aco tetzictic, ano co pacoltic, ioh qoj n tlananalca, ioh qoj n tlanenecivi, mochintin teteniaoaletoqoe, tlatetenjlpilti, tetenjlpitoqoe, in tetenpopocoqojllo ietoc: aoh injc qojn mjctiaia, qoj tlatataqoja injntzontecon, vncan qoj monpolactia, qojnteteppachoa, injc çan qoj mjhiiomjctia coqojati tlan: aoh in itz cojne, in ie on mj qoj itz cojn, icpatl concozcatia, conpepe tla, conmapepetla, qojlhoja: xi nechalmochieli, tinechalmopa naviliz in chiconaoapan: aoh in ceqojnti ic qoj n mjc tiaia, inj qoac can qoj mj chteqoja, chichime, ca qoj niitonja, qoj ntzonvia, moiito nja, moqoechtzonvia.

column3: Macujl oco matli, mj toa, qualton tonalli: in aquj n ipantlacatia, çan vel ie itequjuh ilhujtl, y nemac cat ca in tlatlaquetzaliztli, in cacama nalli, in te ellelquj xtiliztli, tecece meltiliztli, amo no ic tlaqualanja, in tlein icacamanal, inj tlatlaque tzal, injc queoa vetzqujztli, injc tlauetz quj tia, mochtececemelti, mochtlapactia, mochtepac, moch teiolipan, moch mouelcaquj, aiac qujiolitlacoa: auh in tlanoço itla teiolitlaco queman quj camacaoa, ic motenpatilia, in ainemachpan tlein quj totiuetzi, çan no ie compa tia, aneztica in tleinton, ic convella lia, ic contlamachia itlatol: ic amo tlaqualanja, ipampa iuh mjtoa canel iuh quj itonal, iuh qujn ipan tlacat, in ocomatli catea avilia, mochitlacatl ic njuh, tececemjc njuh, nenequjztontli.
column4: makujl oko matli, mj toa, kualton tonali in aquj n ipantlakatia, san vel ie itequjuh iljutl, i nemak kat ka in tlatlaketsalistli, in kakama nali, in te ellelquj xtilistli, tesese meltilistli, amo no ik tlakualanja, in tlein ikakamanal, inj tlatlake tsal, injk keoa vetzqujztli, injk tlauets quj tia, mochtesesemelti, mochtlapaktia, mochtepak, moch teiolipan, moch mouelcaquj, aiak qujiolitlacoa: au in tlanoso itla teiolitlako keman quj kamakaoa, ik motenpatilia, in ainemachpan tlein quj totiuetsi, san no ie kompa tia, anestika in tleinton, ik konvela lia, ik kontlamachia itlatol: ik amo tlakualanja, ipampa iu mjtoa kanel iu quj itonal, iu qujn ipan tlakat, in okomatli katea avilia, mochitlakatl ik nju, tesesemjk nju, nenequjztontli.

column4: Macojl oco matli, mj toa, qoalton tonalli: in aqoj n ipantlacatia, çan vel ie iteqojoh ilhojtl, y nemac cat ca in tlatlaqoetzaliztli, in cacama nalli, in te ellelqoj xtiliztli, tecece meltiliztli, amo no ic tlaqoalanja, in tlein icacamanal, inj tlatlaqoe tzal, injc qoeoa vetzqojztli, injc tlaoetz qoj tia, mochtececemelti, mochtlapactia, mochtepac, moch teiolipan, moch mooelcaqoj, aiac qojiolitlacoa: aoh in tlanoço itla teiolitlaco qoeman qoj camacaoa, ic motenpatilia, in ainemachpan tlein qoj totioetzi, çan no ie compa tia, aneztica in tleinton, ic convella lia, ic contlamachia itlatol: ic amo tlaqoalanja, ipampa ioh mjtoa canel ioh qoj itonal, ioh qojn ipan tlacat, in ocomatli catea avilia, mochitlacatl ic njoh, tececemjc njoh, neneqojztontli.

column1: .de fo.16. man vellacutli mocuepaia, mo namacaia. Chicome acatl: mj toaia qualli, in aqujn ipan tla catia in oqujchitli, in cioatl, ma ceoale, ilhujle, nemaque, necinj inj tech monequj: onca inj axca, inj tlatquj, inj ioca: auh in tlein ma ailia, mochtlacaloa, mochonie hoati, atle nenqujca, atle nenpo livi, inj necocol, y nj ciaviz, in aitla axcanvil, inj tlapaliviztica qujtta. Chicuei ocelotl, io an chicunavi quauhtli, matlactli coz caquauh tli, matlactloce olin, matlactlomo me tecpatl. Y njz quj tetl in, atle qualli in tonalli, iuh mj toaia: in aqujn ipan tlacati, atle imaceoal, atle ilhujlti, inemacti, canoalne nenqujcan tlalticpac: auh in ma tlactlomey quj avitl, iuh mjtoa qualli; ipampa icatonaltzontli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, in oqujchtli, in cioatl, tlacnopilhujanj, mochonca inj tech monequj, in quj qua, in quj, atle monectoc inj chan; auh io an mjto aia vevetiz, y lamatiz, tlachicalhujz, coliviz: ipampa ca quj tlamja in to nalli ipan otlacat.(14) q I nic chicome capitulo, itech patlatoa: injc nauhtetl machi otl, y njtoca ce xuchitl: auh in toqujchti ipan tlacatia, qujto aia: qujlmach papaqujnj iez, vel mozcalianj: ioan vel quj mocujtlavia in cujcatl, ioan in paqujliztli, ioan cacamanal tinj, cacamanale: auh qujl in cioa, vevey tlamachiuhque: qujl mach çan tlanepantla ca injn machiotl, quj toz nequj achi te tolinj, ioan achi qualli.(15) Moquetza ce suchitl, ioan y njz qui tetl y tlavilanoan: injc matlactetl omei tonalli muchi uhtica in yehoatl conto qujlia vme cipactli, yoan ey acatl, na vi calli, macujlli cuetzpali, chi quacen coatl, chicome mjqujz tli, chicuei macatl, chicunavi tochtli, matlactli atl, matlac tli oce y tzcujntli, matlactlomo me ocomatli, matlactlomey malinalli: injzqujtetl in, mj toaia amo qualli: auh yoan mj toaia, achi qualli. I njc motta inaqujn ipan tlacatia pilli, inanoço çan maceoalli cuj canj, papa quj nj, tlatlaque tzanj, totoltecatl muchioaia:

column3: Y njz quj tetl in, atle qualli in tonalli, iuh mj toaia: in aqujn ipan tlacati, atle imaceoal, atle ilhujlti, inemacti, canoalne nenqujcan tlalticpac: auh in ma tlactlomey quj avitl, iuh mjtoa qualli; ipampa icatonaltzontli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, in oqujchtli, in cioatl, tlacnopilhujanj, mochonca inj tech monequj, in quj qua, in quj, atle monectoc inj chan; auh io an mjto aia vevetiz, y lamatiz, tlachicalhujz, coliviz: ipampa ca quj tlamja in to nalli ipan otlacat.
column4: i njs quj tetl in, atle kuali in tonali, iu mj toaia in aqujn ipan tlakati, atle imaseoal, atle iljulti, inemakti, kanoalne nenqujcan tlaltikpak: au in ma tlaktlomei quj avitl, iu mjtoa kuali; ipampa ikatonaltsontli, in aqujn ipan tlakatia, in oqujchtli, in sioatl, tlaknopiljujanj, mochonka inj tech monequj, in quj kua, in quj, atle monektok inj chan; au io an mjto aia vevetis, i lamatis, tlachikaljus, kolivis: ipampa ka quj tlamja in to nali ipan otlakat.

column3: (14) q I nic chicome capitulo, itech patlatoa: injc nauhtetl machi otl, y njtoca ce xuchitl: auh in toqujchti ipan tlacatia, qujto aia: qujlmach papaqujnj iez, vel mozcalianj: ioan vel quj mocujtlavia in cujcatl, ioan in paqujliztli, ioan cacamanal tinj, cacamanale: auh qujl in cioa, vevey tlamachiuhque: qujl mach çan tlanepantla ca injn machiotl, quj toz nequj achi te tolinj, ioan achi qualli.
column4: (14) q i nik chikome kapitulo, itech patlatoa injk nautetl machi otl, i njtoka se xuchitl: au in toqujchti ipan tlakatia, qujto aia qujlmach papaqujnj ies, vel moskalianj: ioan vel quj mokujtlavia in kujkatl, ioan in paqujliztli, ioan kakamanal tinj, kakamanale au qujl in sioa, vevei tlamachiuke qujl mach san tlanepantla ka injn machiotl, quj tos nequj achi te tolinj, ioan achi kuali.

column3: (14) q I nic chicome capitulo, itech patlatoa: injc nauhtetl machi otl, y njtoca ce xuchitl: auh in toqujchti ipan tlacatia, qujto aia: qujlmach papaqujnj iez, vel mozcalianj: ioan vel quj mocujtlavia in cujcatl, ioan in paqujliztli, ioan cacamanal tinj, cacamanale: auh qujl in cioa, vevey tlamachiuhque: qujl mach çan tlanepantla ca injn machiotl, quj toz nequj achi te tolinj, ioan achi qualli.

column3: (15) Moquetza ce suchitl, ioan y njz qui tetl y tlavilanoan: injc matlactetl omei tonalli muchi uhtica in yehoatl conto qujlia vme cipactli, yoan ey acatl, na vi calli, macujlli cuetzpali, chi quacen coatl, chicome mjqujz tli, chicuei macatl, chicunavi tochtli, matlactli atl, matlac tli oce y tzcujntli, matlactlomo me ocomatli, matlactlomey malinalli: injzqujtetl in, mj toaia amo qualli: auh yoan mj toaia, achi qualli.
column4: (15) moketsa se suchitl, ioan i njs ki tetl i tlavilanoan: injk matlaktetl omei tonali muchi utika in yejoatl konto qujlia vme sipaktli, yoan ei akatl, na vi kali, makujli kuetspali, chi kuasen koatl, chikome mjqujz tli, chikuei makatl, chikunavi tochtli, matlaktli atl, matlak tli ose i tskujntli, matlaktlomo me okomatli, matlaktlomei malinali injzqujtetl in, mj toaia amo kuali au yoan mj toaia, achi kuali.

column3: (15) Moquetza ce suchitl, ioan y njz qui tetl y tlavilanoan: injc matlactetl omei tonalli muchi uhtica in yehoatl conto qujlia vme cipactli, yoan ey acatl, na vi calli, macujlli cuetzpali, chi quacen coatl, chicome mjqujz tli, chicuei macatl, chicunavi tochtli, matlactli atl, matlac tli oce y tzcujntli, matlactlomo me ocomatli, matlactlomey malinalli: injzqujtetl in, mj toaia amo qualli: auh yoan mj toaia, achi qualli.

column3: (15) Moquetza ce suchitl, ioan y njz qui tetl y tlavilanoan: injc matlactetl omei tonalli muchi uhtica in yehoatl conto qujlia vme cipactli, yoan ey acatl, na vi calli, macujlli cuetzpali, chi quacen coatl, chicome mjqujz tli, chicuei macatl, chicunavi tochtli, matlactli atl, matlac tli oce y tzcujntli, matlactlomo me ocomatli, matlactlomey malinalli: injzqujtetl in, mj toaia amo qualli: auh yoan mj toaia, achi qualli.
column4: (15) Moqoetza ce sochitl, ioan y njz qoi tetl y tlavilanoan: injc matlactetl omei tonalli mochi ohtica in yehoatl conto qojlia vme cipactli, yoan ey acatl, na vi calli, macojlli coetzpali, chi qoacen coatl, chicome mjqojz tli, chicoei macatl, chiconavi tochtli, matlactli atl, matlac tli oce y tzcojntli, matlactlomo me ocomatli, matlactlomey malinalli: injzqojtetl in, mj toaia amo qoalli: aoh yoan mj toaia, achi qoalli.

column1: .de fo.17. auh qujttaia, quj maceoaia inj neiollaliliz, inj netlamachtil, pac tinenca, vellamatia: inj quac ipan mjmatia y tonal, quj tozne quj: inj quac vel monotzaia, in vel ontlamaceoa. A uh inaqujn amo ipan mjmatia, in atle ipan quj ttaia: çan quj tlavelia y nj to nal: caiuh mjtoa: inj quac a qujn cuj canj, anoço aca toltecatl, tlachichiuhquj: in tlaievnca quj quanj, yevnca y necujltonol: auh ie conpopoa, ijxco, ij cpac, ie quj mana, contepopoaltia, yzic mo quetza, iz ic moqujxtia, icte ijxco, teicpac nemj, ic atlamattine mj, ic cuecuenoti, injx, injiollo, inj cuj canjo, ininemach, inj etlatla tianj, injc tlaiolhujanj, injc cujcapi qujnj, inic cuj catoltecatl: auh intla cana coanotzalo, cuicatlalhujlo, tla caqujtilo, molcaoaltilo, aocmo vm pa conjtta, aoctleipan qujtta, inj aviaca, inj tzopelica intloque, in na oaque, in xochitl, injetl, in atl, in tlaqualli: auh in netilmatli, ipam pa canel ie muchi vnca inj chan, ca aoctle monectoc, aoctle quitemachia, in iuh momati, ioan in tenan, in teta, in tecutli, in ach cauhtli, y ia otequj oa, aoctle ipan qujttez, aocactle con poa, aocac quixtilia, aocnoiellatoa, in aca quj namj quj, in quj motlapal huia, in ic noveve, y njc noilama, in tlapaltzintli: aocmo vmpa conjtta, ca iiacacpantlatoa, ca on quj quj naca, ca con quj quj natza, caia ca quj qujn tlatoa; ic mjtoa canel ie catlamach tia inj necuiltonol, caaoctle ipan qujtlattilia, inj palnemoanj: auh in telic oqujmanjli, inj palnemoanj, in oqujmotzitzqujli, conmocaoal tilia inj maceoal, amo nenqujca y nj atlamachiliz, y matlamatiliz: njma cocoliztli itech motlalia, aco ixpopo ioti, quexilivi anoço tlapalanal tia, cocototzavi, cooacivi, anoço non ti, nonoti, naca tzatzati, nacaztzatza ivi, anoço tlanquaalaviliztli, xuchi civiztli, qualocatl, qualoc itech mo tlalia, xomolli, caltechtli conjttitia in tete cujo, caltechtli contocatimo teca, motzontlaujtiotinemj, moqua tlaujtzotinemj, iquatla mantinemj, mjpitztinemj, mociauhpouhtinemj, mociauhquetztinemj: ie vncan in mo mjqujtlanj, ito neuh copa, ito neuh cacopa, aoc iatlamatian, acontla iecoa, in quj inj tlanjtoc mj quj ztli, in ma cuele popolivi, aocac noica; ocac qujmo cujtia, aocac quj mj xi matcatoca; catlatlatto, vel conjtta vmpa on quj ca injc notlacaiotl, tla tlatlamj, iuh qujn atl on quj ca in jx

column3: auh qujttaia, quj maceoaia inj neiollaliliz, inj netlamachtil, pac tinenca, vellamatia: inj quac ipan mjmatia y tonal, quj tozne quj: inj quac vel monotzaia, in vel ontlamaceoa.
column4: aoh qojttaia, qoj maceoaia inj neiollaliliz, inj netlamachtil, pac tinenca, vellamatia: inj qoac ipan mjmatia y tonal, qoj tozne qoj: inj qoac vel monotzaia, in vel ontlamaceoa.

column3: A uh inaqujn amo ipan mjmatia, in atle ipan quj ttaia: çan quj tlavelia y nj to nal: caiuh mjtoa: inj quac a qujn cuj canj, anoço aca toltecatl, tlachichiuhquj: in tlaievnca quj quanj, yevnca y necujltonol: auh ie conpopoa, ijxco, ij cpac, ie quj mana, contepopoaltia, yzic mo quetza, iz ic moqujxtia, icte ijxco, teicpac nemj, ic atlamattine mj, ic cuecuenoti, injx, injiollo, inj cuj canjo, ininemach, inj etlatla tianj, injc tlaiolhujanj, injc cujcapi qujnj, inic cuj catoltecatl: auh intla cana coanotzalo, cuicatlalhujlo, tla caqujtilo, molcaoaltilo, aocmo vm pa conjtta, aoctleipan qujtta, inj aviaca, inj tzopelica intloque, in na oaque, in xochitl, injetl, in atl, in tlaqualli: auh in netilmatli, ipam pa canel ie muchi vnca inj chan, ca aoctle monectoc, aoctle quitemachia, in iuh momati, ioan in tenan, in teta, in tecutli, in ach cauhtli, y ia otequj oa, aoctle ipan qujttez, aocactle con poa, aocac quixtilia, aocnoiellatoa, in aca quj namj quj, in quj motlapal huia, in ic noveve, y njc noilama, in tlapaltzintli: aocmo vmpa conjtta, ca iiacacpantlatoa, ca on quj quj naca, ca con quj quj natza, caia ca quj qujn tlatoa; ic mjtoa canel ie catlamach tia inj necuiltonol, caaoctle ipan qujtlattilia, inj palnemoanj: auh in telic oqujmanjli, inj palnemoanj, in oqujmotzitzqujli, conmocaoal tilia inj maceoal, amo nenqujca y nj atlamachiliz, y matlamatiliz: njma cocoliztli itech motlalia, aco ixpopo ioti, quexilivi anoço tlapalanal tia, cocototzavi, cooacivi, anoço non ti, nonoti, naca tzatzati, nacaztzatza ivi, anoço tlanquaalaviliztli, xuchi civiztli, qualocatl, qualoc itech mo tlalia, xomolli, caltechtli conjttitia in tete cujo, caltechtli contocatimo teca, motzontlaujtiotinemj, moqua tlaujtzotinemj, iquatla mantinemj, mjpitztinemj, mociauhpouhtinemj, mociauhquetztinemj: ie vncan in mo mjqujtlanj, ito neuh copa, ito neuh cacopa, aoc iatlamatian, acontla iecoa, in quj inj tlanjtoc mj quj ztli, in ma cuele popolivi, aocac noica; ocac qujmo cujtia, aocac quj mj xi matcatoca; catlatlatto, vel conjtta vmpa on quj ca injc notlacaiotl, tla tlatlamj, iuh qujn atl on quj ca in jx
column4: a u inaqujn amo ipan mjmatia, in atle ipan quj ttaia san quj tlavelia i nj to nal: kaiu mjtoa inj kuak a qujn kuj kanj, anoso aka toltekatl, tlachichiukj: in tlaievnka quj kuanj, yevnka i nekujltonol: au ie konpopoa, ijxko, ij kpak, ie quj mana, kontepopoaltia, isik mo ketsa, is ik moqujxtia, ikte ijxko, teikpak nemj, ik atlamattine mj, ik kuekuenoti, injx, injiolo, inj kuj kanjo, ininemach, inj etlatla tianj, injk tlaioljujanj, injk kujkapi qujnj, inik kuj katoltekatl: au intla kana koanotsalo, kuikatlaljulo, tla caqujtilo, molkaoaltilo, aokmo vm pa konjtta, aoktleipan qujtta, inj aviaka, inj tsopelika intloke, in na oake, in xochitl, injetl, in atl, in tlakuali au in netilmatli, ipam pa kanel ie muchi vnka inj chan, ka aoktle monektok, aoktle kitemachia, in iu momati, ioan in tenan, in teta, in tekutli, in ach kautli, i ia otequj oa, aoktle ipan qujttez, aokaktle kon poa, aokak kixtilia, aoknoielatoa, in aka quj namj quj, in quj motlapal uia, in ik noveve, i njk noilama, in tlapaltsintli aokmo vmpa konjtta, ka iiakakpantlatoa, ka on quj quj naka, ka kon quj quj natsa, kaia ka quj qujn tlatoa; ik mjtoa kanel ie katlamach tia inj nekuiltonol, kaaoktle ipan qujtlattilia, inj palnemoanj: au in telik oqujmanjli, inj palnemoanj, in oqujmotzitzqujli, konmokaoal tilia inj maseoal, amo nenqujca i nj atlamachilis, i matlamatilis: njma kokolistli itech motlalia, ako ixpopo ioti, kexilivi anoso tlapalanal tia, kokototsavi, kooasivi, anoso non ti, nonoti, naka tsatsati, nakastsatsa ivi, anoso tlankuaalavilistli, xuchi sivistli, kualokatl, kualok itech mo tlalia, xomoli, kaltechtli konjttitia in tete kujo, kaltechtli kontokatimo teka, motsontlautiotinemj, mokua tlautsotinemj, ikuatla mantinemj, mjpitstinemj, mosiaupoutinemj, mosiauketstinemj: ie vnkan in mo mjqujtlanj, ito neu kopa, ito neu kakopa, aok iatlamatian, akontla iekoa, in quj inj tlanjtok mj quj stli, in ma kuele popolivi, aokak noika; okak qujmo kujtia, aokak quj mj xi matkatoka; katlatlatto, vel konjtta vmpa on quj ka injk notlakaiotl, tla tlatlamj, iu qujn atl on quj ka in jx

ic mjtoa canel ie catlamach tia inj necoiltonol, caaoctle ipan qojtlattilia, inj palnemoanj: aoh in telic oqojmanjli, inj palnemoanj, in oqojmotzitzqojli, conmocaoal tilia inj maceoal, amo nenqojca y nj atlamachiliz, y matlamatiliz: njma cocoliztli itech motlalia, aco ixpopo ioti, qoexilivi anoço tlapalanal tia, cocototzavi, cooacivi, anoço non ti, nonoti, naca tzatzati, nacaztzatza ivi, anoço tlanqoaalaviliztli, xochi civiztli, qoalocatl, qoaloc itech mo tlalia, xomolli, caltechtli conjttitia in tete cojo, caltechtli contocatimo teca, motzontlaojtiotinemj, moqoa tlaojtzotinemj, iqoatla mantinemj, mjpitztinemj, mociaohpoohtinemj, mociaohqoetztinemj: ie vncan in mo mjqojtlanj, ito neoh copa, ito neoh cacopa, aoc iatlamatian, acontla iecoa, in qoj inj tlanjtoc mj qoj ztli, in ma coele popolivi, aocac noica; ocac qojmo cojtia, aocac qoj mj xi matcatoca; catlatlatto, vel conjtta vmpa on qoj ca injc notlacaiotl, tla tlatlamj, ioh qojn atl on qoj ca in jx

column1: .de fo.18. qujch ocatlamachtiaia ytlat quj, vellanaoac tlavica, quj petztoccaoa in cocoliztli, iz quj mpan atlamatti nemj, in atle monectoc ichan: auh injc on mj quj, catetlaoculti, aoctle itech vetz totiuh, capetlauhtiuh, aoc necinj in tlein iq uj mj liuhca, veltoto neoatiuh, chichichinacatiuh in jiollo, vel iiacacpa quj qujztiuh in netoli njliztli, ca iuh quj oniauh, iuh quj onpopolivi: ipampa caueli nocon cauh y maceoal, injc oiztlacattinen vevetitlan, aiacachtitlan: caiuh mj toa, tlaalavi, tlapetzcavi, atlaca cemellecan: vncan vilantoc in tzo tzomatli, intatapatli, vnca mace oalo injc noiotl, injc notlacaiotl: auh vncan icac, in vei atoiatl, in vei tepexitl, in tlaxapuchtli, vnca neato iavilo, netepexivilio, netla xapuchvilo; ioan vncan manj in tzonoaztli, vncan netzonoazvilo: ic mjtoa; in aqujn iuhquj ipan muchioaia, y, qualli ocatca: inj to nal, inj maceoal, caineviian, caon monevianvi, in oconmjtlacalhuj, in oconmopopolhuj, yno conniotla colmjctili. Etc. A uh intlaaca ci oatl, ipantlacatia ce suchitl; mj toaia, vuellamachchiuhquj iez: auh iece injc vel quicnopilhujz imace oal, injc vel qujttaz tlamachtli, ce ca tlama ceoaia, mo caoaia, mj coia, inj quac moquetzaia ce suchitl to nalli: auh intlacamo tlamaceoa, intlacamo vel monotza, intlacamo vellaoapaoalli, vellazcaltilli mo chioa, çan no quj tlaueliaia y nj to nal: no iuh quj ipan muchioaia, (in iuh omjto njcan) atle on quj ca ia, çan moch ic noiotl, netoliniliztli in quj momaceviac auh injc ca on tlatzontia, ontlatzon qujx tia, ca aujl qujz caiotl, inj nemac mochi oa, aavienjti, maaujltia, mona namaca, motzitzin namaca: ic mj toa, canel iuh quj itonal, in ce su chitl, ca vme vitzqujtoa, qualli, ioa a qualli. No yoan mjtoa, inj quac moquetzaia ce suchitl: vncan oncempeoa, vncan vnmocemana, in muchipa maceoalo, netotilo, can iee quj mati in Motecucuma y iollo tlama aiac quj iocoia, in quez qujlhujtl, quj tlaliz y mace oaliz in aco vmpoalilhujtl manjz maceoaliztli: auh injc necia, y njc temaceoaliztlalhujloia, vme su chiquavitl oalmoquetzaia, oal momanaia tecpan, tlatocan: yc monextia in suchilhujtl, suchi

column3: qujch ocatlamachtiaia ytlat quj, vellanaoac tlavica, quj petztoccaoa in cocoliztli, iz quj mpan atlamatti nemj, in atle monectoc ichan: auh injc on mj quj, catetlaoculti, aoctle itech vetz totiuh, capetlauhtiuh, aoc necinj in tlein iq uj mj liuhca, veltoto neoatiuh, chichichinacatiuh in jiollo, vel iiacacpa quj qujztiuh in netoli njliztli, ca iuh quj oniauh, iuh quj onpopolivi: ipampa caueli nocon cauh y maceoal, injc oiztlacattinen vevetitlan, aiacachtitlan: caiuh mj toa, tlaalavi, tlapetzcavi, atlaca cemellecan: vncan vilantoc in tzo tzomatli, intatapatli, vnca mace oalo injc noiotl, injc notlacaiotl: auh vncan icac, in vei atoiatl, in vei tepexitl, in tlaxapuchtli, vnca neato iavilo, netepexivilio, netla xapuchvilo; ioan vncan manj in tzonoaztli, vncan netzonoazvilo: ic mjtoa; in aqujn iuhquj ipan muchioaia, y, qualli ocatca: inj to nal, inj maceoal, caineviian, caon monevianvi, in oconmjtlacalhuj, in oconmopopolhuj, yno conniotla colmjctili.
column4: qujch okatlamachtiaia itlat quj, velanaoak tlavika, quj petstokkaoa in kokolistli, is quj mpan atlamatti nemj, in atle monektok ichan: au injk on mj quj, katetlaokulti, aoktle itech vets totiu, kapetlautiu, aok nesinj in tlein iq uj mj liuka, veltoto neoatiu, chichichinakatiu in jiolo, vel iiakakpa quj qujztiuh in netoli njlistli, ka iu quj oniau, iu quj onpopolivi ipampa kaueli nokon kau i maseoal, injk oistlakattinen vevetitlan, aiakachtitlan: kaiu mj toa, tlaalavi, tlapetskavi, atlaka semelekan: vnkan vilantok in tso tsomatli, intatapatli, vnka mase oalo injk noiotl, injk notlakaiotl: au vnkan ikak, in vei atoiatl, in vei tepexitl, in tlaxapuchtli, vnka neato iavilo, netepexivilio, netla xapuchvilo; ioan vnkan manj in tsonoastli, vnkan netsonoasvilo ik mjtoa; in aqujn iukj ipan muchioaia, i, kuali okatka inj to nal, inj maseoal, kaineviian, kaon monevianvi, in oconmjtlacalhuj, in oconmopopolhuj, ino konniotla kolmjktili.

column3: No yoan mjtoa, inj quac moquetzaia ce suchitl: vncan oncempeoa, vncan vnmocemana, in muchipa maceoalo, netotilo, can iee quj mati in Motecucuma y iollo tlama aiac quj iocoia, in quez qujlhujtl, quj tlaliz y mace oaliz in aco vmpoalilhujtl manjz maceoaliztli: auh injc necia, y njc temaceoaliztlalhujloia, vme su chiquavitl oalmoquetzaia, oal momanaia tecpan, tlatocan: yc monextia in suchilhujtl, suchi
column4: No yoan mjtoa, inj qoac moqoetzaia ce sochitl: vncan oncempeoa, vncan vnmocemana, in mochipa maceoalo, netotilo, can iee qoj mati in Motecocoma y iollo tlama aiac qoj iocoia, in qoez qojlhojtl, qoj tlaliz y mace oaliz in aco vmpoalilhojtl manjz maceoaliztli: aoh injc necia, y njc temaceoaliztlalhojloia, vme so chiqoavitl oalmoqoetzaia, oal momanaia tecpan, tlatocan: yc monextia in sochilhojtl, sochi

column1: .de fo.19. pacoa, nexuchitlamachtilo: vnca tlatlatlamj, tlanene quj in tlato anj, in catle cuj catl coneoaz, in anoço cuextecaiotl, tlaoan ca cuex tecaiotl, vexotzin caiotl, anaoaca iotl, oztome caiotl, nonooalcaiotl, cozcatecaiotl, tenj caiotl, tepetla caiotl, chichimecaiotl, metz titlan cal caiotl, oton cuj catl, quata cuj catl, toch cuj catl, teponaz cujcatl. Etc. cioa cuj catl, atzotzo col cuj catl; auh in anoço çan aujl cuj catl, ix cuecuech cuj catl, coco cuj catl, quap pitz cuj catl, quateco quj cuj catl, aujl cuj catl. Etc. yc mjtoaia ca nel onj cac in suchitl. Ioan vnca quj cen qujx tiaia, in cacalpixque injxquj ch imaceollat quj tlatoanj, quj tlanenectia, quj tlatlattitia, in catle coneleujz, ipan onmjtotiz, ipan ontetlattitiz: ioan vncan qujn tlavizmacaia, in tiacaoan, inte tlaujcecaoa, in otomj, in quaqua chicti, in tlatlacatecca, in tlatla cochcalca, in tevite quj nj, intema lacachoa nj, in te vilte quj nj, inte tzacujia nj, in tetlallanvianj: yoan vel oncan mocnaviaia, mopixquj aia, tlatemachiaia, netlauhtiltica, inj xquich cuj canj, ma ceoal cuj ca nj, in cuj catlalianj, in cuj capiquj nj: auh in tlatz otzon quj, in veve tzon quj, teponaco, teponacpanj cuj caito, cuj ca a nquj, cuj catlaz quj, yoan in mapipitzoanj; auh in teia canquj, in teia cananj, mjto ia nj, motlaqujtotianj, tlamoiauhquj, tozca cue cuechoanj, to cuj lechoanj, tlacocoloanj: mochiehoan in tech povia, intech acia, in mjtoa: ix pampa vitz, itlaqualtzin, in tla qualtectli, in quate cuj cujlli, xoco tamalli, tenextamalli, tetamalli, tzincujtl, tamaltetl, vei tlaqualli, quauh tlaqualli, tlaxcalmj mjlli, tlacuel pacholli, tlaciio cuepalli, tlaz cal cototztli, totol quj mjlli, tama mjmjlli, tamalatl, tamal cue cuech tli, papaiax tlaxcalli, papaian tlaxcalpacholli, nacatlaoio. Auh inj quac otlatziuh, in ocontlatzil huj maceoaliztli, nj man quj cala quj aia, quj tlatiaia, in vme zu chiquavitl: auh iquac occentlama tli, ic quj xip tlaiotiaia, quj chi chioaia, çan no suchiquavitl: ie hoatl tlatlaia, quj tlatiaia, quj tecaviaia: ic cactimomanaia, cac tiuetzia tlamattimomana in alte

column3: Ioan vnca quj cen qujx tiaia, in cacalpixque injxquj ch imaceollat quj tlatoanj, quj tlanenectia, quj tlatlattitia, in catle coneleujz, ipan onmjtotiz, ipan ontetlattitiz: ioan vncan qujn tlavizmacaia, in tiacaoan, inte tlaujcecaoa, in otomj, in quaqua chicti, in tlatlacatecca, in tlatla cochcalca, in tevite quj nj, intema lacachoa nj, in te vilte quj nj, inte tzacujia nj, in tetlallanvianj: yoan vel oncan mocnaviaia, mopixquj aia, tlatemachiaia, netlauhtiltica, inj xquich cuj canj, ma ceoal cuj ca nj, in cuj catlalianj, in cuj capiquj nj: auh in tlatz otzon quj, in veve tzon quj, teponaco, teponacpanj cuj caito, cuj ca a nquj, cuj catlaz quj, yoan in mapipitzoanj; auh in teia canquj, in teia cananj, mjto ia nj, motlaqujtotianj, tlamoiauhquj, tozca cue cuechoanj, to cuj lechoanj, tlacocoloanj: mochiehoan in tech povia, intech acia, in mjtoa: ix pampa vitz, itlaqualtzin, in tla qualtectli, in quate cuj cujlli, xoco tamalli, tenextamalli, tetamalli, tzincujtl, tamaltetl, vei tlaqualli, quauh tlaqualli, tlaxcalmj mjlli, tlacuel pacholli, tlaciio cuepalli, tlaz cal cototztli, totol quj mjlli, tama mjmjlli, tamalatl, tamal cue cuech tli, papaiax tlaxcalli, papaian tlaxcalpacholli, nacatlaoio.

column4: Ioan vnca qoj cen qojx tiaia, in cacalpixqoe injxqoj ch imaceollat qoj tlatoanj, qoj tlanenectia, qoj tlatlattitia, in catle coneleojz, ipan onmjtotiz, ipan ontetlattitiz: ioan vncan qojn tlavizmacaia, in tiacaoan, inte tlaojcecaoa, in otomj, in qoaqoa chicti, in tlatlacatecca, in tlatla cochcalca, in teiite qoj nj, intema lacachoa nj, in te vilte qoj nj, inte tzacojia nj, in tetlallanvianj: yoan vel oncan mocnaviaia, mopixqoj aia, tlatemachiaia, netlaohtiltica, inj xqoich coj canj, ma ceoal coj ca nj, in coj catlalianj, in coj capiqoj nj: aoh in tlatz otzon qoj, in veve tzon qoj, teponaco, teponacpanj coj caito, coj ca a nqoj, coj catlaz qoj, yoan in mapipitzoanj; aoh in teia canqoj, in teia cananj, mjto ia nj, motlaqojtotianj, tlamoiaohqoj, tozca coe coechoanj, to coj lechoanj, tlacocoloanj: mochiehoan in tech povia, intech acia, in mjtoa: ix pampa iitz, itlaqoaltzin, in tla qoaltectli, in qoate coj cojlli, xoco tamalli, tenextamalli, tetamalli, tzincojtl, tamaltetl, vei tlaqoalli, qoaoh tlaqoalli, tlaxcalmj mjlli, tlacoel pacholli, tlaciio coepalli, tlaz cal cototztli, totol qoj mjlli, tama mjmjlli, tamalatl, tamal coe coech tli, papaiax tlaxcalli, papaian tlaxcalpacholli, nacatlaoio.

column3: Auh inj quac otlatziuh, in ocontlatzil huj maceoaliztli, nj man quj cala quj aia, quj tlatiaia, in vme zu chiquavitl: auh iquac occentlama tli, ic quj xip tlaiotiaia, quj chi chioaia, çan no suchiquavitl: ie hoatl tlatlaia, quj tlatiaia, quj tecaviaia: ic cactimomanaia, cac tiuetzia tlamattimomana in alte
column4: au inj kuak otlatsiu, in okontlatsil huj maseoalistli, nj man quj kala quj aia, quj tlatiaia, in vme zu chikuavitl: au ikuak oksentlama tli, ik quj xip tlaiotiaia, quj chi chioaia, san no suchikuavitl: ie joatl tlatlaia, quj tlatiaia, quj tekaviaia ik kaktimomanaia, kak tiuetsia tlamattimomana in alte

column4: Aoh inj qoac otlatzioh, in ocontlatzil hoj maceoaliztli, nj man qoj cala qoj aia, qoj tlatiaia, in vme zo chiqoavitl: aoh iqoac occentlama tli, ic qoj xip tlaiotiaia, qoj chi chioaia, çan no sochiqoavitl: ie hoatl tlatlaia, qoj tlatiaia, qoj tecaviaia: ic cactimomanaia, cac tioetzia tlamattimomana in alte

column1: .de fo. petl, aocac tlaolinja, tlachalanja; ipampa ca omotlati otlatlac in su chitl: auh tel in ceceiaca in chan pi pilti, tlatoque, vel cuj coia, pacoaia, caniio, caniiocan in tecpan mo caoa ia in maceoaliztli, in mochi tlacatl in cempaquja.(16) I njc chicuei capitulo: itech pa tlatoa, injc macujltetl ma chiotl, inj toca ce acatl: auh amo qualli tonalli inj tech ca, qujlmach in a quj que vn can tlacatia, in tla vncan tla catia, injc chicunauhtetl calli, inj toca chicunavi cipactli: quj toaia qujlmach cenca techi coitoanj, ioan teteixpanvianj: auh qujlmach injn machiotl, iehoatl itonal in quetzalcoatl: ipampa in tlatoque, in pipilti, vn can muxtlaoaia, ioan tlama naia.(17) Moquetza ce acatl tonalli, ic mocempoa, in amo qualli, in amo ieccan iz qujlhujtl, qujto qujlitica y nj pan, vme ocelutl, io an ei quauh tli, navi cozcaquauhtli, macujlli olin, chiquacen tecpatl: in jz quj tetl in tonalli, mjtoaia amo qualli, amo ieccan, qujlmach itonal catca, itonalpan in quetzalcoatl. I ehica in quetzalcoatl, iehecatl ipan mjxe oaia, injc tevtocoia: auh inj quac, in moquetzaia, ceacatl tonalli, cencatla maviztiliaia in tlatoque, in pipilti, tlamamaia in cal mecac, y nj tocaio çan mexico, ca vncan pialoia inj xiptla Que tzalcoatl, ixpanqujtlatequjliaia, quj tlamamacaia much iquac quj cenca viliaia, itech quj tlaliliaia, in jz quj tla mantli inechichioal, yni amatlatquj, ioan ixpan qujtequijliaia suchitl, yetl, quj copaltemjliaia atl, tlaqualli, quj manjlia, iuh quj toaia vncan quj to naltia, qujtonalquechia, in Que tzalcoatl. Auh injc mjtoa: amo iec can, in aqujn ipantlacatia pilli, a noco maceoalli, atle cenca imaceoal, ilhujl catca, çan iuh qujn checatl ipa povia inemjliz, ecatocoia, atle itla anca, inelhoaio mochioaia: ipam pa inj tonalpan quetzalcoatl, eecatl otlacat, ca nj man iuh çan oqujz, no iuh quj ipan muchioaia, intla cioatl, auh injc quj patiaia tonalpouhque,

column4: (17) Moqoetza ce acatl tonalli, ic mocempoa, in amo qoalli, in amo ieccan iz qojlhojtl, qojto qojlitica y nj pan, vme ocelotl, io an ei qoaoh tli, navi cozcaqoaohtli, macojlli olin, chiqoacen tecpatl: in jz qoj tetl in tonalli, mjtoaia amo qoalli, amo ieccan, qojlmach itonal catca, itonalpan in qoetzalcoatl.

column3: I ehica in quetzalcoatl, iehecatl ipan mjxe oaia, injc tevtocoia: auh inj quac, in moquetzaia, ceacatl tonalli, cencatla maviztiliaia in tlatoque, in pipilti, tlamamaia in cal mecac, y nj tocaio çan mexico, ca vncan pialoia inj xiptla Que tzalcoatl, ixpanqujtlatequjliaia, quj tlamamacaia much iquac quj cenca viliaia, itech quj tlaliliaia, in jz quj tla mantli inechichioal, yni amatlatquj, ioan ixpan qujtequijliaia suchitl, yetl, quj copaltemjliaia atl, tlaqualli, quj manjlia, iuh quj toaia vncan quj to naltia, qujtonalquechia, in Que tzalcoatl.
column4: i ejika in ketsalkoatl, iejekatl ipan mjxe oaia, injk tevtokoia au inj kuak, in moketsaia, seakatl tonali, senkatla mavistiliaia in tlatoke, in pipilti, tlamamaia in kal mekak, i nj tokaio san mexiko, ka vnkan pialoia inj xiptla ke tsalkoatl, ixpanqujtlatequjliaia, quj tlamamakaia much ikuak quj senka viliaia, itech quj tlaliliaia, in js quj tla mantli inechichioal, ini amatlatquj, ioan ixpan qujtequijliaia suchitl, yetl, quj kopaltemjliaia atl, tlakuali, quj manjlia, iu quj toaia vnkan quj to naltia, qujtonalquechia, in ke tsalkoatl.

column3: Auh injc mjtoa: amo iec can, in aqujn ipantlacatia pilli, a noco maceoalli, atle cenca imaceoal, ilhujl catca, çan iuh qujn checatl ipa povia inemjliz, ecatocoia, atle itla anca, inelhoaio mochioaia: ipam pa inj tonalpan quetzalcoatl, eecatl otlacat, ca nj man iuh çan oqujz, no iuh quj ipan muchioaia, intla cioatl, auh injc quj patiaia tonalpouhque,
column4: au injk mjtoa amo iek kan, in aqujn ipantlakatia pili, a noko maseoali, atle senka imaseoal, iljul katka, san iu qujn chekatl ipa povia inemjlis, ekatokoia, atle itla anka, ineljoaio mochioaia ipam pa inj tonalpan ketsalkoatl, eekatl otlakat, ka nj man iu san oqujz, no iu quj ipan muchioaia, intla sioatl, au injk quj patiaia tonalpouke,

column1: .de fo.21. in tlaaca ipan otlacat iz qujlhujtl oc conchololtiaia, quj chieltiaia in chi conqujavitl; quj nj quac caltiaia in ic qujto cama cazque, ipampa ic quj patia inj tonal, vncan quj iecca quix tia, ieccan qujca, chicoqualtia, ic co njttilia, macoca itla ilhujl, imaceoal, muchioatiuh in tlancmjz; intlauel oapaoaz, intlauel moquetzaz ipam pa oc vncan in chicomatl quj tlaliaia, vel qujtemachiaia in chicon quj avitl, qujtoaia: ca qualli tonalli, ic nooa, teicnoittanj, tetlaocolianj, in aq ujn vel ipan tlacatia, tlacnopilhuj anj muchioaia, iuh qujn ipan tzetzelivi, iuh qujn ipan pipix auj, iuh qujn mo moloca ilhujl, imaceoal, ic nopil, mj toa: canel iuh quj itonal in chicon quj avitl. A uh in aqujn ipan tla catia; çan nj man iquac maltia, quj tocamaca, aocmo conchololtia, aoc mo qujtlatviltia, aocmo connechca tlaca: auh tel no iuh quj inj moztla ioc quj tztica, in quj toqujlitica. Chi cuey suchitl: iuh quj toaia no qualli, intlaaca ipan tlacatia: çan njman noiquac caltiaia, qujtocamacaia, ipampa iuh quj chioaia, y, iehoatl quj macacia in oallatoqujlia, chicu navi cipactli: iuh qujtoaia njman amo qualli, amo tlacacemelle, mot qujtica teuhtli; tlacolli, tzotzomatli, tatapatli, quj teilhujltia, aoctle ipa tica, aoctle ipaio mochioa, in quj oal toqujlia tonalli, canj ioca tetlaactica mjx cauj tica, injc amo qualli in aquj ipan tlacatia, cantlatolli cololotine mj, tlatolli cololhujtinemj, tlatoltzon, tlatolli, itlaqual tlatolnecujl: cenca ivel mach intlacana neaio, vmpa motlaloa, tecacaquj, intlacananeno notzalo, itlaitolo, tetzalan, tenepantla, motecatinemj, techalanjtinemj, te ...revisar nelecheuh tinemj, tetlatolcacaca, te iollococoltia: atle ipan qujtta, amo qujtequan mati in ovi tlatolli, in tetzauhtlatolli, ihiztlacati, iztlactli, tenqualactli, tetla quj qua nj tinemj, motlatol cuj cuj tlavia, quj tlatlatla lilia, in tlatolli, tlatolpiqujnj, tlatol campax, tlatolcacampax, tlatol cho chopoc, tenenexotla, motepapachi via, tecanenemj, tecatlatlatlanj, mo nonotza, atle velitic tlalilo; atle vel ix pan mjtoa: nj man tepan qujcenma na, tepan quj moiaoa inte tlatlacol, intetlatol, tetenco quj tlaztinemj, ic tepan cacalaquj, anie quj mati, anie qujlhuja, in tlein inenca, ic muchipa icnoiotl, quj tztinemj, itech coatinemj, itilmacol, imax tlacol ietinemj, aonmo

column3: Chi cuey suchitl: iuh quj toaia no qualli, intlaaca ipan tlacatia: çan njman noiquac caltiaia, qujtocamacaia, ipampa iuh quj chioaia, y, iehoatl quj macacia in oallatoqujlia, chicu navi cipactli: iuh qujtoaia njman amo qualli, amo tlacacemelle, mot qujtica teuhtli; tlacolli, tzotzomatli, tatapatli, quj teilhujltia, aoctle ipa tica, aoctle ipaio mochioa, in quj oal toqujlia tonalli, canj ioca tetlaactica mjx cauj tica, injc amo qualli in aquj ipan tlacatia, cantlatolli cololotine mj, tlatolli cololhujtinemj, tlatoltzon, tlatolli, itlaqual tlatolnecujl: cenca ivel mach intlacana neaio, vmpa motlaloa, tecacaquj, intlacananeno notzalo, itlaitolo, tetzalan, tenepantla, motecatinemj, techalanjtinemj, te ...revisar nelecheuh tinemj, tetlatolcacaca, te iollococoltia: atle ipan qujtta, amo qujtequan mati in ovi tlatolli, in tetzauhtlatolli, ihiztlacati, iztlactli, tenqualactli, tetla quj qua nj tinemj, motlatol cuj cuj tlavia, quj tlatlatla lilia, in tlatolli, tlatolpiqujnj, tlatol campax, tlatolcacampax, tlatol cho chopoc, tenenexotla, motepapachi via, tecanenemj, tecatlatlatlanj, mo nonotza, atle velitic tlalilo; atle vel ix pan mjtoa: nj man tepan qujcenma na, tepan quj moiaoa inte tlatlacol, intetlatol, tetenco quj tlaztinemj, ic tepan cacalaquj, anie quj mati, anie qujlhuja, in tlein inenca, ic muchipa icnoiotl, quj tztinemj, itech coatinemj, itilmacol, imax tlacol ietinemj, aonmo
column4: chi kuei suchitl: iu quj toaia no kuali, intlaaka ipan tlakatia san njman noikuak kaltiaia, qujtocamacaia, ipampa iu quj chioaia, i, iejoatl quj makasia in oallatoqujlia, chicu navi sipaktli iu qujtoaia njman amo kuali, amo tlakasemele, mot qujtica teutli; tlakoli, tsotsomatli, tatapatli, quj teiljultia, aoktle ipa tika, aoktle ipaio mochioa, in quj oal toqujlia tonali, kanj ioka tetlaaktika mjx cauj tika, injk amo kuali in aquj ipan tlakatia, kantlatoli kololotine mj, tlatoli kololjutinemj, tlatoltson, tlatoli, itlakual tlatolnekujl: senka ivel mach intlakana neaio, vmpa motlaloa, tecacaquj, intlakananeno notsalo, itlaitolo, tetsalan, tenepantla, motekatinemj, techalanjtinemj, te ...revisar nelecheu tinemj, tetlatolkakaka, te iolokokoltia atle ipan qujtta, amo qujtequan mati in ovi tlatoli, in tetsautlatoli, ijistlakati, istlaktli, tenkualaktli, tetla quj kua nj tinemj, motlatol kuj kuj tlavia, quj tlatlatla lilia, in tlatoli, tlatolpiqujnj, tlatol kampax, tlatolkakampax, tlatol cho chopok, tenenexotla, motepapachi via, tekanenemj, tekatlatlatlanj, mo nonotsa, atle velitik tlalilo; atle vel ix pan mjtoa nj man tepan qujcenma na, tepan quj moiaoa inte tlatlakol, intetlatol, tetenko quj tlastinemj, ik tepan cacalaquj, anie quj mati, anie qujlhuja, in tlein inenka, ik muchipa iknoiotl, quj tstinemj, itech koatinemj, itilmakol, imax tlakol ietinemj, aonmo

column4: Chi coey sochitl: ioh qoj toaia no qoalli, intlaaca ipan tlacatia: çan njman noiqoac caltiaia, qojtocamacaia, ipampa ioh qoj chioaia, y, iehoatl qoj macacia in oallatoqojlia, chico navi cipactli: ioh qojtoaia njman amo qoalli, amo tlacacemelle, mot qojtica teohtli; tlacolli, tzotzomatli, tatapatli, qoj teilhojltia, aoctle ipa tica, aoctle ipaio mochioa, in qoj oal toqojlia tonalli, canj ioca tetlaactica mjx caoj tica, injc amo qoalli in aqoj ipan tlacatia, cantlatolli cololotine mj, tlatolli cololhojtinemj, tlatoltzon, tlatolli, itlaqoal tlatolnecojl: cenca ivel mach intlacana neaio, vmpa motlaloa, tecacaqoj, intlacananeno notzalo, itlaitolo, tetzalan, tenepantla, motecatinemj, techalanjtinemj, te ...revisar nelecheoh tinemj, tetlatolcacaca, te iollococoltia: atle ipan qojtta, amo qojteqoan mati in ovi tlatolli, in tetzaohtlatolli, ihiztlacati, iztlactli, tenqoalactli, tetla qoj qoa nj tinemj, motlatol coj coj tlavia, qoj tlatlatla lilia, in tlatolli, tlatolpiqojnj, tlatol campax, tlatolcacampax, tlatol cho chopoc, tenenexotla, motepapachi via, tecanenemj, tecatlatlatlanj, mo nonotza, atle velitic tlalilo; atle vel ix pan mjtoa: nj man tepan qojcenma na, tepan qoj moyaoa inte tlatlacol, intetlatol, tetenco qoj tlaztinemj, ic tepan cacalaqoj, anie qoj mati, anie qojlhoja, in tlein inenca, ic mochipa icnoiotl, qoj tztinemj, itech coatinemj, itilmacol, imax tlacol ietinemj, aonmo

column1: .de fo.22. namj quj inj tatapa, aoalnecinj y nj quezpan onoz, inj quechtlan pilcaz, aoneoatinemj, inj calitic, calceceoazco, aic tlatotonja, petlacolli, icpalcolli, ueuetztoc, aiac tlachpana, tlacolli mo teujlacachoa, tlacolli imoteujlaca choaian, auh çan moxixicotinemj, mococomatinemj, mj hitleuh tinemj, quj quj nacatinemj, qujtemoa in ma itla icompaquj, in maitla iconce vi inj iollo, in maiconvellamati, quen cannel conchioaz: canel iuhcan otla cat, inic noiotl iieoaia, caiuh quj ito nal, in tlacolli, teuhtli. Auh in matlactli hecatl: iuh mjtoaia, qualli tonalli: ioan in oc etetl, qujtoqujltica in matlactloce calli, ioan matlactlo mome cuetzpali, matlactlomei coatl; muchi qualli, qujn cenvica, quj centla talhuja, in matlactli hecatl: iuh mj to aia: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, muchi i nemac inteniotl in mavicotl, in oqujch iotl, in necujl tonolli, netlacamachiliz tli, iuh mjtoaia: cenca tonalchicaoac, aiac vel quj quequeloa, aiac vel ica mocacaiaoa, aiac vel qujmoxixictia: ipampa catlamatlactian in otlacat, iuh quj ipan muchioaia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl.(18) I njc chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiquacen tetl machiotl, injtoca ce mjqujztli: ioan in qualli tonalli itech ca, qujl mach itonal in Tezcatlipuca: auh mjec in ventli, innextlaoalli injc quj maviztiliaia, ioan cenca qujn papaqujltiaia in tlatlacoti. Moquetza ce mj quj ztli: y njn mj toaia, qualli tonalli: auh ioan achi amo qualli, iniuh neciz nican, ipan itlatollo, camjtoa inj quac, y, vncan qujtonaltiaia in Tezcatlipuca, cenca tlamaviztiliaia, intlatoque, tlama naia, tlacotonaia, ceceniaca y njnca litic, inj mjx coian in cacalpulco, in moteneoa in teucalli, in teucalco: iuh qujtoaia, caiehoatl inj paltinemj, in titlacaoan, in tlacticpaque, in tlalte cue, in axcan itonalpantzinco, ic mu chitlacatl vncan tlatemachiaia, nen tlamatia, tlaocuiaia, injc qujc neliz: auh amo canjoque intlatoque, iuh quj chioaia, y, noiehoan in tiacaoa, intequjoaque, yoan in mocujtonoa, in motlacamati, ioan in aqujn quj ma tia, caito nalmo quetza in titlacahoa, notlatonaltiaia, tlamanaia, inj cha, inj calpulco: y pampa injc cenca tla temachiaia, ca vncan tlaitlanjliloia,

column3: namj quj inj tatapa, aoalnecinj y nj quezpan onoz, inj quechtlan pilcaz, aoneoatinemj, inj calitic, calceceoazco, aic tlatotonja, petlacolli, icpalcolli, ueuetztoc, aiac tlachpana, tlacolli mo teujlacachoa, tlacolli imoteujlaca choaian, auh çan moxixicotinemj, mococomatinemj, mj hitleuh tinemj, quj quj nacatinemj, qujtemoa in ma itla icompaquj, in maitla iconce vi inj iollo, in maiconvellamati, quen cannel conchioaz: canel iuhcan otla cat, inic noiotl iieoaia, caiuh quj ito nal, in tlacolli, teuhtli.
column4: namj quj inj tatapa, aoalnesinj i nj kespan onos, inj kechtlan pilkas, aoneoatinemj, inj kalitik, kalseseoasko, aik tlatotonja, petlakoli, ikpalkoli, ueuetstok, aiak tlachpana, tlakoli mo teulakachoa, tlakoli imoteulaka choaian, au san moxixikotinemj, mokokomatinemj, mj jitleu tinemj, quj quj nakatinemj, qujtemoa in ma itla icompaquj, in maitla ikonse vi inj iolo, in maikonvelamati, ken kannel konchioas: kanel iukan otla kat, inik noiotl iieoaia, kaiu quj ito nal, in tlakoli, teutli.

column3: Auh in matlactli hecatl: iuh mjtoaia, qualli tonalli: ioan in oc etetl, qujtoqujltica in matlactloce calli, ioan matlactlo mome cuetzpali, matlactlomei coatl; muchi qualli, qujn cenvica, quj centla talhuja, in matlactli hecatl: iuh mj to aia: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, muchi i nemac inteniotl in mavicotl, in oqujch iotl, in necujl tonolli, netlacamachiliz tli, iuh mjtoaia: cenca tonalchicaoac, aiac vel quj quequeloa, aiac vel ica mocacaiaoa, aiac vel qujmoxixictia: ipampa catlamatlactian in otlacat, iuh quj ipan muchioaia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl.
column4: au in matlaktli jekatl: iu mjtoaia, kuali tonali ioan in ok etetl, qujtoqujltica in matlaktlose kali, ioan matlaktlo mome kuetspali, matlaktlomei koatl; muchi kuali, qujn senvika, quj sentla taljuja, in matlaktli jekatl: iu mj to aia in aqujn ipan tlakatia, muchi i nemak inteniotl in mavikotl, in oqujch iotl, in nekujl tonoli, netlakamachilis tli, iu mjtoaia senka tonalchikaoak, aiak vel quj kekeloa, aiak vel ika mokakaiaoa, aiak vel qujmoxixictia: ipampa katlamatlaktian in otlakat, iu quj ipan muchioaia, in oquj chtli, in sioatl.

column3: Auh in matlactli hecatl: iuh mjtoaia, qualli tonalli: ioan in oc etetl, qujtoqujltica in matlactloce calli, ioan matlactlo mome cuetzpali, matlactlomei coatl; muchi qualli, qujn cenvica, quj centla talhuja, in matlactli hecatl: iuh mj to aia: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, muchi i nemac inteniotl in mavicotl, in oqujch iotl, in necujl tonolli, netlacamachiliz tli, iuh mjtoaia: cenca tonalchicaoac, aiac vel quj quequeloa, aiac vel ica mocacaiaoa, aiac vel qujmoxixictia: ipampa catlamatlactian in otlacat, iuh quj ipan muchioaia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl.
column4: Aoh in matlactli hecatl: ioh mjtoaia, qoalli tonalli: ioan in oc etetl, qojtoqojltica in matlactloce calli, ioan matlactlo mome coetzpali, matlactlomei coatl; mochi qoalli, qojn cenvica, qoj centla talhoja, in matlactli hecatl: ioh mj to aia: in aqojn ipan tlacatia, mochi i nemac inteniotl in mavicotl, in oqojch iotl, in necojl tonolli, netlacamachiliz tli, ioh mjtoaia: cenca tonalchicaoac, aiac vel qoj qoeqoeloa, aiac vel ica mocacayaoa, aiac vel qojmoxixictia: ipampa catlamatlactian in otlacat, ioh qoj ipan mochioaia, in oqoj chtli, in cioatl.

column3: (18) I njc chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiquacen tetl machiotl, injtoca ce mjqujztli: ioan in qualli tonalli itech ca, qujl mach itonal in Tezcatlipuca: auh mjec in ventli, innextlaoalli injc quj maviztiliaia, ioan cenca qujn papaqujltiaia in tlatlacoti.
column4: (18) i njk chikunavi kapitulo itechpa tlatoa, injk chikuasen tetl machiotl, injtoka se mjqujztli: ioan in kuali tonali itech ka, qujl mach itonal in teskatlipuka au mjek in ventli, innextlaoali injk quj mavistiliaia, ioan senka qujn papaqujltiaia in tlatlakoti.

column3: (18) I njc chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiquacen tetl machiotl, injtoca ce mjqujztli: ioan in qualli tonalli itech ca, qujl mach itonal in Tezcatlipuca: auh mjec in ventli, innextlaoalli injc quj maviztiliaia, ioan cenca qujn papaqujltiaia in tlatlacoti.

column3: (18) I njc chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiquacen tetl machiotl, injtoca ce mjqujztli: ioan in qualli tonalli itech ca, qujl mach itonal in Tezcatlipuca: auh mjec in ventli, innextlaoalli injc quj maviztiliaia, ioan cenca qujn papaqujltiaia in tlatlacoti.
column4: (18) I njc chiconavi capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiqoacen tetl machiotl, injtoca ce mjqojztli: ioan in qoalli tonalli itech ca, qojl mach itonal in Tezcatlipoca: aoh mjec in ventli, innextlaoalli injc qoj maviztiliaia, ioan cenca qojn papaqojltiaia in tlatlacoti.

column3: Moquetza ce mj quj ztli: y njn mj toaia, qualli tonalli: auh ioan achi amo qualli, iniuh neciz nican, ipan itlatollo, camjtoa inj quac, y, vncan qujtonaltiaia in Tezcatlipuca, cenca tlamaviztiliaia, intlatoque, tlama naia, tlacotonaia, ceceniaca y njnca litic, inj mjx coian in cacalpulco, in moteneoa in teucalli, in teucalco: iuh qujtoaia, caiehoatl inj paltinemj, in titlacaoan, in tlacticpaque, in tlalte cue, in axcan itonalpantzinco, ic mu chitlacatl vncan tlatemachiaia, nen tlamatia, tlaocuiaia, injc qujc neliz: auh amo canjoque intlatoque, iuh quj chioaia, y, noiehoan in tiacaoa, intequjoaque, yoan in mocujtonoa, in motlacamati, ioan in aqujn quj ma tia, caito nalmo quetza in titlacahoa, notlatonaltiaia, tlamanaia, inj cha, inj calpulco: y pampa injc cenca tla temachiaia, ca vncan tlaitlanjliloia,
column4: moketsa se mj quj stli i njn mj toaia, kuali tonali au ioan achi amo kuali, iniu nesis nikan, ipan itlatolo, kamjtoa inj kuak, i, vnkan qujtonaltiaia in teskatlipuka, senka tlamavistiliaia, intlatoke, tlama naia, tlakotonaia, seseniaka i njnka litik, inj mjx koian in kakalpulko, in moteneoa in teukali, in teukalko iu qujtoaia, kaiejoatl inj paltinemj, in titlakaoan, in tlaktikpake, in tlalte kue, in axkan itonalpantsinko, ik mu chitlakatl vnkan tlatemachiaia, nen tlamatia, tlaokuiaia, injk qujc nelis: au amo kanjoke intlatoke, iu quj chioaia, i, noiejoan in tiakaoa, intequjoaque, yoan in mokujtonoa, in motlakamati, ioan in aqujn quj ma tia, kaito nalmo ketsa in titlakajoa, notlatonaltiaia, tlamanaia, inj cha, inj kalpulko i pampa injk senka tla temachiaia, ka vnkan tlaitlanjliloia,

column4: moketsa se mh quj stli i nhn mh toaia, kwali tonali aw ioan achi amo kwali, iniw nesis nikan, ipan itlatolo, kamhtoa inh kwak, i, vnkan qujtonaltiaia in teskatlipuka, senka tlamavistiliaia, intlatoke, tlama naia, tlakotonaia, seseniaka i nhnka litik, inh mhx koian in kakalpulko, in moteneoa in teukali, in teukalko iw qujtoaia, kaiehoatl inh paltinemj, in titlakaoan, in tlaktikpake, in tlalte kwe, in axkan itonalpantsinko, ik mu chitlakatl vnkan tlatemachiaia, nen tlamatia, tlaokwiaia, inhk qujc nelis: aw amo kanhoke intlatoke, iw quj chioaia, i, noiehoan in tiakaoa, intequjoaque, yoan in mokuhtonoa, in motlakamati, ioan in aqujn quj ma tia, kaito nalmo ketsa in titlakahoa, notlatonaltiaia, tlamanaia, inh cha, inh kalpulko i pampa inhk senka tla temachiaia, ka vnkan tlaitlanhliloia,

column4: Moqoetza ce mj qoj ztli: y njn mj toaia, qoalli tonalli: aoh ioan achi amo qoalli, inioh neciz nican, ipan itlatollo, camjtoa inj qoac, y, vncan qojtonaltiaia in Tezcatlipoca, cenca tlamaviztiliaia, intlatoqoe, tlama naia, tlacotonaia, ceceniaca y njnca litic, inj mjx coian in cacalpolco, in moteneoa in teocalli, in teocalco: ioh qojtoaia, caiehoatl inj paltinemj, in titlacaoan, in tlacticpaqoe, in tlalte coe, in axcan itonalpantzinco, ic mo chitlacatl vncan tlatemachiaia, nen tlamatia, tlaocoiaia, injc qojc neliz: aoh amo canjoqoe intlatoqoe, ioh qoj chioaia, y, noiehoan in tiacaoa, inteqojoaqoe, yoan in mocojtonoa, in motlacamati, ioan in aqojn qoj ma tia, caito nalmo qoetza in titlacahoa, notlatonaltiaia, tlamanaia, inj cha, inj calpolco: y pampa injc cenca tla temachiaia, ca vncan tlaitlanjliloia,

column1: .de fo.23. injc teicneliz: auh injc amo qualcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne mauhtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, monenequjz, ca iuh qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj quanj lia; tel amo cannen iquac in ieatla mati, in ie cuecuetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qujcnoitta, connemactia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in iaotl Tezcatlipuca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal. Auh in aqujn ipa tlacatia itonal cemjqujztli: mj toaia mocujltonoz, motlamachtiz, in tlapilli, anoço çan maceoaltzintli, muchi ine mactia, itech acia, itechpachivia, in mavicotl: iquac in tlauellama ceoa, mocnomati: auh in tlacamouellama ceoa, cacan y neujian con mocauj lia, qujmjtlacalhuja y njtonal, y nj quac, y, tlaaca otlacat, njman cal tiaia, qujtocamaca, quj xic venqua qualia in pipiltotonti, intlaoqujch tli otlacat, ic qujnotza mj qujz, ano co iaotl, ceniaotl, necociaotl, chico iaotl, iao mavitl, ic quj tocamamaia in Tezcatlipuca: injn mjtoaia, aiac vel quj cocoliz, aiac vel quj mj quj tla njz: in tlaaca quj mj quj tlanj, quj mj qujztemachia, çan ie in mococolia on mj ctiuetzi. A uh inj quan in catca ipan tonalli: in tlatlacoti, in tlatlaco tzitzinti, in teatexatitlan, temetlati tlan in nemjan: aiac vel maoaia, aiac vel quj ntenquanviaca, quj ntla uel notzaia, quj nqualan canotzaia, in tlacaoaque, in oquj matque, ca muztla itonalpan iez in Tezcatli puca: nj man achto quj ntomaia, quj tequjlia, qujntlaxilia in qua uh cozcatl, in coliuhquj, injc pieloia, in ic ilpitinenca, injc amo cholozque; njman ic quj mamoviaia, quj mal tiaia, cenca qujntlacotlaia, qujn xo xocoiomatia, vel qujnmavizmatia, ipampa iuh quj matia, caixiptlaoa, ipatillooa, y tlacopilhoan, mj toa iuh qujn i quecholhoan, i caquan totooa, itlacototooan in Tezcatli puca: auh in tlacaoaque, vel qujn nemachtiaia, qujn mj qujz naoatia ia, quj ntlaquauhnao atiaia, qujn tepitznaoatiaiaia, in im pilhoan, injntlaz caltilhoan, y nintlaoapa oalhoan: injc amo quj ma oazque,

column3: injc teicneliz: auh injc amo qualcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne mauhtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, monenequjz, ca iuh qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj quanj lia; tel amo cannen iquac in ieatla mati, in ie cuecuetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qujcnoitta, connemactia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in iaotl Tezcatlipuca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal.
column4: injk teiknelis: au injk amo kualkan, iekkan, ipan machoia, ka vnkan ne mautiloia, i makaxoia, injk amo kannoie mokomas, monenequjz, ka iu qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino kon mavikolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tsopelika, in javiiaka, inj tetlaoko lilis: san noie konjnailia, konj kuanj lia; tel amo kannen ikuak in ieatla mati, in ie kuekuetoni in aoktle ipan tlatta, konmjxkaoaltia, inj maseoal, okatka, osie qujcnoitta, konnemaktia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ka chokati nemj, elsisiutinemj, ik mjtoaia no viian chialo, noviian ivikpa nentla macho, tlaokoialo, akan vel ichan in iaotl teskatlipuka kanjtlan konanti nemj inj petl, ikpal.

column3: injc teicneliz: auh injc amo qualcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne mauhtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, monenequjz, ca iuh qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj quanj lia; tel amo cannen iquac in ieatla mati, in ie cuecuetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qujcnoitta, connemactia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in iaotl Tezcatlipuca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal.
column4: inhk teiknelis: aw inhk amo kwalkan, iekkan, ipan machoia, ka vnkan ne mawtiloia, i makaxoia, inhk amo kannoie mokomas, monenequjz, ka iw qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino kon mavikolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inh tsopelika, in haviiaka, inh tetlaoko lilis: san noie konhnailia, konh kwanh lia; tel amo kannen ikwak in ieatla mati, in ie kwekwetoni in aoktle ipan tlatta, konmhxkaoaltia, inh maseoal, okatka, osie qujcnoitta, konnemaktia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inh ka chokati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ik mhtoaia no viian chialo, noviian ivikpa nentla macho, tlaokoialo, akan vel ichan in iaotl teskatlipuka kanhtlan konanti nemh inh petl, ikpal.

column3: injc teicneliz: auh injc amo qualcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne mauhtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, monenequjz, ca iuh qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj quanj lia; tel amo cannen iquac in ieatla mati, in ie cuecuetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qujcnoitta, connemactia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in iaotl Tezcatlipuca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal.

column3: injc teicneliz: auh injc amo qualcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne mauhtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, monenequjz, ca iuh qujto aia, in aqujn qujc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqujxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj quanj lia; tel amo cannen iquac in ieatla mati, in ie cuecuetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qujcnoitta, connemactia, in qujtlamatataqujlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciuhtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in iaotl Tezcatlipuca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal.
column4: injc teicneliz: aoh injc amo qoalcan, ieccan, ipan machoia, ca vncan ne maohtiloia, y macaxoia, injc amo cannoie mocomaz, moneneqojz, ca ioh qojto aia, in aqojn qojc nelia, ino con mavicolti, in oixpan conqojxti, inj tzopelica, in javiiaca, inj tetlaoco liliz: çan noie conjnailia, conj qoanj lia; tel amo cannen iqoac in ieatla mati, in ie coecoetoni in aoctle ipan tlatta, conmjxcaoaltia, inj maceoal, ocatca, ocie qojcnoitta, connemactia, in qojtlamatataqojlia, inj ca chocati nemj, elciciohtinemj, ic mjtoaia: no viian chialo, noviian ivicpa nentla macho, tlaocoialo, acan vel ichan in yaotl Tezcatlipoca: canjtlan conanti nemj inj petl, icpal.

column3: Auh in aqujn ipa tlacatia itonal cemjqujztli: mj toaia mocujltonoz, motlamachtiz, in tlapilli, anoço çan maceoaltzintli, muchi ine mactia, itech acia, itechpachivia, in mavicotl: iquac in tlauellama ceoa, mocnomati: auh in tlacamouellama ceoa, cacan y neujian con mocauj lia, qujmjtlacalhuja y njtonal, y nj quac, y, tlaaca otlacat, njman cal tiaia, qujtocamaca, quj xic venqua qualia in pipiltotonti, intlaoqujch tli otlacat, ic qujnotza mj qujz, ano co iaotl, ceniaotl, necociaotl, chico iaotl, iao mavitl, ic quj tocamamaia in Tezcatlipuca: injn mjtoaia, aiac vel quj cocoliz, aiac vel quj mj quj tla njz: in tlaaca quj mj quj tlanj, quj mj qujztemachia, çan ie in mococolia on mj ctiuetzi.
column4: au in aqujn ipa tlakatia itonal cemjqujztli: mj toaia mokujltonos, motlamachtis, in tlapili, anoso san maseoaltsintli, muchi ine maktia, itech asia, itechpachivia, in mavikotl: ikuak in tlauelama seoa, moknomati au in tlakamouelama seoa, kakan i neujian kon mocauj lia, qujmjtlacalhuja i njtonal, i nj kuak, i, tlaaka otlakat, njman kal tiaia, qujtocamaca, quj xik venkua kualia in pipiltotonti, intlaoqujch tli otlakat, ik qujnotza mj qujz, ano ko iaotl, seniaotl, nekosiaotl, chiko iaotl, iao mavitl, ik quj tokamamaia in teskatlipuka injn mjtoaia, aiak vel quj kokolis, aiak vel quj mj quj tla njs: in tlaaka quj mj quj tlanj, quj mj qujztemachia, san ie in mokokolia on mj ktiuetsi.

column3: Auh in aqujn ipa tlacatia itonal cemjqujztli: mj toaia mocujltonoz, motlamachtiz, in tlapilli, anoço çan maceoaltzintli, muchi ine mactia, itech acia, itechpachivia, in mavicotl: iquac in tlauellama ceoa, mocnomati: auh in tlacamouellama ceoa, cacan y neujian con mocauj lia, qujmjtlacalhuja y njtonal, y nj quac, y, tlaaca otlacat, njman cal tiaia, qujtocamaca, quj xic venqua qualia in pipiltotonti, intlaoqujch tli otlacat, ic qujnotza mj qujz, ano co iaotl, ceniaotl, necociaotl, chico iaotl, iao mavitl, ic quj tocamamaia in Tezcatlipuca: injn mjtoaia, aiac vel quj cocoliz, aiac vel quj mj quj tla njz: in tlaaca quj mj quj tlanj, quj mj qujztemachia, çan ie in mococolia on mj ctiuetzi.

column4: Aoh in aqojn ipa tlacatia itonal cemjqojztli: mj toaia mocojltonoz, motlamachtiz, in tlapilli, anoço çan maceoaltzintli, mochi ine mactia, itech acia, itechpachivia, in mavicotl: iqoac in tlaoellama ceoa, mocnomati: aoh in tlacamooellama ceoa, cacan y neojian con mocaoj lia, qojmjtlacalhoja y njtonal, y nj qoac, y, tlaaca otlacat, njman cal tiaia, qojtocamaca, qoj xic venqoa qoalia in pipiltotonti, intlaoqojch tli otlacat, ic qojnotza mj qojz, ano co yaotl, cenyaotl, necocyaotl, chico yaotl, yao maiitl, ic qoj tocamamaia in Tezcatlipoca: injn mjtoaia, aiac vel qoj cocoliz, aiac vel qoj mj qoj tla njz: in tlaaca qoj mj qoj tlanj, qoj mj qojztemachia, çan ie in mococolia on mj ctioetzi.

column3: A uh inj quan in catca ipan tonalli: in tlatlacoti, in tlatlaco tzitzinti, in teatexatitlan, temetlati tlan in nemjan: aiac vel maoaia, aiac vel quj ntenquanviaca, quj ntla uel notzaia, quj nqualan canotzaia, in tlacaoaque, in oquj matque, ca muztla itonalpan iez in Tezcatli puca: nj man achto quj ntomaia, quj tequjlia, qujntlaxilia in qua uh cozcatl, in coliuhquj, injc pieloia, in ic ilpitinenca, injc amo cholozque; njman ic quj mamoviaia, quj mal tiaia, cenca qujntlacotlaia, qujn xo xocoiomatia, vel qujnmavizmatia, ipampa iuh quj matia, caixiptlaoa, ipatillooa, y tlacopilhoan, mj toa iuh qujn i quecholhoan, i caquan totooa, itlacototooan in Tezcatli puca: auh in tlacaoaque, vel qujn nemachtiaia, qujn mj qujz naoatia ia, quj ntlaquauhnao atiaia, qujn tepitznaoatiaiaia, in im pilhoan, injntlaz caltilhoan, y nintlaoapa oalhoan: injc amo quj ma oazque,
column4: a u inj kuan in katka ipan tonali in tlatlakoti, in tlatlako tsitsinti, in teatexatitlan, temetlati tlan in nemjan: aiak vel maoaia, aiak vel quj ntenkuanviaka, quj ntla uel notsaia, quj nkualan kanotsaia, in tlakaoake, in oquj matke, ka mustla itonalpan ies in teskatli puka nj man achto quj ntomaia, quj tequjlia, qujntlaxilia in kua u koskatl, in koliukj, injk pieloia, in ik ilpitinenka, injk amo choloske; njman ik quj mamoviaia, quj mal tiaia, senka qujntlacotlaia, qujn xo xokoiomatia, vel qujnmavizmatia, ipampa iu quj matia, kaixiptlaoa, ipatilooa, i tlakopiljoan, mj toa iu qujn i kecholjoan, i kakuan totooa, itlakototooan in teskatli puka au in tlakaoake, vel qujn nemachtiaia, qujn mj qujz naoatia ia, quj ntlakuaunao atiaia, qujn tepitsnaoatiaiaia, in im piljoan, injntlas kaltiljoan, i nintlaoapa oaljoan: injk amo quj ma oaske,

column1: .de fo.24. quj n cuecue nochichioazque, anoço quj n vitequjzque in tlacaoa: auh in tlaaca oquj maoac, iuh mj toaia; iehoatl ica oalmjlacatzoa, conmo mamaltia, ic movitequj in victli, in mecapalli, iuh qujntzotzoviztli itech oalmotlalia, itech oalmoca loa, iuh quj n manoce mactli, itech oaltzopi, itech oalmocaoa, vncan conmocaujlia, inj maceoal: ic mato iavia, motepexiuja, ociehoatl on maquja in quauh cozcatl, ociehoatl oniez, iuh quj conjttaz, y, in iuh quj ittitilo, itlacopiltzin Tezcatlipuca, vitecoz, tzotzonaloz, avic chololtiloz, aquenman tlaltechpacholoz, ao njx caoaloz, aqueman tlaliloz, aiac moceujz, iuh mjtoa: aquenman cax tenmanaloz, aic tlacaco qui chioaz: auh injc mjtoa: matoiavia, motepe xivia, y njc cenca tlamauhcaitti liloia, in nel quj chioaz, injc ica mo caiaoa Tezcatlipuca: injc quj que queloa, injc ica maviltia, injc quj telchioa, acocana altiloz, tlaaltil mjqujz: ioan mj toaia teu mj qujz, quj paoacizque, quj quazque: ipam pa caica omoquavitec, in tlacotzin tli, y tech oquj cauh inj tlatlacol, injc qujmacacia, y, catepan mochioaia, in manel mo cujltonoa, caiciuhca ytech pachiujtiuh in jc noiotl, itech eoatiuh in neto linj liztli: iehoatl injc mjtoa: cantecamaujltia, aiac vel ic nj uh, aiac nellin qujlhuja Tezcatlipuca, tecujltonoa, ioan ic temotla in cococ, in teopo uhquj, ie vncan in aca quj cujlonaoa, itoneuhcacopa, aoc iatla matian in qujlhuja: Titlacaoane, cuj lonpole, cuj lontepole, oton motla machti, otonmoquequelo: no iuh quj toaia, intlaaca oquj chololti imal, cuj lonpole, titlacaoane, macanj, manie iuhtienj, mamotel chioanj, column4: quj n kuekue nochichioaske, anoso quj n vitequjzque in tlakaoa au in tlaaka oquj maoak, iu mj toaia; iejoatl ika oalmjlakatsoa, konmo mamaltia, ik movitequj in viktli, in mekapali, iu qujntzotzoviztli itech oalmotlalia, itech oalmoka loa, iu quj n manose maktli, itech oaltsopi, itech oalmokaoa, vnkan konmokaulia, inj maseoal: ik mato iavia, motepexiuja, osiejoatl on maquja in kuau koskatl, osiejoatl onies, iu quj konjttas, i, in iu quj ittitilo, itlakopiltsin teskatlipuka, vitekos, tsotsonalos, avik chololtilos, akenman tlaltechpacholos, ao njx kaoalos, akeman tlalilos, aiak moseus, iu mjtoa akenman kax tenmanalos, aik tlakako ki chioas: au injk mjtoa matoiavia, motepe xivia, i njk senka tlamaukaitti liloia, in nel quj chioas, injk ika mo kaiaoa teskatlipuka injk quj ke keloa, injk ika maviltia, injk quj telchioa, akokana altilos, tlaaltil mjqujz: ioan mj toaia teu mj qujz, quj paoasiske, quj kuaske ipam pa kaika omokuavitek, in tlakotsin tli, i tech oquj kau inj tlatlakol, injk qujmacacia, i, katepan mochioaia, in manel mo kujltonoa, kaisiuka itech pachiutiu in jk noiotl, itech eoatiu in neto linj listli iejoatl injk mjtoa kantekamaultia, aiak vel ik nj u, aiak nelin qujlhuja teskatlipuka, tekujltonoa, ioan ik temotla in kokok, in teopo ukj, ie vnkan in aka quj kujlonaoa, itoneukakopa, aok iatla matian in qujlhuja: titlakaoane, kuj lonpole, kuj lontepole, oton motla machti, otonmokekelo no iu quj toaia, intlaaka oquj chololti imal, kuj lonpole, titlakaoane, makanj, manie iutienj, mamotel chioanj, intinechmaka mali, kakan notech otonmokekelo in iu quj toaia, i, kakaitonukkatlatol, ietlekane, kai ka oneaultilok, mjtoa iejoan in iu inpammochioaia, i, in aquj ma matkaoake, in atle ipan tlatta, in okon popouke, i nj mjxko, i mj kpak o quj manke, in jn nekujltonol, i njn maseoal okatka, in okasika, injk ote neoaloia, itoloia in tlaltikpak oqujch tli, tlaltikpak tiakaoan, ka mjtoa in iukj iaok tiakau tlamanj, no iu quj in mo kujltonoa, kasi in tlaltikpa kaiotl, ik moteneoa tlaltikpak oquj ch tli, tlaltikpak tiakau: au injk mo teniotia, momaus kotia, tlakotsitsin ti, kamuchioaia, in tlaaka tlakotsintli, ikaonekaiaoalok, o utekok, otlama
