Tezcatlipoca: injc qoj qoe qoeloa, injc ica maviltia, injc qoj telchioa, acocana altiloz, tlaaltil mjqojz: ioan mj toaia teo mj qojz, qoj paoacizqoe, qoj qoazqoe: ipam pa caica omoqoavitec, in tlacotzin tli, y tech oqoj caoh inj tlatlacol, injc qojmacacia, y, catepan mochioaia, in manel mo cojltonoa, caiciohca ytech pachiojtioh in jc noiotl, itech eoatioh in neto linj liztli: iehoatl injc mjtoa: cantecamaojltia, aiac vel ic nj oh, aiac nellin qojlhoja Tezcatlipoca, tecojltonoa, ioan ic temotla in cococ, in teopo ohqoj, ie vncan in aca qoj cojlonaoa, itoneohcacopa, aoc iatla matian in qojlhoja: Titlacaoane, coj lonpole, coj lontepole, oton motla machti, otonmoqoeqoelo: no ioh qoj toaia, intlaaca oqoj chololti imal, coj lonpole, titlacaoane, macanj, manie iohtienj, mamotel chioanj, intinechmaca malli, cacan notech otonmoqoeqoelo: in ioh qoj toaia, y, cacaitoncohcatlatol, ietlecane, cai ca oneaojltiloc, mjtoa: iehoan in ioh inpammochioaia, y, in aqoj ma matcaoaqoe, in atle ipan tlatta, in ocon popoohqoe, y nj mjxco, y mj cpac o qoj manqoe, in jn necojltonol, y njn maceoal ocatca, in ocacica, injc ote neoaloia, itoloia in tlalticpac oqojch tli, tlalticpac tiacaoan, ca mjtoa: in iohqoj yaoc tiacaoh tlamanj, no ioh qoj in mo cojltonoa, caci in tlalticpa caiotl, ic moteneoa: tlalticpac oqoj ch tli, tlalticpac tiacaoh: aoh injc mo teniotia, momaojz cotia, tlacotzitzin ti, camochioaia, in tlaaca tlacotzintli, icaonecayaoaloc, o ojtecoc, otlama

column1: .de fo.25. ceoaltiloc, oc ie quj ca ino cuj ltonoa, motlacamati, ie netecoa, iene onca, ie ne ivic mocemjtquj, ipan moceniaca tia, iene quj cemjtta in teoaniolque, inj quac, y, aco ipan tlacacaoaltic, aco ipan cactiuetz, acacocaque, acocen tlanque in chaneque ocatca, acotlal poliuh, acotlalio oac; auh iee calli qujmantica, iene tlaujlli ocotl quj quetztica; ienetlateniotitica, inj chan tecoanj intlacaoaque ocatca, ic mjtoa: canel aiac quj moxiccavilia in tlaltic paque, inj palnemoanj, ontlaliooac, otlapopoliuh injnchan ocatca teco anjme: auh catlacotzintli inic ontla teniotia in oquj mocnelili totecujo: injc quj mauicoaia, y, aco iequez quj pa, tecoanotza, tetlaqualtia, tenechi coa, tecentlalia teitotia, tetlauhtia, iehoatl in neci, in iuh quj tonalli ipan tlacatioaia, ce mj qujztli, injc mjtoa qualli, ioan achi amo qualli.(19) I njc matlactli capitulo: itech pa tlatoa, in occequj calli, in omoteneuh cequj qualli, cequj amo qualli tetolinj.(20) In conto quj lia, in conon caiotia, intlaoncaiotia, itoca vme macatl: iuh mjtoaia, iuh quj pantiaia, iuh quj nelti liaia amo qualli tonalli, çan ic noiotl quj temaca: in aqujn: ipan tlaca tia, atle imaceoal muchioaia, çan muchipa motolinj tinenca: auh cenca momauhtianj, vel mauhq uj, mama uhquj, mauh catepetla, mavitzoco, mauh caco ne quj nj, mauhcaiollo, mj inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teueuecapavitinemj, mo cuj cuj tivetzi; iuh qujn aatonavi, viviioca, y nj tla ovi tlatolli, mauhca tlatolli quj ca quj, mj cavia in aca tlaquauh tlatoa, ano co aca tlacocomotza, tlatiticujtza, ci iocopinj, iztaia, iuh qujn aoc ezco; ca iuh qujn amaztalli, y iollo chocholoa, y iollo papatlaca, iuh qujntlaca calatz tiuetzi iiollo, itenpapatlaca, iten vi viioca, aocmoiuh quj quj ca inj tlatol, intlacaitla iiollo conmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiollo contoca. Auh in ey tochtli: iuh mjtoaia qualli, in aqujn ipantlacatia, neci in quj qua nj, aneztica, amachiztli, in campa qujcnopilhuja, inj maceoal, iuh mj toa in iuh quj tochin, aneztica inj tlaqual, cacatl, xiuh tzintli, elocacatl, in quj moquaqualtia, popococatoc, ceceliztoc, cecelia, cecel patic, itz moli nj, oalitzmolintiuh, xoxouj xtoc, xo xopaleoatoc, xixinmaltic, xixin maliuhtoc, xixiuh caltic, popotzauh

column3: ceoaltiloc, oc ie quj ca ino cuj ltonoa, motlacamati, ie netecoa, iene onca, ie ne ivic mocemjtquj, ipan moceniaca tia, iene quj cemjtta in teoaniolque, inj quac, y, aco ipan tlacacaoaltic, aco ipan cactiuetz, acacocaque, acocen tlanque in chaneque ocatca, acotlal poliuh, acotlalio oac; auh iee calli qujmantica, iene tlaujlli ocotl quj quetztica; ienetlateniotitica, inj chan tecoanj intlacaoaque ocatca, ic mjtoa: canel aiac quj moxiccavilia in tlaltic paque, inj palnemoanj, ontlaliooac, otlapopoliuh injnchan ocatca teco anjme: auh catlacotzintli inic ontla teniotia in oquj mocnelili totecujo: injc quj mauicoaia, y, aco iequez quj pa, tecoanotza, tetlaqualtia, tenechi coa, tecentlalia teitotia, tetlauhtia, iehoatl in neci, in iuh quj tonalli ipan tlacatioaia, ce mj qujztli, injc mjtoa qualli, ioan achi amo qualli.
column4: seoaltilok, ok ie quj ka ino kuj ltonoa, motlakamati, ie netekoa, iene onka, ie ne ivik mocemjtquj, ipan moseniaka tia, iene quj semjtta in teoaniolke, inj kuak, i, ako ipan tlakakaoaltik, ako ipan kaktiuets, akakokake, akosen tlanke in chaneke okatka, akotlal poliu, akotlalio oak; au iee kali qujmantica, iene tlauli okotl quj ketstika; ienetlateniotitika, inj chan tekoanj intlakaoake okatka, ik mjtoa kanel aiak quj moxikkavilia in tlaltik pake, inj palnemoanj, ontlaliooak, otlapopoliu injnchan okatka teko anjme au katlakotsintli inik ontla teniotia in oquj moknelili totekujo injk quj mauikoaia, i, ako iekes quj pa, tekoanotsa, tetlakualtia, tenechi koa, tesentlalia teitotia, tetlautia, iejoatl in nesi, in iu quj tonali ipan tlakatioaia, se mj qujztli, injk mjtoa kuali, ioan achi amo kuali.

column4: ceoaltiloc, oc ie qoj ca ino coj ltonoa, motlacamati, ie netecoa, iene onca, ie ne ivic mocemjtqoj, ipan moceniaca tia, iene qoj cemjtta in teoaniolqoe, inj qoac, y, aco ipan tlacacaoaltic, aco ipan cactioetz, acacocaqoe, acocen tlanqoe in chaneqoe ocatca, acotlal polioh, acotlalio oac; aoh iee calli qojmantica, iene tlaojlli ocotl qoj qoetztica; ienetlateniotitica, inj chan tecoanj intlacaoaqoe ocatca, ic mjtoa: canel aiac qoj moxiccavilia in tlaltic paqoe, inj palnemoanj, ontlaliooac, otlapopolioh injnchan ocatca teco anjme: aoh catlacotzintli inic ontla teniotia in oqoj mocnelili totecojo: injc qoj maoicoaia, y, aco ieqoez qoj pa, tecoanotza, tetlaqoaltia, tenechi coa, tecentlalia teitotia, tetlaohtia, iehoatl in neci, in ioh qoj tonalli ipan tlacatioaia, ce mj qojztli, injc mjtoa qoalli, ioan achi amo qoalli.

column3: (20) In conto quj lia, in conon caiotia, intlaoncaiotia, itoca vme macatl: iuh mjtoaia, iuh quj pantiaia, iuh quj nelti liaia amo qualli tonalli, çan ic noiotl quj temaca: in aqujn: ipan tlaca tia, atle imaceoal muchioaia, çan muchipa motolinj tinenca: auh cenca momauhtianj, vel mauhq uj, mama uhquj, mauh catepetla, mavitzoco, mauh caco ne quj nj, mauhcaiollo, mj inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teueuecapavitinemj, mo cuj cuj tivetzi; iuh qujn aatonavi, viviioca, y nj tla ovi tlatolli, mauhca tlatolli quj ca quj, mj cavia in aca tlaquauh tlatoa, ano co aca tlacocomotza, tlatiticujtza, ci iocopinj, iztaia, iuh qujn aoc ezco; ca iuh qujn amaztalli, y iollo chocholoa, y iollo papatlaca, iuh qujntlaca calatz tiuetzi iiollo, itenpapatlaca, iten vi viioca, aocmoiuh quj quj ca inj tlatol, intlacaitla iiollo conmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiollo contoca.
column4: (20) in konto quj lia, in konon kaiotia, intlaonkaiotia, itoka vme makatl: iu mjtoaia, iu quj pantiaia, iu quj nelti liaia amo kuali tonali, san ik noiotl quj temaka in aqujn: ipan tlaka tia, atle imaseoal muchioaia, san muchipa motolinj tinenka au senka momautianj, vel mauhq uj, mama ukj, mau katepetla, mavitsoko, mau kako ne quj nj, maukaiolo, mj inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teueuekapavitinemj, mo kuj kuj tivetsi; iu qujn aatonavi, viviioka, i nj tla ovi tlatoli, mauka tlatoli quj ka quj, mj kavia in aka tlakuau tlatoa, ano ko aka tlakokomotsa, tlatitikujtsa, si iokopinj, istaia, iu qujn aok esko; ka iu qujn amastali, i iolo chocholoa, i iolo papatlaka, iu qujntlaca kalats tiuetsi iiolo, itenpapatlaka, iten vi viioka, aokmoiu quj quj ka inj tlatol, intlakaitla iiolo konmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiolo kontoka.

column3: (20) In conto quj lia, in conon caiotia, intlaoncaiotia, itoca vme macatl: iuh mjtoaia, iuh quj pantiaia, iuh quj nelti liaia amo qualli tonalli, çan ic noiotl quj temaca: in aqujn: ipan tlaca tia, atle imaceoal muchioaia, çan muchipa motolinj tinenca: auh cenca momauhtianj, vel mauhq uj, mama uhquj, mauh catepetla, mavitzoco, mauh caco ne quj nj, mauhcaiollo, mj inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teueuecapavitinemj, mo cuj cuj tivetzi; iuh qujn aatonavi, viviioca, y nj tla ovi tlatolli, mauhca tlatolli quj ca quj, mj cavia in aca tlaquauh tlatoa, ano co aca tlacocomotza, tlatiticujtza, ci iocopinj, iztaia, iuh qujn aoc ezco; ca iuh qujn amaztalli, y iollo chocholoa, y iollo papatlaca, iuh qujntlaca calatz tiuetzi iiollo, itenpapatlaca, iten vi viioca, aocmoiuh quj quj ca inj tlatol, intlacaitla iiollo conmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiollo contoca.
column4: (20) in konto quj lia, in konon kaiotia, intlaonkaiotia, itoka vme makatl: iw mhtoaia, iw quj pantiaia, iw quj nelti liaia amo kwali tonali, san ik noiotl quj temaka in aqujn: ipan tlaka tia, atle imaseoal muchioaia, san muchipa motolinh tinenka aw senka momauhtianj, vel mauhq uj, mama uhquj, maw katepetla, mavitsoko, maw kako ne quj nj, mawkaiolo, mh inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teueuecapavitinemj, mo kuh kuh tivetsi; iw qujn aatonavi, viviioka, i nh tla ovi tlatoli, mawka tlatoli quj ka quj, mh kavia in aka tlakwaw tlatoa, ano ko aka tlakokomotsa, tlatitikuhtsa, si iocopinj, istaia, iw qujn aok esko; ka iw qujn amastali, i iolo chocholoa, i iolo papatlaka, iw qujntlaca kalats tiwetsi iiolo, itenpapatlaka, iten vi viioka, aokmoiw quj quj ka inh tlatol, intlakaitla iiolo konmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiolo kontoka.

column4: (20) In conto qoj lia, in conon caiotia, intlaoncaiotia, itoca vme macatl: ioh mjtoaia, ioh qoj pantiaia, ioh qoj nelti liaia amo qoalli tonalli, çan ic noiotl qoj temaca: in aqojn: ipan tlaca tia, atle imaceoal mochioaia, çan mochipa motolinj tinenca: aoh cenca momaohtianj, vel maohq oj, mama ohqoj, maoh catepetla, maiitzoco, maoh caco ne qoj nj, maohcaiollo, mj inaia, mjinaxtinemj, motenetlatilia, teoeoecapavitinemj, mo coj coj tivetzi; ioh qojn aatonavi, viviioca, y nj tla ovi tlatolli, maohca tlatolli qoj ca qoj, mj cavia in aca tlaqoaoh tlatoa, ano co aca tlacocomotza, tlatiticojtza, ci iocopinj, iztaia, ioh qojn aoc ezco; ca ioh qojn amaztalli, y iollo chocholoa, y iollo papatlaca, ioh qojntlaca calatz tioetzi iiollo, itenpapatlaca, iten vi viioca, aocmoioh qoj qoj ca inj tlatol, intlacaitla iiollo conmati, in tlaitla yiolipan, in tlaitla iiollo contoca.

column1: .de fo.26. toc, pepettoc, apoliviz tlanquj, ca cacatla, cacatitlan, inj nemjan, inj quj caian, inj tlaquaquaian tochin, aoachquaqua, aoach chichina, quj ioiomeuhtica, qujntlatlanio meuhtica, injtlaqual. No iuh quj in maceoalli, in tlacatl, inj tonalpan ei tochtli, amo neztica, in quenjn neci itlaqual, anez tica in quenjn ipan oallauh ineuhca, y cemjlhujtiaia. Auh in nauj atl: iuh mjtoa, amo qualli tonalli, çan ic no iotl quj temaca, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; acan aviaia inj iollo, cantlaciiauh tine ca, quj hiiovitinenca: auh in tlacano co itla y maceoal, çan iuh qujn atl on quj ca, onatoco, onamoiaoa. Noiuh quj in macujlli itz cujntli: amono qual li, iuh mjtoa: vncan qujtonaltiaia, in mjctlan tecutli, itonalpan catca. No iuhquj in chiquacen ocomatli, amono qualli, iuh mjtoa: qujn cen vnca qual tiaia, iniz quj tetl in tonalli, y njpan chicome malinalli; y n aqujn ipan tlacatia, injzqujlhujtl in omoteneuh, aiamo caltiaia, aiamo qujto camacaia, qujn cenjpan maltiaia, in chicome ma linalli: ipampa iuh mjtoa, qujlmach muchipa qualcan, y njpan chicome tonalli, in vncan tlachicometi, chico metioaia: vncanca teilhujl, te mace oal: auh in aqujn ipan otlacat, nj ma vel iquac caltiaia, qujtocamacaia.(21) A uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mjtoa: nj man amo qualli tonalli, tequan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlactli quauhtli, vm contlachieltia, injc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemjz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cujz, in qujttaz, toneujztica. A uh in vel icatia, ixcoia, matlactli quauhtli, iuh mjtoa: qualli tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, vel maceoale cat ca, inj pan oqujchiotl, tiacauhiotl, qua uhiotl, oceloiotl, tonalchicaoac, tonal lap alivi, vel teujuj, te ujc mjxtlapa loanj, tetlaquauhtlamachti, teoqujch tlamachtli, amj qujz mauh quj, teca momotlanj, tevic mopetlatiuh, texo xocoa, texoxomolaquja, tepetlati calaquj, tetocaticalaquj, teitqujti uetzi, vel moteix cauj anj, centlamauh tia, aiac vel quj peoaltia, aiac vel ix coieoa, aiac vel quj iacaolinja, aiac vel qujiacapeionja, aiac uel quj queque loa: njman temotzoloa, temotzolqujtz quja, teujc moconeoa, tepan moxitto monja; ipampa caiuh quj itonal inte co cauh quj, ic xico cauh quj, vei quauh tli; nj man iquac maltia, in aqujn ipa tlacatia, in oqujchtli, in cioatl. A uh inmatlactloce coz caquauhtli: iuh mj

column4: No iohqoj in chiqoacen ocomatli, amono qoalli, ioh mjtoa: qojn cen vnca qoal tiaia, iniz qoj tetl in tonalli, y njpan chicome malinalli; y n aqojn ipan tlacatia, injzqojlhojtl in omoteneoh, aiamo caltiaia, aiamo qojto camacaia, qojn cenjpan maltiaia, in chicome ma linalli: ipampa ioh mjtoa, qojlmach mochipa qoalcan, y njpan chicome tonalli, in vncan tlachicometi, chico metioaia: vncanca teilhojl, te mace oal: aoh in aqojn ipan otlacat, nj ma vel iqoac caltiaia, qojtocamacaia.

column3: (21) A uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mjtoa: nj man amo qualli tonalli, tequan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlactli quauhtli, vm contlachieltia, injc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemjz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cujz, in qujttaz, toneujztica.
column4: (21) a u in chi kuei akatl, io an chikunavi oselotl, iu mjtoa nj man amo kuali tonali, tekuan tonali, in aqujn ipan tlakatia; san netolinjlistli in quj mase oaia; au aiamo kaltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlaktli kuautli, vm kontlachieltia, injk quj iekkan qujxtia, itonal, in ako kaitla imaseoaltitiu in tlanemjs: au iese kamo kaxaus, ok ivivi in quj kujs, in qujttaz, toneustika.

column3: (21) A uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mjtoa: nj man amo qualli tonalli, tequan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlactli quauhtli, vm contlachieltia, injc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemjz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cujz, in qujttaz, toneujztica.
column4: (21) a w in chi kwei akatl, io an chikunavi oselotl, iw mhtoa nh man amo kwali tonali, tekwan tonali, in aqujn ipan tlakatia; san netolinhlistli in quj mase oaia; aw aiamo kaltiaia, quj nh pan quj mattiuha, in matlaktli kwawtli, vm kontlachieltia, inhk quj iekkan qujxtia, itonal, in ako kaitla imaseoaltitiw in tlanemhs: aw iese kamo kaxaus, ok ivivi in quj kuhs, in qujttaz, toneustika.

column3: (21) A uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mjtoa: nj man amo qualli tonalli, tequan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlactli quauhtli, vm contlachieltia, injc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemjz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cujz, in qujttaz, toneujztica.
column4: (21) a uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mhtoa nh man amo cualli tonalli, tecuan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; zan netolinhliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nh pan quj mattiuha, in matlactli cuauhtli, vm contlachieltia, inhc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemhz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cuhz, in qujttaz, toneuztica.

column3: (21) A uh in chi cuei acatl, io an chicunavi ocelotl, iuh mjtoa: nj man amo qualli tonalli, tequan tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in quj mace oaia; auh aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan quj mattiuja, in matlactli quauhtli, vm contlachieltia, injc quj ieccan qujxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitiuh in tlanemjz: auh iece camo caxaujz, oc ivivi in quj cujz, in qujttaz, toneujztica.
column4: (21) A oh in chi coei acatl, io an chiconavi ocelotl, ioh mjtoa: nj man amo qoalli tonalli, teqoan tonalli, in aqojn ipan tlacatia; çan netolinjliztli in qoj mace oaia; aoh aiamo caltiaia, qoj nj pan qoj mattioja, in matlactli qoaohtli, vm contlachieltia, injc qoj ieccan qojxtia, itonal, in aco caitla imaceoaltitioh in tlanemjz: aoh iece camo caxaojz, oc ivivi in qoj cojz, in qojttaz, toneojztica.

column3: A uh in vel icatia, ixcoia, matlactli quauhtli, iuh mjtoa: qualli tonalli, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, vel maceoale cat ca, inj pan oqujchiotl, tiacauhiotl, qua uhiotl, oceloiotl, tonalchicaoac, tonal lap alivi, vel teujuj, te ujc mjxtlapa loanj, tetlaquauhtlamachti, teoqujch tlamachtli, amj qujz mauh quj, teca momotlanj, tevic mopetlatiuh, texo xocoa, texoxomolaquja, tepetlati calaquj, tetocaticalaquj, teitqujti uetzi, vel moteix cauj anj, centlamauh tia, aiac vel quj peoaltia, aiac vel ix coieoa, aiac vel quj iacaolinja, aiac vel qujiacapeionja, aiac uel quj queque loa: njman temotzoloa, temotzolqujtz quja, teujc moconeoa, tepan moxitto monja; ipampa caiuh quj itonal inte co cauh quj, ic xico cauh quj, vei quauh tli; nj man iquac maltia, in aqujn ipa tlacatia, in oqujchtli, in cioatl.
column4: a u in vel ikatia, ixkoia, matlaktli kuautli, iu mjtoa kuali tonali, in aqujn ipan tlakatia, vel maseoale kat ka, inj pan oqujchiotl, tiakaujiotl, kua ujiotl, oseloiotl, tonalchikaoak, tonal lap alivi, vel teujuj, te uk mjxtlapa loanj, tetlakuautlamachti, teoqujch tlamachtli, amj qujz mau quj, teka momotlanj, tevik mopetlatiu, texo xokoa, texoxomolaquja, tepetlati calaquj, tetocaticalaquj, teitqujti uetsi, vel moteix cauj anj, sentlamau tia, aiak vel quj peoaltia, aiak vel ix koieoa, aiak vel quj iakaolinja, aiak vel qujiacapeionja, aiak uel quj keke loa njman temotsoloa, temotzolqujtz quja, teuk mokoneoa, tepan moxitto monja; ipampa kaiu quj itonal inte ko kau quj, ik xiko kau quj, vei kuau tli; nj man ikuak maltia, in aqujn ipa tlakatia, in oqujchtli, in sioatl.

column4: A oh in vel icatia, ixcoia, matlactli qoaohtli, ioh mjtoa: qoalli tonalli, in aqojn ipan tlacatia, vel maceoale cat ca, inj pan oqojchiotl, tiacaohiotl, qoa ohiotl, oceloiotl, tonalchicaoac, tonal lap alivi, vel teojoj, te ojc mjxtlapa loanj, tetlaqoaohtlamachti, teoqojch tlamachtli, amj qojz maoh qoj, teca momotlanj, tevic mopetlatioh, texo xocoa, texoxomolaqoja, tepetlati calaqoj, tetocaticalaqoj, teitqojti oetzi, vel moteix caoj anj, centlamaoh tia, aiac vel qoj peoaltia, aiac vel ix coieoa, aiac vel qoj iacaolinja, aiac vel qojiacapeionja, aiac oel qoj qoeqoe loa: njman temotzoloa, temotzolqojtz qoja, teojc moconeoa, tepan moxitto monja; ipampa caioh qoj itonal inte co caoh qoj, ic xico caoh qoj, vei qoaoh tli; nj man iqoac maltia, in aqojn ipa tlacatia, in oqojchtli, in cioatl.

column1: .de fo.27. toa, no qualli tonalli, in aqujn ipantla catia, qujtoaia veuetiz, coliujz, quj tla mjz, quj calaqujz in tonatiuh: y pam pa caveve, in cozcaquauhtli ipan otla cat vevetioaia. No iuh quj in matlac tlomome olin, ioan in tlatzonqujxtia, matlactlomej tecpatl: iz quj tetl qual li, muchi qujn cenvica, qujn centla talhuja, qujn cenqualtilia, in matlac tli quauhtli, injc cenvetzi qualtin tonaltin: caiuh mjtoa inizqujcan ma tlactioaian: in aqujn ipantlacatia ce ca qualittoia, qujtoaia: ca oc Etetl to nalli, in quj tzacuja, ipan omotlacatili, oc etetl tonalli, injc vnnemjz, in quj moqualtitinemjz.(22) I njc matlactli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicontetl machiotl, inj toca cequjavitl: ioan in amo qualli tonalli, inj tech catca: qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlacatia, nanaoalticatca, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlacateco lo: auh in tlacatecolotl, ca iehoatl qujtoznequj in Diablo, achi mu chi in calli itechpouhquj, in amo qualli, in amo iectli: canjio in ic matlactetl vmey qualli.(23) Moquetza ce quj aujtl: injn mj toaia, njman amo qualli to nalli, motqujtica teuhtli, tlacolli, ic noiotl, ic notlacaiotl, tlaciaujliztli, tla cococaviliztli, teopouhcaiotl, atle onquj caliztli, atle oneoatinemjliztli: ipam pa inj pan, y, tonalli, iuh mjtoa: ca vn can temoia, in moteneoa cioateteo, a tlacacemelleque, tecamocaiaooanj: ic cenca qujntlaquauhnaoatiaia, in tepil hoan, in aiac qujcaz, aiac vtli qujto caz: çan cali onozque: iuh quj mjlhuj aia maca xonqujcaca, an motenamjc tizque, catemo, catlalpan aci in cioa pipilti: ic qujntlamauh ca ittiliaia in tetaoan: injc amo aca ten necuj liviz, ixnecujliujz, tenpatziujz, itech qujneuaz: inj quac in, in noviian ci oateupan, cioateucalli; no ujian tla manaloia, canoviian cecentetl ma ca, in cioateucalli, cecentlaxilacalpa vncan in omaxac; teteujtl quj mon quequentia, in vmpa catca, y mj xiptlaoan, macujlteme in teme, tec pantoca, tlaolxaoalti, moolxauh que: in aqujn ivicpa monetoltiaia, qujntlaquentia y nj quac in intemo ia, y njntlapoalpan, inj pan tonalli temoia, izqujteme amateteujtl qujn quentia. A uh yoan noiquac: vnca mjquja in quauh calco onoca, inj tla iccate, in vei qujtzacuticatca, acate tlan xinquj, anoço ichtecquj, in ano

column4: No ioh qoj in matlac tlomome olin, ioan in tlatzonqojxtia, matlactlomej tecpatl: iz qoj tetl qoal li, mochi qojn cenvica, qojn centla talhoja, qojn cenqoaltilia, in matlac tli qoaohtli, injc cenvetzi qoaltin tonaltin: caioh mjtoa inizqojcan ma tlactioaian: in aqojn ipantlacatia ce ca qoalittoia, qojtoaia: ca oc Etetl to nalli, in qoj tzacoja, ipan omotlacatili, oc etetl tonalli, injc vnnemjz, in qoj moqoaltitinemjz.

column3: (22) I njc matlactli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicontetl machiotl, inj toca cequjavitl: ioan in amo qualli tonalli, inj tech catca: qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlacatia, nanaoalticatca, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlacateco lo: auh in tlacatecolotl, ca iehoatl qujtoznequj in Diablo, achi mu chi in calli itechpouhquj, in amo qualli, in amo iectli: canjio in ic matlactetl vmey qualli.
column4: (22) i njk matlaktli ose kapitulo itechpa tlatoa, injk chikontetl machiotl, inj toka cequjavitl: ioan in amo kuali tonali, inj tech katka qujl mach in aqujque vnkan tlakatia, nanaoaltikatka, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlakateko lo au in tlakatekolotl, ka iejoatl qujtoznequj in diablo, achi mu chi in kali itechpoukj, in amo kuali, in amo iektli kanjio in ik matlaktetl vmei kuali.

column4: (22) i nhc matlactli oce capitulo itechpa tlatoa, inhc chicontetl machiotl, inh toca cequjavitl: ioan in amo cualli tonalli, inh tech catca qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlacatia, nanaoalticatca, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlacateco lo auh in tlacatecolotl, ca iehoatl qujtoznequj in diablo, achi mu chi in calli itechpouhquj, in amo cualli, in amo iectli canhio in ic matlactetl vmei cualli.

column3: (22) I njc matlactli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicontetl machiotl, inj toca cequjavitl: ioan in amo qualli tonalli, inj tech catca: qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlacatia, nanaoalticatca, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlacateco lo: auh in tlacatecolotl, ca iehoatl qujtoznequj in Diablo, achi mu chi in calli itechpouhquj, in amo qualli, in amo iectli: canjio in ic matlactetl vmey qualli.
column4: (22) I njc matlactli oce capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicontetl machiotl, inj toca ceqojavitl: ioan in amo qoalli tonalli, inj tech catca: qojl mach in aqojqoe vncan tlacatia, nanaoalticatca, ioan tetlachivianj, tlatlacateco lo: aoh in tlacatecolotl, ca iehoatl qojtozneqoj in Diaplo, achi mo chi in calli itechpoohqoj, in amo qoalli, in amo iectli: canjio in ic matlactetl vmey qoalli.

column3: (23) Moquetza ce quj aujtl: injn mj toaia, njman amo qualli to nalli, motqujtica teuhtli, tlacolli, ic noiotl, ic notlacaiotl, tlaciaujliztli, tla cococaviliztli, teopouhcaiotl, atle onquj caliztli, atle oneoatinemjliztli: ipam pa inj pan, y, tonalli, iuh mjtoa: ca vn can temoia, in moteneoa cioateteo, a tlacacemelleque, tecamocaiaooanj: ic cenca qujntlaquauhnaoatiaia, in tepil hoan, in aiac qujcaz, aiac vtli qujto caz: çan cali onozque: iuh quj mjlhuj aia maca xonqujcaca, an motenamjc tizque, catemo, catlalpan aci in cioa pipilti: ic qujntlamauh ca ittiliaia in tetaoan: injc amo aca ten necuj liviz, ixnecujliujz, tenpatziujz, itech qujneuaz: inj quac in, in noviian ci oateupan, cioateucalli; no ujian tla manaloia, canoviian cecentetl ma ca, in cioateucalli, cecentlaxilacalpa vncan in omaxac; teteujtl quj mon quequentia, in vmpa catca, y mj xiptlaoan, macujlteme in teme, tec pantoca, tlaolxaoalti, moolxauh que: in aqujn ivicpa monetoltiaia, qujntlaquentia y nj quac in intemo ia, y njntlapoalpan, inj pan tonalli temoia, izqujteme amateteujtl qujn quentia.
column4: (23) moketsa se quj autl: injn mj toaia, njman amo kuali to nali, motqujtica teutli, tlakoli, ik noiotl, ik notlakaiotl, tlasiaulistli, tla kokokavilistli, teopoukaiotl, atle onquj kalistli, atle oneoatinemjlistli ipam pa inj pan, i, tonali, iu mjtoa ka vn kan temoia, in moteneoa sioateteo, a tlakasemeleke, tekamokaiaooanj: ik senka qujntlaquauhnaoatiaia, in tepil joan, in aiak qujcaz, aiak vtli qujto kas: san kali onoske iu quj mjlhuj aia maka xonqujcaca, an motenamjk tiske, katemo, katlalpan asi in sioa pipilti ik qujntlamauh ka ittiliaia in tetaoan: injk amo aka ten nekuj livis, ixnekujlius, tenpatsius, itech qujneuaz: inj kuak in, in noviian si oateupan, sioateukali; no ujian tla manaloia, kanoviian sesentetl ma ka, in sioateukali, sesentlaxilakalpa vnkan in omaxak; teteutl quj mon kekentia, in vmpa katka, i mj xiptlaoan, makujlteme in teme, tek pantoka, tlaolxaoalti, moolxau ke in aqujn ivikpa monetoltiaia, qujntlaquentia i nj kuak in intemo ia, i njntlapoalpan, inj pan tonali temoia, izqujteme amateteutl qujn kentia.

column1: .de fo.28. co tlenamacac, itla oittililoc, aco mo mecati, in moteneoa tlacol chiuhque in caco catle in ovi oquj tlaco: no ie hoan in mamaltin, ce quj ntin vn can mj quja, mj toa: caiehoan inca mozcaltiaia in motecucoma, in camo tonalchi caoaia, in ca moquetzaia, in ca moqujx tiaia, iuh mjtoa: iuh qujn occeppa in ca mopil quj xtiaia, y njc vecaoaz, in ca motleiotia, mo maujz cotia, motequantlalia, ic mo tlamauh tilia. A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, quj macacia, injc vncan temoa: auh quj nj pan in ei cipactli, maltiaia, vncan achi quj qualtilia inj tonal, iuh mjtoa: caqual çan inj pan ey cipactli. No yoan mjtoaia: in aqujn ipan tlacatia pilli, naoalli mochioaia tla ciuh quj, quj toznequj: amo tlacatl, i tla quj mo naoaltiaia, itlaic mocue paia, aco tequannaoale. Etc. auh intlamaceoalli, no iuh quj ite quj uh catca, acototoli, aco cocamatl, anoço chichi, ipan moqujxtiaia, in caco tlein inecuepaliz, y naoalmo chioaia, muchi itequj uh, quj cenmama, quj cemololoa, inj xqujch tlauelilo caiotl, cioanotzquj, xochioa, cioatlatole, tempachioace, tetlatlacuepili, teiol malacacho, teioiolma lacacho, teiol lapan, teioiollapan, tetlatlanelto qujti, io an tlacate colotl, tetlatlacate colovia, tepoloa, tlatlalpoloa, tecaca lochpana, teevillotlatia, tetlatlato qujlia, tlauj puchtli, mometz copina, can vel ie itequjuh, ic tlaqueoalco, ic motetlaqueo altia, ic motlaie coltia, in cana io oaltica tepolotiuh, acoto toli, aco co camatl, anoço chichi, ipa mo cuepa, ina qujn tecocolianj quj tlaqueoa, injc quj polotiuh itlaco colil, in quj mj quj tlanj, in quj mj qujz temachia, nappa nauhiooal inonte poloa, in quj chioa ite quj uh: canno ie qujtztiuh, in aqualli tonalli, in vn can itepoloaia, in aca ouel quj chiuh, inienappa oilo ichan, mjtoa: ocontla quj xtili; auh in quenman temac vetzi, temac aquj, temac maquja, axioa, cuj tiuecho, in aqujn iolchicaoac pololo nj, cocolilonj, uel quj mopachiuia injc caci, quj tzon cuj, iquanepantla, y qua iolloco quj momotzalhuja inj tzon, quj quatemotzoltzitzquia, quj quavivitla, quj tzoncopina, aocmo qujca; njman iquac mj quj, caonmj etaci inj chan: auh in ocnen, ic mopatiznequj, ic mopaiaoalochtiz nequj, injc amo mj qujz, ocmotlaiecoltia, motonalanaz nequj, motonalla liliz nequj, oc nen itla quj mo cuj cuj cachioa, quj motla tlanevia, aco atl, aco tletl, aco caxitl, in conmotlaneuja ichan in oqujpo loto, in vmpa ocacique: auh in vel quj mati, in tlaueuemachtilli, in tlano notzalli in pololonj: nj man aoctle quj

column3: co tlenamacac, itla oittililoc, aco mo mecati, in moteneoa tlacol chiuhque in caco catle in ovi oquj tlaco: no ie hoan in mamaltin, ce quj ntin vn can mj quja, mj toa: caiehoan inca mozcaltiaia in motecucoma, in camo tonalchi caoaia, in ca moquetzaia, in ca moqujx tiaia, iuh mjtoa: iuh qujn occeppa in ca mopil quj xtiaia, y njc vecaoaz, in ca motleiotia, mo maujz cotia, motequantlalia, ic mo tlamauh tilia.
column4: ko tlenamakak, itla oittililok, ako mo mekati, in moteneoa tlakol chiuke in kako katle in ovi oquj tlako no ie joan in mamaltin, se quj ntin vn kan mj quja, mj toa kaiejoan inka moskaltiaia in motekukoma, in kamo tonalchi kaoaia, in ka moketsaia, in ka moqujx tiaia, iu mjtoa iu qujn okseppa in ka mopil quj xtiaia, i njk vekaoas, in ka motleiotia, mo maus kotia, motekuantlalia, ik mo tlamau tilia.

column3: co tlenamacac, itla oittililoc, aco mo mecati, in moteneoa tlacol chiuhque in caco catle in ovi oquj tlaco: no ie hoan in mamaltin, ce quj ntin vn can mj quja, mj toa: caiehoan inca mozcaltiaia in motecucoma, in camo tonalchi caoaia, in ca moquetzaia, in ca moqujx tiaia, iuh mjtoa: iuh qujn occeppa in ca mopil quj xtiaia, y njc vecaoaz, in ca motleiotia, mo maujz cotia, motequantlalia, ic mo tlamauh tilia.

column3: A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, quj macacia, injc vncan temoa: auh quj nj pan in ei cipactli, maltiaia, vncan achi quj qualtilia inj tonal, iuh mjtoa: caqual çan inj pan ey cipactli.
column4: a u in aqujn ipan tlakatia, quj makasia, injk vnkan temoa au quj nj pan in ei sipaktli, maltiaia, vnkan achi quj kualtilia inj tonal, iu mjtoa kakual san inj pan ei sipaktli.

column3: A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, quj macacia, injc vncan temoa: auh quj nj pan in ei cipactli, maltiaia, vncan achi quj qualtilia inj tonal, iuh mjtoa: caqual çan inj pan ey cipactli.

column3: A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, quj macacia, injc vncan temoa: auh quj nj pan in ei cipactli, maltiaia, vncan achi quj qualtilia inj tonal, iuh mjtoa: caqual çan inj pan ey cipactli.
column4: A oh in aqojn ipan tlacatia, qoj macacia, injc vncan temoa: aoh qoj nj pan in ei cipactli, maltiaia, vncan achi qoj qoaltilia inj tonal, ioh mjtoa: caqoal çan inj pan ey cipactli.

column3: No yoan mjtoaia: in aqujn ipan tlacatia pilli, naoalli mochioaia tla ciuh quj, quj toznequj: amo tlacatl, i tla quj mo naoaltiaia, itlaic mocue paia, aco tequannaoale.
column4: no yoan mjtoaia in aqujn ipan tlakatia pili, naoali mochioaia tla siu quj, quj toznequj: amo tlakatl, i tla quj mo naoaltiaia, itlaik mokue paia, ako tekuannaoale.

column3: auh intlamaceoalli, no iuh quj ite quj uh catca, acototoli, aco cocamatl, anoço chichi, ipan moqujxtiaia, in caco tlein inecuepaliz, y naoalmo chioaia, muchi itequj uh, quj cenmama, quj cemololoa, inj xqujch tlauelilo caiotl, cioanotzquj, xochioa, cioatlatole, tempachioace, tetlatlacuepili, teiol malacacho, teioiolma lacacho, teiol lapan, teioiollapan, tetlatlanelto qujti, io an tlacate colotl, tetlatlacate colovia, tepoloa, tlatlalpoloa, tecaca lochpana, teevillotlatia, tetlatlato qujlia, tlauj puchtli, mometz copina, can vel ie itequjuh, ic tlaqueoalco, ic motetlaqueo altia, ic motlaie coltia, in cana io oaltica tepolotiuh, acoto toli, aco co camatl, anoço chichi, ipa mo cuepa, ina qujn tecocolianj quj tlaqueoa, injc quj polotiuh itlaco colil, in quj mj quj tlanj, in quj mj qujz temachia, nappa nauhiooal inonte poloa, in quj chioa ite quj uh: canno ie qujtztiuh, in aqualli tonalli, in vn can itepoloaia, in aca ouel quj chiuh, inienappa oilo ichan, mjtoa: ocontla quj xtili; auh in quenman temac vetzi, temac aquj, temac maquja, axioa, cuj tiuecho, in aqujn iolchicaoac pololo nj, cocolilonj, uel quj mopachiuia injc caci, quj tzon cuj, iquanepantla, y qua iolloco quj momotzalhuja inj tzon, quj quatemotzoltzitzquia, quj quavivitla, quj tzoncopina, aocmo qujca; njman iquac mj quj, caonmj etaci inj chan: auh in ocnen, ic mopatiznequj, ic mopaiaoalochtiz nequj, injc amo mj qujz, ocmotlaiecoltia, motonalanaz nequj, motonalla liliz nequj, oc nen itla quj mo cuj cuj cachioa, quj motla tlanevia, aco atl, aco tletl, aco caxitl, in conmotlaneuja ichan in oqujpo loto, in vmpa ocacique: auh in vel quj mati, in tlaueuemachtilli, in tlano notzalli in pololonj: nj man aoctle quj
column4: au intlamaseoali, no iu quj ite quj u katka, akototoli, ako kokamatl, anoso chichi, ipan moqujxtiaia, in kako tlein inekuepalis, i naoalmo chioaia, muchi itequj u, quj senmama, quj semololoa, inj xqujch tlauelilo kaiotl, cioanotzquj, xochioa, sioatlatole, tempachioase, tetlatlakuepili, teiol malakacho, teioiolma lakacho, teiol lapan, teioiolapan, tetlatlanelto qujti, io an tlakate kolotl, tetlatlakate kolovia, tepoloa, tlatlalpoloa, tekaka lochpana, teevilotlatia, tetlatlato qujlia, tlauj puchtli, momets kopina, kan vel ie itequjuh, ik tlakeoalko, ik motetlakeo altia, ik motlaie koltia, in kana io oaltika tepolotiu, akoto toli, ako ko kamatl, anoso chichi, ipa mo kuepa, ina qujn tekokolianj quj tlakeoa, injk quj polotiu itlako kolil, in quj mj quj tlanj, in quj mj qujz temachia, nappa naujiooal inonte poloa, in quj chioa ite quj u: kanno ie qujtztiuh, in akuali tonali, in vn kan itepoloaia, in aka ouel quj chiu, inienappa oilo ichan, mjtoa okontla quj xtili; au in kenman temak vetsi, temak aquj, temak maquja, axioa, kuj tiuecho, in aqujn iolchikaoak pololo nj, kokolilonj, uel quj mopachiuia injk kasi, quj tson kuj, ikuanepantla, i kua ioloko quj momotsaljuja inj tson, quj kuatemotsoltsitskia, quj kuavivitla, quj tsonkopina, aokmo qujca; njman ikuak mj quj, kaonmj etasi inj chan: au in oknen, ik mopatiznequj, ik mopaiaoalochtis nequj, injk amo mj qujz, okmotlaiekoltia, motonalanas nequj, motonala lilis nequj, ok nen itla quj mo kuj kuj kachioa, quj motla tlanevia, ako atl, ako tletl, ako kaxitl, in konmotlaneuja ichan in oqujpo loto, in vmpa okasike au in vel quj mati, in tlaueuemachtili, in tlano notsali in pololonj: nj man aoktle quj

column4: aoh intlamaceoalli, no ioh qoj ite qoj oh catca, acototoli, aco cocamatl, anoço chichi, ipan moqojxtiaia, in caco tlein inecoepaliz, y naoalmo chioaia, mochi iteqoj oh, qoj cenmama, qoj cemololoa, inj xqojch tlaoelilo caiotl, cioanotzqoj, xochioa, cioatlatole, tempachioace, tetlatlacoepili, teiol malacacho, teioiolma lacacho, teiol lapan, teioiollapan, tetlatlanelto qojti, io an tlacate colotl, tetlatlacate colovia, tepoloa, tlatlalpoloa, tecaca lochpana, teevillotlatia, tetlatlato qojlia, tlaoj pochtli, mometz copina, can vel ie iteqojoh, ic tlaqoeoalco, ic motetlaqoeo altia, ic motlaie coltia, in cana io oaltica tepolotioh, acoto toli, aco co camatl, anoço chichi, ipa mo coepa, ina qojn tecocolianj qoj tlaqoeoa, injc qoj polotioh itlaco colil, in qoj mj qoj tlanj, in qoj mj qojz temachia, nappa naohiooal inonte poloa, in qoj chioa ite qoj oh: canno ie qojtztioh, in aqoalli tonalli, in vn can itepoloaia, in aca ooel qoj chioh, inienappa oilo ichan, mjtoa: ocontla qoj xtili; aoh in qoenman temac vetzi, temac aqoj, temac maqoja, axioa, coj tioecho, in aqojn iolchicaoac pololo nj, cocolilonj, oel qoj mopachioia injc caci, qoj tzon coj, iqoanepantla, y qoa iolloco qoj momotzalhoja inj tzon, qoj qoatemotzoltzitzqoia, qoj qoavivitla, qoj tzoncopina, aocmo qojca; njman iqoac mj qoj, caonmj etaci inj chan: aoh in ocnen, ic mopatizneqoj, ic mopayaoalochtiz neqoj, injc amo mj qojz, ocmotlaiecoltia, motonalanaz neqoj, motonalla liliz neqoj, oc nen itla qoj mo coj coj cachioa, qoj motla tlanevia, aco atl, aco tletl, aco caxitl, in conmotlaneoja ichan in oqojpo loto, in vmpa ocaciqoe: aoh in vel qoj mati, in tlaoeoemachtilli, in tlano notzalli in pololonj: nj man aoctle qoj

column1: .de fo.29. temaca, in iuh cemjlhujtl in oallat vic, aoctle qujtetlaneuhtia, y nj moz tlaioc: ic vncan veltematlac maquia, intlacatecolotl, on mj quj, canel ieon comca ite quj uh, caie in qujtetemoa, caie vn canca ipoliuj liz: ca nj ma iuh iiollo quj matia in ocnemj, in acoca na axioaz: ca nj man iuh ipan tlacat, icom miquiz: nj man aic avia, aic vellamati, itzotzoma, itatapa ietine mj; auh çan moxixicotinemj, maco ma, motlaqualcoma, no viian ima caxo, acan vel tepan calaquj, aiac ic njuh: auh in manel ieo anoc, amo ic momauhtia, amo ic motzaqua, amo ic quj caquj, intla on cate ipilhoa, can mochipa iuh nemj, amo quj caoa liztlamati, vncan activi quitz acutiuj, muchiuh vi, muchiuh polivi; çan no iuh quj ite qujuh catca intlacioatl, muchi amo qualli inj tequj uh catca, cenca motolinj tinenca, acan ichan, in manel cioapilli, acan ixtona, acan motztica; çan iuhquj on mj quj, toto neoatiuh in jiollo, mjtoa canel iuh quj itonal injc noiotl.(24) I njc matlactlomome ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occe quj calli, cequj cantlanepantla ca, cequj vel nj man amo qual li.(25) I nj pan nauh ecatl: tonalli, mj toa qualli, ioan amo qualli, ca vncan mj ctiloia, quj n quech mecanjaia, qujn quechtzonviaia, qujn mecanjaia, qujn piloa, qujn cuexcoch vivitequj, qujn quatepipitzinja; in moteneoa tlacolchiuhque, intetlanxinque, çan iooan, in mj ctiloia, in oallatvi ietlacuj tlapocaoa, atlan quj monmamaiavi. No ioan cequjn vncan mj quja, in ma malti, iuh mj toa: caiehoan in ca moz caltiaia in Motecucoma (in iuh omo teneuh) ipan ce quj auitl in vncan temoa:auh ieno vncan tepopoloaia, in omoteneuhque tlatlacateculo, in nanaoalti: auh injc imacaxoia, in ipan in tonalli nauecatl: in tlecalco noujian caaqujaia, in tlacateculo xo covitztli, qujpopotzaquj aia, quj caca catztzaia: iuh mjtoa caic qujnpevi aia. Auh in iehoantin pochteca, in moteneoa: acxoteca, in oztome ca, in motlacamati, ie quj veimatia, quj maviztiliaia, ca vncan quj toto nj aia, inixquich tlacotli quj tlatiaia, in chalchiujtl, in chalchiuhtli, in que tzal chalchiuhtli, in ololiuh quj, in to matic, in acatic; in ie ixqujch cozcatl, in cozcapetlatl, in patlaoac, in pitzaoac, xiujtl: auh inj xqujch nepapan i vitl, in quetzalli in vel iaque in vel vitoliuj, in patlaoac, in viiac, in qujl huja cezciacatl ican moteca: auh in cantoto cuj tlapiltic, ioan in qujlhuja

column3: temaca, in iuh cemjlhujtl in oallat vic, aoctle qujtetlaneuhtia, y nj moz tlaioc: ic vncan veltematlac maquia, intlacatecolotl, on mj quj, canel ieon comca ite quj uh, caie in qujtetemoa, caie vn canca ipoliuj liz: ca nj ma iuh iiollo quj matia in ocnemj, in acoca na axioaz: ca nj man iuh ipan tlacat, icom miquiz: nj man aic avia, aic vellamati, itzotzoma, itatapa ietine mj; auh çan moxixicotinemj, maco ma, motlaqualcoma, no viian ima caxo, acan vel tepan calaquj, aiac ic njuh: auh in manel ieo anoc, amo ic momauhtia, amo ic motzaqua, amo ic quj caquj, intla on cate ipilhoa, can mochipa iuh nemj, amo quj caoa liztlamati, vncan activi quitz acutiuj, muchiuh vi, muchiuh polivi; çan no iuh quj ite qujuh catca intlacioatl, muchi amo qualli inj tequj uh catca, cenca motolinj tinenca, acan ichan, in manel cioapilli, acan ixtona, acan motztica; çan iuhquj on mj quj, toto neoatiuh in jiollo, mjtoa canel iuh quj itonal injc noiotl.
column4: temaka, in iu semjljutl in oalat vik, aoktle qujtetlaneuhtia, i nj mos tlaiok: ik vnkan veltematlak makia, intlakatekolotl, on mj quj, kanel ieon komka ite quj u, kaie in qujtetemoa, kaie vn kanka ipoliuj lis: ka nj ma iu iiolo quj matia in oknemj, in akoka na axioas: ka nj man iu ipan tlakat, ikom mikis: nj man aik avia, aik velamati, itsotsoma, itatapa ietine mj; au san moxixikotinemj, mako ma, motlakualkoma, no viian ima kaxo, akan vel tepan calaquj, aiak ik nju: au in manel ieo anok, amo ik momautia, amo ik motsakua, amo ik quj caquj, intla on kate ipiljoa, kan mochipa iu nemj, amo quj kaoa listlamati, vnkan aktivi kits acutiuj, muchiu vi, muchiu polivi; san no iu quj ite qujuh katka intlasioatl, muchi amo kuali inj tequj u katka, senka motolinj tinenka, akan ichan, in manel sioapili, akan ixtona, akan motstika; san iukj on mj quj, toto neoatiu in jiolo, mjtoa kanel iu quj itonal injk noiotl.

column4: (25) I nj pan naoh ecatl: tonalli, mj toa qoalli, ioan amo qoalli, ca vncan mj ctiloia, qoj n qoech mecanjaia, qojn qoechtzonviaia, qojn mecanjaia, qojn piloa, qojn coexcoch viviteqoj, qojn qoatepipitzinja; in moteneoa tlacolchiohqoe, intetlanxinqoe, çan iooan, in mj ctiloia, in oallatvi ietlacoj tlapocaoa, atlan qoj monmamaiavi.

column3: No ioan cequjn vncan mj quja, in ma malti, iuh mj toa: caiehoan in ca moz caltiaia in Motecucoma (in iuh omo teneuh) ipan ce quj auitl in vncan temoa:auh ieno vncan tepopoloaia, in omoteneuhque tlatlacateculo, in nanaoalti: auh injc imacaxoia, in ipan in tonalli nauecatl: in tlecalco noujian caaqujaia, in tlacateculo xo covitztli, qujpopotzaquj aia, quj caca catztzaia: iuh mjtoa caic qujnpevi aia.
column4: no ioan cequjn vnkan mj quja, in ma malti, iu mj toa kaiejoan in ka mos kaltiaia in motekukoma (in iu omo teneu) ipan se quj auitl in vnkan temoaau ieno vnkan tepopoloaia, in omoteneuke tlatlakatekulo, in nanaoalti au injk imakaxoia, in ipan in tonali nauekatl: in tlekalko noujian caaqujaia, in tlakatekulo xo kovitstli, qujpopotzaquj aia, quj kaka katstsaia iu mjtoa kaik qujnpevi aia.

column4: No ioan ceqojn vncan mj qoja, in ma malti, ioh mj toa: caiehoan in ca moz caltiaia in Motecocoma (in ioh omo teneoh) ipan ce qoj aoitl in vncan temoa:aoh ieno vncan tepopoloaia, in omoteneohqoe tlatlacatecolo, in nanaoalti: aoh injc imacaxoia, in ipan in tonalli naoecatl: in tlecalco noojian caaqojaia, in tlacatecolo xo coiitztli, qojpopotzaqoj aia, qoj caca catztzaia: ioh mjtoa caic qojnpevi aia.

column3: Auh in iehoantin pochteca, in moteneoa: acxoteca, in oztome ca, in motlacamati, ie quj veimatia, quj maviztiliaia, ca vncan quj toto nj aia, inixquich tlacotli quj tlatiaia, in chalchiujtl, in chalchiuhtli, in que tzal chalchiuhtli, in ololiuh quj, in to matic, in acatic; in ie ixqujch cozcatl, in cozcapetlatl, in patlaoac, in pitzaoac, xiujtl: auh inj xqujch nepapan i vitl, in quetzalli in vel iaque in vel vitoliuj, in patlaoac, in viiac, in qujl huja cezciacatl ican moteca: auh in cantoto cuj tlapiltic, ioan in qujlhuja
column4: au in iejoantin pochteka, in moteneoa akxoteka, in ostome ka, in motlakamati, ie quj veimatia, quj mavistiliaia, ka vnkan quj toto nj aia, inixkich tlakotli quj tlatiaia, in chalchiutl, in chalchiutli, in ke tsal chalchiutli, in ololiu quj, in to matik, in akatik; in ie ixqujch koskatl, in koskapetlatl, in patlaoak, in pitsaoak, xiutl: au inj xqujch nepapan i vitl, in ketsali in vel iake in vel vitoliuj, in patlaoak, in viiak, in qujl juja sessiakatl ikan moteka au in kantoto kuj tlapiltik, ioan in qujlhuja

column1: .de fo. quetzaliacatl, in cantepitoton, in chil chotic, ioan in tzinjtz can, in teoque chol, in axcan mjtoa tlauh quechol, ioan in xiuh tototl, in aiopal, in toz tli, in toz cuj cujl, in caquan, in cocho ivitl, in chamolin, in cuj tlatexotli, in cocotli, in xiuh apalli. Etc. yoan intequaneoatl, in tequanpetlatl; auh in aquaujtl, in atzaccaiotl: in ie mochi in tlatquj in teintoc, inteucali, tlacotilmapan quj cente caia, quj cue cuentiliaia, qujtlatlamantiliaia, quj viujpanaia, quj tetecpanaia; vncan tlenamacaia, tlacoton aia, iehoatl injc mjtoa: tlatotonja, auh inj quac otlatoto nj que, in otlenamacaque, ce mjlhujtl, catepan tlatlaqualo, aatli oa, mopixtoque, in pochteca veuet que, nepielotoc, tlachichinalotoc, tlanecutoc, tlaaujaxtoc, puctleoa toc, puctli momtoc, tlaqualli quj qujz toc, atlemonectoc; iehoatl injc mjtoa, catlatonaltia, tlatotonja, in puch teca. A uh in oioocac tlatlaoano, mocecen tlalia in puchteca veuetque, in puch teca ilamatque, intlaotlai uj ntic, vncan quj mopopoaltia, quj meeoal tia, ic mjx motlatoque, y nin necujl tonol, ynintlaiecoliz, y nj moquj ch tiliz, occenca iehoatl: in canjn icac imjcxi, qujtoznequj; in canjn aciti nemj, in quexqujch ic conmati, in quexqujch imjloch, innecuepal, ic quichiuhtinemj, injc qujlacatzotinemj anaoatl, injc ixtlaoatl quj na mj cti nemj, injc atlauhtli quitemovitinemj, in noviian calactinemj, in o vica, in iao titlan qujztinemj: auh in nel cana, im pan oalmotzaqua, quj npoiomjctia, aco cace, vme, inte matitlampa quj ca, in quj oalcaoa tlatolli, in oalteitoa, ie hoan achtopa quj petla, quj xitinja in quauhtena mjtl, quauh tlatza cujlli, ocelotenamjtl, ocelo tlatz acujlli, ic vn can qujquequeloa, ica maujltia, quj tlatlacaqujtia, quj cocoa, quj totoneoa, quj cocolhuja, quj chichinachilia y nj iollo, in acan onmati, in acampa ianj, in acan quentel, in acan icac icxi, in can njcam inextitlan mooqujchitoa, can njcan tianquizco in mj mantine mj, tlaxtlapalotinemj, çan nj çan in motitianquja, tlatlanecujloa, tlatla xic cuj; auh ie vncan inj toneuhca co pa, motlecomaiavi vevetzteoa, yn in tlaz caltilhoan, inj ntlaoapaoalhoa, injc vel imjtic oaacic intecoco, in te itic aacic in tlatol, in jn tahoan, y njn naoan, injc vncan in necentlaliaia maaoa, mononotza, moquequeloa, mopapatla, mopapatzaoa, moquez iccatoque, moco quj motlatoque, motla tzouj litoque, moquaquatoque, mjx quaquatoque, motlatol xopeuh toque, moiehoato catoque, amotenaqujlmat que amo moten pana villanj, chacha

column4: yoan inteqoaneoatl, in teqoanpetlatl; aoh in aqoaojtl, in atzaccaiotl: in ie mochi in tlatqoj in teintoc, inteocali, tlacotilmapan qoj cente caia, qoj coe coentiliaia, qojtlatlamantiliaia, qoj viojpanaia, qoj tetecpanaia; vncan tlenamacaia, tlacoton aia, iehoatl injc mjtoa: tlatotonja, aoh inj qoac otlatoto nj qoe, in otlenamacaqoe, ce mjlhojtl, catepan tlatlaqoalo, aatli oa, mopixtoqoe, in pochteca veoet qoe, nepielotoc, tlachichinalotoc, tlanecotoc, tlaaojaxtoc, poctleoa toc, poctli momtoc, tlaqoalli qoj qojz toc, atlemonectoc; iehoatl injc mjtoa, catlatonaltia, tlatotonja, in poch teca.

column3: A uh in oioocac tlatlaoano, mocecen tlalia in puchteca veuetque, in puch teca ilamatque, intlaotlai uj ntic, vncan quj mopopoaltia, quj meeoal tia, ic mjx motlatoque, y nin necujl tonol, ynintlaiecoliz, y nj moquj ch tiliz, occenca iehoatl: in canjn icac imjcxi, qujtoznequj; in canjn aciti nemj, in quexqujch ic conmati, in quexqujch imjloch, innecuepal, ic quichiuhtinemj, injc qujlacatzotinemj anaoatl, injc ixtlaoatl quj na mj cti nemj, injc atlauhtli quitemovitinemj, in noviian calactinemj, in o vica, in iao titlan qujztinemj: auh in nel cana, im pan oalmotzaqua, quj npoiomjctia, aco cace, vme, inte matitlampa quj ca, in quj oalcaoa tlatolli, in oalteitoa, ie hoan achtopa quj petla, quj xitinja in quauhtena mjtl, quauh tlatza cujlli, ocelotenamjtl, ocelo tlatz acujlli, ic vn can qujquequeloa, ica maujltia, quj tlatlacaqujtia, quj cocoa, quj totoneoa, quj cocolhuja, quj chichinachilia y nj iollo, in acan onmati, in acampa ianj, in acan quentel, in acan icac icxi, in can njcam inextitlan mooqujchitoa, can njcan tianquizco in mj mantine mj, tlaxtlapalotinemj, çan nj çan in motitianquja, tlatlanecujloa, tlatla xic cuj; auh ie vncan inj toneuhca co pa, motlecomaiavi vevetzteoa, yn in tlaz caltilhoan, inj ntlaoapaoalhoa, injc vel imjtic oaacic intecoco, in te itic aacic in tlatol, in jn tahoan, y njn naoan, injc vncan in necentlaliaia maaoa, mononotza, moquequeloa, mopapatla, mopapatzaoa, moquez iccatoque, moco quj motlatoque, motla tzouj litoque, moquaquatoque, mjx quaquatoque, motlatol xopeuh toque, moiehoato catoque, amotenaqujlmat que amo moten pana villanj, chacha
column4: a u in oiookak tlatlaoano, mosesen tlalia in puchteka veuetke, in puch teka ilamatke, intlaotlai uj ntik, vnkan quj mopopoaltia, quj meeoal tia, ik mjx motlatoke, i nin nekujl tonol, inintlaiekolis, i nj moquj ch tilis, oksenka iejoatl: in kanjn ikak imjkxi, qujtoznequj; in kanjn asiti nemj, in quexqujch ik konmati, in quexqujch imjloch, innekuepal, ik kichiutinemj, injk qujlacatzotinemj anaoatl, injk ixtlaoatl quj na mj kti nemj, injk atlautli kitemovitinemj, in noviian kalaktinemj, in o vika, in iao titlan qujztinemj: au in nel kana, im pan oalmotsakua, quj npoiomjktia, ako kase, vme, inte matitlampa quj ka, in quj oalkaoa tlatoli, in oalteitoa, ie joan achtopa quj petla, quj xitinja in kuautena mjtl, kuau tlatsa kujli, oselotenamjtl, oselo tlats akujli, ik vn kan qujquequeloa, ika maultia, quj tlatlacaqujtia, quj kokoa, quj totoneoa, quj kokoljuja, quj chichinachilia i nj iolo, in akan onmati, in akampa ianj, in akan kentel, in akan ikak ikxi, in kan njkam inextitlan mooqujchitoa, kan njkan tiankisko in mj mantine mj, tlaxtlapalotinemj, san nj san in motitianquja, tlatlanekujloa, tlatla xik kuj; au ie vnkan inj toneuka ko pa, motlekomaiavi vevetsteoa, in in tlas kaltiljoan, inj ntlaoapaoaljoa, injk vel imjtik oaasik intekoko, in te itik aasik in tlatol, in jn tajoan, i njn naoan, injk vnkan in nesentlaliaia maaoa, mononotsa, mokekeloa, mopapatla, mopapatsaoa, mokes ikkatoke, moko quj motlatoke, motla tzouj litoke, mokuakuatoke, mjx kuakuatoke, motlatol xopeu toke, moiejoato katoke, amotenaqujlmat ke amo moten pana vilanj, chacha

column4: A oh in oioocac tlatlaoano, mocecen tlalia in pochteca veoetqoe, in poch teca ilamatqoe, intlaotlai oj ntic, vncan qoj mopopoaltia, qoj meeoal tia, ic mjx motlatoqoe, y nin necojl tonol, ynintlaiecoliz, y nj moqoj ch tiliz, occenca iehoatl: in canjn icac imjcxi, qojtozneqoj; in canjn aciti nemj, in qoexqojch ic conmati, in qoexqojch imjloch, innecoepal, ic qoichiohtinemj, injc qojlacatzotinemj anaoatl, injc ixtlaoatl qoj na mj cti nemj, injc atlaohtli qoitemovitinemj, in noviian calactinemj, in o vica, in yao titlan qojztinemj: aoh in nel cana, im pan oalmotzaqoa, qoj npoiomjctia, aco cace, vme, inte matitlampa qoj ca, in qoj oalcaoa tlatolli, in oalteitoa, ie hoan achtopa qoj petla, qoj xitinja in qoaohtena mjtl, qoaoh tlatza cojlli, ocelotenamjtl, ocelo tlatz acojlli, ic vn can qojqoeqoeloa, ica maojltia, qoj tlatlacaqojtia, qoj cocoa, qoj totoneoa, qoj cocolhoja, qoj chichinachilia y nj iollo, in acan onmati, in acampa ianj, in acan qoentel, in acan icac icxi, in can njcam inextitlan mooqojchitoa, can njcan tianqoizco in mj mantine mj, tlaxtlapalotinemj, çan nj çan in motitianqoja, tlatlanecojloa, tlatla xic coj; aoh ie vncan inj toneohca co pa, motlecomaiavi vevetzteoa, yn in tlaz caltilhoan, inj ntlaoapaoalhoa, injc vel imjtic oaacic intecoco, in te itic aacic in tlatol, in jn tahoan, y njn naoan, injc vncan in necentlaliaia maaoa, mononotza, moqoeqoeloa, mopapatla, mopapatzaoa, moqoez iccatoqoe, moco qoj motlatoqoe, motla tzooj litoqoe, moqoaqoatoqoe, mjx qoaqoatoqoe, motlatol xopeoh toqoe, moiehoato catoqoe, amotenaqojlmat qoe amo moten pana villanj, chacha

column1: .de fo.31. lacatoque, no cac in jz moquixtia: muchitlacatl cecentetl itlatol, atle ipan quj motz tilitoque, amo com mopovilitoque injn necujltonol, y njn netla machtil: huel nonon qua mutachcauhnequj, mocecen tecpoa, cecentecuti, cecenme momati, mocecocamati, nonon qua motlatalhuja, aiac vei in oan tlatoa, aiac vel in pal on mo cenca mavia: intlacamo oztome catl, in tlacamo veca matinj: ioan intlacamo cenca mocujltonoa, intlacamo ontlaaaquj ichan, intlacamo tecoanj, intlacamo tealtianj, intlacamo cacatzca toc, na natzcatoc ichan cacax tli: intlacamo poctecontica, aio tectica atlioa ichan et. I pam pa injc ceceniaca tlatonaltia ia, puchteca injn cacalitic: inj pa njn tonalli navecatl.(26) I njc matlactli vmey ca pitulo, vncan mjtoa: qujl mach amo qualli inezca catca, in aqujn moteputla mjaia, in anoço vetzia, y nj pa njn: ioan in amo qualli inpan muchioaia, in aquj que vncan tlacatia, inj pa icchicuetetl calli: y nj toca chicuey mjqujztli: vncan moteneoa injz quj tlamantli in amo qualli intech ca No ioan mjtoa: aiac vel maoa ia, anoço motlaujtequja, mo tepotlamja, motecuj nja, moxo quechaquja, moxo cuetlanja, mocxicue loa: ic tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma quj cencuj, caomonaue cauj, quj toznequj: comauecatl inj pan omococo. No ioan mjtoa: in aqujn y pantlacatia, quj pa tiaia, quj nemactiaia, intonalpouhque, iuh qujtoaia: mo cuj ltonoz, ioan tia cauhtiz, oquj chtiz, tlamauhtiz, tlama mauhtiz, momaujzcotiz, tonal chi caoac iez: auh aiamo caltiaia, inj pan chico me coatl, iuh quj toaia: oc cenca vel ipan qujto nalchi caoaia, injc cenca mo cujl tonoz, injc ma ceoale, nemaque, ilhujle, mochioaz: ipampa in chicome coatl caquj xiptlatiaia in to nacaiotl, in tlaolli, motqujtica qualonj: io an in iuh quj toa; in chicome tioaia ipan tonalli, muchipa qualcan. A uh in quj oal toqujlia macujlli calli, io an chiqua cen cuetzpalin: iuh injtoaia: njma amo qualli tonalli, inj onteixtin, y, in tlato aian macujl xochitl, io an mjc tlan tecutli: in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oqujchtli, in cioatl, nj man atle ima ceoal mochioaia, çan oalnenenquj caia, motqujtica netolinjliztli, in ilhujl, inj maceoal, y nemac, io an cantlatolli cololotinemj, tlatolli cololhuj tinemj, tlatolli itlaqual, tlacatl quj caoatzti nemj, çan ic nemj in tlacatl quj cuecue tlanja, tlacatl quj cocomonja, iuh mj

column3: lacatoque, no cac in jz moquixtia: muchitlacatl cecentetl itlatol, atle ipan quj motz tilitoque, amo com mopovilitoque injn necujltonol, y njn netla machtil: huel nonon qua mutachcauhnequj, mocecen tecpoa, cecentecuti, cecenme momati, mocecocamati, nonon qua motlatalhuja, aiac vei in oan tlatoa, aiac vel in pal on mo cenca mavia: intlacamo oztome catl, in tlacamo veca matinj: ioan intlacamo cenca mocujltonoa, intlacamo ontlaaaquj ichan, intlacamo tecoanj, intlacamo tealtianj, intlacamo cacatzca toc, na natzcatoc ichan cacax tli: intlacamo poctecontica, aio tectica atlioa ichan et.
column4: lakatoke, no kak in js mokixtia muchitlakatl sesentetl itlatol, atle ipan quj mots tilitoke, amo kom mopovilitoke injn nekujltonol, i njn netla machtil: uel nonon kua mutachcauhnequj, mosesen tekpoa, sesentekuti, sesenme momati, mosekokamati, nonon kua motlataljuja, aiak vei in oan tlatoa, aiak vel in pal on mo senka mavia intlakamo ostome katl, in tlakamo veka matinj: ioan intlakamo senka mokujltonoa, intlakamo ontlaaaquj ichan, intlakamo tekoanj, intlakamo tealtianj, intlakamo kakatska tok, na natskatok ichan kakax tli intlakamo poktekontika, aio tektika atlioa ichan et.

column3: (26) I njc matlactli vmey ca pitulo, vncan mjtoa: qujl mach amo qualli inezca catca, in aqujn moteputla mjaia, in anoço vetzia, y nj pa njn: ioan in amo qualli inpan muchioaia, in aquj que vncan tlacatia, inj pa icchicuetetl calli: y nj toca chicuey mjqujztli: vncan moteneoa injz quj tlamantli in amo qualli intech ca No ioan mjtoa: aiac vel maoa ia, anoço motlaujtequja, mo tepotlamja, motecuj nja, moxo quechaquja, moxo cuetlanja, mocxicue loa: ic tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma quj cencuj, caomonaue cauj, quj toznequj: comauecatl inj pan omococo.
column4: (26) i njk matlaktli vmei ka pitulo, vnkan mjtoa qujl mach amo kuali ineska katka, in aqujn moteputla mjaia, in anoso vetsia, i nj pa njn: ioan in amo kuali inpan muchioaia, in aquj ke vnkan tlakatia, inj pa ikchikuetetl kali i nj toka chikuei mjqujztli: vnkan moteneoa injs quj tlamantli in amo kuali intech ka no ioan mjtoa aiak vel maoa ia, anoso motlaujtequja, mo tepotlamja, motekuj nja, moxo quechaquja, moxo kuetlanja, mokxikue loa ik tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma quj senkuj, kaomonaue cauj, quj toznequj: komauekatl inj pan omokoko.

column3: (26) I njc matlactli vmey ca pitulo, vncan mjtoa: qujl mach amo qualli inezca catca, in aqujn moteputla mjaia, in anoço vetzia, y nj pa njn: ioan in amo qualli inpan muchioaia, in aquj que vncan tlacatia, inj pa icchicuetetl calli: y nj toca chicuey mjqujztli: vncan moteneoa injz quj tlamantli in amo qualli intech ca No ioan mjtoa: aiac vel maoa ia, anoço motlaujtequja, mo tepotlamja, motecuj nja, moxo quechaquja, moxo cuetlanja, mocxicue loa: ic tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma quj cencuj, caomonaue cauj, quj toznequj: comauecatl inj pan omococo.

column3: (26) I njc matlactli vmey ca pitulo, vncan mjtoa: qujl mach amo qualli inezca catca, in aqujn moteputla mjaia, in anoço vetzia, y nj pa njn: ioan in amo qualli inpan muchioaia, in aquj que vncan tlacatia, inj pa icchicuetetl calli: y nj toca chicuey mjqujztli: vncan moteneoa injz quj tlamantli in amo qualli intech ca No ioan mjtoa: aiac vel maoa ia, anoço motlaujtequja, mo tepotlamja, motecuj nja, moxo quechaquja, moxo cuetlanja, mocxicue loa: ic tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma quj cencuj, caomonaue cauj, quj toznequj: comauecatl inj pan omococo.
column4: (26) I njc matlactli vmey ca pitolo, vncan mjtoa: qojl mach amo qoalli inezca catca, in aqojn motepotla mjaia, in anoço vetzia, y nj pa njn: ioan in amo qoalli inpan mochioaia, in aqoj qoe vncan tlacatia, inj pa icchicoetetl calli: y nj toca chicoey mjqojztli: vncan moteneoa injz qoj tlamantli in amo qoalli intech ca No ioan mjtoa: aiac vel maoa ia, anoço motlaojteqoja, mo tepotlamja, motecoj nja, moxo qoechaqoja, moxo coetlanja, mocxicoe loa: ic tlatenmachililoia itoloia, ma qoj cencoj, caomonaoe caoj, qoj tozneqoj: comaoecatl inj pan omococo.

column3: No ioan mjtoa: in aqujn y pantlacatia, quj pa tiaia, quj nemactiaia, intonalpouhque, iuh qujtoaia: mo cuj ltonoz, ioan tia cauhtiz, oquj chtiz, tlamauhtiz, tlama mauhtiz, momaujzcotiz, tonal chi caoac iez: auh aiamo caltiaia, inj pan chico me coatl, iuh quj toaia: oc cenca vel ipan qujto nalchi caoaia, injc cenca mo cujl tonoz, injc ma ceoale, nemaque, ilhujle, mochioaz: ipampa in chicome coatl caquj xiptlatiaia in to nacaiotl, in tlaolli, motqujtica qualonj: io an in iuh quj toa; in chicome tioaia ipan tonalli, muchipa qualcan.
column4: no ioan mjtoa in aqujn i pantlakatia, quj pa tiaia, quj nemaktiaia, intonalpouke, iu qujtoaia: mo kuj ltonos, ioan tia kautis, oquj chtis, tlamautis, tlama mautis, momauskotis, tonal chi kaoak ies: au aiamo kaltiaia, inj pan chiko me koatl, iu quj toaia ok senka vel ipan qujto nalchi kaoaia, injk senka mo kujl tonos, injk ma seoale, nemake, iljule, mochioas: ipampa in chikome koatl caquj xiptlatiaia in to nakaiotl, in tlaoli, motqujtica kualonj: io an in iu quj toa; in chikome tioaia ipan tonali, muchipa kualkan.

column3: A uh in quj oal toqujlia macujlli calli, io an chiqua cen cuetzpalin: iuh injtoaia: njma amo qualli tonalli, inj onteixtin, y, in tlato aian macujl xochitl, io an mjc tlan tecutli: in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oqujchtli, in cioatl, nj man atle ima ceoal mochioaia, çan oalnenenquj caia, motqujtica netolinjliztli, in ilhujl, inj maceoal, y nemac, io an cantlatolli cololotinemj, tlatolli cololhuj tinemj, tlatolli itlaqual, tlacatl quj caoatzti nemj, çan ic nemj in tlacatl quj cuecue tlanja, tlacatl quj cocomonja, iuh mj

column1: .de fo.32. toa injc aio: inj quac onoitla contechi oalti, in onoitla conteecaujlti, in onoi tla ic onteatlatzicuj nj, macel ica ontla canemj in tlapalpul, iollo chicopul, iollopatlachpul, iollo tlauelilo capul, quennel noco macujltonale, caie iuh que in ma macujlto naleque, aquen tlatta, canel ic monotzque, in amo ceme tla cace melleque, caiuh çan tlacatque. Auh injc quj quattiliaia tonalpouhque, quj teilhuiaia aiamo vel ipan maltiz, in ipan otlacat, maoc quj chia in chico me coatl; ca vmpa ocnentitlate machia, ca quj nic quj mattiuh, intlanemjz, aco canen itla imaceoaltitiuh, caitlama ceoaliztica quj mo cue pilili tiuh y nj to nal: ipampa in iuh quj toaia, inj pan chicome tonalli: qujlmach mochipa qualcan, vel vncan in tlatoaia in chi come coatl, in quj xiptlatiaia tonaca iotl, motqujtica necujltonolli. Ioan no quj toaia in tlatlamo cuj tlaujz, mo tlacujtlaujz, iel, ieel, mochioaz, caic qujzcaltiaia inj tonal, qujtoznequj: ic quj qualtilia: vncan quj motlaxi lia, quj mopopolhuja, injc otlamauh caittililoc ipan tonalli otlacat; ic ix coian inoma, itlama ceoaliztica, quj moieccaqujxtilia inj tonal, quj mono mavilia inezcaliliztica. I njpan chi cuei mjqujztli: amo qualli, no ioan in chicunavi macatl; njman amono qualli, tonalli, iuh mjtoaia: cam chi cunavitioaia ipan tonalli: nj man amo qualcan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oquj chtli, in cioatl; nj man atle il hujl, imaceoal mochioa: iehoantin vn can tlacati in cantlatlanecomaltia tpc tlaneco maltitinemj, çan tlatlaueliloc, iollo tlaueliloc, teuhtli, tlacolli cololo tinemj, tlalli cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil quj xtitinemj, aia c quj xitta, aiac quj xtilia, aiac quj mamati, aiac tleipan qujtta, aiac tleco poa, aiac compoa, cenca iz mo qujxtia, vel ixquaujtl, yixquauhti, acan ixma vi, nonoviia, aquentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlacatlatoa, tetenquauhti, tetennemj, tenxaxacalpul, camaxa calpul, tlatol campax, tetenpatztla toa, tetentlamati, y iztlacati, atle vel ixpan mjtoa, amo iollo tlaquaoac, amo teten pachiuhquj, amo moten ma mati, iollo camachal, atle uel itic tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaca, teix necujloa, teixtlaca, teueuetlaca, amo patzaoallanj, axic chioaliztli, canie eipan mj xpoa, caniee quj cemmati, canice icentequjuh in tlatlaueliloca iotl, muchi chivil, muchitequjuh, te tlatlanxima, y ichtequj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to quj lia, tetlatlaxiqujttilia, teoovi cana quja, tetlatlanamjctia, tetlatla

column3: I njpan chi cuei mjqujztli: amo qualli, no ioan in chicunavi macatl; njman amono qualli, tonalli, iuh mjtoaia: cam chi cunavitioaia ipan tonalli: nj man amo qualcan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oquj chtli, in cioatl; nj man atle il hujl, imaceoal mochioa: iehoantin vn can tlacati in cantlatlanecomaltia tpc tlaneco maltitinemj, çan tlatlaueliloc, iollo tlaueliloc, teuhtli, tlacolli cololo tinemj, tlalli cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil quj xtitinemj, aia c quj xitta, aiac quj xtilia, aiac quj mamati, aiac tleipan qujtta, aiac tleco poa, aiac compoa, cenca iz mo qujxtia, vel ixquaujtl, yixquauhti, acan ixma vi, nonoviia, aquentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlacatlatoa, tetenquauhti, tetennemj, tenxaxacalpul, camaxa calpul, tlatol campax, tetenpatztla toa, tetentlamati, y iztlacati, atle vel ixpan mjtoa, amo iollo tlaquaoac, amo teten pachiuhquj, amo moten ma mati, iollo camachal, atle uel itic tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaca, teix necujloa, teixtlaca, teueuetlaca, amo patzaoallanj, axic chioaliztli, canie eipan mj xpoa, caniee quj cemmati, canice icentequjuh in tlatlaueliloca iotl, muchi chivil, muchitequjuh, te tlatlanxima, y ichtequj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to quj lia, tetlatlaxiqujttilia, teoovi cana quja, tetlatlanamjctia, tetlatla
column4: i nhpan chi kwei mjqujztli: amo kwali, no ioan in chikunavi makatl; nhman amono kwali, tonali, iw mhtoaia kam chi kunavitioaia ipan tonali nh man amo kwalkan, in aqujn ipan tlakatia in oquj chtli, in sioatl; nh man atle il hul, imaseoal mochioa iehoantin vn kan tlakati in kantlatlanekomaltia tpk tlaneko maltitinemj, san tlatlawelilok, iolo tlawelilok, tewtli, tlakoli kololo tinemj, tlali cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil quj xtitinemj, aia k quj xitta, aiak quj xtilia, aiak quj mamati, aiak tleipan qujtta, aiak tleko poa, aiak kompoa, senka is mo qujxtia, vel ixkwautl, yixkwawti, akan ixma vi, nonoviia, akentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlakatlatoa, tetenkwawti, tetennemj, tenxaxakalpul, kamaxa kalpul, tlatol kampax, tetenpatstla toa, tetentlamati, i istlakati, atle vel ixpan mhtoa, amo iolo tlakwaoak, amo teten pachiuhquj, amo moten ma mati, iolo kamachal, atle wel itik tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaka, teix nekuhloa, teixtlaka, tewewetlaka, amo patzaoallanj, axik chioalistli, kanie eipan mh xpoa, kaniee quj semmati, kanise icentequjuh in tlatlaweliloka iotl, muchi chivil, muchitequjuh, te tlatlanxima, i ichtequj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to quj lia, tetlatlaxiqujttilia, teoovi kana quja, tetlatlanamhktia, tetlatla

column4: i nhpan chi cuei mjqujztli: amo cualli, no ioan in chicunavi macatl; nhman amono cualli, tonalli, iuh mhtoaia cam chi cunavitioaia ipan tonalli nh man amo cualcan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oquj chtli, in cioatl; nh man atle il hul, imaceoal mochioa iehoantin vn can tlacati in cantlatlanecomaltia tpc tlaneco maltitinemj, zan tlatlahueliloc, iollo tlahueliloc, teuhtli, tlacolli cololo tinemj, tlalli cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil quj xtitinemj, aia c quj xitta, aiac quj xtilia, aiac quj mamati, aiac tleipan qujtta, aiac tleco poa, aiac compoa, cenca iz mo qujxtia, vel ixcuautl, yixcuauhti, acan ixma vi, nonoviia, aquentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlacatlatoa, tetencuauhti, tetennemj, tenxaxacalpul, camaxa calpul, tlatol campax, tetenpatztla toa, tetentlamati, i iztlacati, atle vel ixpan mhtoa, amo iollo tlacuaoac, amo teten pachiuhquj, amo moten ma mati, iollo camachal, atle huel itic tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaca, teix necuhloa, teixtlaca, tehuehuetlaca, amo patzaoallanj, axic chioaliztli, canie eipan mh xpoa, caniee quj cemmati, canice icentequjuh in tlatlahueliloca iotl, muchi chivil, muchitequjuh, te tlatlanxima, i ichtequj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to quj lia, tetlatlaxiqujttilia, teoovi cana quja, tetlatlanamhctia, tetlatla

column3: I njpan chi cuei mjqujztli: amo qualli, no ioan in chicunavi macatl; njman amono qualli, tonalli, iuh mjtoaia: cam chi cunavitioaia ipan tonalli: nj man amo qualcan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia in oquj chtli, in cioatl; nj man atle il hujl, imaceoal mochioa: iehoantin vn can tlacati in cantlatlanecomaltia tpc tlaneco maltitinemj, çan tlatlaueliloc, iollo tlaueliloc, teuhtli, tlacolli cololo tinemj, tlalli cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil quj xtitinemj, aia c quj xitta, aiac quj xtilia, aiac quj mamati, aiac tleipan qujtta, aiac tleco poa, aiac compoa, cenca iz mo qujxtia, vel ixquaujtl, yixquauhti, acan ixma vi, nonoviia, aquentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlacatlatoa, tetenquauhti, tetennemj, tenxaxacalpul, camaxa calpul, tlatol campax, tetenpatztla toa, tetentlamati, y iztlacati, atle vel ixpan mjtoa, amo iollo tlaquaoac, amo teten pachiuhquj, amo moten ma mati, iollo camachal, atle uel itic tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaca, teix necujloa, teixtlaca, teueuetlaca, amo patzaoallanj, axic chioaliztli, canie eipan mj xpoa, caniee quj cemmati, canice icentequjuh in tlatlaueliloca iotl, muchi chivil, muchitequjuh, te tlatlanxima, y ichtequj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to quj lia, tetlatlaxiqujttilia, teoovi cana quja, tetlatlanamjctia, tetlatla
column4: I njpan chi coei mjqojztli: amo qoalli, no ioan in chiconavi macatl; njman amono qoalli, tonalli, ioh mjtoaia: cam chi conavitioaia ipan tonalli: nj man amo qoalcan, in aqojn ipan tlacatia in oqoj chtli, in cioatl; nj man atle il hojl, imaceoal mochioa: iehoantin vn can tlacati in cantlatlanecomaltia tpc tlaneco maltitinemj, çan tlatlaoeliloc, iollo tlaoeliloc, teohtli, tlacolli cololo tinemj, tlalli cololotinemj, atlacanemj, iztlacattinemj, tlaavil qoj xtitinemj, aia c qoj xitta, aiac qoj xtilia, aiac qoj mamati, aiac tleipan qojtta, aiac tleco poa, aiac compoa, cenca iz mo qojxtia, vel ixqoaojtl, yixqoaohti, acan ixma vi, nonoviia, aqoentlatta, atleipan tlatla, atlatlacatlatoa, tetenqoaohti, tetennemj, tenxaxacalpol, camaxa calpol, tlatol campax, tetenpatztla toa, tetentlamati, y iztlacati, atle vel ixpan mjtoa, amo iollo tlaqoaoac, amo teten pachiohqoj, amo moten ma mati, iollo camachal, atle oel itic tla lilo, nenepil maxal, tenenenxotla, nenepil ixtlapal, tepapantlaca, teix necojloa, teixtlaca, teoeoetlaca, amo patzaoallanj, axic chioaliztli, canie eipan mj xpoa, caniee qoj cemmati, canice icenteqojoh in tlatlaoeliloca iotl, mochi chivil, mochiteqojoh, te tlatlanxima, y ichteqoj, tlatlaixpa choa, tlatlanaoalchioa, tetlatlaix to qoj lia, tetlatlaxiqojttilia, teoovi cana qoja, tetlatlanamjctia, tetlatla

column1: .de fo.33. colnamjctia, tlatlachtacanamaca, te iichtacanamaca, teiichtacaujca, te nanaoalhujca, tenanaoalnotza, much aitlaqual in quj qua, tecanenemj, te cacalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nj man iuh quj ca, nj man iuh mozcaltia, in aquentlatta, in atlacacemelle: njma ipan pilpeoa, nj man ipan mo oapaoa, in auel monotza, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatolli, çan ietenananqujlia, tepan quj cuepa, tlatlauel chioanj, mj ixtla ca, moquaquatlaca, iix cueloa, mj ix cueloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolacic, tlaue liloc, vel iollo cuj cujtla, atentlacatl, tentlaueliloc, muchi tlacatl qujtenjma caci, qujtlatol imacaci, aiac quj tena ci, aiac vel qujtempanavia, iee injc mjtoa: atlacacemelle, çan tlatolli il hujl, tlatolli itlaqual, aiac itlacato caia, noviian tetenco caca, tepan onoc, tepan cen mantoc, injc aujlqujz quj, tlaitolli, tlaztlacolli, noviian mauh caitto inj nemjliz, inj tlachioal, canel iuh çan tlacat, in tlacoltitlan, teuhti tlan, qujtoznequj: cacan motqujtica aujlqujz caiotl, inj nemac, atle qualli, atle iectli: auh in nen ic quj qualti aia, quj qualtiliaia tonalpouhque, in iuh quj itonal ipan otlacat, quj nj pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlactetl tochtli: injc ipan maltiz, quj toca ma cazque, qujtoaia: in tlanemjz aco ca itla imaceoaltiz, iece camo cax canviz, octotoneoaz, chichichina caz inj iollo, inj nacaio, itlamaceoaliztica quj cnopilhujz, inj nemac mochioaz, qujn inoma, qujn ixcoian quj mj xnextiliz, qujn quj nomaviz, qujn quj monoma viliz: iniuh ie mj ieccan omoteneuh.(27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in qualli, tonalli: injn techca in nauh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl qualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.(28) A uh inj pan in cemjlhuj to nalli: cemj lhuj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli: iuh mjtoa, cenca qual can in aqujn vncan tlacatia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhujle, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iuh mjtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inj pan matlactli tonalli, muchipa qualcan, vncan ca ilhujlli, maceoalli; in iuhca itlatlatollo, in iemj ieccan omo teneuh: auh aiamo nj man caltiaia, inj pan in tonalli o tlacat, qujn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qujto cama caia: inj pan matlactlon

column3: colnamjctia, tlatlachtacanamaca, te iichtacanamaca, teiichtacaujca, te nanaoalhujca, tenanaoalnotza, much aitlaqual in quj qua, tecanenemj, te cacalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nj man iuh quj ca, nj man iuh mozcaltia, in aquentlatta, in atlacacemelle: njma ipan pilpeoa, nj man ipan mo oapaoa, in auel monotza, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatolli, çan ietenananqujlia, tepan quj cuepa, tlatlauel chioanj, mj ixtla ca, moquaquatlaca, iix cueloa, mj ix cueloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolacic, tlaue liloc, vel iollo cuj cujtla, atentlacatl, tentlaueliloc, muchi tlacatl qujtenjma caci, qujtlatol imacaci, aiac quj tena ci, aiac vel qujtempanavia, iee injc mjtoa: atlacacemelle, çan tlatolli il hujl, tlatolli itlaqual, aiac itlacato caia, noviian tetenco caca, tepan onoc, tepan cen mantoc, injc aujlqujz quj, tlaitolli, tlaztlacolli, noviian mauh caitto inj nemjliz, inj tlachioal, canel iuh çan tlacat, in tlacoltitlan, teuhti tlan, qujtoznequj: cacan motqujtica aujlqujz caiotl, inj nemac, atle qualli, atle iectli: auh in nen ic quj qualti aia, quj qualtiliaia tonalpouhque, in iuh quj itonal ipan otlacat, quj nj pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlactetl tochtli: injc ipan maltiz, quj toca ma cazque, qujtoaia: in tlanemjz aco ca itla imaceoaltiz, iece camo cax canviz, octotoneoaz, chichichina caz inj iollo, inj nacaio, itlamaceoaliztica quj cnopilhujz, inj nemac mochioaz, qujn inoma, qujn ixcoian quj mj xnextiliz, qujn quj nomaviz, qujn quj monoma viliz: iniuh ie mj ieccan omoteneuh.
column4: kolnamjktia, tlatlachtakanamaka, te iichtakanamaka, teiichtakauka, te nanaoaljuka, tenanaoalnotsa, much aitlakual in quj kua, tekanenemj, te kakalpanoa, tepan kakalaktinemj: nj man iu quj ka, nj man iu moskaltia, in akentlatta, in atlakasemele njma ipan pilpeoa, nj man ipan mo oapaoa, in auel monotsa, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatoli, san ietenananqujlia, tepan quj kuepa, tlatlauel chioanj, mj ixtla ka, mokuakuatlaka, iix kueloa, mj ix kueloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolasik, tlaue lilok, vel iolo kuj kujtla, atentlakatl, tentlauelilok, muchi tlakatl qujtenjma kasi, qujtlatol imakasi, aiak quj tena si, aiak vel qujtempanavia, iee injk mjtoa atlakasemele, san tlatoli il jul, tlatoli itlakual, aiak itlakato kaia, noviian tetenko kaka, tepan onok, tepan sen mantok, injk aujlqujz quj, tlaitoli, tlastlakoli, noviian mau kaitto inj nemjlis, inj tlachioal, kanel iu san tlakat, in tlakoltitlan, teuti tlan, qujtoznequj: kakan motqujtica aujlqujz kaiotl, inj nemak, atle kuali, atle iektli au in nen ik quj kualti aia, quj kualtiliaia tonalpouke, in iu quj itonal ipan otlakat, quj nj pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlaktetl tochtli injk ipan maltis, quj toka ma kaske, qujtoaia: in tlanemjs ako ka itla imaseoaltis, iese kamo kax kanvis, oktotoneoas, chichichina kas inj iolo, inj nakaio, itlamaseoalistika quj knopiljus, inj nemak mochioas, qujn inoma, qujn ixkoian quj mj xnextilis, qujn quj nomavis, qujn quj monoma vilis: iniu ie mj iekkan omoteneu.

column4: kolnamhktia, tlatlachtakanamaka, te iichtakanamaka, teiichtakauka, te nanaoalhuka, tenanaoalnotsa, much aitlakwal in quj kwa, tecanenemj, te kakalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nh man iw quj ka, nh man iw moskaltia, in akentlatta, in atlakasemele nhma ipan pilpeoa, nh man ipan mo oapaoa, in awel monotsa, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatoli, san ietenananqujlia, tepan quj kwepa, tlatlawel chioanj, mh ixtla ka, mokwakwatlaka, iix kweloa, mh ix kweloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolasik, tlawe lilok, vel iolo kuh kuhtla, atentlakatl, tentlawelilok, muchi tlakatl qujtenjma kasi, qujtlatol imakasi, aiak quj tena si, aiak vel qujtempanavia, iee inhk mhtoa atlakasemele, san tlatoli il hul, tlatoli itlakwal, aiak itlakato kaia, noviian tetenko kaka, tepan onok, tepan sen mantok, inhk aujlqujz quj, tlaitoli, tlastlakoli, noviian maw kaitto inh nemhlis, inh tlachioal, kanel iw san tlakat, in tlakoltitlan, tewti tlan, qujtoznequj: kakan motqujtica aujlqujz kaiotl, inh nemak, atle kwali, atle iektli aw in nen ik quj kwalti aia, quj kwaltiliaia tonalpowke, in iw quj itonal ipan otlakat, quj nh pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlaktetl tochtli inhk ipan maltis, quj toka ma kaske, qujtoaia: in tlanemhs ako ka itla imaseoaltis, iese kamo kax kanvis, oktotoneoas, chichichina kas inh iolo, inh nakaio, itlamaseoalistika quj knopilhus, inh nemak mochioas, qujn inoma, qujn ixkoian quj mh xnextilis, qujn quj nomavis, qujn quj monoma vilis: iniw ie mh iekkan omotenew.

column3: colnamjctia, tlatlachtacanamaca, te iichtacanamaca, teiichtacaujca, te nanaoalhujca, tenanaoalnotza, much aitlaqual in quj qua, tecanenemj, te cacalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nj man iuh quj ca, nj man iuh mozcaltia, in aquentlatta, in atlacacemelle: njma ipan pilpeoa, nj man ipan mo oapaoa, in auel monotza, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatolli, çan ietenananqujlia, tepan quj cuepa, tlatlauel chioanj, mj ixtla ca, moquaquatlaca, iix cueloa, mj ix cueloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolacic, tlaue liloc, vel iollo cuj cujtla, atentlacatl, tentlaueliloc, muchi tlacatl qujtenjma caci, qujtlatol imacaci, aiac quj tena ci, aiac vel qujtempanavia, iee injc mjtoa: atlacacemelle, çan tlatolli il hujl, tlatolli itlaqual, aiac itlacato caia, noviian tetenco caca, tepan onoc, tepan cen mantoc, injc aujlqujz quj, tlaitolli, tlaztlacolli, noviian mauh caitto inj nemjliz, inj tlachioal, canel iuh çan tlacat, in tlacoltitlan, teuhti tlan, qujtoznequj: cacan motqujtica aujlqujz caiotl, inj nemac, atle qualli, atle iectli: auh in nen ic quj qualti aia, quj qualtiliaia tonalpouhque, in iuh quj itonal ipan otlacat, quj nj pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlactetl tochtli: injc ipan maltiz, quj toca ma cazque, qujtoaia: in tlanemjz aco ca itla imaceoaltiz, iece camo cax canviz, octotoneoaz, chichichina caz inj iollo, inj nacaio, itlamaceoaliztica quj cnopilhujz, inj nemac mochioaz, qujn inoma, qujn ixcoian quj mj xnextiliz, qujn quj nomaviz, qujn quj monoma viliz: iniuh ie mj ieccan omoteneuh.
column4: colnamhctia, tlatlachtacanamaca, te iichtacanamaca, teiichtacauca, te nanaoalhuca, tenanaoalnotza, much aitlacual in quj cua, tecanenemj, te cacalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nh man iuh quj ca, nh man iuh mozcaltia, in aquentlatta, in atlacacemelle nhma ipan pilpeoa, nh man ipan mo oapaoa, in ahuel monotza, aiel qujcaqujz in tlatolli, zan ietenananqujlia, tepan quj cuepa, tlatlahuel chioanj, mh ixtla ca, mocuacuatlaca, iix cueloa, mh ix cueloa, vel qujmaxilti, iiolacic, tlahue liloc, vel iollo cuh cuhtla, atentlacatl, tentlahueliloc, muchi tlacatl qujtenjma caci, qujtlatol imacaci, aiac quj tena ci, aiac vel qujtempanavia, iee inhc mhtoa atlacacemelle, zan tlatolli il hul, tlatolli itlacual, aiac itlacato caia, noviian tetenco caca, tepan onoc, tepan cen mantoc, inhc aujlqujz quj, tlaitolli, tlaztlacolli, noviian mauh caitto inh nemhliz, inh tlachioal, canel iuh zan tlacat, in tlacoltitlan, teuhti tlan, qujtoznequj: cacan motqujtica aujlqujz caiotl, inh nemac, atle cualli, atle iectli auh in nen ic quj cualti aia, quj cualtiliaia tonalpouhque, in iuh quj itonal ipan otlacat, quj nh pan quj tlatlaliliaia, in matlactetl tochtli inhc ipan maltiz, quj toca ma cazque, qujtoaia: in tlanemhz aco ca itla imaceoaltiz, iece camo cax canviz, octotoneoaz, chichichina caz inh iollo, inh nacaio, itlamaceoaliztica quj cnopilhujz, inh nemac mochioaz, qujn inoma, qujn ixcoian quj mh xnextiliz, qujn quj nomaviz, qujn quj monoma viliz: iniuh ie mh ieccan omoteneuh.
