column4: colnamjctia, tlatlachtacanamaca, te iichtacanamaca, teiichtacaojca, te nanaoalhojca, tenanaoalnotza, moch aitlaqoal in qoj qoa, tecanenemj, te cacalpanoa, tepan cacalactinemj: nj man ioh qoj ca, nj man ioh mozcaltia, in aqoentlatta, in atlacacemelle: njma ipan pilpeoa, nj man ipan mo oapaoa, in aoel monotza, aiel qojcaqojz in tlatolli, çan ietenananqojlia, tepan qoj coepa, tlatlaoel chioanj, mj ixtla ca, moqoaqoatlaca, iix coeloa, mj ix coeloa, vel qojmaxilti, iiolacic, tlaoe liloc, vel iollo coj cojtla, atentlacatl, tentlaoeliloc, mochi tlacatl qojtenjma caci, qojtlatol imacaci, aiac qoj tena ci, aiac vel qojtempanavia, iee injc mjtoa: atlacacemelle, çan tlatolli il hojl, tlatolli itlaqoal, aiac itlacato caia, noviian tetenco caca, tepan onoc, tepan cen mantoc, injc aojlqojz qoj, tlaitolli, tlaztlacolli, noviian maoh caitto inj nemjliz, inj tlachioal, canel ioh çan tlacat, in tlacoltitlan, teohti tlan, qojtozneqoj: cacan motqojtica aojlqojz caiotl, inj nemac, atle qoalli, atle iectli: aoh in nen ic qoj qoalti aia, qoj qoaltiliaia tonalpoohqoe, in ioh qoj itonal ipan otlacat, qoj nj pan qoj tlatlaliliaia, in matlactetl tochtli: injc ipan maltiz, qoj toca ma cazqoe, qojtoaia: in tlanemjz aco ca itla imaceoaltiz, iece camo cax canviz, octotoneoaz, chichichina caz inj iollo, inj nacaio, itlamaceoaliztica qoj cnopilhojz, inj nemac mochioaz, qojn inoma, qojn ixcoian qoj mj xnextiliz, qojn qoj nomaviz, qojn qoj monoma viliz: inioh ie mj ieccan omoteneoh.

column3: (27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in qualli, tonalli: injn techca in nauh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl qualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.
column4: (27) i njk matlaktli onnavi ka pitulo itechpa tlatoa, in kuali, tonali injn techka in nau tetl kali in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl kuali in tonal kat ka, in aquj ke vnkan tlakati.

column3: (27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in qualli, tonalli: injn techca in nauh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl qualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.
column4: (27) i nhk matlaktli onnavi ka pitulo itechpa tlatoa, in kwali, tonali inhn techka in naw tetl kali in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl kwali in tonal kat ka, in aquj ke vnkan tlakati.

column3: (27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in qualli, tonalli: injn techca in nauh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl qualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.
column4: (27) i nhc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo itechpa tlatoa, in cualli, tonalli inhn techca in nauh tetl calli in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl cualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.

column3: (27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in qualli, tonalli: injn techca in nauh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qujl qualli in tonal cat ca, in aquj que vncan tlacati.
column4: (27) I njc matlactli onnavi ca pitolo: itechpa tlatoa, in qoalli, tonalli: injn techca in naoh tetl calli: in ipan in machiotl, ioan qojl qoalli in tonal cat ca, in aqoj qoe vncan tlacati.

column3: (28) A uh inj pan in cemjlhuj to nalli: cemj lhuj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli: iuh mjtoa, cenca qual can in aqujn vncan tlacatia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhujle, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iuh mjtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inj pan matlactli tonalli, muchipa qualcan, vncan ca ilhujlli, maceoalli; in iuhca itlatlatollo, in iemj ieccan omo teneuh: auh aiamo nj man caltiaia, inj pan in tonalli o tlacat, qujn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qujto cama caia: inj pan matlactlon
column4: (28) a u inj pan in cemjlhuj to nali semj lhuj tlapoali, in matlak tli tochtli iu mjtoa, senka kual kan in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, in oquj chtli, in sioatl, senka maseoa le, iljule, mo kujltonoanj: ipampa no iu mjtoa, in matlaktioaia, in vnka tlamatlakti, inj pan matlaktli tonali, muchipa kualkan, vnkan ka iljuli, maseoali; in iuka itlatlatolo, in iemj iekkan omo teneu: au aiamo nj man kaltiaia, inj pan in tonali o tlakat, qujn senompa kontlachial tiaia in tonaltsonko, ipan kaltiaia, qujto kama kaia inj pan matlaktlon

column3: (28) A uh inj pan in cemjlhuj to nalli: cemj lhuj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli: iuh mjtoa, cenca qual can in aqujn vncan tlacatia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhujle, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iuh mjtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inj pan matlactli tonalli, muchipa qualcan, vncan ca ilhujlli, maceoalli; in iuhca itlatlatollo, in iemj ieccan omo teneuh: auh aiamo nj man caltiaia, inj pan in tonalli o tlacat, qujn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qujto cama caia: inj pan matlactlon
column4: (28) a w inh pan in cemjlhuj to nali semh lhuj tlapoali, in matlak tli tochtli iw mhtoa, senka kwal kan in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, in oquj chtli, in sioatl, senka maseoa le, ilhule, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iw mhtoa, in matlaktioaia, in vnka tlamatlakti, inh pan matlaktli tonali, muchipa kwalkan, vnkan ka ilhuli, maseoali; in iwka itlatlatolo, in iemh iekkan omo tenew: aw aiamo nh man kaltiaia, inh pan in tonali o tlakat, qujn senompa kontlachial tiaia in tonaltsonko, ipan kaltiaia, qujto kama kaia inh pan matlaktlon

column4: (28) a uh inh pan in cemjlhuj to nalli cemh lhuj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli iuh mhtoa, cenca cual can in aqujn vncan tlacatia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhule, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iuh mhtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inh pan matlactli tonalli, muchipa cualcan, vncan ca ilhulli, maceoalli; in iuhca itlatlatollo, in iemh ieccan omo teneuh: auh aiamo nh man caltiaia, inh pan in tonalli o tlacat, qujn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qujto cama caia inh pan matlactlon

column3: (28) A uh inj pan in cemjlhuj to nalli: cemj lhuj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli: iuh mjtoa, cenca qual can in aqujn vncan tlacatia, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhujle, mo cujltonoanj: ipampa no iuh mjtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inj pan matlactli tonalli, muchipa qualcan, vncan ca ilhujlli, maceoalli; in iuhca itlatlatollo, in iemj ieccan omo teneuh: auh aiamo nj man caltiaia, inj pan in tonalli o tlacat, qujn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qujto cama caia: inj pan matlactlon
column4: (28) A oh inj pan in cemjlhoj to nalli: cemj lhoj tlapoalli, in matlac tli tochtli: ioh mjtoa, cenca qoal can in aqojn vncan tlacatia, in oqoj chtli, in cioatl, cenca maceoa le, ilhojle, mo cojltonoanj: ipampa no ioh mjtoa, in matlactioaia, in vnca tlamatlacti, inj pan matlactli tonalli, mochipa qoalcan, vncan ca ilhojlli, maceoalli; in iohca itlatlatollo, in iemj ieccan omo teneoh: aoh aiamo nj man caltiaia, inj pan in tonalli o tlacat, qojn cenompa contlachial tiaia in tonaltzonco, ipan caltiaia, qojto cama caia: inj pan matlactlon

column1: .de fo.34. nauj ocomatli ipampa injc cenca quj tonal chicaoaia, quj uecapano aia itonal, caiuh mjtoa: cenca qual can in tonaltzonco, inj ca tlantica to nalli, in qujtlamjtica tonalli, in iuh ipan moteneoaz itlatollo. A uh in quj toq uj lia, matlactloce atl, io an matlactlomome itz cuj ntli, io an in tlatzonqujxtia, matlactli vmej ocoma tli, izquj tetl qualli, muchi quj centi linja, quj cenvilana, qujn centeteoa na, qujn centlatalhuja in matlactli tochtli, ic nauhteixtin qualtin. Mi toa: in aqujn vncan ipan tlacatia injzqujtetl in tonalli: cenca tlacno pilhujanj muchioaia, oalqujcaia, oal nemja in tlalticpac, quj toz nequj: amo patzactzintli, amo cantetzacuja, amo tlatzinpiloa, amo çan cannenemj, vel iximacho teixpan icac, moteniotia momaujzcotia, injc mocujlto noanj, injc maujztli, injc tetlaocolianj, injc teca muchioanj: auh injc tiacauh injc chicaoac, injc iaotlaueliloc, injc amo tetlacaltoca, amo ix mauh quj, io an injc mozcalianj, ixe, iollo, iollo tecuj cujl, ioliz matquj, ioliz tlamat quj, tlanemjlianj, toltecatl, mjma tinj: io an vellatoa, vellacaquj, iuh qujn mjtic qujte itlatol, choqujzco tlaocollo, vel teitic acic, teiollapan, teiollali, velmocaquj, muchitlacatl quj paqujltia, iuh quj nteaacotlaz, te iizcali; iehoatl injc mjtoa, camaceoale, tlacnopilhuj anj, camuchoncan quj caia, in iuh quj inemactia injzqujtla mantli, nj çan moteneoa. No iuh quj imaceoal muchioaia in cioatl, mo cujltonoaia, mo maujzcotiaia, vel motitianqujanj, tiamjc aquj nj, teca muchioanj, tepan tlaocoianj. Etc. auh in tlaaca amo iuhq uj ipan mo chioaia, mjtoa: cacaix coian, ineviia conmo caujlia, quj motlacolmjctilia injtonal: ipampa acacouel omonotz, acacomouel otlamaceuh, in iuh ie mj ieccan omjto. A uh injc mjtoa: cen ca qualcan intonaltzonco, inj pan matlactlo mej ocomatli (ioan in oc ceq uj ipan tonaltzontli) injc vmpa quj nj quac quj maltiaia in tlacatia inj pan in izqujtetl tonalli omoteneuh in qujn centeteoana, matlactli tochtli ipampa mjtoa, qujlmach muchipa navintin vncan tlatoa: iehoan tla cemjlhujtiltia, quj tlatalhuja in tonal tzontli itoca Tlauizcalpan tecutli, ioan citlallii cue, njman ic tonatiuh, ioan Tonaca tecutli: iehoatl injc quj quallittaia tonal pouhque, in quj to aia: cauel vncanca ilhujlli, ne mactli; io an no quj toaia, veuetioaia, in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj toaia, qujtlamjz, monemjtiz in tlalticpac, tlamaujcoz

column3: nauj ocomatli ipampa injc cenca quj tonal chicaoaia, quj uecapano aia itonal, caiuh mjtoa: cenca qual can in tonaltzonco, inj ca tlantica to nalli, in qujtlamjtica tonalli, in iuh ipan moteneoaz itlatollo.
column4: nauj okomatli ipampa injk senka quj tonal chikaoaia, quj uekapano aia itonal, kaiu mjtoa senka kual kan in tonaltsonko, inj ka tlantika to nali, in qujtlamjtica tonali, in iu ipan moteneoas itlatolo.

column3: nauj ocomatli ipampa injc cenca quj tonal chicaoaia, quj uecapano aia itonal, caiuh mjtoa: cenca qual can in tonaltzonco, inj ca tlantica to nalli, in qujtlamjtica tonalli, in iuh ipan moteneoaz itlatollo.
column4: naoj ocomatli ipampa injc cenca qoj tonal chicaoaia, qoj oecapano aia itonal, caioh mjtoa: cenca qoal can in tonaltzonco, inj ca tlantica to nalli, in qojtlamjtica tonalli, in ioh ipan moteneoaz itlatollo.

column3: A uh in quj toq uj lia, matlactloce atl, io an matlactlomome itz cuj ntli, io an in tlatzonqujxtia, matlactli vmej ocoma tli, izquj tetl qualli, muchi quj centi linja, quj cenvilana, qujn centeteoa na, qujn centlatalhuja in matlactli tochtli, ic nauhteixtin qualtin.

column3: A uh in quj toq uj lia, matlactloce atl, io an matlactlomome itz cuj ntli, io an in tlatzonqujxtia, matlactli vmej ocoma tli, izquj tetl qualli, muchi quj centi linja, quj cenvilana, qujn centeteoa na, qujn centlatalhuja in matlactli tochtli, ic nauhteixtin qualtin.

column3: A uh in quj toq uj lia, matlactloce atl, io an matlactlomome itz cuj ntli, io an in tlatzonqujxtia, matlactli vmej ocoma tli, izquj tetl qualli, muchi quj centi linja, quj cenvilana, qujn centeteoa na, qujn centlatalhuja in matlactli tochtli, ic nauhteixtin qualtin.
column4: A oh in qoj toq oj lia, matlactloce atl, io an matlactlomome itz coj ntli, io an in tlatzonqojxtia, matlactli vmej ocoma tli, izqoj tetl qoalli, mochi qoj centi linja, qoj cenvilana, qojn centeteoa na, qojn centlatalhoja in matlactli tochtli, ic naohteixtin qoaltin.

column3: Mi toa: in aqujn vncan ipan tlacatia injzqujtetl in tonalli: cenca tlacno pilhujanj muchioaia, oalqujcaia, oal nemja in tlalticpac, quj toz nequj: amo patzactzintli, amo cantetzacuja, amo tlatzinpiloa, amo çan cannenemj, vel iximacho teixpan icac, moteniotia momaujzcotia, injc mocujlto noanj, injc maujztli, injc tetlaocolianj, injc teca muchioanj: auh injc tiacauh injc chicaoac, injc iaotlaueliloc, injc amo tetlacaltoca, amo ix mauh quj, io an injc mozcalianj, ixe, iollo, iollo tecuj cujl, ioliz matquj, ioliz tlamat quj, tlanemjlianj, toltecatl, mjma tinj: io an vellatoa, vellacaquj, iuh qujn mjtic qujte itlatol, choqujzco tlaocollo, vel teitic acic, teiollapan, teiollali, velmocaquj, muchitlacatl quj paqujltia, iuh quj nteaacotlaz, te iizcali; iehoatl injc mjtoa, camaceoale, tlacnopilhuj anj, camuchoncan quj caia, in iuh quj inemactia injzqujtla mantli, nj çan moteneoa.
column4: mi toa in aqujn vnkan ipan tlakatia injzqujtetl in tonali senka tlakno piljujanj muchioaia, oalqujcaia, oal nemja in tlaltikpak, quj tos nequj: amo patsaktsintli, amo kantetsakuja, amo tlatsinpiloa, amo san kannenemj, vel iximacho teixpan ikak, moteniotia momauskotia, injk mokujlto noanj, injk maustli, injk tetlaokolianj, injk teka muchioanj: au injk tiakau injk chikaoak, injk iaotlauelilok, injk amo tetlakaltoka, amo ix mau quj, io an injk moskalianj, ixe, iolo, iolo tekuj kujl, iolis matquj, iolis tlamat quj, tlanemjlianj, toltekatl, mjma tinj: io an velatoa, vellacaquj, iu qujn mjtik qujte itlatol, choqujzco tlaokolo, vel teitik asik, teiolapan, teiolali, velmocaquj, muchitlakatl quj paqujltia, iu quj nteaakotlas, te iiskali; iejoatl injk mjtoa, kamaseoale, tlacnopilhuj anj, kamuchonkan quj kaia, in iu quj inemaktia injzqujtla mantli, nj san moteneoa.

column3: Mi toa: in aqujn vncan ipan tlacatia injzqujtetl in tonalli: cenca tlacno pilhujanj muchioaia, oalqujcaia, oal nemja in tlalticpac, quj toz nequj: amo patzactzintli, amo cantetzacuja, amo tlatzinpiloa, amo çan cannenemj, vel iximacho teixpan icac, moteniotia momaujzcotia, injc mocujlto noanj, injc maujztli, injc tetlaocolianj, injc teca muchioanj: auh injc tiacauh injc chicaoac, injc iaotlaueliloc, injc amo tetlacaltoca, amo ix mauh quj, io an injc mozcalianj, ixe, iollo, iollo tecuj cujl, ioliz matquj, ioliz tlamat quj, tlanemjlianj, toltecatl, mjma tinj: io an vellatoa, vellacaquj, iuh qujn mjtic qujte itlatol, choqujzco tlaocollo, vel teitic acic, teiollapan, teiollali, velmocaquj, muchitlacatl quj paqujltia, iuh quj nteaacotlaz, te iizcali; iehoatl injc mjtoa, camaceoale, tlacnopilhuj anj, camuchoncan quj caia, in iuh quj inemactia injzqujtla mantli, nj çan moteneoa.

column3: No iuh quj imaceoal muchioaia in cioatl, mo cujltonoaia, mo maujzcotiaia, vel motitianqujanj, tiamjc aquj nj, teca muchioanj, tepan tlaocoianj.

column3: A uh injc mjtoa: cen ca qualcan intonaltzonco, inj pan matlactlo mej ocomatli (ioan in oc ceq uj ipan tonaltzontli) injc vmpa quj nj quac quj maltiaia in tlacatia inj pan in izqujtetl tonalli omoteneuh in qujn centeteoana, matlactli tochtli ipampa mjtoa, qujlmach muchipa navintin vncan tlatoa: iehoan tla cemjlhujtiltia, quj tlatalhuja in tonal tzontli itoca Tlauizcalpan tecutli, ioan citlallii cue, njman ic tonatiuh, ioan Tonaca tecutli: iehoatl injc quj quallittaia tonal pouhque, in quj to aia: cauel vncanca ilhujlli, ne mactli; io an no quj toaia, veuetioaia, in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj toaia, qujtlamjz, monemjtiz in tlalticpac, tlamaujcoz
column4: a u injk mjtoa sen ka kualkan intonaltsonko, inj pan matlaktlo mej okomatli (ioan in ok ceq uj ipan tonaltsontli) injk vmpa quj nj kuak quj maltiaia in tlakatia inj pan in izqujtetl tonali omoteneu in qujn senteteoana, matlaktli tochtli ipampa mjtoa, qujlmach muchipa navintin vnkan tlatoa iejoan tla semjljutiltia, quj tlataljuja in tonal tsontli itoka tlauiskalpan tekutli, ioan sitlalii kue, njman ik tonatiu, ioan tonaka tekutli iejoatl injk quj kualittaia tonal pouke, in quj to aia kauel vnkanka iljuli, ne maktli; io an no quj toaia, veuetioaia, in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, quj toaia, qujtlamjz, monemjtis in tlaltikpak, tlamaukos

column4: A oh injc mjtoa: cen ca qoalcan intonaltzonco, inj pan matlactlo mej ocomatli (ioan in oc ceq oj ipan tonaltzontli) injc vmpa qoj nj qoac qoj maltiaia in tlacatia inj pan in izqojtetl tonalli omoteneoh in qojn centeteoana, matlactli tochtli ipampa mjtoa, qojlmach mochipa navintin vncan tlatoa: iehoan tla cemjlhojtiltia, qoj tlatalhoja in tonal tzontli itoca Tlaoizcalpan tecotli, ioan citlallii coe, njman ic tonatioh, ioan Tonaca tecotli: iehoatl injc qoj qoallittaia tonal poohqoe, in qoj to aia: caoel vncanca ilhojlli, ne mactli; io an no qoj toaia, veoetioaia, in aqojn vncan tlacatia, qoj toaia, qojtlamjz, monemjtiz in tlalticpac, tlamaojcoz

column1: .de fo.35. I njc caxtolli capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicue tetl machiotl, inj toca ce ma linalli: ioan in amo qualli tonalli inj techca, auh qujl injc ontetl calli qualli: io an injxqujch occequj chicuna uhtetl: injxqujch occequj, inj tech vmpcoa injc chicunauh tetl calli, ie injc matlactetl, ioan injc oce, injc omome, in ic vmei, qujlmach qualli catca.(29) Moquetza ce malinalli, injc mjtoa: njman amo qualli tonalli, tequanj, imacaxonj, in aqujn ipa tlacatia, çan motolinjtinenca, tel qujttaia inj neiollaliliz: auh çan om poli, çan onqujztiqujca, ioan mopil hoatiaia, muchintin moquetzaia, inj pilhoan, iuh qujn tlaquauhtzonquj ca, iuh qujn tlaneujuja, iuh qujn qua vitl manj, tetemmanj, tlalli cuecue tlaca: auh in ie oquj chiuh canjc quj mati, in iuh quj motlapevia y pilhoan, onmototo catiuetzi, on mo totocatiquj ca, muchintin, on mjctiuetzi, ololiuh tiuj, mo cemjchictivi, oncemoti, on mo toca, on mototocatiuj, onj chictiuj, ao cac mocaoa, in occe conpeoalti mj qujz tli, mj quiliztli, iuh qujn otli patlaoac quj monquechilia, yoampooan, icet caio oan, intlapancaiooa, itzicueoallo oa, y cotoncaoa, icotoncaioa, iezcoan, itlapalloa iuh qujn ipan tlatlatzinj, in teta, in tenan, iioca moquetz tiqujca, motztimotlalia, mj xaioujtoma, injc oquj monpolo y pilhoan, caitolol, y malcoch quj chiuhtica, centlamjc quj mattica, quj centlamjtica, oiaque in intech oatlamatia, inj ntech o cuecue notia, in oquj monpopoaia, inj xco oqujnmanaia, in oquj tepeujtinen ca, in ocololhujtinenca, in oqujtete peujaia, ocoololhujaia, oquj momac tocac, omonelchiuh, ieonmanelli omo pilhoati, ie on manelli oquj mj ttac: ie hoatl injc mjtoa, amo qualli tonalli, can tequanj, motqujtica ic noiotl: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan caltiaia, in ey oce lotl, cemjlhuj tonalli, iuh quj toaia, in tonalpouhque, ca muchipa qualca in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iehoatl injc quj oallatotoqujliaia tonalpouh que, injc achi vncan quj qualtiliaia itonal, inj pan tlacatia ce malinalli. A uh in qujtoqujlia, vme acatl tonalli qujtoaia vel qualli in tonalli; ipam pa cano vncan quj tonaltiaia y n

column4: I njc caxtolli capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicoe tetl machiotl, inj toca ce ma linalli: ioan in amo qoalli tonalli inj techca, aoh qojl injc ontetl calli qoalli: io an injxqojch occeqoj chicona ohtetl: injxqojch occeqoj, inj tech vmpcoa injc chiconaoh tetl calli, ie injc matlactetl, ioan injc oce, injc omome, in ic vmei, qojlmach qoalli catca.

column3: (29) Moquetza ce malinalli, injc mjtoa: njman amo qualli tonalli, tequanj, imacaxonj, in aqujn ipa tlacatia, çan motolinjtinenca, tel qujttaia inj neiollaliliz: auh çan om poli, çan onqujztiqujca, ioan mopil hoatiaia, muchintin moquetzaia, inj pilhoan, iuh qujn tlaquauhtzonquj ca, iuh qujn tlaneujuja, iuh qujn qua vitl manj, tetemmanj, tlalli cuecue tlaca: auh in ie oquj chiuh canjc quj mati, in iuh quj motlapevia y pilhoan, onmototo catiuetzi, on mo totocatiquj ca, muchintin, on mjctiuetzi, ololiuh tiuj, mo cemjchictivi, oncemoti, on mo toca, on mototocatiuj, onj chictiuj, ao cac mocaoa, in occe conpeoalti mj qujz tli, mj quiliztli, iuh qujn otli patlaoac quj monquechilia, yoampooan, icet caio oan, intlapancaiooa, itzicueoallo oa, y cotoncaoa, icotoncaioa, iezcoan, itlapalloa iuh qujn ipan tlatlatzinj, in teta, in tenan, iioca moquetz tiqujca, motztimotlalia, mj xaioujtoma, injc oquj monpolo y pilhoan, caitolol, y malcoch quj chiuhtica, centlamjc quj mattica, quj centlamjtica, oiaque in intech oatlamatia, inj ntech o cuecue notia, in oquj monpopoaia, inj xco oqujnmanaia, in oquj tepeujtinen ca, in ocololhujtinenca, in oqujtete peujaia, ocoololhujaia, oquj momac tocac, omonelchiuh, ieonmanelli omo pilhoati, ie on manelli oquj mj ttac: ie hoatl injc mjtoa, amo qualli tonalli, can tequanj, motqujtica ic noiotl: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan caltiaia, in ey oce lotl, cemjlhuj tonalli, iuh quj toaia, in tonalpouhque, ca muchipa qualca in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iehoatl injc quj oallatotoqujliaia tonalpouh que, injc achi vncan quj qualtiliaia itonal, inj pan tlacatia ce malinalli.
column4: (29) moketsa se malinali, injk mjtoa njman amo kuali tonali, tekuanj, imakaxonj, in aqujn ipa tlakatia, san motolinjtinenka, tel qujttaia inj neiolalilis: au san om poli, san onqujztiqujca, ioan mopil joatiaia, muchintin moketsaia, inj piljoan, iu qujn tlaquauhtzonquj ka, iu qujn tlaneujuja, iu qujn kua vitl manj, tetemmanj, tlali kuekue tlaka au in ie oquj chiu kanjk quj mati, in iu quj motlapevia i piljoan, onmototo katiuetsi, on mo totocatiquj ka, muchintin, on mjktiuetsi, ololiu tiuj, mo semjchiktivi, onsemoti, on mo toka, on mototocatiuj, onj chictiuj, ao kak mokaoa, in okse konpeoalti mj qujz tli, mj kilistli, iu qujn otli patlaoak quj monkechilia, yoampooan, iset kaio oan, intlapankaiooa, itsikueoalo oa, i kotonkaoa, ikotonkaioa, ieskoan, itlapaloa iu qujn ipan tlatlatsinj, in teta, in tenan, iioka mokets tiqujca, motstimotlalia, mj xaioutoma, injk oquj monpolo i piljoan, kaitolol, i malkoch quj chiutika, sentlamjk quj mattika, quj sentlamjtika, oiake in intech oatlamatia, inj ntech o kuekue notia, in oquj monpopoaia, inj xko oqujnmanaia, in oquj tepeutinen ka, in okololjutinenka, in oqujtete peujaia, okoololjujaia, oquj momak tokak, omonelchiu, ieonmaneli omo piljoati, ie on maneli oquj mj ttak: ie joatl injk mjtoa, amo kuali tonali, kan tekuanj, motqujtica ik noiotl: au in aqujn ipan tlakatia, aiamo kaltiaia, quj nj pan kaltiaia, in ei ose lotl, cemjlhuj tonali, iu quj toaia, in tonalpouke, ka muchipa kualka in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iejoatl injk quj oallatotoqujliaia tonalpou ke, injk achi vnkan quj kualtiliaia itonal, inj pan tlakatia se malinali.

column3: (29) Moquetza ce malinalli, injc mjtoa: njman amo qualli tonalli, tequanj, imacaxonj, in aqujn ipa tlacatia, çan motolinjtinenca, tel qujttaia inj neiollaliliz: auh çan om poli, çan onqujztiqujca, ioan mopil hoatiaia, muchintin moquetzaia, inj pilhoan, iuh qujn tlaquauhtzonquj ca, iuh qujn tlaneujuja, iuh qujn qua vitl manj, tetemmanj, tlalli cuecue tlaca: auh in ie oquj chiuh canjc quj mati, in iuh quj motlapevia y pilhoan, onmototo catiuetzi, on mo totocatiquj ca, muchintin, on mjctiuetzi, ololiuh tiuj, mo cemjchictivi, oncemoti, on mo toca, on mototocatiuj, onj chictiuj, ao cac mocaoa, in occe conpeoalti mj qujz tli, mj quiliztli, iuh qujn otli patlaoac quj monquechilia, yoampooan, icet caio oan, intlapancaiooa, itzicueoallo oa, y cotoncaoa, icotoncaioa, iezcoan, itlapalloa iuh qujn ipan tlatlatzinj, in teta, in tenan, iioca moquetz tiqujca, motztimotlalia, mj xaioujtoma, injc oquj monpolo y pilhoan, caitolol, y malcoch quj chiuhtica, centlamjc quj mattica, quj centlamjtica, oiaque in intech oatlamatia, inj ntech o cuecue notia, in oquj monpopoaia, inj xco oqujnmanaia, in oquj tepeujtinen ca, in ocololhujtinenca, in oqujtete peujaia, ocoololhujaia, oquj momac tocac, omonelchiuh, ieonmanelli omo pilhoati, ie on manelli oquj mj ttac: ie hoatl injc mjtoa, amo qualli tonalli, can tequanj, motqujtica ic noiotl: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, aiamo caltiaia, quj nj pan caltiaia, in ey oce lotl, cemjlhuj tonalli, iuh quj toaia, in tonalpouhque, ca muchipa qualca in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iehoatl injc quj oallatotoqujliaia tonalpouh que, injc achi vncan quj qualtiliaia itonal, inj pan tlacatia ce malinalli.
column4: (29) moketsa se malinali, inhk mhtoa nhman amo kwali tonali, tequanj, imacaxonj, in aqujn ipa tlakatia, san motolinhtinenka, tel qujttaia inh neiolalilis: aw san om poli, san onqujztiqujca, ioan mopil hoatiaia, muchintin moketsaia, inh pilhoan, iw qujn tlaquauhtzonquj ka, iw qujn tlaneujuja, iw qujn kwa vitl manj, tetemmanj, tlali kwekwe tlaka aw in ie oquj chiw kanhk quj mati, in iw quj motlapevia i pilhoan, onmototo katiwetsi, on mo totocatiquj ka, muchintin, on mhktiwetsi, ololiw tiuj, mo semhchiktivi, onsemoti, on mo toka, on mototocatiuj, onh chictiuj, ao kak mokaoa, in okse konpeoalti mh qujz tli, mh kilistli, iw qujn otli patlaoak quj monkechilia, yoampooan, iset kaio oan, intlapankaiooa, itsikweoalo oa, i kotonkaoa, ikotonkaioa, ieskoan, itlapaloa iw qujn ipan tlatlatzinj, in teta, in tenan, iioka mokets tiqujca, motstimotlalia, mh xaioutoma, inhk oquj monpolo i pilhoan, kaitolol, i malkoch quj chiwtika, sentlamhk quj mattika, quj sentlamhtika, oiake in intech oatlamatia, inh ntech o kwekwe notia, in oquj monpopoaia, inh xko oqujnmanaia, in oquj tepeutinen ka, in okololhutinenka, in oqujtete peuhaia, okoololhuhaia, oquj momak tokak, omonelchiw, ieonmaneli omo pilhoati, ie on maneli oquj mh ttak: ie hoatl inhk mhtoa, amo kwali tonali, kan tequanj, motqujtica ik noiotl: aw in aqujn ipan tlakatia, aiamo kaltiaia, quj nh pan kaltiaia, in ei ose lotl, cemjlhuj tonali, iw quj toaia, in tonalpowke, ka muchipa kwalka in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iehoatl inhk quj oallatotoqujliaia tonalpow ke, inhk achi vnkan quj kwaltiliaia itonal, inh pan tlakatia se malinali.

column4: (29) Moqoetza ce malinalli, injc mjtoa: njman amo qoalli tonalli, teqoanj, imacaxonj, in aqojn ipa tlacatia, çan motolinjtinenca, tel qojttaia inj neiollaliliz: aoh çan om poli, çan onqojztiqojca, ioan mopil hoatiaia, mochintin moqoetzaia, inj pilhoan, ioh qojn tlaqoaohtzonqoj ca, ioh qojn tlaneojoja, ioh qojn qoa iitl manj, tetemmanj, tlalli coecoe tlaca: aoh in ie oqoj chioh canjc qoj mati, in ioh qoj motlapevia y pilhoan, onmototo catioetzi, on mo totocatiqoj ca, mochintin, on mjctioetzi, ololioh tioj, mo cemjchictivi, oncemoti, on mo toca, on mototocatioj, onj chictioj, ao cac mocaoa, in occe conpeoalti mj qojz tli, mj qoiliztli, ioh qojn otli patlaoac qoj monqoechilia, yoampooan, icet caio oan, intlapancaiooa, itzicoeoallo oa, y cotoncaoa, icotoncaioa, iezcoan, itlapalloa ioh qojn ipan tlatlatzinj, in teta, in tenan, iioca moqoetz tiqojca, motztimotlalia, mj xaioojtoma, injc oqoj monpolo y pilhoan, caitolol, y malcoch qoj chiohtica, centlamjc qoj mattica, qoj centlamjtica, oiaqoe in intech oatlamatia, inj ntech o coecoe notia, in oqoj monpopoaia, inj xco oqojnmanaia, in oqoj tepeojtinen ca, in ocololhojtinenca, in oqojtete peojaia, ocoololhojaia, oqoj momac tocac, omonelchioh, ieonmanelli omo pilhoati, ie on manelli oqoj mj ttac: ie hoatl injc mjtoa, amo qoalli tonalli, can teqoanj, motqojtica ic noiotl: aoh in aqojn ipan tlacatia, aiamo caltiaia, qoj nj pan caltiaia, in ey oce lotl, cemjlhoj tonalli, ioh qoj toaia, in tonalpoohqoe, ca mochipa qoalca in eitioaia; amo neten machoia, iehoatl injc qoj oallatotoqojliaia tonalpooh qoe, injc achi vncan qoj qoaltiliaia itonal, inj pan tlacatia ce malinalli.

column1: .de fo.36. Tezcatlipuca, titlacaoa, injc quj tla liaia ixiptla, itoca Omacatl: çan no ivi in mjchioaia, ic quj chichioaia, injc quj tlaliaia: auh in aqujn quj ne quja, qujtlaliaia inj xiptla Omacatl, matlacpoaltica in quj piaia y chan, ipan in quj tlaliaia, vme acatl tonalli, auh in tlaceitla vel ma ailia in aqujn oqujtlali, qujtoznequj: intlaietla piuja, ixneci, iaxca itlatquj, aocmo quj caoaliztlamatia, çan quj centlali aia, quj cencalaqujaia inj chan, ve cauhtica qujpiaia: auh intlaieo qujnec in quj caoaz, in aocmo quj piaz: canno ipan in quj caoaia vme acatl tonalli, canie e quj mattiuja inj tonal, ipan in quj tlaliaia, no ipan in quj caoaia: vm pa concaoaia inj teupan, inj calpulco omacatl, quj tlenamaqujlitiuh: auh vmpa canatiuh, in aqujn ocie oquj nec, qujpiaz ichan, quj cuj catiaia in calpuleque, ic tetlatlaqualtia in chane, tlatlaqualo, aatlioa, y nj chan: auh in oiooac tlatlaoamo, çan ie iuh tlatla lilli, canieiuhtlatecolli, çan vncan tectica, canie vncan tlantica, çan ie vncan quj mattiaia, in matlac poaltica pialoia techan iquac ca laquja, noiquac quj caia: auh mj toa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, qujto aia mo cujltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan vel muchioaz, inj netlaiecoltiliz, in tlein maailiz, amo nenqujcaz, vel quj ttaz inj neiollaliliz. A uh y nj pan nauj quauhtli, yoan macujl li cozcaquauhtli, yoan chiquacen olin, iuh mj toa: nj man amotle qualli injzqujtetl yn, tonalli, çan muchipa iuh mjtoa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, çan yee injlhujl, in emac in netolinjliztli, yoan tlatolli colol hujtinemj, tetlatolevia, yoan tlato levilo, oiovilo, tenepantla quj tlaliti nemj in xixtli, cuj tlatl, in aqualli: injuhquj yemjieccan omoteneuh. Auh inoc nen ic quj qualtiliaia tonal pouhque: quj nj pan quj tlaliaia in chi come tecpatl, iquac caltiaia ipam pa ca omjto, ca muchipa qualcan in chicometioaia: atle yc itlacauh tica in tonalli, vel vncan ca ilhujl li, nemactli: ca y tlatoaia in chico me coatl. et. A uh in chicuci quj aujtl, yoan chicunavi suchitl: ieo mjto, y eomoteittiti in quenjn a mo qualcan vncan yn: ca vncan in tlacatia, in quj caia injchtequj nj, in tetlatlaxima. Etc. y ni macaxonj, in mauh caittonj tlalticpac, in teca mocacaiaoa, in atlacacemelleque; in iuh mjectlamantli omoteneuh itlatlatollo. A uh inj pan matlactli cipactli: iuhqujtoa, qualcan vncan tlacatia, in mocujltonoa, in motlaca mati, in avia, in vellamati, in paquj tlalticpac, in oquj chtli, in cioatl, çan ie noiuh quj, in quj toqujlitica matlac

column3: Tezcatlipuca, titlacaoa, injc quj tla liaia ixiptla, itoca Omacatl: çan no ivi in mjchioaia, ic quj chichioaia, injc quj tlaliaia: auh in aqujn quj ne quja, qujtlaliaia inj xiptla Omacatl, matlacpoaltica in quj piaia y chan, ipan in quj tlaliaia, vme acatl tonalli, auh in tlaceitla vel ma ailia in aqujn oqujtlali, qujtoznequj: intlaietla piuja, ixneci, iaxca itlatquj, aocmo quj caoaliztlamatia, çan quj centlali aia, quj cencalaqujaia inj chan, ve cauhtica qujpiaia: auh intlaieo qujnec in quj caoaz, in aocmo quj piaz: canno ipan in quj caoaia vme acatl tonalli, canie e quj mattiuja inj tonal, ipan in quj tlaliaia, no ipan in quj caoaia: vm pa concaoaia inj teupan, inj calpulco omacatl, quj tlenamaqujlitiuh: auh vmpa canatiuh, in aqujn ocie oquj nec, qujpiaz ichan, quj cuj catiaia in calpuleque, ic tetlatlaqualtia in chane, tlatlaqualo, aatlioa, y nj chan: auh in oiooac tlatlaoamo, çan ie iuh tlatla lilli, canieiuhtlatecolli, çan vncan tectica, canie vncan tlantica, çan ie vncan quj mattiaia, in matlac poaltica pialoia techan iquac ca laquja, noiquac quj caia: auh mj toa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, qujto aia mo cujltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan vel muchioaz, inj netlaiecoltiliz, in tlein maailiz, amo nenqujcaz, vel quj ttaz inj neiollaliliz.
column4: teskatlipuka, titlakaoa, injk quj tla liaia ixiptla, itoka omakatl: san no ivi in mjchioaia, ik quj chichioaia, injk quj tlaliaia au in aqujn quj ne quja, qujtlaliaia inj xiptla omakatl, matlakpoaltika in quj piaia i chan, ipan in quj tlaliaia, vme akatl tonali, au in tlaseitla vel ma ailia in aqujn oqujtlali, qujtoznequj: intlaietla piuja, ixnesi, iaxka itlatquj, aokmo quj kaoalistlamatia, san quj sentlali aia, quj cencalaqujaia inj chan, ve kautika qujpiaia: au intlaieo qujnec in quj kaoas, in aokmo quj pias: kanno ipan in quj kaoaia vme akatl tonali, kanie e quj mattiuja inj tonal, ipan in quj tlaliaia, no ipan in quj kaoaia vm pa konkaoaia inj teupan, inj kalpulko omakatl, quj tlenamaqujlitiuh: au vmpa kanatiu, in aqujn osie oquj nek, qujpiaz ichan, quj kuj katiaia in kalpuleke, ik tetlatlakualtia in chane, tlatlakualo, aatlioa, i nj chan: au in oiooak tlatlaoamo, san ie iu tlatla lili, kanieiutlatekoli, san vnkan tektika, kanie vnkan tlantika, san ie vnkan quj mattiaia, in matlak poaltika pialoia techan ikuak ka laquja, noikuak quj kaia au mj toa in aqujn ipan tlakatia, qujto aia mo kujltonos, motlakamatis, ioan vel muchioas, inj netlaiekoltilis, in tlein maailis, amo nenqujcaz, vel quj ttas inj neiolalilis.

column3: Tezcatlipuca, titlacaoa, injc quj tla liaia ixiptla, itoca Omacatl: çan no ivi in mjchioaia, ic quj chichioaia, injc quj tlaliaia: auh in aqujn quj ne quja, qujtlaliaia inj xiptla Omacatl, matlacpoaltica in quj piaia y chan, ipan in quj tlaliaia, vme acatl tonalli, auh in tlaceitla vel ma ailia in aqujn oqujtlali, qujtoznequj: intlaietla piuja, ixneci, iaxca itlatquj, aocmo quj caoaliztlamatia, çan quj centlali aia, quj cencalaqujaia inj chan, ve cauhtica qujpiaia: auh intlaieo qujnec in quj caoaz, in aocmo quj piaz: canno ipan in quj caoaia vme acatl tonalli, canie e quj mattiuja inj tonal, ipan in quj tlaliaia, no ipan in quj caoaia: vm pa concaoaia inj teupan, inj calpulco omacatl, quj tlenamaqujlitiuh: auh vmpa canatiuh, in aqujn ocie oquj nec, qujpiaz ichan, quj cuj catiaia in calpuleque, ic tetlatlaqualtia in chane, tlatlaqualo, aatlioa, y nj chan: auh in oiooac tlatlaoamo, çan ie iuh tlatla lilli, canieiuhtlatecolli, çan vncan tectica, canie vncan tlantica, çan ie vncan quj mattiaia, in matlac poaltica pialoia techan iquac ca laquja, noiquac quj caia: auh mj toa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, qujto aia mo cujltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan vel muchioaz, inj netlaiecoltiliz, in tlein maailiz, amo nenqujcaz, vel quj ttaz inj neiollaliliz.

column3: Tezcatlipuca, titlacaoa, injc quj tla liaia ixiptla, itoca Omacatl: çan no ivi in mjchioaia, ic quj chichioaia, injc quj tlaliaia: auh in aqujn quj ne quja, qujtlaliaia inj xiptla Omacatl, matlacpoaltica in quj piaia y chan, ipan in quj tlaliaia, vme acatl tonalli, auh in tlaceitla vel ma ailia in aqujn oqujtlali, qujtoznequj: intlaietla piuja, ixneci, iaxca itlatquj, aocmo quj caoaliztlamatia, çan quj centlali aia, quj cencalaqujaia inj chan, ve cauhtica qujpiaia: auh intlaieo qujnec in quj caoaz, in aocmo quj piaz: canno ipan in quj caoaia vme acatl tonalli, canie e quj mattiuja inj tonal, ipan in quj tlaliaia, no ipan in quj caoaia: vm pa concaoaia inj teupan, inj calpulco omacatl, quj tlenamaqujlitiuh: auh vmpa canatiuh, in aqujn ocie oquj nec, qujpiaz ichan, quj cuj catiaia in calpuleque, ic tetlatlaqualtia in chane, tlatlaqualo, aatlioa, y nj chan: auh in oiooac tlatlaoamo, çan ie iuh tlatla lilli, canieiuhtlatecolli, çan vncan tectica, canie vncan tlantica, çan ie vncan quj mattiaia, in matlac poaltica pialoia techan iquac ca laquja, noiquac quj caia: auh mj toa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, qujto aia mo cujltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan vel muchioaz, inj netlaiecoltiliz, in tlein maailiz, amo nenqujcaz, vel quj ttaz inj neiollaliliz.
column4: Tezcatlipoca, titlacaoa, injc qoj tla liaia ixiptla, itoca Omacatl: çan no ivi in mjchioaia, ic qoj chichioaia, injc qoj tlaliaia: aoh in aqojn qoj ne qoja, qojtlaliaia inj xiptla Omacatl, matlacpoaltica in qoj piaia y chan, ipan in qoj tlaliaia, vme acatl tonalli, aoh in tlaceitla vel ma ailia in aqojn oqojtlali, qojtozneqoj: intlaietla pioja, ixneci, iaxca itlatqoj, aocmo qoj caoaliztlamatia, çan qoj centlali aia, qoj cencalaqojaia inj chan, ve caohtica qojpiaia: aoh intlaieo qojnec in qoj caoaz, in aocmo qoj piaz: canno ipan in qoj caoaia vme acatl tonalli, canie e qoj mattioja inj tonal, ipan in qoj tlaliaia, no ipan in qoj caoaia: vm pa concaoaia inj teopan, inj calpolco omacatl, qoj tlenamaqojlitioh: aoh vmpa canatioh, in aqojn ocie oqoj nec, qojpiaz ichan, qoj coj catiaia in calpoleqoe, ic tetlatlaqoaltia in chane, tlatlaqoalo, aatlioa, y nj chan: aoh in oiooac tlatlaoamo, çan ie ioh tlatla lilli, canieiohtlatecolli, çan vncan tectica, canie vncan tlantica, çan ie vncan qoj mattiaia, in matlac poaltica pialoia techan iqoac ca laqoja, noiqoac qoj caia: aoh mj toa: in aqojn ipan tlacatia, qojto aia mo cojltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan vel mochioaz, inj netlaiecoltiliz, in tlein maailiz, amo nenqojcaz, vel qoj ttaz inj neiollaliliz.

column3: A uh y nj pan nauj quauhtli, yoan macujl li cozcaquauhtli, yoan chiquacen olin, iuh mj toa: nj man amotle qualli injzqujtetl yn, tonalli, çan muchipa iuh mjtoa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, çan yee injlhujl, in emac in netolinjliztli, yoan tlatolli colol hujtinemj, tetlatolevia, yoan tlato levilo, oiovilo, tenepantla quj tlaliti nemj in xixtli, cuj tlatl, in aqualli: injuhquj yemjieccan omoteneuh.

column3: Auh inoc nen ic quj qualtiliaia tonal pouhque: quj nj pan quj tlaliaia in chi come tecpatl, iquac caltiaia ipam pa ca omjto, ca muchipa qualcan in chicometioaia: atle yc itlacauh tica in tonalli, vel vncan ca ilhujl li, nemactli: ca y tlatoaia in chico me coatl.
column4: au inok nen ik quj kualtiliaia tonal pouke quj nj pan quj tlaliaia in chi kome tekpatl, ikuak kaltiaia ipam pa ka omjto, ka muchipa kualkan in chikometioaia atle ik itlakau tika in tonali, vel vnkan ka iljul li, nemaktli ka i tlatoaia in chiko me koatl.

column1: .de fo.37. tloce hecatl, io an matlactlomome calli, ioan matlactlomej cuetzpalin, qujn cenvica quj ncentlatalhuja in matlactli cipactli, izqujteme qualtin in ontlatzonqujxtia, nauhteme tonal tin, çan mo chiuh otlato catiuj, in vnca oacic matlactioaia iequalcan, injx qujch iconacitica matlactli vmej to nalli, in tlatzonqujxtia.(30) I njc caxtolli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicunauh tetl machiotl, inj toca cecoatl: qujlmach qualli tonalli: intla camo çan iehoantin quj tla cozque in vncan tlacatia: auh in puchteca cenca quj matatacaia, inj pampa, inj nnetlaiecoltiliz.(31) Moquetza ce coatl: injn mj toaia, qualli tonalli: in aqujn ipa tlacatia, qujtoaia: ilhujle, mace oale iez, mocujltonoz, oniez in quj quaz, in qujz; auh in iaoc, in iaopan, oqujchtiz, tiacauhtiz, momavizcotiz pan vetziz, mavicoaz, moteniotiz, aco tlatocatiz, tecutiz; auh intlacioatl, vel motlacamatiz, vel motlaiecoltiz, vel motlacatiz, quj ttaz, quj piaz inj teicneliliz, inj coco cauh totecujo, tlaca loanj, tlapachoanj iez, vel quj ntlacal hujz, qujntlapachilhujz, qujntetzon tiz, quj ntl atlam achiz inj pilhoan; auh io an mjtoa, ma civi in iuh quj in inemac mo chioa, inj pan tlacati (ca ie omjto mjieccan) intlacamo ie vel lamaceoa, in tlacamo vel monotza, catle vnqujca, caixcoian conmocauj lia, quj mjxcaoaltia, quj mopolhuja, quj mopopolhuja, inj maceoal ocat ca: ipampa ican tlatlacomati, tlaa vilmati, tlaquel chioa, tlatlacanequj, quj tenmati, acontlaeltia, aiel atle conmochichioaltia, vel cujtlatzcopic, cujtlatzcocopic, cuj tlananaca, cujtla cotlac, cuj tlatzol, quj ten matitl, coch pal, coch mj mjl: io an auel monotza, can quj ten mati, quj quammati, quj tlauel chioa, in tlatolli, ie hoatl injc mjtoa: canel omaxcauja, in qualonj, canetoto quj lilo, amo neteteco, amo nequequetzalo: vel ixqujch maana, vel ontlamj in ciaujztli, in tlapaliuiz tli, amo çan motenenmaca, amo çan teixpan vetzi, in necujltonolli, in ne tlamachtilli, in netlacamatiliztli, in netlacamachiliztli. Io an mjtoa: mj pan in ce coatl, cenca quj qualittaia inpuchteca in ozto meca, inj aque, inne nemjnj, in vecacalaqujnj, in tonalpan catca, intlapoalpan catca, iehoatl qujtztivia, vncan vmpeoaia in veca:

column3: tloce hecatl, io an matlactlomome calli, ioan matlactlomej cuetzpalin, qujn cenvica quj ncentlatalhuja in matlactli cipactli, izqujteme qualtin in ontlatzonqujxtia, nauhteme tonal tin, çan mo chiuh otlato catiuj, in vnca oacic matlactioaia iequalcan, injx qujch iconacitica matlactli vmej to nalli, in tlatzonqujxtia.

column4: (30) i nhk kaxtoli ose kapitulo itechpa tlatoa, inhk chikunaw tetl machiotl, inh toka sekoatl: qujlmach kwali tonali intla kamo san iehoantin quj tla koske in vnkan tlakatia aw in puchteka senka quj matatakaia, inh pampa, inh nnetlaiekoltilis.

column3: (30) I njc caxtolli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicunauh tetl machiotl, inj toca cecoatl: qujlmach qualli tonalli: intla camo çan iehoantin quj tla cozque in vncan tlacatia: auh in puchteca cenca quj matatacaia, inj pampa, inj nnetlaiecoltiliz.
column4: (30) i nhc caxtolli oce capitulo itechpa tlatoa, inhc chicunauh tetl machiotl, inh toca cecoatl: qujlmach cualli tonalli intla camo zan iehoantin quj tla cozque in vncan tlacatia auh in puchteca cenca quj matatacaia, inh pampa, inh nnetlaiecoltiliz.

column3: (30) I njc caxtolli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chicunauh tetl machiotl, inj toca cecoatl: qujlmach qualli tonalli: intla camo çan iehoantin quj tla cozque in vncan tlacatia: auh in puchteca cenca quj matatacaia, inj pampa, inj nnetlaiecoltiliz.
column4: (30) I njc caxtolli oce capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc chiconaoh tetl machiotl, inj toca cecoatl: qojlmach qoalli tonalli: intla camo çan iehoantin qoj tla cozqoe in vncan tlacatia: aoh in pochteca cenca qoj matatacaia, inj pampa, inj nnetlaiecoltiliz.

column3: (31) Moquetza ce coatl: injn mj toaia, qualli tonalli: in aqujn ipa tlacatia, qujtoaia: ilhujle, mace oale iez, mocujltonoz, oniez in quj quaz, in qujz; auh in iaoc, in iaopan, oqujchtiz, tiacauhtiz, momavizcotiz pan vetziz, mavicoaz, moteniotiz, aco tlatocatiz, tecutiz; auh intlacioatl, vel motlacamatiz, vel motlaiecoltiz, vel motlacatiz, quj ttaz, quj piaz inj teicneliliz, inj coco cauh totecujo, tlaca loanj, tlapachoanj iez, vel quj ntlacal hujz, qujntlapachilhujz, qujntetzon tiz, quj ntl atlam achiz inj pilhoan; auh io an mjtoa, ma civi in iuh quj in inemac mo chioa, inj pan tlacati (ca ie omjto mjieccan) intlacamo ie vel lamaceoa, in tlacamo vel monotza, catle vnqujca, caixcoian conmocauj lia, quj mjxcaoaltia, quj mopolhuja, quj mopopolhuja, inj maceoal ocat ca: ipampa ican tlatlacomati, tlaa vilmati, tlaquel chioa, tlatlacanequj, quj tenmati, acontlaeltia, aiel atle conmochichioaltia, vel cujtlatzcopic, cujtlatzcocopic, cuj tlananaca, cujtla cotlac, cuj tlatzol, quj ten matitl, coch pal, coch mj mjl: io an auel monotza, can quj ten mati, quj quammati, quj tlauel chioa, in tlatolli, ie hoatl injc mjtoa: canel omaxcauja, in qualonj, canetoto quj lilo, amo neteteco, amo nequequetzalo: vel ixqujch maana, vel ontlamj in ciaujztli, in tlapaliuiz tli, amo çan motenenmaca, amo çan teixpan vetzi, in necujltonolli, in ne tlamachtilli, in netlacamatiliztli, in netlacamachiliztli.
column4: (31) moketsa se koatl: injn mj toaia, kuali tonali in aqujn ipa tlakatia, qujtoaia: iljule, mase oale ies, mokujltonos, onies in quj kuas, in qujz; au in iaok, in iaopan, oqujchtiz, tiakautis, momaviskotis pan vetsis, mavikoas, moteniotis, ako tlatokatis, tekutis; au intlasioatl, vel motlakamatis, vel motlaiekoltis, vel motlakatis, quj ttas, quj pias inj teiknelilis, inj koko kau totekujo, tlaka loanj, tlapachoanj ies, vel quj ntlakal jus, qujntlapachilhujz, qujntetzon tis, quj ntl atlam achis inj piljoan; au io an mjtoa, ma sivi in iu quj in inemak mo chioa, inj pan tlakati (ka ie omjto mjiekkan) intlakamo ie vel lamaseoa, in tlakamo vel monotsa, katle vnqujca, kaixkoian conmocauj lia, quj mjxkaoaltia, quj mopoljuja, quj mopopoljuja, inj maseoal okat ka ipampa ikan tlatlakomati, tlaa vilmati, tlakel chioa, tlatlacanequj, quj tenmati, akontlaeltia, aiel atle konmochichioaltia, vel kujtlatskopik, kujtlatskokopik, kuj tlananaka, kujtla kotlak, kuj tlatsol, quj ten matitl, koch pal, koch mj mjl: io an auel monotsa, kan quj ten mati, quj kuammati, quj tlauel chioa, in tlatoli, ie joatl injk mjtoa kanel omaxkauja, in kualonj, kanetoto quj lilo, amo neteteko, amo nekeketsalo vel ixqujch maana, vel ontlamj in siaustli, in tlapaliuis tli, amo san motenenmaka, amo san teixpan vetsi, in nekujltonoli, in ne tlamachtili, in netlakamatilistli, in netlakamachilistli.

column3: (31) Moquetza ce coatl: injn mj toaia, qualli tonalli: in aqujn ipa tlacatia, qujtoaia: ilhujle, mace oale iez, mocujltonoz, oniez in quj quaz, in qujz; auh in iaoc, in iaopan, oqujchtiz, tiacauhtiz, momavizcotiz pan vetziz, mavicoaz, moteniotiz, aco tlatocatiz, tecutiz; auh intlacioatl, vel motlacamatiz, vel motlaiecoltiz, vel motlacatiz, quj ttaz, quj piaz inj teicneliliz, inj coco cauh totecujo, tlaca loanj, tlapachoanj iez, vel quj ntlacal hujz, qujntlapachilhujz, qujntetzon tiz, quj ntl atlam achiz inj pilhoan; auh io an mjtoa, ma civi in iuh quj in inemac mo chioa, inj pan tlacati (ca ie omjto mjieccan) intlacamo ie vel lamaceoa, in tlacamo vel monotza, catle vnqujca, caixcoian conmocauj lia, quj mjxcaoaltia, quj mopolhuja, quj mopopolhuja, inj maceoal ocat ca: ipampa ican tlatlacomati, tlaa vilmati, tlaquel chioa, tlatlacanequj, quj tenmati, acontlaeltia, aiel atle conmochichioaltia, vel cujtlatzcopic, cujtlatzcocopic, cuj tlananaca, cujtla cotlac, cuj tlatzol, quj ten matitl, coch pal, coch mj mjl: io an auel monotza, can quj ten mati, quj quammati, quj tlauel chioa, in tlatolli, ie hoatl injc mjtoa: canel omaxcauja, in qualonj, canetoto quj lilo, amo neteteco, amo nequequetzalo: vel ixqujch maana, vel ontlamj in ciaujztli, in tlapaliuiz tli, amo çan motenenmaca, amo çan teixpan vetzi, in necujltonolli, in ne tlamachtilli, in netlacamatiliztli, in netlacamachiliztli.
column4: (31) moketsa se koatl: inhn mh toaia, kwali tonali in aqujn ipa tlakatia, qujtoaia: ilhule, mase oale ies, mokuhltonos, onies in quj kwas, in qujz; aw in iaok, in iaopan, oqujchtiz, tiakawtis, momaviskotis pan vetsis, mavikoas, moteniotis, ako tlatokatis, tekutis; aw intlasioatl, vel motlakamatis, vel motlaiekoltis, vel motlakatis, quj ttas, quj pias inh teiknelilis, inh koko kaw totekuho, tlaka loanj, tlapachoanh ies, vel quj ntlakal hus, qujntlapachilhujz, qujntetzon tis, quj ntl atlam achis inh pilhoan; aw io an mhtoa, ma sivi in iw quj in inemak mo chioa, inh pan tlakati (ca ie omhto mhiekkan) intlakamo ie vel lamaseoa, in tlakamo vel monotsa, katle vnqujca, kaixkoian conmocauj lia, quj mhxkaoaltia, quj mopolhuha, quj mopopolhuha, inh maseoal okat ka ipampa ikan tlatlakomati, tlaa vilmati, tlakel chioa, tlatlacanequj, quj tenmati, akontlaeltia, aiel atle konmochichioaltia, vel kuhtlatskopik, kuhtlatskokopik, kuh tlananaka, kuhtla kotlak, kuh tlatsol, quj ten matitl, koch pal, koch mh mhl: io an awel monotsa, kan quj ten mati, quj kwammati, quj tlawel chioa, in tlatoli, ie hoatl inhk mhtoa kanel omaxkauha, in qualonj, kanetoto quj lilo, amo neteteko, amo nekeketsalo vel ixqujch maana, vel ontlamh in siaustli, in tlapaliwis tli, amo san motenenmaka, amo san teixpan vetsi, in nekuhltonoli, in ne tlamachtili, in netlakamatilistli, in netlakamachilistli.

column4: (31) Moqoetza ce coatl: injn mj toaia, qoalli tonalli: in aqojn ipa tlacatia, qojtoaia: ilhojle, mace oale iez, mocojltonoz, oniez in qoj qoaz, in qojz; aoh in yaoc, in yaopan, oqojchtiz, tiacaohtiz, momavizcotiz pan vetziz, mavicoaz, moteniotiz, aco tlatocatiz, tecotiz; aoh intlacioatl, vel motlacamatiz, vel motlaiecoltiz, vel motlacatiz, qoj ttaz, qoj piaz inj teicneliliz, inj coco caoh totecojo, tlaca loanj, tlapachoanj iez, vel qoj ntlacal hojz, qojntlapachilhojz, qojntetzon tiz, qoj ntl atlam achiz inj pilhoan; aoh io an mjtoa, ma civi in ioh qoj in inemac mo chioa, inj pan tlacati (ca ie omjto mjieccan) intlacamo ie vel lamaceoa, in tlacamo vel monotza, catle vnqojca, caixcoian conmocaoj lia, qoj mjxcaoaltia, qoj mopolhoja, qoj mopopolhoja, inj maceoal ocat ca: ipampa ican tlatlacomati, tlaa vilmati, tlaqoel chioa, tlatlacaneqoj, qoj tenmati, acontlaeltia, aiel atle conmochichioaltia, vel cojtlatzcopic, cojtlatzcocopic, coj tlananaca, cojtla cotlac, coj tlatzol, qoj ten matitl, coch pal, coch mj mjl: io an aoel monotza, can qoj ten mati, qoj qoammati, qoj tlaoel chioa, in tlatolli, ie hoatl injc mjtoa: canel omaxcaoja, in qoalonj, canetoto qoj lilo, amo neteteco, amo neqoeqoetzalo: vel ixqojch maana, vel ontlamj in ciaojztli, in tlapalioiz tli, amo çan motenenmaca, amo çan teixpan vetzi, in necojltonolli, in ne tlamachtilli, in netlacamatiliztli, in netlacamachiliztli.

column3: Io an mjtoa: mj pan in ce coatl, cenca quj qualittaia inpuchteca in ozto meca, inj aque, inne nemjnj, in vecacalaqujnj, in tonalpan catca, intlapoalpan catca, iehoatl qujtztivia, vncan vmpeoaia in veca:
column4: io an mjtoa mj pan in se koatl, senka quj kualittaia inpuchteka in osto meka, inj ake, inne nemjnj, in vecacalaqujnj, in tonalpan katka, intlapoalpan katka, iejoatl qujtztivia, vnkan vmpeoaia in veka

column3: Io an mjtoa: mj pan in ce coatl, cenca quj qualittaia inpuchteca in ozto meca, inj aque, inne nemjnj, in vecacalaqujnj, in tonalpan catca, intlapoalpan catca, iehoatl qujtztivia, vncan vmpeoaia in veca:
column4: Io an mjtoa: mj pan in ce coatl, cenca qoj qoalittaia inpochteca in ozto meca, inj aqoe, inne nemjnj, in vecacalaqojnj, in tonalpan catca, intlapoalpan catca, iehoatl qojtztivia, vncan vmpeoaia in veca:

column1: .de fo.38. auh in aqujn ie vmpeoaz in omo chi chiuh, in otlacacaxten, in otlaca cax chichiuh: nj man tetlalhuja, quj ncen tlalia, quj n nechicoa, quj n nechicoa, quj n machitia inj veue io van, in puch teca veuetque, atlioa, tlaqualo, tlaoa no, injc teixpan motlalia, in aqujn ieoncholoteoaznequj, ieonmoquetzte oaznequj,ie on ueuetzteoaznequj, in ocontetl al caujznequj, ocompoliuhtoz nequj, io an mjtoa: ocon mjx ceujzne quj, quexqujch caujtl injc teixco ove vetz, omachteixcoveuetz, quj toznequj: cenca ie macho, injc ievecaoa ichan, injc aoccampa iauh.(32) I njc caxtolli omome capi tulo: itechpa tlatoa, inj ntenono tzaliz puchteca, in veuet que, in quj mj lhujaia inpilhoan, inj quac ie oneoazque, in veca mo tlaiecoltizque, in quj nj iopa iaz nequj, vmpeoaznequj.(33) A uh njman ic ceceiaca qujtla tlauhtia in veuetque: quj tlapaloa, qujchicaoa, quellaquaoa, qujtetzi loa, aco quj lpia, quj choqujztlapa loa, quj tlaquam maca in netolinjliz tli, in tlaihiio vilistli. Etc. Quj lhuja: canj cantonca nopiltze, nopiltzine, tel puchtle, notelputze, tel putztze: caoti quj montemo, otiquj montz atzili, oti quj mon nenotzallan in monaoan, in motahoan, in puchteca, in oztomeca, inj aque: canj çan imjxco, y mj opac, titlachia, tiquj monjximati, a mj tzca vilizque, a mj tzmacazque in cententli, yn cencamatl, inj ntlatquja, y nj ntla mamaia, inj ntlacaz caltiaia, inj ntla caoapaoaia, injc otlamavicoque, in iuhcan in quauhtla, in cacatla: auh injn ca nj çan cententli, cencamatl, ic nj mjtziollalia, ic nj mjtzchicaoa in tinopiltzin, in ic nj mona, nj mota, injc timonanmati, inj ctimotamati: timo tolinja, caie tonmoquetzaz, ietocon tlalcaviz in altepetl, in mochan in me ocico, in tlatilulco, anoço in tenuchti tlan, ietiqujmon cauhtiaz, ietiquj mon cauhteoaz, in mooaniolque: ie tontla cauhteoaz in mochan, in mocalitic, in moqujzcan, in moiolcan y moquech tetzon ionocan, in momanaoal, anoço momatetzon, ie toconnamj qujz in ce coatl, in vtli melaoac, in vchpantli, ietocontocaz, ietoconnamjqujz injx tlaoatl, in vei tlalli. Timotolinja no piltze, telpuchtle, maximellaquaoa, cannel timonemjtiz? cuix njcan timo mj qujliz? macana ixtlauhto, popouh to; injnchoqujz, y nj ntlaocol, in mo techiuh caoan, in veuetque: in nj çan ic mj tzapana, ic mjtz quj mjloa: aoiuh iaque in motechiuh caoan, ca inteoauh, itlachinol oqujmattiaque, o quj chiuh

column3: auh in aqujn ie vmpeoaz in omo chi chiuh, in otlacacaxten, in otlaca cax chichiuh: nj man tetlalhuja, quj ncen tlalia, quj n nechicoa, quj n nechicoa, quj n machitia inj veue io van, in puch teca veuetque, atlioa, tlaqualo, tlaoa no, injc teixpan motlalia, in aqujn ieoncholoteoaznequj, ieonmoquetzte oaznequj,ie on ueuetzteoaznequj, in ocontetl al caujznequj, ocompoliuhtoz nequj, io an mjtoa: ocon mjx ceujzne quj, quexqujch caujtl injc teixco ove vetz, omachteixcoveuetz, quj toznequj: cenca ie macho, injc ievecaoa ichan, injc aoccampa iauh.
column4: au in aqujn ie vmpeoas in omo chi chiu, in otlakakaxten, in otlaka kax chichiu: nj man tetlaljuja, quj nsen tlalia, quj n nechikoa, quj n nechikoa, quj n machitia inj veue io van, in puch teka veuetke, atlioa, tlakualo, tlaoa no, injk teixpan motlalia, in aqujn ieoncholoteoaznequj, ieonmoketste oaznequj,ie on ueuetzteoaznequj, in okontetl al caujznequj, okompoliutos nequj, io an mjtoa okon mjx seusne quj, quexqujch kautl injk teixko ove vets, omachteixkoveuets, quj toznequj: senka ie macho, injk ievekaoa ichan, injk aokkampa iau.

column3: auh in aqujn ie vmpeoaz in omo chi chiuh, in otlacacaxten, in otlaca cax chichiuh: nj man tetlalhuja, quj ncen tlalia, quj n nechicoa, quj n nechicoa, quj n machitia inj veue io van, in puch teca veuetque, atlioa, tlaqualo, tlaoa no, injc teixpan motlalia, in aqujn ieoncholoteoaznequj, ieonmoquetzte oaznequj,ie on ueuetzteoaznequj, in ocontetl al caujznequj, ocompoliuhtoz nequj, io an mjtoa: ocon mjx ceujzne quj, quexqujch caujtl injc teixco ove vetz, omachteixcoveuetz, quj toznequj: cenca ie macho, injc ievecaoa ichan, injc aoccampa iauh.

column3: (32) I njc caxtolli omome capi tulo: itechpa tlatoa, inj ntenono tzaliz puchteca, in veuet que, in quj mj lhujaia inpilhoan, inj quac ie oneoazque, in veca mo tlaiecoltizque, in quj nj iopa iaz nequj, vmpeoaznequj.

column3: Quj lhuja: canj cantonca nopiltze, nopiltzine, tel puchtle, notelputze, tel putztze: caoti quj montemo, otiquj montz atzili, oti quj mon nenotzallan in monaoan, in motahoan, in puchteca, in oztomeca, inj aque: canj çan imjxco, y mj opac, titlachia, tiquj monjximati, a mj tzca vilizque, a mj tzmacazque in cententli, yn cencamatl, inj ntlatquja, y nj ntla mamaia, inj ntlacaz caltiaia, inj ntla caoapaoaia, injc otlamavicoque, in iuhcan in quauhtla, in cacatla: auh injn ca nj çan cententli, cencamatl, ic nj mjtziollalia, ic nj mjtzchicaoa in tinopiltzin, in ic nj mona, nj mota, injc timonanmati, inj ctimotamati: timo tolinja, caie tonmoquetzaz, ietocon tlalcaviz in altepetl, in mochan in me ocico, in tlatilulco, anoço in tenuchti tlan, ietiqujmon cauhtiaz, ietiquj mon cauhteoaz, in mooaniolque: ie tontla cauhteoaz in mochan, in mocalitic, in moqujzcan, in moiolcan y moquech tetzon ionocan, in momanaoal, anoço momatetzon, ie toconnamj qujz in ce coatl, in vtli melaoac, in vchpantli, ietocontocaz, ietoconnamjqujz injx tlaoatl, in vei tlalli.
column4: quj ljuja kanj kantonka nopiltse, nopiltsine, tel puchtle, notelputse, tel putstse kaoti quj montemo, otiquj monts atsili, oti quj mon nenotsalan in monaoan, in motajoan, in puchteka, in ostomeka, inj ake kanj san imjxko, i mj opak, titlachia, tiquj monjximati, a mj tska viliske, a mj tsmakaske in sententli, in senkamatl, inj ntlatquja, i nj ntla mamaia, inj ntlakas kaltiaia, inj ntla kaoapaoaia, injk otlamavikoke, in iukan in kuautla, in kakatla au injn ka nj san sententli, senkamatl, ik nj mjtsiolalia, ik nj mjtschikaoa in tinopiltsin, in ik nj mona, nj mota, injk timonanmati, inj ktimotamati timo tolinja, kaie tonmoketsas, ietokon tlalkavis in altepetl, in mochan in me osiko, in tlatilulko, anoso in tenuchti tlan, ietiqujmon kautias, ietiquj mon kauteoas, in mooaniolke ie tontla kauteoas in mochan, in mokalitik, in moqujzcan, in moiolkan i mokech tetson ionokan, in momanaoal, anoso momatetson, ie tokonnamj qujz in se koatl, in vtli melaoak, in vchpantli, ietokontokas, ietoconnamjqujz injx tlaoatl, in vei tlali.

column4: macana ixtlaohto, popooh to; injnchoqojz, y nj ntlaocol, in mo techioh caoan, in veoetqoe: in nj çan ic mj tzapana, ic mjtz qoj mjloa: aoioh iaqoe in motechioh caoan, ca inteoaoh, itlachinol oqojmattiaqoe, o qoj chioh

column1: .de fo.39. tiaque in vtli, in nenemjliztli, injc oquj tlamatata qujlitiaque, oqujtlaitlanj litiaque in tloque, in na oaque, injc ixillan, itozcatlan omamaiauhtia que: auh injn, macuele timaliuj, ma xocontimalo in tlaihiioviliztli; caie toconmatiz, ietoconjxcaujz, ietocon ce nmatiz in netolinjliztli, in apiz mj qujliztli, inteociujliztli, in amj quj liz tli, inatetzocoaqujliztli, in ciam mj quj liztli: auh innle otlatlan in motacatzm in motlato caia: cujx aticmoquialtiz, in tlaxcalquappitztli, in tlaxcal totopoch tli, in totopuchtzintli, in tamaliia catzin tli: auh cujxatic mjtiz in xococ atl, in alchichic, in tlaclatl, in atzoatl. Auh cai tech tacitiuh, itech tipachiujtiuh, itech timotzotzonatiuh in temamauhti atl, in iuh quj colonj, in iuh quj tetecujca tiuh, xaxamacatiuh ic iauh, in moch quj uj ca, qujtzineuhtiuh, vevei qua ujtl: auh ca vncan tiquez qujlhujtiz, timatzaquaz, titlaihiioujz in mocuj tlaxcoltica, in monetequjliztica: intla ticmaujcoz, in iuh quj in, nopiltze, ma titlapinauhti, matitlacuecuetlaxo, ma timo cioa tlamachi, ie xicmo cenma ca, itlan xaquj, xicmotlaquammaca, ic ximotetzilo intlaihiioujliztli. Etc. canel ie in tictemoa, caie in ticto tocac, caiuh çan o tlacotique, in motechiuh caoan, in veuet que, caicomomotlaque oquj momacaque in tlaihiioujliztli: injc amo oqujtlacotla que, injntzon tecon, y nj mel chiqujuh, ca amo ca cuj que qujnencujque, injc oqujttaque in tach cauhiotl, in veueiotl, injc iepe tlati, ie icpalti, injc ie contl anevi injn petl, inj mjcpal in puchteca. A uh in y, timotolinja telpuchtle, in tlaitla mocnopil, momaceoal mochioaz in tlaitla ipan mjtzpoaz totecujo: caoe toconjttaz, octo con maujcoz mteco co, in tetolinj, in aiecoliztli, inteiacacpa quj qujz; in iuh quj motzaqua in aoa can, tepeoacan: caoc vmpa onqujcaz, ticiam mj qujz, timociappoaz, timoci auh quetztiaz, titonal ciauh tiaz, teeca ciiauhtiaz, tixtlaltzin timochiuhtiaz, tixtlalteuhpipixcauhtiaz, mjxqua tzin tlatlatiaz, mj tonaltzin ticma cujtiaz, vel timaliviz intexomolo, in tecaltech, in tetlatzacujltitlan, timotololtitiez, mocuj tlaxcol motech motetecatiez, ti maaqujz, ti moca calaq ujz, timoquj quj xtiz: in aoa can, tepeoacan, timotzotzonaz, timo cacapanjz, qujtoz nequj: acaco cantle uel on mochioaz, acaco cantle onma qujtiz in motiamjc, in mocnopillo, in monentlamatia, cauel ic noioaz in moiollo, mj xaiotzin tic matentiez: amo ticax çan viz, in mocneliloca, cati mj hi iotamachioaz, vel ontlamjz in mj hiio in motlapaliujz: in aco cana atlauh itic, atlauh camac, tlacopac, tetl itzin tlan, quavitl itz intlan timocochitiz, in aco cana timopopoliujtiz, mjtz tla

column3: tiaque in vtli, in nenemjliztli, injc oquj tlamatata qujlitiaque, oqujtlaitlanj litiaque in tloque, in na oaque, injc ixillan, itozcatlan omamaiauhtia que: auh injn, macuele timaliuj, ma xocontimalo in tlaihiioviliztli; caie toconmatiz, ietoconjxcaujz, ietocon ce nmatiz in netolinjliztli, in apiz mj qujliztli, inteociujliztli, in amj quj liz tli, inatetzocoaqujliztli, in ciam mj quj liztli: auh innle otlatlan in motacatzm in motlato caia: cujx aticmoquialtiz, in tlaxcalquappitztli, in tlaxcal totopoch tli, in totopuchtzintli, in tamaliia catzin tli: auh cujxatic mjtiz in xococ atl, in alchichic, in tlaclatl, in atzoatl.
column4: tiake in vtli, in nenemjlistli, injk oquj tlamatata qujlitiaque, oqujtlaitlanj litiake in tloke, in na oake, injk ixilan, itoskatlan omamaiautia ke au injn, makuele timaliuj, ma xokontimalo in tlaijiiovilistli; kaie tokonmatis, ietokonjxkaus, ietokon se nmatis in netolinjlistli, in apis mj qujliztli, inteosiulistli, in amj quj lis tli, inatetzocoaqujliztli, in siam mj quj listli au innle otlatlan in motakatsm in motlato kaia kujx atikmokialtis, in tlaxkalkuappitstli, in tlaxkal totopoch tli, in totopuchtsintli, in tamaliia katsin tli au kujxatik mjtis in xokok atl, in alchichik, in tlaklatl, in atsoatl.

column3: A uh in y, timotolinja telpuchtle, in tlaitla mocnopil, momaceoal mochioaz in tlaitla ipan mjtzpoaz totecujo: caoe toconjttaz, octo con maujcoz mteco co, in tetolinj, in aiecoliztli, inteiacacpa quj qujz; in iuh quj motzaqua in aoa can, tepeoacan: caoc vmpa onqujcaz, ticiam mj qujz, timociappoaz, timoci auh quetztiaz, titonal ciauh tiaz, teeca ciiauhtiaz, tixtlaltzin timochiuhtiaz, tixtlalteuhpipixcauhtiaz, mjxqua tzin tlatlatiaz, mj tonaltzin ticma cujtiaz, vel timaliviz intexomolo, in tecaltech, in tetlatzacujltitlan, timotololtitiez, mocuj tlaxcol motech motetecatiez, ti maaqujz, ti moca calaq ujz, timoquj quj xtiz: in aoa can, tepeoacan, timotzotzonaz, timo cacapanjz, qujtoz nequj: acaco cantle uel on mochioaz, acaco cantle onma qujtiz in motiamjc, in mocnopillo, in monentlamatia, cauel ic noioaz in moiollo, mj xaiotzin tic matentiez: amo ticax çan viz, in mocneliloca, cati mj hi iotamachioaz, vel ontlamjz in mj hiio in motlapaliujz: in aco cana atlauh itic, atlauh camac, tlacopac, tetl itzin tlan, quavitl itz intlan timocochitiz, in aco cana timopopoliujtiz, mjtz tla
column4: a u in i, timotolinja telpuchtle, in tlaitla moknopil, momaseoal mochioas in tlaitla ipan mjtspoas totekujo kaoe tokonjttas, okto kon maukos mteko ko, in tetolinj, in aiekolistli, inteiakakpa quj qujz; in iu quj motsakua in aoa kan, tepeoakan: kaok vmpa onqujcaz, tisiam mj qujz, timosiappoas, timosi au ketstias, titonal siau tias, teeka siiautias, tixtlaltsin timochiutias, tixtlalteupipixkautias, mjxkua tsin tlatlatias, mj tonaltsin tikma kujtias, vel timalivis intexomolo, in tekaltech, in tetlatsakujltitlan, timotololtities, mokuj tlaxkol motech motetekaties, ti maaqujz, ti moka calaq us, timoquj quj xtis: in aoa kan, tepeoakan, timotsotsonas, timo kakapanjs, qujtoz nequj: akako kantle uel on mochioas, akako kantle onma qujtiz in motiamjk, in moknopilo, in monentlamatia, kauel ik noioas in moiolo, mj xaiotsin tik matenties: amo tikax san vis, in mokneliloka, kati mj ji iotamachioas, vel ontlamjs in mj jiio in motlapalius: in ako kana atlau itik, atlau kamak, tlakopak, tetl itsin tlan, kuavitl its intlan timokochitis, in ako kana timopopoliutis, mjts tla

column1: .de fo. tiz tote cujo: auh in anoço c mjloch, mo necuepal ticchioaqujuh: caiac vntla mati, maoc ie moiolic: xicmotlao colnonochilitiuh in totecujo, mati moxiccauh, maxoconjx cauj, xoco cenmati in tlamaceoaliztli, xicmo cujtlauj in tecamapaqujliztli, intema tequjliztli: auh in tlachpanaliztli, in tlacujcujliztli, macamo ce monjca, moteputzco xiqual, etc. macamo cemonjca, moteputzco xiqual. Et. macamo cemjcampa, moteputzco xiqual quetztiuh in mocxi, qujtozne quj, macamo xitzintlaccatiuh, ma camo xitz in qujztiuh, macamo xi tzinqujzcatlaiecotiuh, xioalnacazitz tiuh, macatle xiqualilnamjctiuh: macan centlamjc xocommattiuh, maxoconcenmattiuh, xoconjxcauj tiuh, in tlaihiioujliztli, acitla mjtz ma ceoaltiz, mjtzilhujltiz in tloque, naoa que: acoc ceppa mjxco, mocpac tla chiazque in monaoan, in motaoan, in mooaniolque: caticquaz, catiquiz in njcan ic timjtznonotza, aixqujch ic timjtzonapana, timjtzontetziloa, aco timjtzilpia in timonaoan, in ti motaoan, timjtztlatlauhtia, tletic mati, tletic momachitia, tleticmat catz intli nopiltze, ma iiolic ximovi catiuh, xiquj montlal cauj in maujoa in motlaoan. Etc. Ivin in quella quaoaia, in quj chicaoaia; in aiamo cenca ixtlamati, in aco qujn jiopa te vica, motevicaltia, in canpa ie ontlama tiznequj, injc ie vmpeoa veca, ocnovi ian qujnemjtia, quj tlatlattitia, quj tlatlachieltia inj n tlatoltica, in iuh can quauhtla, cacatla: mamaxcanvia in puchtecaiotl, in oztomecaiotl.(34) I njc caxtolli vmei capitulo: vncan moteneoa in tlatolli, injntenonotzaliz catca, in çan ienoiehoantin, puchteca ve uetque, in quj mjlhujaia in in pilhoan in ie onmatia veca.(35) A uh in aqujn ie mjiecpa iloti, ie mj iecpa mo cuepa; inico njtztica in iuh çan inentla, inemja, in oujcan, in temamauhtican, intla ihiioujliztitlan: caquex qujch in qujl huja, caee cauh quj, caixieecauhquj, catlaieecolli, catlauelittalli, catama chiuhquj, catlaqualittalli, caipan qualli, caipan tlauelittalli, caipan tlacecolli, aocmo cenca viiac, aoc mo cenca vitlatztic, aocmo cenca noviian ontlatoa, aocmo noviian quj nemjtia, aocmo çan ilhujztlatoa, aocmo cailiviz tlatetoa: caixqujch in quj lhuja. Canj çan tonca telpuch tle: ca aocmo tipiltontli, aocmo tiuh quj titenmachonj, caietonjtztica, ie

column4: makamo semjkampa, moteputsko xikual ketstiu in mokxi, qujtozne quj, makamo xitsintlakkatiu, ma kamo xits in qujztiuh, makamo xi tzinqujzcatlaiecotiuh, xioalnakasits tiu, makatle xikualilnamjktiu: makan sentlamjk xokommattiu, maxokonsenmattiu, xoconjxcauj tiu, in tlaijiioulistli, asitla mjts ma seoaltis, mjtsiljultis in tloke, naoa ke akok seppa mjxko, mokpak tla chiaske in monaoan, in motaoan, in mooaniolke katikkuas, katikis in njkan ik timjtsnonotsa, aixqujch ik timjtsonapana, timjtsontetsiloa, ako timjtsilpia in timonaoan, in ti motaoan, timjtstlatlautia, tletik mati, tletik momachitia, tletikmat kats intli nopiltse, ma iiolik ximovi katiu, xiquj montlal cauj in maujoa in motlaoan.

column1: .de fo.41. tontlachixtica, ie mjx tlalopan, ie mjx nentla, ie mjxonj cac, in vmpa ton tlamatiznequj, in iuh çan in quauh tla, cacatla, in aoacan, in tepeaoaca, aocmotle ic tontlapolotiaz, aoctle ic tonjx mamauhtiaz, tonjx mj mjc tiaz, aoctle mjtztzicololtiz, aoctle, mj tzixtilquetzaz: caieno viian tonjtz ti ca, in iuh çan in tlaiecoaian, intlaco tia in oztomeca: ca amo ticmati, ano co ie ic cen mjtzixcaoa, in monaoan, in motaoan, aco ie ic centiauh, aco ie cana tonuetzitiuh, acocana atlauhtli, ixtlaoatl itic timaqujltitoz, timo popoliuhtitoz, acocana tictlantoz in altepetc, aco ie cenmanian mjxco mocpac ontlatlachia, catel iuh quj mattiuh in moiollo, camo iollo itlan ietiuh, caictimellaquauhtiuh, y njn choqujz, y njn tlaocol in monaoan, in motaoan: auh in tlaoqujtla toma ceoal, inti veuetque, in acoc mjloch, monecuepal ticmochiujliqujuh, caoc ceppa timjtximatizque. Auh in axcan tleticmomachitia: maiiolic xoconmotoqujli in vtli, maitlato conjcxinamjc: ca amo tlacacemelle toc, catequaniotoc, motequanioti toc, amo tlaca onoc in cacatl in tla cotl, ma ivian in matitech xiquj monantiuh, xiquj monaantiuh, xi quj monololotiuh, xiquj motepeujtiuh, xiquj moncenqujxtitiuh, xiq ujmo nechicotiuh in moteiccaoan: mati qujmon noxiccaujli, maxiquj mon notztiuh; injc conte cujlizque in caca tzintli, in pepetzintli: io an injc conte tlalilizque, in teicpaltzin, in campa neceujloian, catelix quj cho, in o tiqujn macaque in tihiio, in totlatol; in iuh quj in tlacaoapaoaia, in quauh tlaca, in cacatlaca, in puehteca injaque et. caaocmo monequj in quexqujch, ti mjtzcaqujtizque, cacanjcan achitzin ic timjtzon chicaoa: maio cuxca itla xonmaqujlti in tlaihiioviliztli, ma ixqujch motlapaltzin, tletic mo ma chitia nopiltze: inj quac otlatlauh tiloc, nj man no ic cenca matzintli ic tlacuepa, ic tlananqujlia, qujtoa O annechmocnelilique ino celo quj ch tle: otlacauh quj in amo iollotzin, ac nehoatl, acnjno mati; in njcan cen ca matzintli nj quj cnopilhuja, y n amotechicaoaliztzin, in amotenan iotzin, amotetaiotzin, canoço ntlapoa inamoxillantzinco, amotozcatlantzinco in co actica, in cepouhtoc, in cepoatoc, in cuel pachiuhtoc, in iuh quj quetzalli, in vel vito liuh quj, in vel iaque; auh in iuhquj chalchiujtl, in ololiuhquj, in vel petlaoac, in iuh quj teoxiujtl, in tlamatilolli, in uel cue cueio ca, aco cana namecho nnotlaxililiz, caic nonna pantiuh, no xillan, notoz catlan onac tiuh, no iollo itlan onietiuh, in amo naiotzin, in amotaiotzin; in amo no anqujmax cauj lique. Et. A uh in in canamechon notlatl auh tilia, que

column3: tontlachixtica, ie mjx tlalopan, ie mjx nentla, ie mjxonj cac, in vmpa ton tlamatiznequj, in iuh çan in quauh tla, cacatla, in aoacan, in tepeaoaca, aocmotle ic tontlapolotiaz, aoctle ic tonjx mamauhtiaz, tonjx mj mjc tiaz, aoctle mjtztzicololtiz, aoctle, mj tzixtilquetzaz: caieno viian tonjtz ti ca, in iuh çan in tlaiecoaian, intlaco tia in oztomeca: ca amo ticmati, ano co ie ic cen mjtzixcaoa, in monaoan, in motaoan, aco ie ic centiauh, aco ie cana tonuetzitiuh, acocana atlauhtli, ixtlaoatl itic timaqujltitoz, timo popoliuhtitoz, acocana tictlantoz in altepetc, aco ie cenmanian mjxco mocpac ontlatlachia, catel iuh quj mattiuh in moiollo, camo iollo itlan ietiuh, caictimellaquauhtiuh, y njn choqujz, y njn tlaocol in monaoan, in motaoan: auh in tlaoqujtla toma ceoal, inti veuetque, in acoc mjloch, monecuepal ticmochiujliqujuh, caoc ceppa timjtximatizque.
column4: tontlachixtika, ie mjx tlalopan, ie mjx nentla, ie mjxonj kak, in vmpa ton tlamatiznequj, in iu san in kuau tla, kakatla, in aoakan, in tepeaoaka, aokmotle ik tontlapolotias, aoktle ik tonjx mamautias, tonjx mj mjk tias, aoktle mjtstsikololtis, aoktle, mj tsixtilketsas: kaieno viian tonjts ti ka, in iu san in tlaiekoaian, intlako tia in ostomeka ka amo tikmati, ano ko ie ik sen mjtsixkaoa, in monaoan, in motaoan, ako ie ik sentiau, ako ie kana tonuetsitiu, akokana atlautli, ixtlaoatl itik timaqujltitoz, timo popoliutitos, akokana tiktlantos in altepetk, ako ie senmanian mjxko mokpak ontlatlachia, katel iu quj mattiu in moiolo, kamo iolo itlan ietiu, kaiktimelakuautiu, i njn choqujz, i njn tlaokol in monaoan, in motaoan: au in tlaoqujtla toma seoal, inti veuetke, in akok mjloch, monekuepal ticmochiujliqujuh, kaok seppa timjtximatiske.

column4: tontlachixtica, ie mjx tlalopan, ie mjx nentla, ie mjxonj cac, in vmpa ton tlamatizneqoj, in ioh çan in qoaoh tla, cacatla, in aoacan, in tepeaoaca, aocmotle ic tontlapolotiaz, aoctle ic tonjx mamaohtiaz, tonjx mj mjc tiaz, aoctle mjtztzicololtiz, aoctle, mj tzixtilqoetzaz: caieno viian tonjtz ti ca, in ioh çan in tlaiecoaian, intlaco tia in oztomeca: ca amo ticmati, ano co ie ic cen mjtzixcaoa, in monaoan, in motaoan, aco ie ic centiaoh, aco ie cana tonoetzitioh, acocana atlaohtli, ixtlaoatl itic timaqojltitoz, timo popoliohtitoz, acocana tictlantoz in altepetc, aco ie cenmanian mjxco mocpac ontlatlachia, catel ioh qoj mattioh in moiollo, camo iollo itlan ietioh, caictimellaqoaohtioh, y njn choqojz, y njn tlaocol in monaoan, in motaoan: aoh in tlaoqojtla toma ceoal, inti veoetqoe, in acoc mjloch, monecoepal ticmochiojliqojoh, caoc ceppa timjtximatizqoe.

column3: Auh in axcan tleticmomachitia: maiiolic xoconmotoqujli in vtli, maitlato conjcxinamjc: ca amo tlacacemelle toc, catequaniotoc, motequanioti toc, amo tlaca onoc in cacatl in tla cotl, ma ivian in matitech xiquj monantiuh, xiquj monaantiuh, xi quj monololotiuh, xiquj motepeujtiuh, xiquj moncenqujxtitiuh, xiq ujmo nechicotiuh in moteiccaoan: mati qujmon noxiccaujli, maxiquj mon notztiuh; injc conte cujlizque in caca tzintli, in pepetzintli: io an injc conte tlalilizque, in teicpaltzin, in campa neceujloian, catelix quj cho, in o tiqujn macaque in tihiio, in totlatol; in iuh quj in tlacaoapaoaia, in quauh tlaca, in cacatlaca, in puehteca injaque et.
column4: au in axkan tletikmomachitia maiiolik xoconmotoqujli in vtli, maitlato konjkxinamjk: ka amo tlakasemele tok, katekuaniotok, motekuanioti tok, amo tlaka onok in kakatl in tla kotl, ma ivian in matitech xiquj monantiu, xiquj monaantiu, xi quj monololotiu, xiquj motepeutiu, xiquj moncenqujxtitiuh, xiq umo nechikotiu in moteikkaoan: mati qujmon noxikkauli, maxiquj mon notstiu; injk konte kujliske in kaka tsintli, in pepetsintli io an injk konte tlaliliske, in teikpaltsin, in kampa neseuloian, katelix quj cho, in o tiqujn makake in tijiio, in totlatol; in iu quj in tlakaoapaoaia, in kuau tlaka, in kakatlaka, in puejteka injake et.

column3: Auh in axcan tleticmomachitia: maiiolic xoconmotoqujli in vtli, maitlato conjcxinamjc: ca amo tlacacemelle toc, catequaniotoc, motequanioti toc, amo tlaca onoc in cacatl in tla cotl, ma ivian in matitech xiquj monantiuh, xiquj monaantiuh, xi quj monololotiuh, xiquj motepeujtiuh, xiquj moncenqujxtitiuh, xiq ujmo nechicotiuh in moteiccaoan: mati qujmon noxiccaujli, maxiquj mon notztiuh; injc conte cujlizque in caca tzintli, in pepetzintli: io an injc conte tlalilizque, in teicpaltzin, in campa neceujloian, catelix quj cho, in o tiqujn macaque in tihiio, in totlatol; in iuh quj in tlacaoapaoaia, in quauh tlaca, in cacatlaca, in puehteca injaque et.
column4: Aoh in axcan tleticmomachitia: maiiolic xoconmotoqojli in vtli, maitlato conjcxinamjc: ca amo tlacacemelle toc, cateqoaniotoc, moteqoanioti toc, amo tlaca onoc in cacatl in tla cotl, ma ivian in matitech xiqoj monantioh, xiqoj monaantioh, xi qoj monololotioh, xiqoj motepeojtioh, xiqoj moncenqojxtitioh, xiq ojmo nechicotioh in moteiccaoan: mati qojmon noxiccaojli, maxiqoj mon notztioh; injc conte cojlizqoe in caca tzintli, in pepetzintli: io an injc conte tlalilizqoe, in teicpaltzin, in campa neceojloian, catelix qoj cho, in o tiqojn macaqoe in tihiio, in totlatol; in ioh qoj in tlacaoapaoaia, in qoaoh tlaca, in cacatlaca, in poehteca injaqoe et.

column3: caaocmo monequj in quexqujch, ti mjtzcaqujtizque, cacanjcan achitzin ic timjtzon chicaoa: maio cuxca itla xonmaqujlti in tlaihiioviliztli, ma ixqujch motlapaltzin, tletic mo ma chitia nopiltze: inj quac otlatlauh tiloc, nj man no ic cenca matzintli ic tlacuepa, ic tlananqujlia, qujtoa O annechmocnelilique ino celo quj ch tle: otlacauh quj in amo iollotzin, ac nehoatl, acnjno mati; in njcan cen ca matzintli nj quj cnopilhuja, y n amotechicaoaliztzin, in amotenan iotzin, amotetaiotzin, canoço ntlapoa inamoxillantzinco, amotozcatlantzinco in co actica, in cepouhtoc, in cepoatoc, in cuel pachiuhtoc, in iuh quj quetzalli, in vel vito liuh quj, in vel iaque; auh in iuhquj chalchiujtl, in ololiuhquj, in vel petlaoac, in iuh quj teoxiujtl, in tlamatilolli, in uel cue cueio ca, aco cana namecho nnotlaxililiz, caic nonna pantiuh, no xillan, notoz catlan onac tiuh, no iollo itlan onietiuh, in amo naiotzin, in amotaiotzin; in amo no anqujmax cauj lique.
column4: kaaokmo monequj in quexqujch, ti mjtzcaqujtizque, kakanjkan achitsin ik timjtson chikaoa maio kuxka itla xonmaqujlti in tlaijiiovilistli, ma ixqujch motlapaltsin, tletik mo ma chitia nopiltse inj kuak otlatlau tilok, nj man no ik senka matsintli ik tlakuepa, ik tlananqujlia, qujtoa o annechmoknelilike ino selo quj ch tle otlakau quj in amo iolotsin, ak nejoatl, aknjno mati; in njkan sen ka matsintli nj quj knopiljuja, i n amotechikaoalistsin, in amotenan iotsin, amotetaiotsin, kanoso ntlapoa inamoxilantsinko, amotoskatlantsinko in ko aktika, in sepoutok, in sepoatok, in kuel pachiutok, in iu quj ketsali, in vel vito liu quj, in vel iake; au in iukj chalchiutl, in ololiukj, in vel petlaoak, in iu quj teoxiutl, in tlamatiloli, in uel kue kueio ka, ako kana namecho nnotlaxililis, kaik nonna pantiu, no xilan, notos katlan onak tiu, no iolo itlan onietiu, in amo naiotsin, in amotaiotsin; in amo no anqujmax cauj like.

column1: .de fo.42. tlacaoaz injiollotzin totecujo, a coc amjtzinco amocpactzinco nj tlachie qujuh caie namechon no tlalcaujlia, in aipan an motlatoltizque, in tlach panaliztli, in tlach panalli, in tlach panaltzintli in tlacuj cuj liztli, in tle tlaliliztli: macamo ontlaioaticaz, tlacolli o nqujzticaz, I. onqujztoz, in nocnoxacalco, maoc conjxcauj in caiio noconcauhtiuh in nonantzin, in notecitzin, in nouel tioatzin, in nauj tzin. Et. caica nonnotequjpachotiuh, ica nontlaocoxtiuh; maipan anoal moquj xtiz que, ipan an motlatoltiz que, macaiac ica mo cacaiaoaz, in aco cana nechmopopolhujz totecujo: caix qujch noic amo tetzinco non no cauhtiuh, vel onietiuh in noiollo. Niman ic nechoqujlilo, inj chan tlaca, necho qujz tlapalolo, in ie muchintin puchteca veuetque, puchteca ila matque: auh in aca auel choca, çan teicampa tzotzoiontica, mochoqujz canenequj; auh catepan achitzin ic papacoa, neiollalilo, tlaoano, injc motlaocolpopoloa, motlaocol cece mana: ic catepan netlatlalcaujlo, vi ujloa, cacalacoa in techachan.(36) I njc caxtolli vnnavi ca pitulo: vncan moteneoa, in ventli in quj chioaia, in impa pa veca nemja ioan injc mox tlaoaia inj pampa in mj quja.(37) A uh inj chantlaca: nj man iquac compeoaltia intla maceo aia, motzo iotia, aocmomamovia, tel vel maltia y njn tlacapa,iece, aocmo polaquj: auh nanapo altica quj mattiuj, in mamovi tiuj; injc quj nextia, quj temachitia, caipampa tlama ceoa in jn coneuh, inj ntelpuch, in oqujx cauhque, ix qujch caujtl iuh quj chiuhtinemj, inj qujn quj caqujuh: auh intlanoce omj qujto, iehoan achto caqujtilo, in puch teca veuetque, in tequjuh, inteiol melaoazque, inteiolpachiujtizque, iehoantin qujcalaquja in choqujz tli, injxaiotl, inj chan omj qujto, ic quj temachitia, injc naujlhujtl il namj coz, mjccaoatizque inj chan tla ca, injc tlapalolozque, ellaquaoaloz que, quj mj loloz in in coneuh: auh in oqujz navilhujtl iquac mamovia inj chantlaca: ic mjtoa, momjcca altia injc compopoloa, conjilcaoa intlaocol: auh intlacana oiaomjc, quj tlaliaia ie ujllo, queuj llotia, que ujllotlalilia, ixiptla quj chichiujlia, injn Evillotl: çan oco quavitl in quj tzatzaianaia, catepan quj cuj tlalpia: auh ixqujch itech quj tlalia, in ama tlat qujtl, in amanechichioalli, in ama xicolli, in ama cozcatl, in amaneapan

column3: tlacaoaz injiollotzin totecujo, a coc amjtzinco amocpactzinco nj tlachie qujuh caie namechon no tlalcaujlia, in aipan an motlatoltizque, in tlach panaliztli, in tlach panalli, in tlach panaltzintli in tlacuj cuj liztli, in tle tlaliliztli: macamo ontlaioaticaz, tlacolli o nqujzticaz, I. onqujztoz, in nocnoxacalco, maoc conjxcauj in caiio noconcauhtiuh in nonantzin, in notecitzin, in nouel tioatzin, in nauj tzin.
column4: tlakaoas injiolotsin totekujo, a kok amjtsinko amokpaktsinko nj tlachie qujuh kaie namechon no tlalkaulia, in aipan an motlatoltiske, in tlach panalistli, in tlach panali, in tlach panaltsintli in tlakuj kuj listli, in tle tlalilistli makamo ontlaioatikas, tlakoli o nqujzticaz, i. onqujztoz, in noknoxakalko, maok conjxcauj in kaiio nokonkautiu in nonantsin, in notesitsin, in nouel tioatsin, in nauj tsin.

column3: (37) A uh inj chantlaca: nj man iquac compeoaltia intla maceo aia, motzo iotia, aocmomamovia, tel vel maltia y njn tlacapa,iece, aocmo polaquj: auh nanapo altica quj mattiuj, in mamovi tiuj; injc quj nextia, quj temachitia, caipampa tlama ceoa in jn coneuh, inj ntelpuch, in oqujx cauhque, ix qujch caujtl iuh quj chiuhtinemj, inj qujn quj caqujuh: auh intlanoce omj qujto, iehoan achto caqujtilo, in puch teca veuetque, in tequjuh, inteiol melaoazque, inteiolpachiujtizque, iehoantin qujcalaquja in choqujz tli, injxaiotl, inj chan omj qujto, ic quj temachitia, injc naujlhujtl il namj coz, mjccaoatizque inj chan tla ca, injc tlapalolozque, ellaquaoaloz que, quj mj loloz in in coneuh: auh in oqujz navilhujtl iquac mamovia inj chantlaca: ic mjtoa, momjcca altia injc compopoloa, conjilcaoa intlaocol: auh intlacana oiaomjc, quj tlaliaia ie ujllo, queuj llotia, que ujllotlalilia, ixiptla quj chichiujlia, injn Evillotl: çan oco quavitl in quj tzatzaianaia, catepan quj cuj tlalpia: auh ixqujch itech quj tlalia, in ama tlat qujtl, in amanechichioalli, in ama xicolli, in ama cozcatl, in amaneapan
column4: (37) a u inj chantlaka nj man ikuak kompeoaltia intla maseo aia, motso iotia, aokmomamovia, tel vel maltia i njn tlakapa,iese, aokmo polaquj: au nanapo altika quj mattiuj, in mamovi tiuj; injk quj nextia, quj temachitia, kaipampa tlama seoa in jn koneu, inj ntelpuch, in oqujx kauke, ix qujch kautl iu quj chiutinemj, inj qujn quj caqujuh: au intlanose omj qujto, iejoan achto caqujtilo, in puch teka veuetke, in tequjuh, inteiol melaoaske, inteiolpachiutiske, iejoantin qujcalaquja in choqujz tli, injxaiotl, inj chan omj qujto, ik quj temachitia, injk nauljutl il namj kos, mjkkaoatiske inj chan tla ka, injk tlapaloloske, elakuaoalos ke, quj mj lolos in in koneu: au in oqujz naviljutl ikuak mamovia inj chantlaka ik mjtoa, momjkka altia injk kompopoloa, konjilkaoa intlaokol: au intlakana oiaomjk, quj tlaliaia ie ulo, queuj lotia, ke ulotlalilia, ixiptla quj chichiulia, injn evilotl: san oko kuavitl in quj tsatsaianaia, katepan quj kuj tlalpia au ixqujch itech quj tlalia, in ama tlat qujtl, in amanechichioali, in ama xikoli, in ama koskatl, in amaneapan
