column4: (37) A oh inj chantlaca: nj man iqoac compeoaltia intla maceo aia, motzo iotia, aocmomamovia, tel vel maltia y njn tlacapa,iece, aocmo polaqoj: aoh nanapo altica qoj mattioj, in mamovi tioj; injc qoj nextia, qoj temachitia, caipampa tlama ceoa in jn coneoh, inj ntelpoch, in oqojx caohqoe, ix qojch caojtl ioh qoj chiohtinemj, inj qojn qoj caqojoh: aoh intlanoce omj qojto, iehoan achto caqojtilo, in poch teca veoetqoe, in teqojoh, inteiol melaoazqoe, inteiolpachiojtizqoe, iehoantin qojcalaqoja in choqojz tli, injxaiotl, inj chan omj qojto, ic qoj temachitia, injc naojlhojtl il namj coz, mjccaoatizqoe inj chan tla ca, injc tlapalolozqoe, ellaqoaoaloz qoe, qoj mj loloz in in coneoh: aoh in oqojz navilhojtl iqoac mamovia inj chantlaca: ic mjtoa, momjcca altia injc compopoloa, conjilcaoa intlaocol: aoh intlacana oyaomjc, qoj tlaliaia ie ojllo, qoeoj llotia, qoe ojllotlalilia, ixiptla qoj chichiojlia, injn Evillotl: çan oco qoavitl in qoj tzatzaianaia, catepan qoj coj tlalpia: aoh ixqojch itech qoj tlalia, in ama tlat qojtl, in amanechichioalli, in ama xicolli, in ama cozcatl, in amaneapan

column1: .de fo.43. tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaca, injc mochi ioan quj tlatizque: in ie iuh quj in oquj cen cauh que evillotl, inj quac iechoquj liloz oiaomjc, occemjlhujtica, inj eujllo icalpulco, cemjlhujtl in ca, ce mjlhujtl in eoatica: auh quj nj quac in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to caiotiaia, tevito alco, quauh xicalco, tzompantitlan: auh in tlaca ontlalmjc oztomecatl, qujtoznequj: in tlacamo oiaomjc, in aco cano coco lizcuje, çan ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieujllo, iece çan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatiuh, iquac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatiuh quj tlatiaia. No ioan mj toa: inj quac ypan in cecoatl tonalli, intlaipanti, ipan motlalia, inj quac oiactlatoloc, oteiaotlalhujloc, in o mjto, in otecaqujtiloc iaoiotl; vel i iqua ipan vnpeoaia in iaoc: vncan iao quj xoaia, ipan atlatocoia, ipan vnneotemaloia, vnmotema, on ma cocuj, onmolinja, coa, nenemj, ic xiconana, injxqujch quauhtlocelotl: auh in aqujn ipan otlacat ce ocelotl tonalli, qujtoaia, qujpatiaia, quj nemactiaia intonalpouque, tlac nopilhujanj, ilhujle, maceoale mu chioaz, mocujltonoz, vnca quj quanj iez: auh intlacamouellamaceoa, in iuh quj itonal in, amo ipan muchi oa inj nemac, injc nopil: çan iehoatl quj mitlacalhuja, quj mopopolhuja, mjtoa: ine viian con mo caujlia, quj motlacol mjetilia. Etc. y naqujn ipa otlacat in, aiamo caltiaia, quj nipa caltiaia in Ey macatl: iquac qujto camaca, ipampa iemj ieccan omjto: in eitioaian tonalli, inj quac tlace mjlhujtiltia, quj qualittaia in tonal pouhque: iehoatl ic contlatoto quj liaia, vmpa quj tlatequjniaia, vm pa contlachieltiaia, injc cenca qujto nalchicaoaia. Auh in qujto quj lia, vme mj qujztli, iuh qujtoa: amo qualli, atle vnca ca maceoalli. Auh in ey macatl: iuh qujtoa qualli to nalli, ieomjto: in eitioaia muchipa qualcan, vncanca tlacnopilhujliztli in iuh qujteilhujaia tonalpouhque. A uh in navi tochtli in tlanauhca iotia tonalli, in nauh caiopa tlavi ca, tlace mjlhujtiltia, amono qualli, iuh qujtoa: in jzqujcan tlanauhca iopan tonalli, muchi amo qualli, atle vncanca qualli nemactli. No iuh quj in macujlli atl: amo no qualli, iuh qujtoa: injz quj çan tla macujltilia tonalli, mochi amo qualli: in aquj que vncan tlacati, a mo tlacacemelleque, amo tlaca, tla ueliloque: auh ioan qujtoa, in vn can y, tonalli, macujltioaia, chico qualli no quj toaia: injc chico qualli in tlaaca itonal omochiuh macujlli,

column3: tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaca, injc mochi ioan quj tlatizque: in ie iuh quj in oquj cen cauh que evillotl, inj quac iechoquj liloz oiaomjc, occemjlhujtica, inj eujllo icalpulco, cemjlhujtl in ca, ce mjlhujtl in eoatica: auh quj nj quac in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to caiotiaia, tevito alco, quauh xicalco, tzompantitlan: auh in tlaca ontlalmjc oztomecatl, qujtoznequj: in tlacamo oiaomjc, in aco cano coco lizcuje, çan ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieujllo, iece çan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatiuh, iquac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatiuh quj tlatiaia.
column4: tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaka, injk mochi ioan quj tlatiske in ie iu quj in oquj sen kau ke evilotl, inj kuak iechoquj lilos oiaomjk, oksemjljutika, inj eulo ikalpulko, semjljutl in ka, se mjljutl in eoatika au quj nj kuak in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to kaiotiaia, tevito alko, kuau xikalko, tsompantitlan: au in tlaka ontlalmjk ostomekatl, qujtoznequj: in tlakamo oiaomjk, in ako kano koko liskuje, san ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieulo, iese san ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, okachi tonatiu, ikuak in ieonmots kaloa, onmopiloa tonatiu quj tlatiaia.

column3: tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaca, injc mochi ioan quj tlatizque: in ie iuh quj in oquj cen cauh que evillotl, inj quac iechoquj liloz oiaomjc, occemjlhujtica, inj eujllo icalpulco, cemjlhujtl in ca, ce mjlhujtl in eoatica: auh quj nj quac in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to caiotiaia, tevito alco, quauh xicalco, tzompantitlan: auh in tlaca ontlalmjc oztomecatl, qujtoznequj: in tlacamo oiaomjc, in aco cano coco lizcuje, çan ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieujllo, iece çan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatiuh, iquac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatiuh quj tlatiaia.

column4: tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaca, inhc mochi ioan quj tlatizque in ie iuh quj in oquj cen cauh que evillotl, inh cuac iechoquj liloz oiaomhc, occemhlhutica, inh eullo icalpulco, cemhlhutl in ca, ce mhlhutl in eoatica auh quj nh cuac in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to caiotiaia, tevito alco, cuauh xicalco, tzompantitlan: auh in tlaca ontlalmhc oztomecatl, qujtoznequj: in tlacamo oiaomhc, in aco cano coco lizcuhe, zan ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieullo, iece zan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatiuh, icuac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatiuh quj tlatiaia.

column3: tli, qujtlaolololtia, qujtlatepeoaltia quj tlamamaca, injc mochi ioan quj tlatizque: in ie iuh quj in oquj cen cauh que evillotl, inj quac iechoquj liloz oiaomjc, occemjlhujtica, inj eujllo icalpulco, cemjlhujtl in ca, ce mjlhujtl in eoatica: auh quj nj quac in io alnepantla, quj tlatiaia, vmpa in quj to caiotiaia, tevito alco, quauh xicalco, tzompantitlan: auh in tlaca ontlalmjc oztomecatl, qujtoznequj: in tlacamo oiaomjc, in aco cano coco lizcuje, çan ie no ivi in quj chi chioa ia ieujllo, iece çan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatiuh, iquac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatiuh quj tlatiaia.
column4: tli, qojtlaolololtia, qojtlatepeoaltia qoj tlamamaca, injc mochi ioan qoj tlatizqoe: in ie ioh qoj in oqoj cen caoh qoe evillotl, inj qoac iechoqoj liloz oyaomjc, occemjlhojtica, inj eojllo icalpolco, cemjlhojtl in ca, ce mjlhojtl in eoatica: aoh qoj nj qoac in io alnepantla, qoj tlatiaia, vmpa in qoj to caiotiaia, teiito alco, qoaoh xicalco, tzompantitlan: aoh in tlaca ontlalmjc oztomecatl, qojtozneqoj: in tlacamo oyaomjc, in aco cano coco lizcoje, çan ie no ivi in qoj chi chioa ia ieojllo, iece çan ichan in tlatlaia, amo ioalnepantla, ocachi tonatioh, iqoac in ieonmotz caloa, onmopiloa tonatioh qoj tlatiaia.

column3: No ioan mj toa: inj quac ypan in cecoatl tonalli, intlaipanti, ipan motlalia, inj quac oiactlatoloc, oteiaotlalhujloc, in o mjto, in otecaqujtiloc iaoiotl; vel i iqua ipan vnpeoaia in iaoc: vncan iao quj xoaia, ipan atlatocoia, ipan vnneotemaloia, vnmotema, on ma cocuj, onmolinja, coa, nenemj, ic xiconana, injxqujch quauhtlocelotl: auh in aqujn ipan otlacat ce ocelotl tonalli, qujtoaia, qujpatiaia, quj nemactiaia intonalpouque, tlac nopilhujanj, ilhujle, maceoale mu chioaz, mocujltonoz, vnca quj quanj iez: auh intlacamouellamaceoa, in iuh quj itonal in, amo ipan muchi oa inj nemac, injc nopil: çan iehoatl quj mitlacalhuja, quj mopopolhuja, mjtoa: ine viian con mo caujlia, quj motlacol mjetilia.
column4: no ioan mj toa inj kuak ipan in sekoatl tonali, intlaipanti, ipan motlalia, inj kuak oiaktlatolok, oteiaotlaljulok, in o mjto, in otecaqujtiloc iaoiotl; vel i ikua ipan vnpeoaia in iaok: vnkan iao quj xoaia, ipan atlatokoia, ipan vnneotemaloia, vnmotema, on ma kokuj, onmolinja, koa, nenemj, ik xikonana, injxqujch kuautloselotl: au in aqujn ipan otlakat se oselotl tonali, qujtoaia, qujpatiaia, quj nemaktiaia intonalpouke, tlak nopiljujanj, iljule, maseoale mu chioas, mokujltonos, vnka quj kuanj ies: au intlakamouelamaseoa, in iu quj itonal in, amo ipan muchi oa inj nemak, injk nopil: san iejoatl quj mitlakaljuja, quj mopopoljuja, mjtoa ine viian kon mo kaulia, quj motlakol mjetilia.

column1: .de fo.44. intlauel mozcaltia, vel monotza ic mo oapaoa, amo iuhquj ipan mochioaia; in quenamj itonal itenemac, injc atla cacemelle iez quja, canj cuepca, canjc mo patla, inj macehoal mochioaia tlamaujz tic ic oalmoteniotia, oalmomavicotia, itolo in ienemj; injn iquac tlacat ic ten machoc, inj tonal macujlli; quj tlamauhcaittilique, quj tlaten ma chilique: auh in axcan amo oipantic, injc ovitizquja, çan ie teniotl, ma vicotl, in oqujmomacevi; tel cainoma, itlamaceoaliztica omoqujxti, omoc neli, caoquj tecuili, oquj tecaqujli in veue tlatolli, injpiltian, ic ooaliztlama.(38) I njc cempoalli capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in occequj calli, inj tech pouhquj machiotl, o mjto.(39) A uh in contoqujlia, chiquacen itzcujntli: amono qualli ipan ma choia, ie omjto in quenamj in ieliz vncan tlacati, inj pan muchi chiqua cen tonalli, çan atle qualli inj ne mac muchioa, çan ie quj cenmama quj cemololoa in tlaca tlatolli, in aujl qujz caiotl, muchi ie caujltilo, cujtilo, mamaltilo, intechontzopi; ioan ie hoan quj tecujtia, quj teecaujltia, qujtechioaltia, contematzoltia in aqualli, in teicolo, in tecatz auh, in tepacolo, in teaujlqujxti, in teueue tlaz, in teixtlaz, in teixnecujlo, inte ixceuj, in teitolotlac, in tetlaitoltili, in tepan tececenma, in teatlatzicuj nj, in quj co qujuja, in qujcoqujmo tla, in quj popoiotilia, in qujxpopoloa injtlillo, inj tlapallo tenemjliz. No ioan mjtoa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, y, chiquacen tonalli, no quj pantiaia in tonalpouhque, çan cocoxcanacaio iez, amo chicaoac, anoce çan njman on mj ctiuetzia: auh intla nemj çan mococotinemj, iaiatinemj, tetentine mj, totol catinemj, tlatlaztinemj, pi neoatinemj, xoxoujxtinemj, iztaleoa tinemj. Etc. A uh in aquj que ipan tlacatia in, amo qualtitica tonalli, aiamo quj maltiaia, qujn jpan quj mattitiviia, in chicome ocomatli: ic achi vmpa, quj qualtiliaia y njnto nal, qujto aia: intlanemjzque, aco intlamaceoaliztica cuepiz, mopatlaz in aqualli ipan otlacatque, oieco que, otlalticpac qujzque, oxotlaque, oitzmolinque, otzicueoaque, otlapa que. A uh in chicome ocomatli: cenca qujqualittaia, y pampa in iuh mjieccan o mjto, in chicometi oaia tonalli: qujl mach itlatoaia in chicome coatl, injxiptla tonaca

column3: intlauel mozcaltia, vel monotza ic mo oapaoa, amo iuhquj ipan mochioaia; in quenamj itonal itenemac, injc atla cacemelle iez quja, canj cuepca, canjc mo patla, inj macehoal mochioaia tlamaujz tic ic oalmoteniotia, oalmomavicotia, itolo in ienemj; injn iquac tlacat ic ten machoc, inj tonal macujlli; quj tlamauhcaittilique, quj tlaten ma chilique: auh in axcan amo oipantic, injc ovitizquja, çan ie teniotl, ma vicotl, in oqujmomacevi; tel cainoma, itlamaceoaliztica omoqujxti, omoc neli, caoquj tecuili, oquj tecaqujli in veue tlatolli, injpiltian, ic ooaliztlama.
column4: intlauel moskaltia, vel monotsa ik mo oapaoa, amo iukj ipan mochioaia; in kenamj itonal itenemak, injk atla kasemele ies quja, kanj kuepka, kanjk mo patla, inj masejoal mochioaia tlamaus tik ik oalmoteniotia, oalmomavikotia, itolo in ienemj; injn ikuak tlakat ik ten machok, inj tonal makujli; quj tlamaukaittilike, quj tlaten ma chilike au in axkan amo oipantik, injk ovitizquja, san ie teniotl, ma vikotl, in oqujmomacevi; tel kainoma, itlamaseoalistika omoqujxti, omok neli, caoquj tekuili, oquj tecaqujli in veue tlatoli, injpiltian, ik ooalistlama.

column3: (39) A uh in contoqujlia, chiquacen itzcujntli: amono qualli ipan ma choia, ie omjto in quenamj in ieliz vncan tlacati, inj pan muchi chiqua cen tonalli, çan atle qualli inj ne mac muchioa, çan ie quj cenmama quj cemololoa in tlaca tlatolli, in aujl qujz caiotl, muchi ie caujltilo, cujtilo, mamaltilo, intechontzopi; ioan ie hoan quj tecujtia, quj teecaujltia, qujtechioaltia, contematzoltia in aqualli, in teicolo, in tecatz auh, in tepacolo, in teaujlqujxti, in teueue tlaz, in teixtlaz, in teixnecujlo, inte ixceuj, in teitolotlac, in tetlaitoltili, in tepan tececenma, in teatlatzicuj nj, in quj co qujuja, in qujcoqujmo tla, in quj popoiotilia, in qujxpopoloa injtlillo, inj tlapallo tenemjliz.
column4: (39) a u in contoqujlia, chikuasen itskujntli amono kuali ipan ma choia, ie omjto in kenamj in ielis vnkan tlakati, inj pan muchi chikua sen tonali, san atle kuali inj ne mak muchioa, san ie quj senmama quj semololoa in tlaka tlatoli, in aul qujz kaiotl, muchi ie kaultilo, kujtilo, mamaltilo, intechontsopi; ioan ie joan quj tekujtia, quj teekaultia, qujtechioaltia, kontematsoltia in akuali, in teikolo, in tekats au, in tepakolo, in teaujlqujxti, in teueue tlas, in teixtlas, in teixnekujlo, inte ixceuj, in teitolotlak, in tetlaitoltili, in tepan tesesenma, in teatlatsikuj nj, in quj ko qujuja, in qujcoqujmo tla, in quj popoiotilia, in qujxpopoloa injtlilo, inj tlapalo tenemjlis.

column4: (39) A oh in contoqojlia, chiqoacen itzcojntli: amono qoalli ipan ma choia, ie omjto in qoenamj in ieliz vncan tlacati, inj pan mochi chiqoa cen tonalli, çan atle qoalli inj ne mac mochioa, çan ie qoj cenmama qoj cemololoa in tlaca tlatolli, in aojl qojz caiotl, mochi ie caojltilo, cojtilo, mamaltilo, intechontzopi; ioan ie hoan qoj tecojtia, qoj teecaojltia, qojtechioaltia, contematzoltia in aqoalli, in teicolo, in tecatz aoh, in tepacolo, in teaojlqojxti, in teoeoe tlaz, in teixtlaz, in teixnecojlo, inte ixceoj, in teitolotlac, in tetlaitoltili, in tepan tececenma, in teatlatzicoj nj, in qoj co qojoja, in qojcoqojmo tla, in qoj popoiotilia, in qojxpopoloa injtlillo, inj tlapallo tenemjliz.

column3: No ioan mjtoa: in aqujn ipan tlacatia, y, chiquacen tonalli, no quj pantiaia in tonalpouhque, çan cocoxcanacaio iez, amo chicaoac, anoce çan njman on mj ctiuetzia: auh intla nemj çan mococotinemj, iaiatinemj, tetentine mj, totol catinemj, tlatlaztinemj, pi neoatinemj, xoxoujxtinemj, iztaleoa tinemj.
column4: no ioan mjtoa in aqujn ipan tlakatia, i, chikuasen tonali, no quj pantiaia in tonalpouke, san kokoxkanakaio ies, amo chikaoak, anose san njman on mj ktiuetsia au intla nemj san mokokotinemj, iaiatinemj, tetentine mj, totol katinemj, tlatlastinemj, pi neoatinemj, xoxouxtinemj, istaleoa tinemj.

column3: A uh in aquj que ipan tlacatia in, amo qualtitica tonalli, aiamo quj maltiaia, qujn jpan quj mattitiviia, in chicome ocomatli: ic achi vmpa, quj qualtiliaia y njnto nal, qujto aia: intlanemjzque, aco intlamaceoaliztica cuepiz, mopatlaz in aqualli ipan otlacatque, oieco que, otlalticpac qujzque, oxotlaque, oitzmolinque, otzicueoaque, otlapa que.
column4: a u in aquj ke ipan tlakatia in, amo kualtitika tonali, aiamo quj maltiaia, qujn jpan quj mattitiviia, in chikome okomatli ik achi vmpa, quj kualtiliaia i njnto nal, qujto aia intlanemjske, ako intlamaseoalistika kuepis, mopatlas in akuali ipan otlakatke, oieko ke, otlaltikpak qujzque, oxotlake, oitsmolinke, otsikueoake, otlapa ke.

column3: A uh in chicome ocomatli: cenca qujqualittaia, y pampa in iuh mjieccan o mjto, in chicometi oaia tonalli: qujl mach itlatoaia in chicome coatl, injxiptla tonaca

column1: .de fo.45. iotl, motqujtica necujltonolli, ne tlamachtilli, in iuh qujto aia tonal pouhque: auh in aqujn vncan tla catia, much qujnemactiaia in papa qujnj iez, a aujenj, tece celtianj, te cecemeltianj, camanale, camana loanj, vetz quiztli queoa, cemjcnjuh tli, tececemjcnjuh, muchitlacatl itla co, novian vel tetlan motlalia, no viian tepal vntlaqua, ontlachia, aiac qujiolitlacoa: ipampa in iuh quj itonal ocomatli: auh in tlaci oatl cenca mocujltonoz, intlauel mai liz, uel muchioaz inj tiamjc, vellane cujloz, vel motlacatiz, quj himatiz, quj tlatla machiz inj tiamjc, inj tlaca, amo actiuetziz, amo caxaoaz, vel mo chioaz inj nanauh, intlein quj mo nanauhtiz ipampa in chicometioaia, tonale, caiuh ca inemac. A uh in chicuei malinalli: no achi quj qua littaia, çan novian iuh quj, in ix qujch chichicueey tonalli. A uh in chicu navi acatl: çan njman amo qualli, ipampa qujlmach itlatoaia, itlace mjlhujtiltiaian. Tlacolteutl, mot qujtica tlacolli: in aqujn vncan tlacalli, ie omjto: njman alte qualli quj maceoa, çan vncan ca itelchioa loca, iquequeloloca, i cue cue nochichi oaloca, iaujlqujxtiloca. Etc. Novi ian iuh canjn, injzquj çan chicuna vitioaia, in iuh ie mjieccan omjto. A uh inj pan matlactli ocelotl: ie vel qualcan, in iuh iemjieccan omjto itlatollo, iuh qujtoa: qujlmach in ma tlactioaian tonalli, injz quj tetl tlama tlactetilia tonalli, vncan itlatoaia in Tez catlipuca: inj pan machoia tt. in aqujn vncan tlacati, cenca quj qualittaia, qujtoaia: catematian in otlacat, imatian itlato aia, in tlacatl totecujo Tezcatlipuca: intlanemjz camaceoale iez, ic njman iquac cal tiaia: auh intlaqujnequjzque in iollo tlama, in oc conchololtizque, qujn ce vmpa quj mattivia, in tonaltzonco, iquac caltiaia inj pan matlactlomej, olin ipampa in mochi tonaltzontli, cenca qujqualittaia, iccenca uel vn can qujntonalchicaoaia, inj pan, quj maltiaia. A uh in matlactli oce quauh tli, ioan matlactli omome cozcaquauh tli; iuh qujtoa onteixti çan chico qualli, amo çan centettitica, vme vitz qujtoa, in aqujque ipantlacatia in, onteixti, tonalli, qujn cen jpan quj maltiaia in tonaltzontli, vmpa quj qualtiliaia inj ntonal. I ehoatl in, innjcan cen calpan tonaltzontli, matlactli omej olin: injc occenca quj qualittaia, i pampa in quj tlamjtica, y nj ca tlan tica, icatzonqujztica matlactli omej tonalli; auh in quenamj imaceoal: vncan tlacatia, ie mjieccan omjto.(40)

column3: iotl, motqujtica necujltonolli, ne tlamachtilli, in iuh qujto aia tonal pouhque: auh in aqujn vncan tla catia, much qujnemactiaia in papa qujnj iez, a aujenj, tece celtianj, te cecemeltianj, camanale, camana loanj, vetz quiztli queoa, cemjcnjuh tli, tececemjcnjuh, muchitlacatl itla co, novian vel tetlan motlalia, no viian tepal vntlaqua, ontlachia, aiac qujiolitlacoa: ipampa in iuh quj itonal ocomatli: auh in tlaci oatl cenca mocujltonoz, intlauel mai liz, uel muchioaz inj tiamjc, vellane cujloz, vel motlacatiz, quj himatiz, quj tlatla machiz inj tiamjc, inj tlaca, amo actiuetziz, amo caxaoaz, vel mo chioaz inj nanauh, intlein quj mo nanauhtiz ipampa in chicometioaia, tonale, caiuh ca inemac.
column4: iotl, motqujtica nekujltonoli, ne tlamachtili, in iu qujto aia tonal pouke au in aqujn vnkan tla katia, much qujnemactiaia in papa qujnj ies, a aujenj, tese seltianj, te sesemeltianj, kamanale, kamana loanj, vets kistli keoa, semjknju tli, tesesemjknju, muchitlakatl itla ko, novian vel tetlan motlalia, no viian tepal vntlakua, ontlachia, aiak qujiolitlacoa: ipampa in iu quj itonal okomatli au in tlasi oatl senka mokujltonos, intlauel mai lis, uel muchioas inj tiamjk, velane kujlos, vel motlakatis, quj jimatis, quj tlatla machis inj tiamjk, inj tlaka, amo aktiuetsis, amo kaxaoas, vel mo chioas inj nanau, intlein quj mo nanautis ipampa in chikometioaia, tonale, kaiu ka inemak.

column3: iotl, motqujtica necujltonolli, ne tlamachtilli, in iuh qujto aia tonal pouhque: auh in aqujn vncan tla catia, much qujnemactiaia in papa qujnj iez, a aujenj, tece celtianj, te cecemeltianj, camanale, camana loanj, vetz quiztli queoa, cemjcnjuh tli, tececemjcnjuh, muchitlacatl itla co, novian vel tetlan motlalia, no viian tepal vntlaqua, ontlachia, aiac qujiolitlacoa: ipampa in iuh quj itonal ocomatli: auh in tlaci oatl cenca mocujltonoz, intlauel mai liz, uel muchioaz inj tiamjc, vellane cujloz, vel motlacatiz, quj himatiz, quj tlatla machiz inj tiamjc, inj tlaca, amo actiuetziz, amo caxaoaz, vel mo chioaz inj nanauh, intlein quj mo nanauhtiz ipampa in chicometioaia, tonale, caiuh ca inemac.

column3: I ehoatl in, innjcan cen calpan tonaltzontli, matlactli omej olin: injc occenca quj qualittaia, i pampa in quj tlamjtica, y nj ca tlan tica, icatzonqujztica matlactli omej tonalli; auh in quenamj imaceoal: vncan tlacatia, ie mjieccan omjto.

column1: .de fo.46. I njc cempoalli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl machiotl, injtoca ce tecpatl: ioan qujl qualli inj tonallo, auh qujl in aquj que vncan tlacatia chi caoaque catca, ioan tequjo acatia: auh qujl in cioa vncan tlacatia oqujch iolloque catca, muchi in veli catca, cenca uel quj nextiaia injntlatquj: auh qujl itonal cat ca in Vitzilopuchtli, inj tech pouhquj catca, inj tequjuh cat ca iiaoiotl, quj lno tonal in Ca maxtle: auh inj quac vmpeoaia injn machiotl, qujlhujqujxtilia ia; auh qujl muchi qualli catca injz qujlhujtl, matlaqujhujtl vmei.(41) Moquetza ce tecpatl: in in ce tecpatl, inj quac tlacemjlhujtiltiaia, vncan quj tonaltiaia, y tonalpan catca in Vitzilopuchtli, ioan in camax tle, vexotzinca in teouh, inic mjtoa: quj tonaltiaia, cenca quj maviztiliaia, in vncan iteupan icalpuco: inj toca io çan catca tlacatecco, vncan pielo ia inj xiptla, inj xqujch itlatquj, much ixpan qujtequjliaia, qujtoto njaia, qujtlenamaqujliaia qujtlaco tonjliaia, in moteneoa quetzalque mjtl, xiuhtotoquemjtl, tlauhquechol quemjtl, tozquemjtl, vitzilzilquemjtl, auh ca quj to quj lia, qujtzacuja, inaoc mo cenca tlaco ivitl, in iuh quj aztaque mjtl, tzana quemjtl: muchi nononqua quj tecaia, quj tlatlamantilia, quj cue cuentilia, quj vivipana. Et. auh mu chie in tlaco tilmatli ipan quj tecaia, vncan cemjlhujtia: iehoatl injc mjtoa, quj tlatotonjlia in Vitzilopuchtli, ioan vncan tlamanaloia, vncan quj te caia injxqujch ventli; in moteneoa, tlaca tlaqualli: ioan inj xquj ch iectli, in tla chichioalli tlaqualli, in tlato çan oal quj caia; ioan in çan calla, maceoalpa oale oaia, oal quj caia; auh çan achiton ca, in vncan vnmanj, vncan onoc, vn can onmoteca: nj man ic quj quanja, can ic concujtimanj, ic conj qua nj tima nj, in tech povi in calpul veuetque quj moxexelhuja, quj momamaca, queciz quj çan quj inj quanjlia, vntetla mj, iac ix cauj, muchitlacatl itechaci, in vncan tlamaceuhque, in mocexiuh cauhque, inj tech mj totinemj, in quj necaujlia Vitzilopuchtli: auh in Mo tecucoma inj xqujch tlaco xochitl, in nepapan xochitl, in velic, in aviiac vncan quj mana in iollo xochitl, in elo

column3: (41) Moquetza ce tecpatl: in in ce tecpatl, inj quac tlacemjlhujtiltiaia, vncan quj tonaltiaia, y tonalpan catca in Vitzilopuchtli, ioan in camax tle, vexotzinca in teouh, inic mjtoa: quj tonaltiaia, cenca quj maviztiliaia, in vncan iteupan icalpuco: inj toca io çan catca tlacatecco, vncan pielo ia inj xiptla, inj xqujch itlatquj, much ixpan qujtequjliaia, qujtoto njaia, qujtlenamaqujliaia qujtlaco tonjliaia, in moteneoa quetzalque mjtl, xiuhtotoquemjtl, tlauhquechol quemjtl, tozquemjtl, vitzilzilquemjtl, auh ca quj to quj lia, qujtzacuja, inaoc mo cenca tlaco ivitl, in iuh quj aztaque mjtl, tzana quemjtl: muchi nononqua quj tecaia, quj tlatlamantilia, quj cue cuentilia, quj vivipana.
column4: (41) moketsa se tekpatl: in in se tekpatl, inj kuak tlasemjljutiltiaia, vnkan quj tonaltiaia, i tonalpan katka in vitsilopuchtli, ioan in kamax tle, vexotsinka in teou, inik mjtoa quj tonaltiaia, senka quj mavistiliaia, in vnkan iteupan ikalpuko inj toka io san katka tlakatekko, vnkan pielo ia inj xiptla, inj xqujch itlatquj, much ixpan qujtequjliaia, qujtoto njaia, qujtlenamaqujliaia qujtlaco tonjliaia, in moteneoa ketsalke mjtl, xiutotokemjtl, tlaukechol kemjtl, toskemjtl, vitsilsilkemjtl, au ka quj to quj lia, qujtzacuja, inaok mo senka tlako ivitl, in iu quj astake mjtl, tsana kemjtl: muchi nononkua quj tekaia, quj tlatlamantilia, quj kue kuentilia, quj vivipana.

column3: auh mu chie in tlaco tilmatli ipan quj tecaia, vncan cemjlhujtia: iehoatl injc mjtoa, quj tlatotonjlia in Vitzilopuchtli, ioan vncan tlamanaloia, vncan quj te caia injxqujch ventli; in moteneoa, tlaca tlaqualli: ioan inj xquj ch iectli, in tla chichioalli tlaqualli, in tlato çan oal quj caia; ioan in çan calla, maceoalpa oale oaia, oal quj caia; auh çan achiton ca, in vncan vnmanj, vncan onoc, vn can onmoteca: nj man ic quj quanja, can ic concujtimanj, ic conj qua nj tima nj, in tech povi in calpul veuetque quj moxexelhuja, quj momamaca, queciz quj çan quj inj quanjlia, vntetla mj, iac ix cauj, muchitlacatl itechaci, in vncan tlamaceuhque, in mocexiuh cauhque, inj tech mj totinemj, in quj necaujlia Vitzilopuchtli: auh in Mo tecucoma inj xqujch tlaco xochitl, in nepapan xochitl, in velic, in aviiac vncan quj mana in iollo xochitl, in elo
column4: au mu chie in tlako tilmatli ipan quj tekaia, vnkan semjljutia iejoatl injk mjtoa, quj tlatotonjlia in vitsilopuchtli, ioan vnkan tlamanaloia, vnkan quj te kaia injxqujch ventli; in moteneoa, tlaka tlakuali ioan inj xquj ch iektli, in tla chichioali tlakuali, in tlato san oal quj kaia; ioan in san kala, maseoalpa oale oaia, oal quj kaia; au san achiton ka, in vnkan vnmanj, vnkan onok, vn kan onmoteka nj man ik quj kuanja, kan ik konkujtimanj, ik konj kua nj tima nj, in tech povi in kalpul veuetke quj moxexeljuja, quj momamaka, kesis quj san quj inj kuanjlia, vntetla mj, iak ix cauj, muchitlakatl itechasi, in vnkan tlamaseuke, in mosexiu kauke, inj tech mj totinemj, in quj nekaulia vitsilopuchtli au in mo tekukoma inj xqujch tlako xochitl, in nepapan xochitl, in velik, in aviiak vnkan quj mana in iolo xochitl, in elo

column4: aw mu chie in tlako tilmatli ipan quj tekaia, vnkan semhlhutia iehoatl inhk mhtoa, quj tlatotonhlia in vitsilopuchtli, ioan vnkan tlamanaloia, vnkan quj te kaia injxqujch ventli; in moteneoa, tlaka tlakwali ioan inh xquj ch iektli, in tla chichioali tlakwali, in tlato san oal quj kaia; ioan in san kala, maseoalpa oale oaia, oal quj kaia; aw san achiton ka, in vnkan vnmanj, vnkan onok, vn kan onmoteka nh man ik quj kwanha, kan ik concujtimanj, ik konh kwa nh tima nj, in tech povi in kalpul vewetke quj moxexelhuha, quj momamaka, kesis quj san quj inh kwanhlia, vntetla mj, iak ix cauj, muchitlakatl itechasi, in vnkan tlamasewke, in mosexiw kawke, inh tech mh totinemj, in quj nekaulia vitsilopuchtli aw in mo tekukoma inh xqujch tlako xochitl, in nepapan xochitl, in velik, in aviiak vnkan quj mana in iolo xochitl, in elo

column4: aoh mo chie in tlaco tilmatli ipan qoj tecaia, vncan cemjlhojtia: iehoatl injc mjtoa, qoj tlatotonjlia in Vitzilopochtli, ioan vncan tlamanaloia, vncan qoj te caia injxqojch ventli; in moteneoa, tlaca tlaqoalli: ioan inj xqoj ch iectli, in tla chichioalli tlaqoalli, in tlato çan oal qoj caia; ioan in çan calla, maceoalpa oale oaia, oal qoj caia; aoh çan achiton ca, in vncan vnmanj, vncan onoc, vn can onmoteca: nj man ic qoj qoanja, can ic concojtimanj, ic conj qoa nj tima nj, in tech povi in calpol veoetqoe qoj moxexelhoja, qoj momamaca, qoeciz qoj çan qoj inj qoanjlia, vntetla mj, iac ix caoj, mochitlacatl itechaci, in vncan tlamaceohqoe, in mocexioh caohqoe, inj tech mj totinemj, in qoj necaojlia Vitzilopochtli: aoh in Mo tecocoma inj xqojch tlaco xochitl, in nepapan xochitl, in velic, in aviiac vncan qoj mana in iollo xochitl, in elo

column1: .de fo.47. xochitl, in cacaoaxochitl, in iz qujxo chitl, ioan cacaoacincozcatl; in iz quj can icac, oacalxochitl, in cacalo xochitl, in coztic iiexochitl, auh in xoxo uh quj iiexochitl, in xiloxo chitl; io an in ie ix qujch nepapantlaco xochitl, in tla mantli, in vellalalilli, in tlate cuj cuj lolli, in mj mati, in chimal xochitl, in ololiuhquj, in momoiaoa, in xexeli vi: auh in cacan tlatla necutli, iuh quj ntlaujiaxtoc, tlaueuelixtoc, tla auj iax timanj, tlaueuelixtimanj, inj teupan: auh injc qujtlatiaia iietl, can cecem mecatl çan iuh cuj tlalpitiuh in quj tlatiaia, contenteuj ixpan, iuh quj npuehtleoatoc, aiavitl mantoc, aia vitl qujztoc, iuh qujn momomolocatoc. No ioan mjtoa: inj pan in tonalli ce tecpatl, cenca vncan tlatemachiaia in tlachicque, vncan quj tlapanaia in in meuh, ic qujtemachiaia injc cenca meiaz, ontlaiez in meuh: auh injc tla uenchioaia, inj teupan Vitzilopuchtli: vmpa conmanaia inj moc, in iancuj can tlachictli, in moteneoa vitztli, aca tecomac, contecatimanj: vncan ipan icaca cepiaztli: auh in aqujn vm pa vntlatlapaloaia, in ic chicaoaque, in moteneoa quaveuetque: in ie in nemac tlaoanaliztli, iehoan conja, ic conjti manj in piaztli: auh in aqujn ipan tla catia, y, ce tecpal quj toaia, oquj chtiz tiacauhtiz, maujztiz, mocujltonoz: no iuh quj in tlacioatl, maceoale iez, ne maque, ilhujle, vel itla in ailiz, on iez in qujquaz, in qujz, vnca quj quanj iez, mo cuj ltonoz, motlacamatiz, ioan o qujch nacaio, chicaoac, oquj chtlamatiz, mo quj chpoaz, o quj cheoaz, teo quj chtla machti iez; ioan muchinemac vellatoz, motlatolimatiz, vel tenonotzaz, vella toltecpanaz, y ieieian, icacatian, in quj tlaliz tlatolli, vel ixe, iollo, mozca lianj iez. Et. A uh in vme quj avitl, ioan si xochitl, nauj cipactli, ma cujlli ecatl, chiquacen calli, chico me cuetzpalin, chicuci coatl, chicu navi mj quj ztli, matlactli macatl, ma tlaetloce tochtli, matlactli omome atl, matlactlomej itz cujntli: in jxquj chin, can mochiuhquj inj tlatollo omjto: ca muchumpa itztiuh, çan much vmpa tlachia, çan much vmpa tlaujca, ca ie centetl, çan centettitiuh inj tlatlatollo, inj toloca, in iuh tecpantiuh, in vncan tlacecemjlhujtiltitiuj, cecenteme to naltin, inj nieieian ic tecpantiuj ince, in vme, in ei; ixquj chica, inj conaci tiuh, injc ontlatlantiuh tonaltzontli matlatlactlomeci.(42) I njc cempoalli vmome ca pitulo, itechpa tlatoa, injc ma tlactetl oce machiotl, inj toca ce ocomatli: io an inj tonallo, qujl mach inaqujque vncan tlacatia

column4: no ioan mjtoa inj pan in tonali se tekpatl, senka vnkan tlatemachiaia in tlachikke, vnkan quj tlapanaia in in meu, ik qujtemachiaia injk senka meias, ontlaies in meu: au injk tla uenchioaia, inj teupan vitsilopuchtli vmpa konmanaia inj mok, in iankuj kan tlachiktli, in moteneoa vitstli, aka tekomak, kontekatimanj: vnkan ipan ikaka sepiastli au in aqujn vm pa vntlatlapaloaia, in ik chikaoake, in moteneoa kuaveuetke in ie in nemak tlaoanalistli, iejoan konja, ik konjti manj in piastli au in aqujn ipan tla katia, i, se tekpal quj toaia, oquj chtis tiakautis, maustis, mokujltonos: no iu quj in tlasioatl, maseoale ies, ne make, iljule, vel itla in ailis, on ies in qujquaz, in qujz, vnka quj kuanj ies, mo kuj ltonos, motlakamatis, ioan o qujch nakaio, chikaoak, oquj chtlamatis, mo quj chpoas, o quj cheoas, teo quj chtla machti ies; ioan muchinemak velatos, motlatolimatis, vel tenonotsas, vela toltekpanas, i ieieian, ikakatian, in quj tlalis tlatoli, vel ixe, iolo, moska lianj ies.

column3: A uh in vme quj avitl, ioan si xochitl, nauj cipactli, ma cujlli ecatl, chiquacen calli, chico me cuetzpalin, chicuci coatl, chicu navi mj quj ztli, matlactli macatl, ma tlaetloce tochtli, matlactli omome atl, matlactlomej itz cujntli: in jxquj chin, can mochiuhquj inj tlatollo omjto: ca muchumpa itztiuh, çan much vmpa tlachia, çan much vmpa tlaujca, ca ie centetl, çan centettitiuh inj tlatlatollo, inj toloca, in iuh tecpantiuh, in vncan tlacecemjlhujtiltitiuj, cecenteme to naltin, inj nieieian ic tecpantiuj ince, in vme, in ei; ixquj chica, inj conaci tiuh, injc ontlatlantiuh tonaltzontli matlatlactlomeci.
column4: a u in vme quj avitl, ioan si xochitl, nauj sipaktli, ma kujli ekatl, chikuasen kali, chiko me kuetspalin, chikusi koatl, chicu navi mj quj stli, matlaktli makatl, ma tlaetlose tochtli, matlaktli omome atl, matlaktlomej its kujntli in jxquj chin, kan mochiukj inj tlatolo omjto ka muchumpa itstiu, san much vmpa tlachia, san much vmpa tlauka, ka ie sentetl, san sentettitiu inj tlatlatolo, inj toloka, in iu tekpantiu, in vnkan tlacecemjlhujtiltitiuj, sesenteme to naltin, inj nieieian ik tecpantiuj inse, in vme, in ei; ixquj chika, inj konasi tiu, injk ontlatlantiu tonaltsontli matlatlaktlomesi.

column1: .de fo.48. qualli iiollo catca, teicnjoan, tlacotlalonj, papaqujnj, quj mocujtlaviaia in cuj catl, ioan in occequj toltecaiotl: auh qujl inj quac oaltemoia, in aqujque cioateteu in tlalticpac: auh qujl in aqujque qujnnamjquja, in vtlica, in anoço caltzala qujtla ueliaia, cocoliztli itech qujtlalia: auh ipampa inj pan in tonalli catca, aiac vel quj caia: auh in aqujn iquac mococoaia, cannj man qujxnaoatiaia in titici.(43) Moquetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, quj qualittaia: auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzaquaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizque, quj mjtlacozque; acoaca tennecujliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viujio caz, iollo tlauelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz. Et. auh in tlaaca ipan opeuh mococoa, quj te ilhujaia in titici, catlanauiz, aocmo quj caz, caomotenamjcti, ipan oqujz que in cioapipilti, cain temoian, ime coian in opeuh, caoeleujloc: auh no ioan mjtoa, in tlaaca qualli y illo, in qualli itonal, io an qualli itlachieliz: vncan qujtlacalhuj aia, quj toaia: cacan oqueleujque, oqujn monamjcti in cioapipilti. A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, ie quj qualittaia, qujtoaia: in tlao quj chtli ipan otla cat, canioteaaujltiliz, motececemel tiliz, vncan tlaelittoz, muchi tlacatl ic nj uh iez, io an aco cuj canj, mj toti anj, anoço tlacujlo, itla ic totoltecatiz: ipampa ca nj man iuh quj, inj tonal ce ocomatli, iuh quj toa: çan ie much iuh quj, injz quj tetl ocomatli in ie mjieccan omjto, in quen amj inne mac, ipan tlacati. A uh in vme malinalli: nj man amo qualli, quj toa tequanj; in aq ujn vnca tlacati, cenca vel mopilhoatia, iuh quj ntetl icaque, iuh qujn mj chaiatza ipilhoan, can ie amo ce moquetza, çan much vn mj ctiuj. Et. (in iuh omj to). A uh in ei acatl, ioan nauj ocelutl, ma cujlli quauhtli, chi quacen coz caquauh tli, chicome olin, chicuei tecpatl, chi cunavi quj aujtl, matlactli suchitl, matlactloce cipactli, matlactlomome hecatl, matlactli vmei calli; injxqujch in cencalpan tonalli, caniemuchiuh quj

column3: qualli iiollo catca, teicnjoan, tlacotlalonj, papaqujnj, quj mocujtlaviaia in cuj catl, ioan in occequj toltecaiotl: auh qujl inj quac oaltemoia, in aqujque cioateteu in tlalticpac: auh qujl in aqujque qujnnamjquja, in vtlica, in anoço caltzala qujtla ueliaia, cocoliztli itech qujtlalia: auh ipampa inj pan in tonalli catca, aiac vel quj caia: auh in aqujn iquac mococoaia, cannj man qujxnaoatiaia in titici.
column4: qoalli iiollo catca, teicnjoan, tlacotlalonj, papaqojnj, qoj mocojtlaviaia in coj catl, ioan in occeqoj toltecaiotl: aoh qojl inj qoac oaltemoia, in aqojqoe cioateteo in tlalticpac: aoh qojl in aqojqoe qojnnamjqoja, in vtlica, in anoço caltzala qojtla oeliaia, cocoliztli itech qojtlalia: aoh ipampa inj pan in tonalli catca, aiac vel qoj caia: aoh in aqojn iqoac mococoaia, cannj man qojxnaoatiaia in titici.

column3: (43) Moquetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, quj qualittaia: auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzaquaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizque, quj mjtlacozque; acoaca tennecujliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viujio caz, iollo tlauelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz.
column4: (43) moketsa se okomatli inin okomatli, quj kualittaia au ioan qujtoa, no vnkan temo aia in chiel pan, imasia, in moteneoaia sioa pipilti, sioa teteu; senka vnka qujn tlamaukaittiliaia in tepiljoan, ka quj ntsatsakuaia kalitik; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ka, injk amo motenamjktiske, quj mjtlakoske; akoaka tennekujlivis, tempatsivis, ixnekujlius, ixvitsali vis, itenpapatlakas, iten viujio kas, iolo tlauelilotis, itech quj neoas, ten kualakkjkas, matsikolius, makopi chaus, ik xi quj uj lanas.

column3: (43) Moquetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, quj qualittaia: auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzaquaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizque, quj mjtlacozque; acoaca tennecujliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viujio caz, iollo tlauelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz.
column4: (43) moketsa se okomatli inin okomatli, quj kwalittaia aw ioan qujtoa, no vnkan temo aia in chiel pan, imasia, in moteneoaia sioa pipilti, sioa teteu; senka vnka qujn tlamawkaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ka quj ntsatsakwaia kalitik; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ka, inhk amo motenamhktiske, quj mhtlakoske; akoaka tennekuhlivis, tempatsivis, ixnekuhlius, ixvitsali vis, itenpapatlakas, iten viuhio kas, iolo tlawelilotis, itech quj neoas, ten kwalakkhkas, matsikolius, makopi chaus, ik xi quj uj lanas.

column3: (43) Moquetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, quj qualittaia: auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzaquaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizque, quj mjtlacozque; acoaca tennecujliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viujio caz, iollo tlauelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz.
column4: (43) moquetza ce ocomatli inin ocomatli, quj cualittaia auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzacuaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, inhc amo motenamhctizque, quj mhtlacozque; acoaca tennecuhliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viuhio caz, iollo tlahuelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz.

column3: (43) Moquetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, quj qualittaia: auh ioan qujtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteu; cenca vnca qujn tlamauhcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca quj ntzatzaquaia calitic; amo quj monqujxtitlanja, in qujaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizque, quj mjtlacozque; acoaca tennecujliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecujliujz, ixvitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viujio caz, iollo tlauelilotiz, itech quj neoaz, ten qualacqujcaz, matzicoliujz, macopi chaujz, ic xi quj uj lanaz.
column4: (43) Moqoetza ce ocomatli: inin ocomatli, qoj qoalittaia: aoh ioan qojtoa, no vncan temo aia in chiel pan, imacia, in moteneoaia cioa pipilti, cioa teteo; cenca vnca qojn tlamaohcaittiliaia in tepilhoan, ca qoj ntzatzaqoaia calitic; amo qoj monqojxtitlanja, in qojaoac, in vtli ca, injc amo motenamjctizqoe, qoj mjtlacozqoe; acoaca tennecojliviz, tempatziviz, ixnecojliojz, ixiitzali viz, itenpapatlacaz, iten viojio caz, iollo tlaoelilotiz, itech qoj neoaz, ten qoalacqojcaz, matzicoliojz, macopi chaojz, ic xi qoj oj lanaz.

column3: auh in tlaaca ipan opeuh mococoa, quj te ilhujaia in titici, catlanauiz, aocmo quj caz, caomotenamjcti, ipan oqujz que in cioapipilti, cain temoian, ime coian in opeuh, caoeleujloc: auh no ioan mjtoa, in tlaaca qualli y illo, in qualli itonal, io an qualli itlachieliz: vncan qujtlacalhuj aia, quj toaia: cacan oqueleujque, oqujn monamjcti in cioapipilti.
column4: au in tlaaka ipan opeu mokokoa, quj te iljujaia in titisi, katlanauis, aokmo quj kas, kaomotenamjkti, ipan oqujz ke in sioapipilti, kain temoian, ime koian in opeu, kaoeleulok: au no ioan mjtoa, in tlaaka kuali i ilo, in kuali itonal, io an kuali itlachielis: vnkan qujtlacalhuj aia, quj toaia kakan okeleuke, oqujn monamjkti in sioapipilti.

column3: A uh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, ie quj qualittaia, qujtoaia: in tlao quj chtli ipan otla cat, canioteaaujltiliz, motececemel tiliz, vncan tlaelittoz, muchi tlacatl ic nj uh iez, io an aco cuj canj, mj toti anj, anoço tlacujlo, itla ic totoltecatiz: ipampa ca nj man iuh quj, inj tonal ce ocomatli, iuh quj toa: çan ie much iuh quj, injz quj tetl ocomatli in ie mjieccan omjto, in quen amj inne mac, ipan tlacati.
column4: a u in aqujn ipan tlakatia, ie quj kualittaia, qujtoaia: in tlao quj chtli ipan otla kat, kanioteaaultilis, motesesemel tilis, vnkan tlaelittos, muchi tlakatl ik nj u ies, io an ako kuj kanj, mj toti anj, anoso tlakujlo, itla ik totoltekatis: ipampa ka nj man iu quj, inj tonal se okomatli, iu quj toa san ie much iu quj, injs quj tetl okomatli in ie mjiekkan omjto, in ken amj inne mak, ipan tlakati.

column3: A uh in vme malinalli: nj man amo qualli, quj toa tequanj; in aq ujn vnca tlacati, cenca vel mopilhoatia, iuh quj ntetl icaque, iuh qujn mj chaiatza ipilhoan, can ie amo ce moquetza, çan much vn mj ctiuj.
column4: a u in vme malinali nj man amo kuali, quj toa tekuanj; in aq un vnka tlakati, senka vel mopiljoatia, iu quj ntetl ikake, iu qujn mj chaiatsa ipiljoan, kan ie amo se moketsa, san much vn mj ctiuj.

column1: .de fo.49. inj toloca in occequj omoteneuh, can ie ic motztiuh, in iuh tecpantiuj, in iuh caca imj toloca, vncan in ie ian in moteneoa qualli, io an amo qualli.(44) I njc cempoalli vmei ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl omvme machiotl, injtoca ce cuetzpalli: qujl in aquj que vncan tlacatia, iuh quj ntlatlaloapopul catca, cen ca chicaoac catca i njn nacaio, inieel: injc nauhtetl calli, ioa injc macujltetl, io an injc chi quacentetl, qujl amo qualli catca: auh injc vntetl, ioan in ic chicuetetl, quj lmach catla nepantla qujca.(45) Moquetza ce cuetzpalli: in in quj qualittaia, quj toaia: in aquj ipantlacatia, cenca chicaoac, chi caoacanacaio aic cenca mococoa: auh intlacana oalhuetzi aquen con mati, meuh tiuetzi, popoxiuhteoa: ic ipan qujuelittaia, in iuh quj ito nal cuetzpalli, in tlacana tepantic pac oalmomaiauj, oalcapantiue tzi, tlalli quj pototztiuetzi, a quen co mati, iciuhca motlaloa, occeppa te pantli que caujti qujca, quj matoca ti qujca; vncan oqujz in tlatolli icne aio, iniquac acame o moqualanj que, aco ie momj ctiz nequj, quj molhuja: nocne ompaontlalli ic nj mjtz uj tequjz, tlalli tiqujtototztiuetziz, timo cuetzpal tempictiuetziz. No ioan vellachictic inj nacaio, pipin quj, tepitztic, chica oac, chicactic, qujlhuja tlatlalhoa, tlapaliuj, tlapaltic, pupuxtli, io an vel motlaiecoltia, ieel, acan centetl in quj mocujtlauja, inj pan mjxpoa, velnoviiampa mocuecuepa in tlein ic motlacamatia, mj iec in quj monanauh tia, in catleoatl vel onmochioaz, anez tica, amachiztli inj cneci itech mo nequj. A uh in vme coatl; io an ei mj qujztli, inic tecpantiuh, navi ma catl, macujlli tochtli, chiquacen atl, chicume itz cuj ntli, chi cuei o comatli, chicunavi malinalli, matlactli acatl, matlactloce ocelutl, matlactli vmome quauhtli, matlactlomei cozcaquauhtli; injxqujch in, inj contlatlantiuh vme ey; çan centetl inj toloca, in vncan izquj tetl qualtitiuh, io an aqualtitiuh to nalli, in oqujz in cencalli tonalli.

column3: (44) I njc cempoalli vmei ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl omvme machiotl, injtoca ce cuetzpalli: qujl in aquj que vncan tlacatia, iuh quj ntlatlaloapopul catca, cen ca chicaoac catca i njn nacaio, inieel: injc nauhtetl calli, ioa injc macujltetl, io an injc chi quacentetl, qujl amo qualli catca: auh injc vntetl, ioan in ic chicuetetl, quj lmach catla nepantla qujca.
column4: (44) i njk sempoali vmei ka pitulo itechpa tlatoa, injk matlaktetl omvme machiotl, injtoka se kuetspali qujl in aquj ke vnkan tlakatia, iu quj ntlatlaloapopul katka, sen ka chikaoak katka i njn nakaio, inieel: injk nautetl kali, ioa injk makujltetl, io an injk chi kuasentetl, qujl amo kuali katka au injk vntetl, ioan in ik chikuetetl, quj lmach katla nepantla qujca.

column3: (44) I njc cempoalli vmei ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl omvme machiotl, injtoca ce cuetzpalli: qujl in aquj que vncan tlacatia, iuh quj ntlatlaloapopul catca, cen ca chicaoac catca i njn nacaio, inieel: injc nauhtetl calli, ioa injc macujltetl, io an injc chi quacentetl, qujl amo qualli catca: auh injc vntetl, ioan in ic chicuetetl, quj lmach catla nepantla qujca.

column3: (44) I njc cempoalli vmei ca pitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl omvme machiotl, injtoca ce cuetzpalli: qujl in aquj que vncan tlacatia, iuh quj ntlatlaloapopul catca, cen ca chicaoac catca i njn nacaio, inieel: injc nauhtetl calli, ioa injc macujltetl, io an injc chi quacentetl, qujl amo qualli catca: auh injc vntetl, ioan in ic chicuetetl, quj lmach catla nepantla qujca.
column4: (44) I njc cempoalli vmei ca pitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl omvme machiotl, injtoca ce coetzpalli: qojl in aqoj qoe vncan tlacatia, ioh qoj ntlatlaloapopol catca, cen ca chicaoac catca i njn nacaio, inieel: injc naohtetl calli, ioa injc macojltetl, io an injc chi qoacentetl, qojl amo qoalli catca: aoh injc vntetl, ioan in ic chicoetetl, qoj lmach catla nepantla qojca.

column3: (45) Moquetza ce cuetzpalli: in in quj qualittaia, quj toaia: in aquj ipantlacatia, cenca chicaoac, chi caoacanacaio aic cenca mococoa: auh intlacana oalhuetzi aquen con mati, meuh tiuetzi, popoxiuhteoa: ic ipan qujuelittaia, in iuh quj ito nal cuetzpalli, in tlacana tepantic pac oalmomaiauj, oalcapantiue tzi, tlalli quj pototztiuetzi, a quen co mati, iciuhca motlaloa, occeppa te pantli que caujti qujca, quj matoca ti qujca; vncan oqujz in tlatolli icne aio, iniquac acame o moqualanj que, aco ie momj ctiz nequj, quj molhuja: nocne ompaontlalli ic nj mjtz uj tequjz, tlalli tiqujtototztiuetziz, timo cuetzpal tempictiuetziz.
column4: (45) moketsa se kuetspali in in quj kualittaia, quj toaia in aquj ipantlakatia, senka chikaoak, chi kaoakanakaio aik senka mokokoa au intlakana oaluetsi aken kon mati, meu tiuetsi, popoxiuteoa ik ipan qujuelittaia, in iu quj ito nal kuetspali, in tlakana tepantik pak oalmomaiauj, oalkapantiue tsi, tlali quj pototstiuetsi, a ken ko mati, isiuka motlaloa, okseppa te pantli ke kauti qujca, quj matoka ti qujca; vnkan oqujz in tlatoli ikne aio, inikuak akame o mokualanj ke, ako ie momj ktis nequj, quj moljuja nokne ompaontlali ik nj mjts uj tequjz, tlali tiqujtototztiuetziz, timo kuetspal tempiktiuetsis.

column3: (45) Moquetza ce cuetzpalli: in in quj qualittaia, quj toaia: in aquj ipantlacatia, cenca chicaoac, chi caoacanacaio aic cenca mococoa: auh intlacana oalhuetzi aquen con mati, meuh tiuetzi, popoxiuhteoa: ic ipan qujuelittaia, in iuh quj ito nal cuetzpalli, in tlacana tepantic pac oalmomaiauj, oalcapantiue tzi, tlalli quj pototztiuetzi, a quen co mati, iciuhca motlaloa, occeppa te pantli que caujti qujca, quj matoca ti qujca; vncan oqujz in tlatolli icne aio, iniquac acame o moqualanj que, aco ie momj ctiz nequj, quj molhuja: nocne ompaontlalli ic nj mjtz uj tequjz, tlalli tiqujtototztiuetziz, timo cuetzpal tempictiuetziz.

column1: .de fo. ca ce olin, auh quj lmach in a quj que vncan tlacatia: intla tlamaceoaia, io an in tlauel iz calti loia: qujl qualli ipan mu chio aia: auh in amo tlamace oaia, qujl netolinjliztli inpan muchioaia. (46) Niman o almoquetza in ce olin: injn qujtoaia, çan chico qualli in aqujn vncan tlacati, in o quj chtli, in cioatl in vellamaceoa, in vel mo notza, in uel mooapaoa, iehoatl quj caia, qujttaia inj maceoal, inj nemac: auh in tlacamo vel monotza, intlaca mo uel mozcalti; canj cuepca in quj mo na mj ctiaia icnoiotl, itecheoatinemj, can nentlacatl, acan petzitl, çan quauh tlamelaoa, a anemj, ca iuh onioa, acan ixtona. Et. A uh in vme tecpatl, ioan ei quj aujtl, navi suchitl, macujlli cipactli, chiquacen hecatl, chicome calli, chi cuei cuetzpali, chiconauj coatl, ma tlactli mj qujztli, matlactloce macatl, matlactlomome tochtli: io an injc tla tica matlactlo mej atl, qujneen vnpa qualtiaia, ic quj qualittaia in tonal tzontli; in iuh mj ieccan omjto: y n on tlanjn cencalpan tonalli.(47) I njc cempoalli on macujlli capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc matlactetl onnavi, machiotl, inj toca ce itz cujntli: in in qujl mach qualli tonalli, io an qujl itonal catca, in xiuhtecutli: in qujtoaia Tlalxietentica, cenca veiilhujtl quj chioaia: io an y pan motlatoca altiaia in tlato que. column3: (48) Niman oalmoquetza injtoca, ce itz cujntli: injn qujtoaia qualli to nalli, vncan qujtonaltiaia in tletl, inj toca Xiuh tecutli: qujtlaliaia yxip tla in vmpa iteupan: vncan qujtla manjliaia, ipan tlacotona, copalte ma, quj chichioa, quj cecen caoa, injx qujch amatlatqujtl, in mac iecauja in moteneo aia amatecque, amatla matque, quj viiotiaia, quj vitzetzeloa, qujnepapaniviiotia, tlacoiujtica quj nepapanivitzetzeloa: ioan quj chachal chiuhiotia, qujto caiotia nextl aoalli, itlaqual in tlalxictentica, muchixpan qujtlatiaia: auh in noviian ce cencal pan, in netlacamachoia, in necujlto noloia, in puchtlan, in amantlan: cen ca quj veichioaia injc qujmaviztiliaia, tlatlaqualoia, aatlioaia, netlacama cho, neco anotzalo, ocuc caioac, cenca
column4: (48) Niman oalmoqoetza injtoca, ce itz cojntli: injn qojtoaia qoalli to nalli, vncan qojtonaltiaia in tletl, inj toca Xioh tecotli: qojtlaliaia yxip tla in vmpa iteopan: vncan qojtla manjliaia, ipan tlacotona, copalte ma, qoj chichioa, qoj cecen caoa, injx qojch amatlatqojtl, in mac iecaoja in moteneo aia amatecqoe, amatla matqoe, qoj viiotiaia, qoj iitzetzeloa, qojnepapaniviiotia, tlacoiojtica qoj nepapaniiitzetzeloa: ioan qoj chachal chiohiotia, qojto caiotia nextl aoalli, itlaqoal in tlalxictentica, mochixpan qojtlatiaia: aoh in noviian ce cencal pan, in netlacamachoia, in necojlto noloia, in pochtlan, in amantlan: cen ca qoj veichioaia injc qojmaviztiliaia, tlatlaqoaloia, aatlioaia, netlacama cho, neco anotzalo, ococ caioac, cenca

column1: .de fo.51. octlaujzcalpan in quj tlatiaia amatl, in mjtoa ic quj tlamaca tletl, quj vi catiuh, quj tocatiuh in copalli, cecen petlacalli, ovnpetlacalli in contepeoa tleco, chipaoac, iztac copalli: ioan quj n cotona co coltin, iuh qujn tlecujlix quac tlapatlaca, tlapapatlaca, ieco nema maiaooa, tlalli ic neujujteco tlecujlix quac quj tzitzi cujtza, quj no no quj a inj mezco: io an no achto tlecujlixquac quj totoiaoa in vctli; auh catepan tle cujl nacazco nauh campa ixti quj to toiaoa: auh in çan maceoaltzintli, in motolinja, çan copalxalli in tleco quj tema: auh incaiequene qujtzacuja, in molhuj ic notlacatl, tequj ic notlacatl, in a avia, in auellamati; çan ie inj auh tli tleco quj tepeoa, ic quj tlamaca inj x coian itleuh; ioan mjtoa in tlatoque vncan motecutlaliaia motlato catla liaia, inj pan in ce itzcujntli: auh ipan motequaltiaia, motecpacaia, motlato capacaia, in nauh acatl, iquac noviian oalhuja, in altepetl ipan tlatoque, co anotzalo, ic machitilo in ian cujcan tla toanj omotlali, mjiec injc oalhuj, injn tetlapaloaia, injntetlapalol quj oal cuj, qujoalitquj in ma cuextli, in til matli, in suchitl, inj etl, in caco tle in imamaujzco, y ximachoca imaltepeuh, in campa, in quexqujchca oaleoa, quj tlamamaca, quj tlatequjlia in tlatoanj, io an, quj tlapaloa, quj tlatlauhtia: oal motlalia injntechiuh caoan, in te cu tlatoque, in vellatoa, in tlatol mati, quj tlacuepilia, quj ntlananqujlilia: auh çan no iuj in chioalo, in namjco, can ic mocuepa injn netlacotlaliz, injc inotlaneuj, injc mj ximati, injc mo malcochoa, injc mocoachioa, quj mo mamaca in xuchitl, inj etl, in atl, in tlaqualli, in tlaqualtectli; auh in til matli çan quj quj mj liuh tiuh, çan quj quj mj lietiuh, çan quj mjltica in quj momaca, in, in quj mo tlauhtia, quj iaia cana intlaco tilmatli, in tetech tilmatli, in vel in tonal icalitic ochi oaloc, otlatlan, iquac impan qujn pepena, in pan quj nuelitta, quj ntla tlattilia, quj mjipantia, quj npapan tia, qujnpapanjtia, in quenamj qujn macazque altepetl ipan tlatoque: injc nononqua qujn maujztilia, quj nve capano, in tetlauj calhoan tlaliuj, tla tlaliuj, tlatlalhujtiuj, tlatlaliooa, in tlamamalo, in tlatlatqujoa, quaqua ilpitiuh in netlauhtilli; auh in netla caujlli, atletlacotli, atlatlacotli, tlacuj tlaputz mamalo, cuj cuj tlalpitiuh injn tlaceujl, quj mjtqujlia tlatoque, in omopieco, io an in cequjn çan ote nepieltico.(49) I njc cempoalli on chiqua cen capitulo: vncan motene oa, in quenjn ie hoantin tlato

column3: octlaujzcalpan in quj tlatiaia amatl, in mjtoa ic quj tlamaca tletl, quj vi catiuh, quj tocatiuh in copalli, cecen petlacalli, ovnpetlacalli in contepeoa tleco, chipaoac, iztac copalli: ioan quj n cotona co coltin, iuh qujn tlecujlix quac tlapatlaca, tlapapatlaca, ieco nema maiaooa, tlalli ic neujujteco tlecujlix quac quj tzitzi cujtza, quj no no quj a inj mezco: io an no achto tlecujlixquac quj totoiaoa in vctli; auh catepan tle cujl nacazco nauh campa ixti quj to toiaoa: auh in çan maceoaltzintli, in motolinja, çan copalxalli in tleco quj tema: auh incaiequene qujtzacuja, in molhuj ic notlacatl, tequj ic notlacatl, in a avia, in auellamati; çan ie inj auh tli tleco quj tepeoa, ic quj tlamaca inj x coian itleuh; ioan mjtoa in tlatoque vncan motecutlaliaia motlato catla liaia, inj pan in ce itzcujntli: auh ipan motequaltiaia, motecpacaia, motlato capacaia, in nauh acatl, iquac noviian oalhuja, in altepetl ipan tlatoque, co anotzalo, ic machitilo in ian cujcan tla toanj omotlali, mjiec injc oalhuj, injn tetlapaloaia, injntetlapalol quj oal cuj, qujoalitquj in ma cuextli, in til matli, in suchitl, inj etl, in caco tle in imamaujzco, y ximachoca imaltepeuh, in campa, in quexqujchca oaleoa, quj tlamamaca, quj tlatequjlia in tlatoanj, io an, quj tlapaloa, quj tlatlauhtia: oal motlalia injntechiuh caoan, in te cu tlatoque, in vellatoa, in tlatol mati, quj tlacuepilia, quj ntlananqujlilia: auh çan no iuj in chioalo, in namjco, can ic mocuepa injn netlacotlaliz, injc inotlaneuj, injc mj ximati, injc mo malcochoa, injc mocoachioa, quj mo mamaca in xuchitl, inj etl, in atl, in tlaqualli, in tlaqualtectli; auh in til matli çan quj quj mj liuh tiuh, çan quj quj mj lietiuh, çan quj mjltica in quj momaca, in, in quj mo tlauhtia, quj iaia cana intlaco tilmatli, in tetech tilmatli, in vel in tonal icalitic ochi oaloc, otlatlan, iquac impan qujn pepena, in pan quj nuelitta, quj ntla tlattilia, quj mjipantia, quj npapan tia, qujnpapanjtia, in quenamj qujn macazque altepetl ipan tlatoque: injc nononqua qujn maujztilia, quj nve capano, in tetlauj calhoan tlaliuj, tla tlaliuj, tlatlalhujtiuj, tlatlaliooa, in tlamamalo, in tlatlatqujoa, quaqua ilpitiuh in netlauhtilli; auh in netla caujlli, atletlacotli, atlatlacotli, tlacuj tlaputz mamalo, cuj cuj tlalpitiuh injn tlaceujl, quj mjtqujlia tlatoque, in omopieco, io an in cequjn çan ote nepieltico.
column4: oktlauskalpan in quj tlatiaia amatl, in mjtoa ik quj tlamaka tletl, quj vi katiu, quj tokatiu in kopali, sesen petlakali, ovnpetlakali in kontepeoa tleko, chipaoak, istak kopali ioan quj n kotona ko koltin, iu qujn tlekujlix kuak tlapatlaka, tlapapatlaka, ieko nema maiaooa, tlali ik neujujteco tlekujlix kuak quj tsitsi kujtsa, quj no no quj a inj mesko io an no achto tlekujlixkuak quj totoiaoa in vktli; au katepan tle kujl nakasko nau kampa ixti quj to toiaoa au in san maseoaltsintli, in motolinja, san kopalxali in tleko quj tema au inkaiekene qujtzacuja, in molhuj ik notlakatl, tequj ik notlakatl, in a avia, in auelamati; san ie inj au tli tleko quj tepeoa, ik quj tlamaka inj x koian itleu; ioan mjtoa in tlatoke vnkan motekutlaliaia motlato katla liaia, inj pan in se itskujntli au ipan motekualtiaia, motekpakaia, motlato kapakaia, in nau akatl, ikuak noviian oaljuja, in altepetl ipan tlatoke, ko anotsalo, ik machitilo in ian kujkan tla toanj omotlali, mjiek injk oalhuj, injn tetlapaloaia, injntetlapalol quj oal kuj, qujoalitquj in ma kuextli, in til matli, in suchitl, inj etl, in kako tle in imamausko, i ximachoka imaltepeu, in kampa, in quexqujchca oaleoa, quj tlamamaka, quj tlatequjlia in tlatoanj, io an, quj tlapaloa, quj tlatlautia oal motlalia injntechiu kaoan, in te cu tlatoke, in velatoa, in tlatol mati, quj tlakuepilia, quj ntlananqujlilia: au san no iuj in chioalo, in namjko, kan ik mokuepa injn netlakotlalis, injk inotlaneuj, injk mj ximati, injk mo malkochoa, injk mokoachioa, quj mo mamaka in xuchitl, inj etl, in atl, in tlakuali, in tlakualtektli; au in til matli san quj quj mj liu tiu, san quj quj mj lietiu, san quj mjltika in quj momaka, in, in quj mo tlautia, quj iaia kana intlako tilmatli, in tetech tilmatli, in vel in tonal ikalitik ochi oalok, otlatlan, ikuak impan qujn pepena, in pan quj nuelitta, quj ntla tlattilia, quj mjipantia, quj npapan tia, qujnpapanjtia, in kenamj qujn makaske altepetl ipan tlatoke injk nononkua qujn maustilia, quj nve kapano, in tetlauj kaljoan tlaliuj, tla tlaliuj, tlatlalhujtiuj, tlatlaliooa, in tlamamalo, in tlatlatqujoa, kuakua ilpitiu in netlautili; au in netla kauli, atletlakotli, atlatlakotli, tlakuj tlaputs mamalo, kuj kuj tlalpitiu injn tlaseul, quj mjtqujlia tlatoke, in omopieko, io an in cequjn san ote nepieltiko.

column3: octlaujzcalpan in quj tlatiaia amatl, in mjtoa ic quj tlamaca tletl, quj vi catiuh, quj tocatiuh in copalli, cecen petlacalli, ovnpetlacalli in contepeoa tleco, chipaoac, iztac copalli: ioan quj n cotona co coltin, iuh qujn tlecujlix quac tlapatlaca, tlapapatlaca, ieco nema maiaooa, tlalli ic neujujteco tlecujlix quac quj tzitzi cujtza, quj no no quj a inj mezco: io an no achto tlecujlixquac quj totoiaoa in vctli; auh catepan tle cujl nacazco nauh campa ixti quj to toiaoa: auh in çan maceoaltzintli, in motolinja, çan copalxalli in tleco quj tema: auh incaiequene qujtzacuja, in molhuj ic notlacatl, tequj ic notlacatl, in a avia, in auellamati; çan ie inj auh tli tleco quj tepeoa, ic quj tlamaca inj x coian itleuh; ioan mjtoa in tlatoque vncan motecutlaliaia motlato catla liaia, inj pan in ce itzcujntli: auh ipan motequaltiaia, motecpacaia, motlato capacaia, in nauh acatl, iquac noviian oalhuja, in altepetl ipan tlatoque, co anotzalo, ic machitilo in ian cujcan tla toanj omotlali, mjiec injc oalhuj, injn tetlapaloaia, injntetlapalol quj oal cuj, qujoalitquj in ma cuextli, in til matli, in suchitl, inj etl, in caco tle in imamaujzco, y ximachoca imaltepeuh, in campa, in quexqujchca oaleoa, quj tlamamaca, quj tlatequjlia in tlatoanj, io an, quj tlapaloa, quj tlatlauhtia: oal motlalia injntechiuh caoan, in te cu tlatoque, in vellatoa, in tlatol mati, quj tlacuepilia, quj ntlananqujlilia: auh çan no iuj in chioalo, in namjco, can ic mocuepa injn netlacotlaliz, injc inotlaneuj, injc mj ximati, injc mo malcochoa, injc mocoachioa, quj mo mamaca in xuchitl, inj etl, in atl, in tlaqualli, in tlaqualtectli; auh in til matli çan quj quj mj liuh tiuh, çan quj quj mj lietiuh, çan quj mjltica in quj momaca, in, in quj mo tlauhtia, quj iaia cana intlaco tilmatli, in tetech tilmatli, in vel in tonal icalitic ochi oaloc, otlatlan, iquac impan qujn pepena, in pan quj nuelitta, quj ntla tlattilia, quj mjipantia, quj npapan tia, qujnpapanjtia, in quenamj qujn macazque altepetl ipan tlatoque: injc nononqua qujn maujztilia, quj nve capano, in tetlauj calhoan tlaliuj, tla tlaliuj, tlatlalhujtiuj, tlatlaliooa, in tlamamalo, in tlatlatqujoa, quaqua ilpitiuh in netlauhtilli; auh in netla caujlli, atletlacotli, atlatlacotli, tlacuj tlaputz mamalo, cuj cuj tlalpitiuh injn tlaceujl, quj mjtqujlia tlatoque, in omopieco, io an in cequjn çan ote nepieltico.
column4: octlaojzcalpan in qoj tlatiaia amatl, in mjtoa ic qoj tlamaca tletl, qoj vi catioh, qoj tocatioh in copalli, cecen petlacalli, ovnpetlacalli in contepeoa tleco, chipaoac, iztac copalli: ioan qoj n cotona co coltin, ioh qojn tlecojlix qoac tlapatlaca, tlapapatlaca, ieco nema mayaooa, tlalli ic neojojteco tlecojlix qoac qoj tzitzi cojtza, qoj no no qoj a inj mezco: io an no achto tlecojlixqoac qoj totoyaoa in vctli; aoh catepan tle cojl nacazco naoh campa ixti qoj to toyaoa: aoh in çan maceoaltzintli, in motolinja, çan copalxalli in tleco qoj tema: aoh incaieqoene qojtzacoja, in molhoj ic notlacatl, teqoj ic notlacatl, in a avia, in aoellamati; çan ie inj aoh tli tleco qoj tepeoa, ic qoj tlamaca inj x coian itleoh; ioan mjtoa in tlatoqoe vncan motecotlaliaia motlato catla liaia, inj pan in ce itzcojntli: aoh ipan moteqoaltiaia, motecpacaia, motlato capacaia, in naoh acatl, iqoac noviian oalhoja, in altepetl ipan tlatoqoe, co anotzalo, ic machitilo in ian cojcan tla toanj omotlali, mjiec injc oalhoj, injn tetlapaloaia, injntetlapalol qoj oal coj, qojoalitqoj in ma coextli, in til matli, in sochitl, inj etl, in caco tle in imamaojzco, y ximachoca imaltepeoh, in campa, in qoexqojchca oaleoa, qoj tlamamaca, qoj tlateqojlia in tlatoanj, io an, qoj tlapaloa, qoj tlatlaohtia: oal motlalia injntechioh caoan, in te co tlatoqoe, in vellatoa, in tlatol mati, qoj tlacoepilia, qoj ntlananqojlilia: aoh çan no ioj in chioalo, in namjco, can ic mocoepa injn netlacotlaliz, injc inotlaneoj, injc mj ximati, injc mo malcochoa, injc mocoachioa, qoj mo mamaca in xochitl, inj etl, in atl, in tlaqoalli, in tlaqoaltectli; aoh in til matli çan qoj qoj mj lioh tioh, çan qoj qoj mj lietioh, çan qoj mjltica in qoj momaca, in, in qoj mo tlaohtia, qoj iaia cana intlaco tilmatli, in tetech tilmatli, in vel in tonal icalitic ochi oaloc, otlatlan, iqoac impan qojn pepena, in pan qoj noelitta, qoj ntla tlattilia, qoj mjipantia, qoj npapan tia, qojnpapanjtia, in qoenamj qojn macazqoe altepetl ipan tlatoqoe: injc nononqoa qojn maojztilia, qoj nve capano, in tetlaoj calhoan tlalioj, tla tlalioj, tlatlalhojtioj, tlatlaliooa, in tlamamalo, in tlatlatqojoa, qoaqoa ilpitioh in netlaohtilli; aoh in netla caojlli, atletlacotli, atlatlacotli, tlacoj tlapotz mamalo, coj coj tlalpitioh injn tlaceojl, qoj mjtqojlia tlatoqoe, in omopieco, io an in ceqojn çan ote nepieltico.

column1: .de fo.52. que (inj pan in tonalli omotencuh) iaotlatoaia, i oan vncan tlatzon te quj liloia in mj qujztli ipan catca.(50) I nj quac ie omotecpac teco anotza liztica: nj man ie no cuele o almotla lia injc iaotlatolo, noic mjtoa icop pa iaoc motecpacaz, in tlato anj, iquac cenca ipan mopepena in tiacaoan, in chicaoaque, ipan netotocholo, nemama lioa, injc quj tlamatilizque, qujpale vizque, injc iehoan uel quj tlamaltiz que, ipampa caqujxtoca, ipan mjx poa, quj mototoqujlia inj auh, inj tla qual, inj tilma, injc ipal nemjzque, ipallaquemjzque, qujn n maujzcotiz, Et. itlauj ce caoan mochioaz que, in mjtoa: injc aquj tlacotla inj ntzontecon, inj melchiqujuh, teca momotla, teujc mopetlatiuj; io an mjtoa noipan tecu tlatoloia injn ce itz cujntli, vncantla tzontequjliloia injn panca mj qujztli: auh iquac quj xtiloia; caoaloia, in amo cenca ovi ic cate, io an qujntla tlacollacaia, in tlatlacoti, in amo cen ca melaoac, in amo uel ixnezquj, in amo cenca uel neztica ictlacoti, ictla na mj quj in aco cantlapictli quj tzaqua, can tlapi quj loque; çan ix popoio tlana mjctiloque, ixpopoiotlanamjcque, aco çan tepan in tlaie coa, aco çan tecujtl in quj tzaqua, injc cuj tiloque in victli, mecapalli, injc victique, mecapalti que, iquac nj man vmpa on ma al tia, in chapultepec, injc quj ncaoa, in tlatlacul: auh in aqujn ipan tlacatia, inj cqujtonal ittaia, quj toaia: mocujl tonoz, ipal iez, quj tlamauj calhujz in totecujo: aco tecoaz, tealtiz, aco quez qujpa cuj cuj caz, teitotiz: uh injc quj tocamacaia, qujn no ipan quj matti uja in naoacatl, iquac quj tlatlaqua liaia, quj xic venquaqualiaia in pi piltotonti: ipampa in vncan motla tocapaca, in netla tocap acaian tlato que, altepeme. No ioan mjtoa: inj pan in ce itzcujntli, inj xqujchtin chi chime, qujnquatlaviaia in itz cuj neque, injtz cuj nnemjtique. A uh in quj to quj lia vme ocomatli, io an ey malinalli, navi acatl, macujlli ocelotl, chiqua cen quauhtli, chicome cozcaquauhtli, chicuei olin, chi cun auj tecpac, ma tlactli quj aujtl, matlactloce suchitl, matlactlomome cipactli, matlactli vmei hecatl, injz quj tetl in cen calpa tonalli, ca ie muchiuhquj inj toloca omoteneuh, injc cecemjlhujpa, tla po altitiuh, in quenamj in nenemac ipan tlacati, ie omomelauh mjieccan vel omonenexti: auh inj quac on qujz in njman ic oalmoquetza.(51) I njc cempoalli on chicome capitulo: vncan moteneoa,

column4: itlaoj ce caoan mochioaz qoe, in mjtoa: injc aqoj tlacotla inj ntzontecon, inj melchiqojoh, teca momotla, teojc mopetlatioj; io an mjtoa noipan teco tlatoloia injn ce itz cojntli, vncantla tzonteqojliloia injn panca mj qojztli: aoh iqoac qoj xtiloia; caoaloia, in amo cenca ovi ic cate, io an qojntla tlacollacaia, in tlatlacoti, in amo cen ca melaoac, in amo oel ixnezqoj, in amo cenca oel neztica ictlacoti, ictla na mj qoj in aco cantlapictli qoj tzaqoa, can tlapi qoj loqoe; çan ix popoio tlana mjctiloqoe, ixpopoiotlanamjcqoe, aco çan tepan in tlaie coa, aco çan tecojtl in qoj tzaqoa, injc coj tiloqoe in victli, mecapalli, injc victiqoe, mecapalti qoe, iqoac nj man vmpa on ma al tia, in chapoltepec, injc qoj ncaoa, in tlatlacol: aoh in aqojn ipan tlacatia, inj cqojtonal ittaia, qoj toaia: mocojl tonoz, ipal iez, qoj tlamaoj calhojz in totecojo: aco tecoaz, tealtiz, aco qoez qojpa coj coj caz, teitotiz: oh injc qoj tocamacaia, qojn no ipan qoj matti oja in naoacatl, iqoac qoj tlatlaqoa liaia, qoj xic venqoaqoaliaia in pi piltotonti: ipampa in vncan motla tocapaca, in netla tocap acaian tlato qoe, altepeme.

column3: A uh in quj to quj lia vme ocomatli, io an ey malinalli, navi acatl, macujlli ocelotl, chiqua cen quauhtli, chicome cozcaquauhtli, chicuei olin, chi cun auj tecpac, ma tlactli quj aujtl, matlactloce suchitl, matlactlomome cipactli, matlactli vmei hecatl, injz quj tetl in cen calpa tonalli, ca ie muchiuhquj inj toloca omoteneuh, injc cecemjlhujpa, tla po altitiuh, in quenamj in nenemac ipan tlacati, ie omomelauh mjieccan vel omonenexti: auh inj quac on qujz in njman ic oalmoquetza.
column4: a u in quj to quj lia vme okomatli, io an ei malinali, navi akatl, makujli oselotl, chikua sen kuautli, chikome koskakuautli, chikuei olin, chi kun auj tekpak, ma tlaktli quj autl, matlaktlose suchitl, matlaktlomome sipaktli, matlaktli vmei jekatl, injs quj tetl in sen kalpa tonali, ka ie muchiukj inj toloka omoteneu, injk sesemjljupa, tla po altitiu, in kenamj in nenemak ipan tlakati, ie omomelau mjiekkan vel omonenexti au inj kuak on qujz in njman ik oalmoketsa.

column1: .de fo.53. injc caxtoltetl machiotl, inj toca ce calli: ioan qujl amo qualli, qujl in vncan tlacatia toqujchti, ichtecque catca, teuh tli tlacolli quj mocujtlaviaia: mochi amo qualli injn pan mo chioaia: auh qujl in cioa cen ca tlatziujnj, cenca cochinj, nj man atle qualli quj chioa.(52) I n ce calli: jnjn ce calli, quj toaia: njman amo qualli tonalli, tlacolli, teuhtli iiolian, ioan no ipan temo ia in omoteneuh que cio ateteo; auh in tlein vncan mochioaioa, ie mjiec can omjto: in iehoan titici, occenca iehoan qujnmaujztiliaia, cecenia ca quj ntlamanjliaia inj nchachan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, cenca qujtla tenmachiliaia, injc ohujcan quj caz, acoiao mj qujz, axioaz, iapanio çan popoliujz, ano co calaqujz, vicoz, aco oaoanaloz, oaoanoz, aco cacalioaz, aco quatlecueponjloz, aco tlepantla xoz, anoço quj matlapatz cazque, que vitequjzque, anoço quj xicanazque, quj xicteteoanazque, anoço çan ca tocanpolozque, catlan papachozque, vncan quj xixilizque, tlatzotzopotz tinemj, anoço çan quj temazque, ioan injc ovican quj caz, aco tetlanximaz, aco tetlan aqujz, aco cueitl, vipilli te pan canaz, aco tetlaqualiz, tetlan quateujz: auh in cioatl imj quj ztevical iez, vmextin quj nquate pipitzinjz que, quj nquatexaxamanjzque, ic tocaiotilo in tetlan xinquj, quatepi tzie, quatexamac: ioan injc o vican qujcaz, aco monamacaz, moquaz, mjz motoloz, motlamjz, acan avia, acan tlacaco tlamati, injc nemj, iichtequj, motlatlacuja, tetlatlatlalochtia, te tlacujcujlia, tetlatlacaltia, tecacal xaputla, te quj quj mj liquanja, çan iuh aviloujti, much quj motequjtia in olli, in patolli, papatoa, o ollama, motlatlanjtoa, tetlatlanjtoa, moxixi coa, texixicoa, texixictlanj, ontetla tlalia, muchi quj tlanjtoa inj chan onoc, muchi patolco, tlachco, qujtlamja, inj ntetzon, inj nnepachol itatzin, inan tzin, muchi quj chteccaqujxtia, in acoc cana itlatzin tlatilo, çan nen quj pi quj, çan nempanca in motlanjtoa, a octle in quj xquetza, aoctle inj tlatla njtol, injc tlanamjctiz, injc vel oviti, aoctepapatla, patolco, tlachco, oviti, chiquati, quj chiquatilia, anoce quj momachtia in ollatolli, patollatolli, ollatole, patollatole: auh amo ivian iectli, amo ivian tecauh, mot quj tica tzotzomatli, tatapatli, acaxe, acome: ioan tecoco, tetolinj, coco liztli qujte

column3: (52) I n ce calli: jnjn ce calli, quj toaia: njman amo qualli tonalli, tlacolli, teuhtli iiolian, ioan no ipan temo ia in omoteneuh que cio ateteo; auh in tlein vncan mochioaioa, ie mjiec can omjto: in iehoan titici, occenca iehoan qujnmaujztiliaia, cecenia ca quj ntlamanjliaia inj nchachan, in aqujn ipan tlacatia, cenca qujtla tenmachiliaia, injc ohujcan quj caz, acoiao mj qujz, axioaz, iapanio çan popoliujz, ano co calaqujz, vicoz, aco oaoanaloz, oaoanoz, aco cacalioaz, aco quatlecueponjloz, aco tlepantla xoz, anoço quj matlapatz cazque, que vitequjzque, anoço quj xicanazque, quj xicteteoanazque, anoço çan ca tocanpolozque, catlan papachozque, vncan quj xixilizque, tlatzotzopotz tinemj, anoço çan quj temazque, ioan injc ovican quj caz, aco tetlanximaz, aco tetlan aqujz, aco cueitl, vipilli te pan canaz, aco tetlaqualiz, tetlan quateujz: auh in cioatl imj quj ztevical iez, vmextin quj nquate pipitzinjz que, quj nquatexaxamanjzque, ic tocaiotilo in tetlan xinquj, quatepi tzie, quatexamac: ioan injc o vican qujcaz, aco monamacaz, moquaz, mjz motoloz, motlamjz, acan avia, acan tlacaco tlamati, injc nemj, iichtequj, motlatlacuja, tetlatlatlalochtia, te tlacujcujlia, tetlatlacaltia, tecacal xaputla, te quj quj mj liquanja, çan iuh aviloujti, much quj motequjtia in olli, in patolli, papatoa, o ollama, motlatlanjtoa, tetlatlanjtoa, moxixi coa, texixicoa, texixictlanj, ontetla tlalia, muchi quj tlanjtoa inj chan onoc, muchi patolco, tlachco, qujtlamja, inj ntetzon, inj nnepachol itatzin, inan tzin, muchi quj chteccaqujxtia, in acoc cana itlatzin tlatilo, çan nen quj pi quj, çan nempanca in motlanjtoa, a octle in quj xquetza, aoctle inj tlatla njtol, injc tlanamjctiz, injc vel oviti, aoctepapatla, patolco, tlachco, oviti, chiquati, quj chiquatilia, anoce quj momachtia in ollatolli, patollatolli, ollatole, patollatole: auh amo ivian iectli, amo ivian tecauh, mot quj tica tzotzomatli, tatapatli, acaxe, acome: ioan tecoco, tetolinj, coco liztli qujte
column4: (52) i n se kali jnjn se kali, quj toaia njman amo kuali tonali, tlakoli, teutli iiolian, ioan no ipan temo ia in omoteneu ke sio ateteo; au in tlein vnkan mochioaioa, ie mjiek kan omjto in iejoan titisi, oksenka iejoan qujnmaujztiliaia, sesenia ka quj ntlamanjliaia inj nchachan, in aqujn ipan tlakatia, senka qujtla tenmachiliaia, injk ojukan quj kas, akoiao mj qujz, axioas, iapanio san popolius, ano ko calaqujz, vikos, ako oaoanalos, oaoanos, ako kakalioas, ako kuatlekueponjlos, ako tlepantla xos, anoso quj matlapats kaske, ke vitequjzque, anoso quj xikanaske, quj xikteteoanaske, anoso san ka tokanpoloske, katlan papachoske, vnkan quj xixiliske, tlatsotsopots tinemj, anoso san quj temaske, ioan injk ovikan quj kas, ako tetlanximas, ako tetlan aqujz, ako kueitl, vipili te pan kanas, ako tetlakualis, tetlan kuateus: au in sioatl imj quj stevikal ies, vmextin quj nkuate pipitsinjs ke, quj nkuatexaxamanjske, ik tokaiotilo in tetlan xinquj, kuatepi tsie, kuatexamak: ioan injk o vikan qujcaz, ako monamakas, mokuas, mjs motolos, motlamjs, akan avia, akan tlakako tlamati, injk nemj, iichtequj, motlatlakuja, tetlatlatlalochtia, te tlakujkujlia, tetlatlakaltia, tekakal xaputla, te quj quj mj likuanja, san iu avilouti, much quj motequjtia in oli, in patoli, papatoa, o olama, motlatlanjtoa, tetlatlanjtoa, moxixi koa, texixikoa, texixiktlanj, ontetla tlalia, muchi quj tlanjtoa inj chan onok, muchi patolko, tlachko, qujtlamja, inj ntetson, inj nnepachol itatsin, inan tsin, muchi quj chteccaqujxtia, in akok kana itlatsin tlatilo, san nen quj pi quj, san nempanka in motlanjtoa, a oktle in quj xketsa, aoktle inj tlatla njtol, injk tlanamjktis, injk vel oviti, aoktepapatla, patolko, tlachko, oviti, chikuati, quj chikuatilia, anose quj momachtia in olatoli, patolatoli, olatole, patolatole au amo ivian iektli, amo ivian tekau, mot quj tika tsotsomatli, tatapatli, akaxe, akome ioan tekoko, tetolinj, koko listli qujte

column4: (52) I n ce calli: jnjn ce calli, qoj toaia: njman amo qoalli tonalli, tlacolli, teohtli iiolian, ioan no ipan temo ia in omoteneoh qoe cio ateteo; aoh in tlein vncan mochioaioa, ie mjiec can omjto: in iehoan titici, occenca iehoan qojnmaojztiliaia, cecenia ca qoj ntlamanjliaia inj nchachan, in aqojn ipan tlacatia, cenca qojtla tenmachiliaia, injc ohojcan qoj caz, acoyao mj qojz, axioaz, iapanio çan popoliojz, ano co calaqojz, vicoz, aco oaoanaloz, oaoanoz, aco cacalioaz, aco qoatlecoeponjloz, aco tlepantla xoz, anoço qoj matlapatz cazqoe, qoe viteqojzqoe, anoço qoj xicanazqoe, qoj xicteteoanazqoe, anoço çan ca tocanpolozqoe, catlan papachozqoe, vncan qoj xixilizqoe, tlatzotzopotz tinemj, anoço çan qoj temazqoe, ioan injc ovican qoj caz, aco tetlanximaz, aco tetlan aqojz, aco coeitl, vipilli te pan canaz, aco tetlaqoaliz, tetlan qoateojz: aoh in cioatl imj qoj ztevical iez, vmextin qoj nqoate pipitzinjz qoe, qoj nqoatexaxamanjzqoe, ic tocaiotilo in tetlan xinqoj, qoatepi tzie, qoatexamac: ioan injc o vican qojcaz, aco monamacaz, moqoaz, mjz motoloz, motlamjz, acan avia, acan tlacaco tlamati, injc nemj, iichteqoj, motlatlacoja, tetlatlatlalochtia, te tlacojcojlia, tetlatlacaltia, tecacal xapotla, te qoj qoj mj liqoanja, çan ioh aviloojti, moch qoj moteqojtia in olli, in patolli, papatoa, o ollama, motlatlanjtoa, tetlatlanjtoa, moxixi coa, texixicoa, texixictlanj, ontetla tlalia, mochi qoj tlanjtoa inj chan onoc, mochi patolco, tlachco, qojtlamja, inj ntetzon, inj nnepachol itatzin, inan tzin, mochi qoj chteccaqojxtia, in acoc cana itlatzin tlatilo, çan nen qoj pi qoj, çan nempanca in motlanjtoa, a octle in qoj xqoetza, aoctle inj tlatla njtol, injc tlanamjctiz, injc vel oiiti, aoctepapatla, patolco, tlachco, oiiti, chiqoati, qoj chiqoatilia, anoce qoj momachtia in ollatolli, patollatolli, ollatole, patollatole: aoh amo ivian iectli, amo ivian tecaoh, mot qoj tica tzotzomatli, tatapatli, acaxe, acome: ioan tecoco, tetolinj, coco liztli qojte

column1: .de fo.54. ittitia, ie temotla: auh in manellamaz iaoc, mjtoa çan ic noiotl in caci, in ma nelte qujo acati, çan ic noiotl ic mapa tinemj, totoneo atinemj, in jiollo, ao neoatinemj, aonmonamj quj, inj tzotzo ma, inj tatapa, iquech tlan cotonti nemj, inj aiacol, quj chi chi qua ilpia, uel ompa on qujz tinemj intlalticpac, anoço cana teumj quiz, tlaaltil mj qujz, altiloz; auh in tlaca noco itla ima ceoaltiz, amo caxcanviz, vellamace oaz, inj piltian; çan nj man ipan pil peoaz in vel monotzaz, vel mozcaliz, can vei qujcaz, amo iviian, tetitlan, quauh titlan, inj tla quj cnopilhujz.(53) I njc cempoalli on chicuey capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in oc cequj in ieliz, inj mjuhcatiliz ci oa inj pantlacatia in machiotl.(54) A uh intlacioatl, canienoiuh quj inj maceoalti, inj tech eva, injc movitequj, inj tech motzotzona, atle vel ai, avel qujtotia in malacatl, a vel colinja, auel caco cuj in tzotzopaz tli, maoolol, matetepo, ixquj quj mjl, ixtepetla, vetz qujztomac, aquetztza na, çan ic nemjntlapitzaoa, itzic quj tlatlatztzatinemj, tentlaueliloc, ate tlacatl, atle ovi in quj cacamacaoa: iuh qujn acontetemoa qujtoa, iuh qujn quj monolotza itla ellatol, vel tepapa canj; auh çan quj x cauja in cuj tlacotla oatinemj, tlaten mattinemj, moque quequetza, maaviltia, aiel itla aiz, cuj tlatzcopic, cujtlacotlac, cochmjmjl auh in ie oquj chiuh, canjc quj mati, can ic imachitilo, in movicanaq uja, in movitilia, in oal moz calia, ietevic, ietemecapal muchiuhtinemj; auh çan no iui aontlaiecoa, aontlaeltia, inj tecuacan in vmpa tetlacauh, avel atl, avel metlatl contechiujlia, çan neian qualpul, qualtepul, ixtimalpul, iece çan molhuj tlaca mj mjlli, atle ine coca, atle ic temachilo: ic nj man in mac concaoa in tlacanecujloque in vm pa azcaputzalco, tlacanecujlolli mu chioa; auh catepan tlaaltilmjquj, ie oatl ipopoliuhca, y ceniaca muchioa, vncantzomoccalaquj, canel iauel neno tzaliz in oconcaujli, in ocontemovi, aocmo tlatollin tlatolli, avmpa o qujt tac injz caliloca, canj pan otlamelauh in iuh quj itonal, inj pantlacat: auh in ic achi quj qualtilizque itonal, ipan caltiaia in Ei coatl: ipampa omjto, injx qujch eei tonalli in tlacemjlhuj tiltia quj qualittaia; column3: (53) I njc cempoalli on chicuey capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in oc cequj in ieliz, inj mjuhcatiliz ci oa inj pantlacatia in machiotl.

column3: (54) A uh intlacioatl, canienoiuh quj inj maceoalti, inj tech eva, injc movitequj, inj tech motzotzona, atle vel ai, avel qujtotia in malacatl, a vel colinja, auel caco cuj in tzotzopaz tli, maoolol, matetepo, ixquj quj mjl, ixtepetla, vetz qujztomac, aquetztza na, çan ic nemjntlapitzaoa, itzic quj tlatlatztzatinemj, tentlaueliloc, ate tlacatl, atle ovi in quj cacamacaoa: iuh qujn acontetemoa qujtoa, iuh qujn quj monolotza itla ellatol, vel tepapa canj; auh çan quj x cauja in cuj tlacotla oatinemj, tlaten mattinemj, moque quequetza, maaviltia, aiel itla aiz, cuj tlatzcopic, cujtlacotlac, cochmjmjl auh in ie oquj chiuh, canjc quj mati, can ic imachitilo, in movicanaq uja, in movitilia, in oal moz calia, ietevic, ietemecapal muchiuhtinemj; auh çan no iui aontlaiecoa, aontlaeltia, inj tecuacan in vmpa tetlacauh, avel atl, avel metlatl contechiujlia, çan neian qualpul, qualtepul, ixtimalpul, iece çan molhuj tlaca mj mjlli, atle ine coca, atle ic temachilo: ic nj man in mac concaoa in tlacanecujloque in vm pa azcaputzalco, tlacanecujlolli mu chioa; auh catepan tlaaltilmjquj, ie oatl ipopoliuhca, y ceniaca muchioa, vncantzomoccalaquj, canel iauel neno tzaliz in oconcaujli, in ocontemovi, aocmo tlatollin tlatolli, avmpa o qujt tac injz caliloca, canj pan otlamelauh in iuh quj itonal, inj pantlacat: auh in ic achi quj qualtilizque itonal, ipan caltiaia in Ei coatl: ipampa omjto, injx qujch eei tonalli in tlacemjlhuj tiltia quj qualittaia; auh in tlanoço quj nequjzque, aco quj nj pan caltiz que, in chicome atl: no ipampa inj qualtica, injx quj ch chichicovme to nalli, vt supra.
column4: (54) a u intlasioatl, kanienoiu quj inj maseoalti, inj tech eva, injk movitequj, inj tech motsotsona, atle vel ai, avel qujtotia in malakatl, a vel kolinja, auel kako kuj in tsotsopas tli, maoolol, matetepo, ixquj quj mjl, ixtepetla, vets qujztomac, aketstsa na, san ik nemjntlapitsaoa, itsik quj tlatlatstsatinemj, tentlauelilok, ate tlakatl, atle ovi in quj kakamakaoa iu qujn akontetemoa qujtoa, iu qujn quj monolotsa itla elatol, vel tepapa kanj; au san quj x kauja in kuj tlakotla oatinemj, tlaten mattinemj, moke keketsa, maaviltia, aiel itla ais, kuj tlatskopik, kujtlakotlak, kochmjmjl au in ie oquj chiu, kanjk quj mati, kan ik imachitilo, in movicanaq uja, in movitilia, in oal mos kalia, ietevik, ietemekapal muchiutinemj; au san no iui aontlaiekoa, aontlaeltia, inj tekuakan in vmpa tetlakau, avel atl, avel metlatl kontechiulia, san neian kualpul, kualtepul, ixtimalpul, iese san molhuj tlaka mj mjli, atle ine koka, atle ik temachilo ik nj man in mak konkaoa in tlakanekujloke in vm pa askaputsalko, tlakanekujloli mu chioa; au katepan tlaaltilmjquj, ie oatl ipopoliuka, i seniaka muchioa, vncantzomoccalaquj, kanel iauel neno tsalis in okonkauli, in okontemovi, aokmo tlatolin tlatoli, avmpa o qujt tak injs kaliloka, kanj pan otlamelau in iu quj itonal, inj pantlakat: au in ik achi quj kualtiliske itonal, ipan kaltiaia in ei koatl: ipampa omjto, injx qujch eei tonali in tlacemjlhuj tiltia quj kualittaia; au in tlanoso quj nequjzque, ako quj nj pan kaltis ke, in chikome atl: no ipampa inj kualtika, injx quj ch chichikovme to nali, vt supra.
