column4: (54) A oh intlacioatl, canienoioh qoj inj maceoalti, inj tech eva, injc moviteqoj, inj tech motzotzona, atle vel ai, avel qojtotia in malacatl, a vel colinja, aoel caco coj in tzotzopaz tli, maoolol, matetepo, ixqoj qoj mjl, ixtepetla, vetz qojztomac, aqoetztza na, çan ic nemjntlapitzaoa, itzic qoj tlatlatztzatinemj, tentlaoeliloc, ate tlacatl, atle ovi in qoj cacamacaoa: ioh qojn acontetemoa qojtoa, ioh qojn qoj monolotza itla ellatol, vel tepapa canj; aoh çan qoj x caoja in coj tlacotla oatinemj, tlaten mattinemj, moqoe qoeqoetza, maaviltia, aiel itla aiz, coj tlatzcopic, cojtlacotlac, cochmjmjl aoh in ie oqoj chioh, canjc qoj mati, can ic imachitilo, in movicanaq oja, in moiitilia, in oal moz calia, ietevic, ietemecapal mochiohtinemj; aoh çan no ioi aontlaiecoa, aontlaeltia, inj tecoacan in vmpa tetlacaoh, avel atl, avel metlatl contechiojlia, çan neian qoalpol, qoaltepol, ixtimalpol, iece çan molhoj tlaca mj mjlli, atle ine coca, atle ic temachilo: ic nj man in mac concaoa in tlacanecojloqoe in vm pa azcapotzalco, tlacanecojlolli mo chioa; aoh catepan tlaaltilmjqoj, ie oatl ipopoliohca, y ceniaca mochioa, vncantzomoccalaqoj, canel iaoel neno tzaliz in oconcaojli, in ocontemovi, aocmo tlatollin tlatolli, avmpa o qojt tac injz caliloca, canj pan otlamelaoh in ioh qoj itonal, inj pantlacat: aoh in ic achi qoj qoaltilizqoe itonal, ipan caltiaia in Ei coatl: ipampa omjto, injx qojch eei tonalli in tlacemjlhoj tiltia qoj qoalittaia; aoh in tlanoço qoj neqojzqoe, aco qoj nj pan caltiz qoe, in chicome atl: no ipampa inj qoaltica, injx qoj ch chichicovme to nalli, vt sopra.

column1: .de fo.55. nen tontlatlatoz que: titlatol caca muz que, in amo çan tlatol xaqualli, tla tolnechicollo, tlatolnenel, iliviz tla tolli, çan nen tlatolli to connemjtizque, ticcuep tinemjz que io an injc amo can ieehoatl, tiqujtotinemjz que, tic cueptinemjzque, ticcujtlacueptinemjz que, inj xqujch omjto, omoteneuh, ca nj çan onmocenteneoa, onmo cenca maitoa, in tlatolli, caca nie muchiuh quj inj tlatlatollo ixqujch omote neuh in iuh tetecpantivi, in vncan qualtitiuh tonalli, io an in achi qual titiuh: io an in nj man amo qualti tiuh, injxqujch icontlatl antiuh, ma tlatlactlomeei: ipampa in ca nj çan onmo centlalia, izqujteme cencalpa tonaltin, in quj npeoaltitica ce calli, ioan vme cuetzpalin, ei coatl, nauj mj quj ztli, macujlli macatl, chiquace tochtli, chicome atl, chi cuei itz cujn tli, chicunauj oco matli, matlactli, malinalli, matlactloce, acatl matlac tlomome acelutl, matlactlomei quauh tli; auh inj quac ontlan iz quj lhujtl in, nj man oalmoquetza.(55) I njc cempoalli on chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc caxcoltetl oce machiotl: qujl mach qualli tonalli: auh qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlaca tia, vecaoaia, iece amonelli iuh muchioaia, iehica ca mjequjn tin iciuh ca mj quja, in vncan tlacatia.(56) I nce cozcaquauhtli: injn cozca quauhtli, mjtoa veue tonalli, ca quez quj çan omjto, in iuh quj itlatlatollo: in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj quallitta ia, qujtoa veuetiz, ilamatiz, quj tlamjz, quj tlamjteoaz in paqujliz tli, ioan mo cujltonoz, tlamauj coz in tlalticpac: auh tel çan noipantia, in aqujn iuhquj ipan mochioaia, iehica camjectlacatl mj quja, inj pan tlacatia: auh in tlaonca poliujnj, po poliujnj, in qualonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; njman iquac caltia inj pan itonal, ic qujnotza Coz caquauh: auh intla caietle popoliujz, occonchololtia in pilhoaque, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc conjhimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nj pan caltia in chico me hecatl. A uh in contoqujlia vme calli, ioan ei tecpatl, nauj quj avitl, macujlli suchitl, chiquacen cipactli, chicome hecatl, chicuei calli, chicu nauj cuetzpalin, matlactli coatl, ma tlactloce, mj qujztli, matlactlomome macatl, matlactli vmei tochtli. column4: nen tontlatlatos ke titlatol kaka mus ke, in amo san tlatol xakuali, tla tolnechikolo, tlatolnenel, ilivis tla toli, san nen tlatoli to konnemjtiske, tikkuep tinemjs ke io an injk amo kan ieejoatl, tiqujtotinemjz ke, tik kueptinemjske, tikkutlakueptinemjs ke, inj xqujch omjto, omoteneu, ka nj san onmosenteneoa, onmo senka maitoa, in tlatoli, kaka nie muchiu quj inj tlatlatolo ixqujch omote neu in iu tetekpantivi, in vnkan kualtitiu tonali, io an in achi kual titiu: io an in nj man amo kualti tiu, injxqujch ikontlatl antiu, ma tlatlaktlomeei ipampa in ka nj san onmo sentlalia, izqujteme senkalpa tonaltin, in quj npeoaltitika se kali, ioan vme kuetspalin, ei koatl, nauj mj quj stli, makujli makatl, chikuase tochtli, chikome atl, chi kuei its kujn tli, chicunauj oko matli, matlaktli, malinali, matlaktlose, akatl matlak tlomome aselutl, matlaktlomei kuau tli; au inj kuak ontlan is quj ljutl in, nj man oalmoketsa.

column3: (55) I njc cempoalli on chicunavi capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, injc caxcoltetl oce machiotl: qujl mach qualli tonalli: auh qujl mach in aqujque vncan tlaca tia, vecaoaia, iece amonelli iuh muchioaia, iehica ca mjequjn tin iciuh ca mj quja, in vncan tlacatia.
column4: (55) I njc cempoalli on chiconavi capitolo: itechpa tlatoa, injc caxcoltetl oce machiotl: qojl mach qoalli tonalli: aoh qojl mach in aqojqoe vncan tlaca tia, vecaoaia, iece amonelli ioh mochioaia, iehica ca mjeqojn tin icioh ca mj qoja, in vncan tlacatia.

column3: (56) I nce cozcaquauhtli: injn cozca quauhtli, mjtoa veue tonalli, ca quez quj çan omjto, in iuh quj itlatlatollo: in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj quallitta ia, qujtoa veuetiz, ilamatiz, quj tlamjz, quj tlamjteoaz in paqujliz tli, ioan mo cujltonoz, tlamauj coz in tlalticpac: auh tel çan noipantia, in aqujn iuhquj ipan mochioaia, iehica camjectlacatl mj quja, inj pan tlacatia: auh in tlaonca poliujnj, po poliujnj, in qualonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; njman iquac caltia inj pan itonal, ic qujnotza Coz caquauh: auh intla caietle popoliujz, occonchololtia in pilhoaque, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc conjhimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nj pan caltia in chico me hecatl.
column4: (56) i nse koskakuautli injn koska kuautli, mjtoa veue tonali, ka kes quj san omjto, in iu quj itlatlatolo in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, quj kualitta ia, qujtoa veuetis, ilamatis, quj tlamjs, quj tlamjteoas in paqujliz tli, ioan mo kujltonos, tlamauj kos in tlaltikpak: au tel san noipantia, in aqujn iukj ipan mochioaia, iejika kamjektlakatl mj quja, inj pan tlakatia au in tlaonka poliunj, po poliunj, in kualonj, tenechikolonj, tesentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlakamachonj, tekoanotsalonj; njman ikuak kaltia inj pan itonal, ik qujnotza kos kakuau: au intla kaietle popolius, okkonchololtia in piljoake, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc konjjimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nj pan kaltia in chiko me jekatl.

column3: (56) I nce cozcaquauhtli: injn cozca quauhtli, mjtoa veue tonalli, ca quez quj çan omjto, in iuh quj itlatlatollo: in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj quallitta ia, qujtoa veuetiz, ilamatiz, quj tlamjz, quj tlamjteoaz in paqujliz tli, ioan mo cujltonoz, tlamauj coz in tlalticpac: auh tel çan noipantia, in aqujn iuhquj ipan mochioaia, iehica camjectlacatl mj quja, inj pan tlacatia: auh in tlaonca poliujnj, po poliujnj, in qualonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; njman iquac caltia inj pan itonal, ic qujnotza Coz caquauh: auh intla caietle popoliujz, occonchololtia in pilhoaque, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc conjhimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nj pan caltia in chico me hecatl.
column4: (56) i nse koskakwawtli inhn koska kwawtli, mhtoa vewe tonali, ka kes quj san omhto, in iw quj itlatlatolo in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, quj kwalitta ia, qujtoa vewetis, ilamatis, quj tlamhs, quj tlamhteoas in paqujliz tli, ioan mo kuhltonos, tlamauj kos in tlaltikpak: aw tel san noipantia, in aqujn iwkh ipan mochioaia, iehika kamhektlakatl mh quja, inh pan tlakatia aw in tlaonka poliujnj, po poliujnj, in qualonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; nhman ikwak kaltia inh pan itonal, ik qujnotza kos kakwaw: aw intla kaietle popolius, okkonchololtia in pilhoake, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc konhhimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nh pan kaltia in chiko me hekatl.

column4: (56) i nce cozcacuauhtli inhn cozca cuauhtli, mhtoa vehue tonalli, ca quez quj zan omhto, in iuh quj itlatlatollo in aqujn vncan tlacatia, quj cuallitta ia, qujtoa vehuetiz, ilamatiz, quj tlamhz, quj tlamhteoaz in paqujliz tli, ioan mo cuhltonoz, tlamauj coz in tlalticpac: auh tel zan noipantia, in aqujn iuhquj ipan mochioaia, iehica camhectlacatl mh quja, inh pan tlacatia auh in tlaonca poliujnj, po poliujnj, in qualonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; nhman icuac caltia inh pan itonal, ic qujnotza coz caquauh: auh intla caietle popoliujz, occonchololtia in pilhoaque, oqujc onmotlamachia, oqujc conhhimati, injxqujch mone nenequjz, quj nh pan caltia in chico me hecatl.

column4: (56) I nce cozcaqoaohtli: injn cozca qoaohtli, mjtoa veoe tonalli, ca qoez qoj çan omjto, in ioh qoj itlatlatollo: in aqojn vncan tlacatia, qoj qoallitta ia, qojtoa veoetiz, ilamatiz, qoj tlamjz, qoj tlamjteoaz in paqojliz tli, ioan mo cojltonoz, tlamaoj coz in tlalticpac: aoh tel çan noipantia, in aqojn iohqoj ipan mochioaia, iehica camjectlacatl mj qoja, inj pan tlacatia: aoh in tlaonca poliojnj, po poliojnj, in qoalonj, tenechicolonj, tecentlalilonj, tetemolonj, teiximacho nj, tetlacamachonj, tecoanotzalonj; njman iqoac caltia inj pan itonal, ic qojnotza Coz caqoaoh: aoh intla caietle popoliojz, occonchololtia in pilhoaqoe, oqojc onmotlamachia, oqojc conjhimati, injxqojch mone neneqojz, qoj nj pan caltia in chico me hecatl.

column3: A uh in contoqujlia vme calli, ioan ei tecpatl, nauj quj avitl, macujlli suchitl, chiquacen cipactli, chicome hecatl, chicuei calli, chicu nauj cuetzpalin, matlactli coatl, ma tlactloce, mj qujztli, matlactlomome macatl, matlactli vmei tochtli.
column4: a u in contoqujlia vme kali, ioan ei tekpatl, nauj quj avitl, makujli suchitl, chikuasen sipaktli, chikome jekatl, chikuei kali, chicu nauj kuetspalin, matlaktli koatl, ma tlaktlose, mj qujztli, matlaktlomome makatl, matlaktli vmei tochtli.

column1: .de fo.56. quj chin, çan ie centetl inj nteneoalo ca, in iuh tecpantiuj, aocmo mone quj in ca tlatolcolli, ca nentlatlatolli, in omachcamatzopetziuh, omachtla tziuh tlatolli, tiqujtotinemjzque: i pampa in caiio tonal peoallotl, achi tzitzin tlatolli ic toconnextia, injc mottaz, injz quj pavetzi cempoalpa, injc cecencalpan otlato catiuj: ioan oalmotoqujlitiuj: inj quac ontlan in cencalpan tonalli, in iuh quj ce Se mana muchioa, inj pan machoia ce domingo: njman ic oalmoquetza, vm peoa, onte quj ana, onte quj cuj in ce atl.(57) I njc cempoalli on matlac tli capitulo: itechpa tlatoa, in ic caxtolli omome machiotl, inj toca ce atl: qujl mach amo qualli tonalli: auh qujl in a quj que vncan tlacatia, çan ipeuhian inj nnemjliz achi paquja; auh injc tzonqujcaia amo qualli, auh qujl mach mochipa, amo qualli, injc mj quja: auh qujl itonal catca in chalchiujtl icue, qujlhuj quj xtiliaia in atlaca. C e atl: injn ce atl; quj toa, a mono qualli: yoan qjt oa, çan chictlapantli, chictlapantica: ix qujch qualli, ixqujch amo qualli: Vncan quj tonaltiaia: inj toca chal chi uh tli y cue, inj pan mjxcoaia atl: occenca iehoan quj tlamanj liaia, y nanamacaque, in acale que, acaltica atlacuj, yoan acal quetzque: iehoan qujxiptlatiaia quj tlaliaia ycoloio inj teupan, inj calpulco. A uh injc mjtoa çan chic tlapanquj yn amo vel macitica mot quitica ic qualli, quitoznequi inaqujn ipantlacatia, çan vej quicaia cenca canaca in vncan qujcaia tlacnopil hujani, cainjuhca vel in maceoal, itonal çan muchi aqualli in cololo tica mot quitica teuhtli, tlacolli, auh amo qualli y njciaz, inic miquiz, aco çan cana tetepacholoz, tetica ue tziz, anoço , atocoz, atlan mj qujz; auh intlacan oco itla imaceoaltiz, ca cotocpol, çan cuel achic, çan cuecue lachic, çan achica, çan achitonca, ca achitzinca, çan ixqujch caujtl in, injx pan on qujcaz inj necujltonol, ic ipa mjtoa, injntlatol tlalticpac tlatlato anj, çan tatacapitzuelin tlacticpac, que man veli, quen man aveli, intlaipil tian motoliniz, qujn itzonco in achi moiollaliz: auh intlanoce nj man ipa pilpeoa, qujpilpilpeoalli inetlamach tli, çan tlantica, çan coctocpol, injc con motlanevia: auh caic noiotl injc on

column3: C e atl: injn ce atl; quj toa, a mono qualli: yoan qjt oa, çan chictlapantli, chictlapantica: ix qujch qualli, ixqujch amo qualli: Vncan quj tonaltiaia: inj toca chal chi uh tli y cue, inj pan mjxcoaia atl: occenca iehoan quj tlamanj liaia, y nanamacaque, in acale que, acaltica atlacuj, yoan acal quetzque: iehoan qujxiptlatiaia quj tlaliaia ycoloio inj teupan, inj calpulco.
column4: k e atl: injn se atl; quj toa, a mono kuali yoan kjt oa, san chiktlapantli, chiktlapantika ix qujch kuali, ixqujch amo kuali vnkan quj tonaltiaia inj toka chal chi u tli i kue, inj pan mjxkoaia atl: oksenka iejoan quj tlamanj liaia, i nanamakake, in akale ke, akaltika atlakuj, yoan akal ketske iejoan qujxiptlatiaia quj tlaliaia ikoloio inj teupan, inj kalpulko.

column3: A uh injc mjtoa çan chic tlapanquj yn amo vel macitica mot quitica ic qualli, quitoznequi inaqujn ipantlacatia, çan vej quicaia cenca canaca in vncan qujcaia tlacnopil hujani, cainjuhca vel in maceoal, itonal çan muchi aqualli in cololo tica mot quitica teuhtli, tlacolli, auh amo qualli y njciaz, inic miquiz, aco çan cana tetepacholoz, tetica ue tziz, anoço , atocoz, atlan mj qujz; auh intlacan oco itla imaceoaltiz, ca cotocpol, çan cuel achic, çan cuecue lachic, çan achica, çan achitonca, ca achitzinca, çan ixqujch caujtl in, injx pan on qujcaz inj necujltonol, ic ipa mjtoa, injntlatol tlalticpac tlatlato anj, çan tatacapitzuelin tlacticpac, que man veli, quen man aveli, intlaipil tian motoliniz, qujn itzonco in achi moiollaliz: auh intlanoce nj man ipa pilpeoa, qujpilpilpeoalli inetlamach tli, çan tlantica, çan coctocpol, injc con motlanevia: auh caic noiotl injc on
column4: a u injk mjtoa san chik tlapanquj in amo vel masitika mot kitika ik kuali, kitosneki inaqujn ipantlakatia, san vej kikaia senka kanaka in vnkan qujcaia tlaknopil jujani, kainjuka vel in maseoal, itonal san muchi akuali in kololo tika mot kitika teutli, tlakoli, au amo kuali i njsias, inik mikis, ako san kana tetepacholos, tetika ue tsis, anoso , atokos, atlan mj qujz; au intlakan oko itla imaseoaltis, ka kotokpol, san kuel achik, san kuekue lachik, san achika, san achitonka, ka achitsinka, san ixqujch kautl in, injx pan on qujcaz inj nekujltonol, ik ipa mjtoa, injntlatol tlaltikpak tlatlato anj, san tatakapitsuelin tlaktikpak, ke man veli, ken man aveli, intlaipil tian motolinis, qujn itsonko in achi moiolalis: au intlanose nj man ipa pilpeoa, qujpilpilpeoalli inetlamach tli, san tlantika, san koktokpol, injk kon motlanevia au kaik noiotl injk on

column4: A oh injc mjtoa çan chic tlapanqoj yn amo vel macitica mot qoitica ic qoalli, qoitozneqoi inaqojn ipantlacatia, çan vej qoicaia cenca canaca in vncan qojcaia tlacnopil hojani, cainjohca vel in maceoal, itonal çan mochi aqoalli in cololo tica mot qoitica teohtli, tlacolli, aoh amo qoalli y njciaz, inic miqoiz, aco çan cana tetepacholoz, tetica oe tziz, anoço , atocoz, atlan mj qojz; aoh intlacan oco itla imaceoaltiz, ca cotocpol, çan coel achic, çan coecoe lachic, çan achica, çan achitonca, ca achitzinca, çan ixqojch caojtl in, injx pan on qojcaz inj necojltonol, ic ipa mjtoa, injntlatol tlalticpac tlatlato anj, çan tatacapitzoelin tlacticpac, qoe man veli, qoen man aveli, intlaipil tian motoliniz, qojn itzonco in achi moiollaliz: aoh intlanoce nj man ipa pilpeoa, qojpilpilpeoalli inetlamach tli, çan tlantica, çan coctocpol, injc con motlanevia: aoh caic noiotl injc on

column1: .de fo.57. tlatzonqujxtia, ontlatzontia: auh in tlapuchtecatl, mjtoa, aco cana tlaatoc tiz, tlapoloz: auh in aca çan nj man ie atle on quj ca, çan iuh amoiaoa, aujlqujca inj nemjliz, ipampa ca nj man iuh qujn itonal ce atl: auh injc amo cenca ocnoujian tontlatoz que, tontlaanazque in amo çan iee tlatolli tic cuep ti ne mjzque, ticte quj matti ne mjzque, ticteq uj matiz que, ipanto m pipilcatozque, titotequj ma tizque, titlatlatozque, m iuh quj ato ten quauhtinj, atitentlatziujnj, ca ixquj ch icon maantiqujca, toconpa panqua, toconpapanquatiqujca, in can uel neneztica, ixneztica, panj caca tlatolli vt supra. In aqujn ipa tlacatia, in iuh quj in tonalli, in amo qualli, qujn nj pan contlatotoqujli aia, vmpa quj n contlate quj viaia, in qualcan, iquac caltiaia, mjtoa ic quj chico quj xtia, quj qualtilia, inj tlacatiliz, aiac quj matli, aiac ontla mati, in aco caitla imaceoaltiz, in tlauellamaceoaz. Et. Caic neztica in que ciz quj çan intla quecizquj ca io pan ieietiuh in moteneoa qualli tonalli: ipampa in ca njcan on mo cecentlalia, on mocenteneoa in iz qujteme in tlaotlatoctia, tlanene mjtia cen calpan, cencallopan: caie hoatl ontlaoncaiotia, on tlato quj lia, in vme itz cujntli, ic tecpantiuj, mototoquilitiuh in ey oco matli, nauj malinalli, macujlli acatl, chi quacen ocelotl, chicome quauhtli, chi cuey cozcaquauhtli, chicunauj olin matlactli tecpatl, matlactloce quja vitl, matlactlomone suchitl, matlac tlomei cipactli: inj quac onuetz inte quj uh in in ontequj caujque in ocon motlaxilique in tlanenemjtiaia injz qujlhujtl vncan tlaotlatoctia: njma oal moquetza, onte quj ana. (58) I njc cempoalli on matlactli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa injc caxtolli vmei machiotl, inj toca ce hecatl: ioan in amo qualli, in amo iectli inj techca: qujl amo qualli tonalli quj maceoaia, in vncan tlacatia.(59) I n ce hecatl: in in ce hecatl, quj toa amo qualli, vncan quj tonal tiaia, in moteneoa quetzalcoatl, inj xiptla catca hecatl, hecamalacotl: auh in aqujn vncan tlacatia, qujtoa in tlapilli, naoalli iez, amo tlacatl, tlaciuhquj, nenonotzale, impanj neci ca tlacatl, iece amo qualli, itla cauh quj, itlaqujmati, tlacatecolo tlatolli, tlacatecoloiotl, teipitzanj, te xoxanj, tetlachiuj anj, tetlanono chi li, tetlateononochili, much ichiujl

column3: tlatzonqujxtia, ontlatzontia: auh in tlapuchtecatl, mjtoa, aco cana tlaatoc tiz, tlapoloz: auh in aca çan nj man ie atle on quj ca, çan iuh amoiaoa, aujlqujca inj nemjliz, ipampa ca nj man iuh qujn itonal ce atl: auh injc amo cenca ocnoujian tontlatoz que, tontlaanazque in amo çan iee tlatolli tic cuep ti ne mjzque, ticte quj matti ne mjzque, ticteq uj matiz que, ipanto m pipilcatozque, titotequj ma tizque, titlatlatozque, m iuh quj ato ten quauhtinj, atitentlatziujnj, ca ixquj ch icon maantiqujca, toconpa panqua, toconpapanquatiqujca, in can uel neneztica, ixneztica, panj caca tlatolli vt supra.
column4: tlatzonqujxtia, ontlatsontia au in tlapuchtekatl, mjtoa, ako kana tlaatok tis, tlapolos: au in aka san nj man ie atle on quj ka, san iu amoiaoa, aujlqujca inj nemjlis, ipampa ka nj man iu qujn itonal se atl: au injk amo senka oknoujian tontlatos ke, tontlaanaske in amo san iee tlatoli tik kuep ti ne mjske, tikte quj matti ne mjske, ticteq uj matis ke, ipanto m pipilkatoske, titotequj ma tiske, titlatlatoske, m iu quj ato ten kuautinj, atitentlatsiunj, ka ixquj ch ikon maantiqujca, tokonpa pankua, toconpapanquatiqujca, in kan uel nenestika, ixnestika, panj kaka tlatoli vt supra.

column3: Caic neztica in que ciz quj çan intla quecizquj ca io pan ieietiuh in moteneoa qualli tonalli: ipampa in ca njcan on mo cecentlalia, on mocenteneoa in iz qujteme in tlaotlatoctia, tlanene mjtia cen calpan, cencallopan: caie hoatl ontlaoncaiotia, on tlato quj lia, in vme itz cujntli, ic tecpantiuj, mototoquilitiuh in ey oco matli, nauj malinalli, macujlli acatl, chi quacen ocelotl, chicome quauhtli, chi cuey cozcaquauhtli, chicunauj olin matlactli tecpatl, matlactloce quja vitl, matlactlomone suchitl, matlac tlomei cipactli: inj quac onuetz inte quj uh in in ontequj caujque in ocon motlaxilique in tlanenemjtiaia injz qujlhujtl vncan tlaotlatoctia: njma oal moquetza, onte quj ana.
column4: kaik nestika in ke sis quj san intla quecizquj ka io pan ieietiu in moteneoa kuali tonali ipampa in ka njkan on mo sesentlalia, on mosenteneoa in is qujteme in tlaotlatoktia, tlanene mjtia sen kalpan, senkalopan: kaie joatl ontlaonkaiotia, on tlato quj lia, in vme its kujntli, ik tecpantiuj, mototokilitiu in ei oko matli, nauj malinali, makujli akatl, chi kuasen oselotl, chikome kuautli, chi kuei koskakuautli, chicunauj olin matlaktli tekpatl, matlaktlose quja vitl, matlaktlomone suchitl, matlak tlomei sipaktli inj kuak onuets inte quj u in in ontequj kauke in okon motlaxilike in tlanenemjtiaia injs qujlhujtl vnkan tlaotlatoktia njma oal moketsa, onte quj ana.

column3: (58) I njc cempoalli on matlactli oce capitulo: itechpa tlatoa injc caxtolli vmei machiotl, inj toca ce hecatl: ioan in amo qualli, in amo iectli inj techca: qujl amo qualli tonalli quj maceoaia, in vncan tlacatia.

column3: (59) I n ce hecatl: in in ce hecatl, quj toa amo qualli, vncan quj tonal tiaia, in moteneoa quetzalcoatl, inj xiptla catca hecatl, hecamalacotl: auh in aqujn vncan tlacatia, qujtoa in tlapilli, naoalli iez, amo tlacatl, tlaciuhquj, nenonotzale, impanj neci ca tlacatl, iece amo qualli, itla cauh quj, itlaqujmati, tlacatecolo tlatolli, tlacatecoloiotl, teipitzanj, te xoxanj, tetlachiuj anj, tetlanono chi li, tetlateononochili, much ichiujl
column4: (59) i n se jekatl: in in se jekatl, quj toa amo kuali, vnkan quj tonal tiaia, in moteneoa ketsalkoatl, inj xiptla katka jekatl, jekamalakotl: au in aqujn vnkan tlakatia, qujtoa in tlapili, naoali ies, amo tlakatl, tlasiukj, nenonotsale, impanj nesi ka tlakatl, iese amo kuali, itla kau quj, itlaqujmati, tlakatekolo tlatoli, tlakatekoloiotl, teipitsanj, te xoxanj, tetlachiuj anj, tetlanono chi li, tetlateononochili, much ichiul

column1: .de fo.58. much quj mati, acote qua nnaoale, co io naoale. Et. auh in tlamaceoalli can ie no iuh quj, ieho atl in mjtoa: tlacatecolotl, tetl atlacate colo uja, te pup uxaquavia, temamac palitotia, tepoloanj, tecujllotlatia: no iuh quj in tlaci oatl mometzcopinquj, mometz copi nanj. Et. auh inj pan tepolo aia, vncan quj matti uja in aqualli to nalli, iehoatl con toto caia, contlatoto quj liaia, quj toa cenca ipan tepo lo aia in chicunauj itzcuj ntli, anoço chicunauj mjqujztli, chicunauj ma linalli: io an in ie muchi chichicuna nauj, ioan in occequj moteneoa aqualli tonalli, injz quj çan omote neuh, auh in iuh quez quican omjto, in aqujn iuh quj in ite quj uh, iteto quj uh muchioa, quj motetequjtia, aic auja, atle quj qua nj, çan motoli nj tinemj, aoneoatinemj, acan icha, acan chanca; amo chane caca, acan chantla matica: acan chanecatlamat tica, çan ic noiotl qujtztinemj, çan ic conquatiuh, canjc onmotlamj tiuh, in tlacana itla maco, nema quj lilo injc tepoloa, injc netlaque vilo: anoce cana axioa, inj quac ieo, tlatlatz iujti, ie ontlaxujti, ieo tlatla tzilhuj, vncan ano, quj tzoncuj, quj tleio cujlia, qujtonalitlacoa: ic ca temac on momj quj cacaoa: auh in ieho antin moteneoa, temamac palitotique, tep upuxaquauj que, inj quac tlacana ichtequjzque, te chan tlaquj xtizque, quj chichio aia inj xiptla ce hecatl; quj nia cantiuja in iacac, i mj xpan icatiuja, io an qujt quj tiuj inj macpal mo cio aquetz quj, injti ic iauh in auel inj xiuj iquac quj cujliaia in qujn on mj quj, çan o quj ch tecca cuja, io altica in quj te quj liaca, iooalli itic,auh injc qujto caia amo ichan, çan vmpa concaoaia in vtlica, vncan in uel omaxac contoca, quj ne caliltitiuj, ipan necalioatiuh, coio vitiuj injc quj uj ca: auh injc quj oal quj xtia ichan, amo ix copa inj cal, can quj cuj tlacoionja in calli, vmpa quj qujxtia injc concaoa vmaxac: auh in ieoantin in temamacpalito tique, inj quac cana tepoloz que, ich tequjzque, cetlacatl conquechpanoa con moquech panoltia inj macpal, mo cioaquetzquj, iehoatl in inj opuch, io puchma, inj quac oacito techan, in aiamo calaquj calitic: ocie achto it oalnepantla ictlauj tequj in mac palli, icoppa tlaujtequj, in oacique, caltempan, quj uj tequj in calixquatl, in tlaixquatl: njman iee in tlaquetzalli, ic conmocaoa in tle cuj lixquac, oc ceppa oncan tlaujtequj, inj quac in iuh mjtoa njman aocac naoati, aocac uel mopocaoa, vel ioiol mj quj in cha neque; auh in ce qujn çan vel cococh mjquj, tlacotaliuj, tlaquaqualaca, iuhqujn neacatzaia nalo cochioa, auh in tlaca ocaca nen itztoc, aoc vel mo

amo chane caca, acan chantla matica: acan chanecatlamat tica, çan ic noiotl qujtztinemj, çan ic conquatiuh, canjc onmotlamj tiuh, in tlacana itla maco, nema quj lilo injc tepoloa, injc netlaque vilo: anoce cana axioa, inj quac ieo, tlatlatz iujti, ie ontlaxujti, ieo tlatla tzilhuj, vncan ano, quj tzoncuj, quj tleio cujlia, qujtonalitlacoa: ic ca temac on momj quj cacaoa: auh in ieho antin moteneoa, temamac palitotique, tep upuxaquauj que, inj quac tlacana ichtequjzque, te chan tlaquj xtizque, quj chichio aia inj xiptla ce hecatl; quj nia cantiuja in iacac, i mj xpan icatiuja, io an qujt quj tiuj inj macpal mo cio aquetz quj, injti ic iauh in auel inj xiuj iquac quj cujliaia in qujn on mj quj, çan o quj ch tecca cuja, io altica in quj te quj liaca, iooalli itic,auh injc qujto caia amo ichan, çan vmpa concaoaia in vtlica, vncan in uel omaxac contoca, quj ne caliltitiuj, ipan necalioatiuh, coio vitiuj injc quj uj ca: auh injc quj oal quj xtia ichan, amo ix copa inj cal, can quj cuj tlacoionja in calli, vmpa quj qujxtia injc concaoa vmaxac: auh in ieoantin in temamacpalito tique, inj quac cana tepoloz que, ich tequjzque, cetlacatl conquechpanoa con moquech panoltia inj macpal, mo cioaquetzquj, iehoatl in inj opuch, io puchma, inj quac oacito techan, in aiamo calaquj calitic: ocie achto it oalnepantla ictlauj tequj in mac palli, icoppa tlaujtequj, in oacique, caltempan, quj uj tequj in calixquatl, in tlaixquatl: njman iee in tlaquetzalli, ic conmocaoa in tle cuj lixquac, oc ceppa oncan tlaujtequj, inj quac in iuh mjtoa njman aocac naoati, aocac uel mopocaoa, vel ioiol mj quj in cha neque; auh in ce qujn çan vel cococh mjquj, tlacotaliuj, tlaquaqualaca, iuhqujn neacatzaia nalo cochioa, auh in tlaca ocaca nen itztoc, aoc vel mo
column4: au inj pan tepolo aia, vnkan quj matti uja in akuali to nali, iejoatl kon toto kaia, kontlatoto quj liaia, quj toa senka ipan tepo lo aia in chicunauj itskuj ntli, anoso chicunauj mjqujztli, chicunauj ma linali io an in ie muchi chichikuna nauj, ioan in occequj moteneoa akuali tonali, injs quj san omote neu, au in iu kes kikan omjto, in aqujn iu quj in ite quj u, iteto quj u muchioa, quj motetequjtia, aik auja, atle quj kua nj, san motoli nj tinemj, aoneoatinemj, akan icha, akan chanka; amo chane kaka, akan chantla matika akan chanekatlamat tika, san ik noiotl qujtztinemj, san ik konkuatiu, kanjk onmotlamj tiu, in tlakana itla mako, nema quj lilo injk tepoloa, injk netlake vilo anose kana axioa, inj kuak ieo, tlatlats iuti, ie ontlaxuti, ieo tlatla tzilhuj, vnkan ano, quj tsonkuj, quj tleio kujlia, qujtonalitlacoa: ik ka temak on momj quj kakaoa au in iejo antin moteneoa, temamak palitotike, tep upuxaquauj ke, inj kuak tlakana ichtequjzque, te chan tlaquj xtiske, quj chichio aia inj xiptla se jekatl; quj nia kantiuja in iakak, i mj xpan ikatiuja, io an qujt quj tiuj inj makpal mo sio akets quj, injti ik iau in auel inj xiuj ikuak quj kujliaia in qujn on mj quj, san o quj ch tekka kuja, io altika in quj te quj liaka, iooali itik,au injk qujto kaia amo ichan, san vmpa konkaoaia in vtlika, vnkan in uel omaxak kontoka, quj ne caliltitiuj, ipan nekalioatiu, koio vitiuj injk quj uj ka au injk quj oal quj xtia ichan, amo ix kopa inj kal, kan quj kuj tlakoionja in kali, vmpa quj qujxtia injk konkaoa vmaxak: au in ieoantin in temamakpalito tike, inj kuak kana tepolos ke, ich tequjzque, setlakatl konkechpanoa kon mokech panoltia inj makpal, mo cioaquetzquj, iejoatl in inj opuch, io puchma, inj kuak oasito techan, in aiamo calaquj kalitik: osie achto it oalnepantla ictlauj tequj in mak pali, ikoppa tlaujtequj, in oasike, kaltempan, quj uj tequj in kalixkuatl, in tlaixkuatl: njman iee in tlaketsali, ik konmokaoa in tle kuj lixkuak, ok seppa onkan tlaujtequj, inj kuak in iu mjtoa njman aokak naoati, aokak uel mopokaoa, vel ioiol mj quj in cha neke; au in se qujn san vel kokoch mjquj, tlacotaliuj, tlakuakualaka, iukjn neakatsaia nalo kochioa, au in tlaka okaka nen itstok, aok vel mo

qoj nia cantioja in iacac, i mj xpan icatioja, io an qojt qoj tioj inj macpal mo cio aqoetz qoj, injti ic iaoh in aoel inj xioj iqoac qoj cojliaia in qojn on mj qoj, çan o qoj ch tecca coja, io altica in qoj te qoj liaca, iooalli itic,aoh injc qojto caia amo ichan, çan vmpa concaoaia in vtlica, vncan in oel omaxac contoca, qoj ne caliltitioj, ipan necalioatioh, coio vitioj injc qoj oj ca: aoh injc qoj oal qoj xtia ichan, amo ix copa inj cal, can qoj coj tlacoionja in calli, vmpa qoj qojxtia injc concaoa vmaxac: aoh in ieoantin in temamacpalito tiqoe, inj qoac cana tepoloz qoe, ich teqojzqoe, cetlacatl conqoechpanoa con moqoech panoltia inj macpal, mo cioaqoetzqoj, iehoatl in inj opoch, io pochma, inj qoac oacito techan, in aiamo calaqoj calitic: ocie achto it oalnepantla ictlaoj teqoj in mac palli, icoppa tlaojteqoj, in oaciqoe, caltempan, qoj oj teqoj in calixqoatl, in tlaixqoatl: njman iee in tlaqoetzalli, ic conmocaoa in tle coj lixqoac, oc ceppa oncan tlaojteqoj, inj qoac in ioh mjtoa njman aocac naoati, aocac oel mopocaoa, vel ioiol mj qoj in cha neqoe; aoh in ce qojn çan vel cococh mjqoj, tlacotalioj, tlaqoaqoalaca, iohqojn neacatzaia nalo cochioa, aoh in tlaca ocaca nen itztoc, aoc vel mo

column1: .de fo.59. linja, aocuel mocuechinja, aoc vel momapatla, vel cocotlaoa, cocotlac mjquj y nj n ma, inj mjcxi, canelli mach in acopa teiitz toque, ixtepepetz me, ixpepetzteme onoque, ixpepetzin toque: auh in iehoantin ichtecpatlach popul, nj man ie ic tlepitza, quj te moa in tlaqualli, achtopa tlaqua, vel motlacauja aiac quj melleltia, canel oontepoloque, ontepuxaquaujque inj quac on moiollalique njman ic calaquj in tlecopa, in tlatlatilcali, tla maololoa, tlaqujxtia inj xqujch tilma tli, in quachtli, in chalchiujtl, in teo cujtlatl, in ieixqujch tlatilonj, in tetzon tli, in pielli, netlacujtlaputzmamaltilo, netlanenectilo, netlatlattililo, in ca co acquexqujch ic con mo tlamamal tia, ic on muchichioa: auh in nel cenca iuh on mjtoa, in uih on machiz ti, amo nentecaoa, amo nen quj ca, tecamaujl titeoa in iuh cochioa, ne cochitilo maceo alpan pilcoatoc, vi pantoatoc, teiiquanja, tepapatla, in vncan ceceiaca ionoia, inetecaia, ocie cecni conteca, amo vel mjtoz, in quexqujch icteca maujltia tlaueli loque; auh injc viotlica acan mo ceuja, acan mj xqua cevia, ca qujn ce vmpa quj mattiuj injnchan; iuh mj toa, qujlmach in tla aca moceviz vtlica: aioc vel yaz, aio uel meoaz, aioc vel otlatocaz: vncan ipan tlat hujz, qujn nexotlaz injch teccaicnj oan, anozque, cacacozque, namo ialozque, teca catzilpiloz.(60) I nj cempoalli om matlactli omome capitulo: y techpa tla toa injn choqujz, in jn tlaocul, yoan in jn netolinjliz inj chte qujliloia: in quj mj ch tequjliaia in temamac palitotique: yoan inoccequj calli, inj tech pouh quj yn.(61) A uh in iehoantin otlaqujxtililo que: quj nj quac muzcalia, moolinja, mocuecuechinja, meoa, meeoa, me oatiquetza, ino acique inchan ychtec que: ynon tlachia in tlecopa, yoan ynjn topco, in jn petlacalco: inj tanaioc in maqujztli in chalchivitl: auh in que tzalpetlatl, ynjpetlaioc in quetzalli, aioctle onvetztoc, ca cacactoc, cane mjuhian: otlacemjtqujque, otlaceia, oquj mon tlacemjtquj lique, ontlama ololoque, oquj montlamaololhujque, ontlanamuxque, oquj montlann mojeli que, otlanavac ontlavicaque, ontlanemjuh cantilique, oqujmonpetz toccauhque, ovel quj monchiuhque, oquj mo njc nochiuhque, ic noiotl oqujmon tlaxilitiaque, oq uj montlaixpulvique, oquj montla cecemmanjlique: caneia, ca nelli mach in moota, tlachoqujz tleoa, tlatecoiooa, tlatetecoiooa, tla tzatziztleoa, momamatlatzinja, moma mapuztequj, mjxaiopatzca in cioa: que can neloc nen, que noc, tlecanel nen, tlecanen, tleocnen, tleoc y tlatollo: ac on nelhujloz, campa nel onmjtoz, in manel momamaiavi, motetentima iavi, mjxtetzotzona choca: caonjt quj oac, ontla cemj chictia, on cemj chic

column3: linja, aocuel mocuechinja, aoc vel momapatla, vel cocotlaoa, cocotlac mjquj y nj n ma, inj mjcxi, canelli mach in acopa teiitz toque, ixtepepetz me, ixpepetzteme onoque, ixpepetzin toque: auh in iehoantin ichtecpatlach popul, nj man ie ic tlepitza, quj te moa in tlaqualli, achtopa tlaqua, vel motlacauja aiac quj melleltia, canel oontepoloque, ontepuxaquaujque inj quac on moiollalique njman ic calaquj in tlecopa, in tlatlatilcali, tla maololoa, tlaqujxtia inj xqujch tilma tli, in quachtli, in chalchiujtl, in teo cujtlatl, in ieixqujch tlatilonj, in tetzon tli, in pielli, netlacujtlaputzmamaltilo, netlanenectilo, netlatlattililo, in ca co acquexqujch ic con mo tlamamal tia, ic on muchichioa: auh in nel cenca iuh on mjtoa, in uih on machiz ti, amo nentecaoa, amo nen quj ca, tecamaujl titeoa in iuh cochioa, ne cochitilo maceo alpan pilcoatoc, vi pantoatoc, teiiquanja, tepapatla, in vncan ceceiaca ionoia, inetecaia, ocie cecni conteca, amo vel mjtoz, in quexqujch icteca maujltia tlaueli loque; auh injc viotlica acan mo ceuja, acan mj xqua cevia, ca qujn ce vmpa quj mattiuj injnchan; iuh mj toa, qujlmach in tla aca moceviz vtlica: aioc vel yaz, aio uel meoaz, aioc vel otlatocaz: vncan ipan tlat hujz, qujn nexotlaz injch teccaicnj oan, anozque, cacacozque, namo ialozque, teca catzilpiloz.
column4: linja, aokuel mokuechinja, aok vel momapatla, vel kokotlaoa, kokotlak mjquj i nj n ma, inj mjkxi, kaneli mach in akopa teiits toke, ixtepepets me, ixpepetsteme onoke, ixpepetsin toke au in iejoantin ichtekpatlach popul, nj man ie ik tlepitsa, quj te moa in tlakuali, achtopa tlakua, vel motlakauja aiak quj meleltia, kanel oontepoloke, ontepuxakuauke inj kuak on moiolalike njman ik calaquj in tlekopa, in tlatlatilkali, tla maololoa, tlaqujxtia inj xqujch tilma tli, in kuachtli, in chalchiutl, in teo kujtlatl, in ieixqujch tlatilonj, in tetson tli, in pieli, netlakujtlaputsmamaltilo, netlanenektilo, netlatlattililo, in ka ko acquexqujch ik kon mo tlamamal tia, ik on muchichioa au in nel senka iu on mjtoa, in uij on machis ti, amo nentekaoa, amo nen quj ka, tekamaul titeoa in iu kochioa, ne kochitilo maseo alpan pilkoatok, vi pantoatok, teiikuanja, tepapatla, in vnkan seseiaka ionoia, inetekaia, osie sekni konteka, amo vel mjtos, in quexqujch ikteka maultia tlaueli loke; au injk viotlika akan mo seuja, akan mj xkua sevia, ka qujn se vmpa quj mattiuj injnchan; iu mj toa, qujlmach in tla aka mosevis vtlika aiok vel yas, aio uel meoas, aiok vel otlatokas: vnkan ipan tlat jus, qujn nexotlas injch tekkaiknj oan, anoske, kakakoske, namo ialoske, teka katsilpilos.

column3: (61) A uh in iehoantin otlaqujxtililo que: quj nj quac muzcalia, moolinja, mocuecuechinja, meoa, meeoa, me oatiquetza, ino acique inchan ychtec que: ynon tlachia in tlecopa, yoan ynjn topco, in jn petlacalco: inj tanaioc in maqujztli in chalchivitl: auh in que tzalpetlatl, ynjpetlaioc in quetzalli, aioctle onvetztoc, ca cacactoc, cane mjuhian: otlacemjtqujque, otlaceia, oquj mon tlacemjtquj lique, ontlama ololoque, oquj montlamaololhujque, ontlanamuxque, oquj montlann mojeli que, otlanavac ontlavicaque, ontlanemjuh cantilique, oqujmonpetz toccauhque, ovel quj monchiuhque, oquj mo njc nochiuhque, ic noiotl oqujmon tlaxilitiaque, oq uj montlaixpulvique, oquj montla cecemmanjlique: caneia, ca nelli mach in moota, tlachoqujz tleoa, tlatecoiooa, tlatetecoiooa, tla tzatziztleoa, momamatlatzinja, moma mapuztequj, mjxaiopatzca in cioa: que can neloc nen, que noc, tlecanel nen, tlecanen, tleocnen, tleoc y tlatollo: ac on nelhujloz, campa nel onmjtoz, in manel momamaiavi, motetentima iavi, mjxtetzotzona choca: caonjt quj oac, ontla cemj chictia, on cemj chic
column4: (61) a u in iejoantin otlaqujxtililo ke quj nj kuak muskalia, moolinja, mokuekuechinja, meoa, meeoa, me oatiketsa, ino asike inchan ichtek ke inon tlachia in tlekopa, yoan injn topko, in jn petlakalko inj tanaiok in maqujztli in chalchivitl: au in ke tsalpetlatl, injpetlaiok in ketsali, aioktle onvetstok, ka kakaktok, kane mjuhian: otlacemjtqujque, otlaseia, oquj mon tlacemjtquj like, ontlama ololoke, oquj montlamaololjuke, ontlanamuxke, oquj montlann mojeli ke, otlanavak ontlavikake, ontlanemju kantilike, oqujmonpetz tokkauke, ovel quj monchiuke, oquj mo njk nochiuke, ik noiotl oqujmon tlaxilitiake, oq uj montlaixpulvike, oquj montla sesemmanjlike kaneia, ka neli mach in moota, tlachoqujz tleoa, tlatekoiooa, tlatetekoiooa, tla tsatsistleoa, momamatlatsinja, moma mapuztequj, mjxaiopatska in sioa ke kan nelok nen, ke nok, tlekanel nen, tlekanen, tleoknen, tleok i tlatolo ak on neljulos, kampa nel onmjtos, in manel momamaiavi, motetentima iavi, mjxtetsotsona choka kaonjt quj oak, ontla semj chiktia, on semj chik

column4: (61) A oh in iehoantin otlaqojxtililo qoe: qoj nj qoac mozcalia, moolinja, mocoecoechinja, meoa, meeoa, me oatiqoetza, ino aciqoe inchan ychtec qoe: ynon tlachia in tlecopa, yoan inin topco, in jn petlacalco: inj tanaioc in maqojztli in chalchiiitl: aoh in qoe tzalpetlatl, ynjpetlaioc in qoetzalli, aioctle onvetztoc, ca cacactoc, cane mjohian: otlacemjtqojqoe, otlaceia, oqoj mon tlacemjtqoj liqoe, ontlama ololoqoe, oqoj montlamaololhojqoe, ontlanamoxqoe, oqoj montlann mojeli qoe, otlanavac ontlavicaqoe, ontlanemjoh cantiliqoe, oqojmonpetz toccaohqoe, ovel qoj monchiohqoe, oqoj mo njc nochiohqoe, ic noiotl oqojmon tlaxilitiaqoe, oq oj montlaixpolviqoe, oqoj montla cecemmanjliqoe: caneia, ca nelli mach in moota, tlachoqojz tleoa, tlatecoiooa, tlatetecoiooa, tla tzatziztleoa, momamatlatzinja, moma mapozteqoj, mjxaiopatzca in cioa: qoe can neloc nen, qoe noc, tlecanel nen, tlecanen, tleocnen, tleoc y tlatollo: ac on nelhojloz, campa nel onmjtoz, in manel momamaiavi, motetentima iavi, mjxtetzotzona choca: caonjt qoj oac, ontla cemj chictia, on cemj chic

column1: .de fo. tia, ontla chichic tiaque, oconce mj chic tiaque, y natlaaxcavilli, in aiaxcaio, in aiaxcan otzintic, oneloaiooac, inj patiuh in molicpitl, intete puntli, in aiaxcan onez, ocacaliuh: injc oma coquetz, omotlapivi inj coco cauh in totecujo in tlatqujtl. et. I ujn in quj toa tepoloaia: in moteneoa ia vel teuichtecque, tetzotzonme, tepatlachti: in ie hoantin temamac palitotique. A uh injc tocaiotilo tetzotzonme: intlacana ovel ano que, çan qujn tetepachoa, qujn te cicali, tetica vetzi, qujn tetzotzona, qujn tepatzca, qujn quatepipitzinja: y quac vncan cuj tilo, namoialilo in amo çan qucx qujch imjchtech, intlaqujxtil. et. A uh injuh o mjto tlacpac: injc amo çan iliujz tlatolli tocon nemj tizque, on mijtoz, on motetequj matiz, ipan tontlatepeoazque, tontlatequj te peoazque, tocon tlatepeoaltizque, tocon tlaaaqujlizque, tocon tlatlatla lilizque: in amo çan ieehoatl ticte quj mattinemjzque, tico vppa viz que, tique expavizque, ticnanap pavizque: çan iehoatl ipan ton tixpoa, tontoiolpoa, toconjx toca, ipan tontlaneiocolia: in aiamo neci, inaiamo panj oalmotlalia: inoc tlapachiuhtica, mo cuj litica, mocujcujlitica, inaiamo teyolli pan, inaiamo teiollo quj na mj quj, inaiamo teiollo contoca, inaia mo teiollo contoca, y naiamo te iollo itlan qujca, teiollo ipan iauh tlatolli: cam jiecpa omocuj cuj tlacueptinen, in jx qujch omjto: ipampa in ca nj çan ixco tonquj ca, tocon chocholhujtiqujca, tocon chuech cholhujtiqujca. Aiocmo vmpa ton tlavica: aiocmo toeoniehoailhuja y nomoteneuh, injc no non qua tlatollo toque, izquj teme tonalti: yc çan nj can ommocentlalia, on motecpichoa, on monechicoa, on mocen quj xtia, on mototoqujlia, ti quj mon nenetzolla lia, ti quj mon nenetechcaloa, ti quj mon nenetech tlalia: ic çan on nene tzolcate, nenetechcate, nenetech catiuh ticate, moquequetzticate, mototocati cate, mototoqujliticate: ynjz quj teme njcan cencalpan tequj ppa neque: in iehoatl vme calli: ey cuetzpalin, navi coatl, macujlli mjqujztli, chiquacen macatl, chicome tochtli, chicuei atl, chicunavi ytzcujntli, matlactli ocoma tli, matlactli oce malinalli, matlac tli omome acatl, matlactli omey oce lutl. Y nj quac oontlan izqujlhujtl yn, in tlapoalpan, y njn tlacecemjlhujtilti aian: njman oalmoquetza.(62) I njc cepoalli omatlactli v mey capitulo: vncan moteneoa ynjc caxtolli vnnavi machiotl, yn itoca ce quauhtli: quil amo qualli in tonalli, auh in ipan tla catia, mochachamaoanj, yoa chicaoque, aiac ixcotlachia, a tle y pan tlatta, atle y pateitta: yoan quil in cihoa, anotle ypa tlacia, yoan cenca tlavil qujxtianj, tentlaveliloque,

column3: A uh injuh o mjto tlacpac: injc amo çan iliujz tlatolli tocon nemj tizque, on mijtoz, on motetequj matiz, ipan tontlatepeoazque, tontlatequj te peoazque, tocon tlatepeoaltizque, tocon tlaaaqujlizque, tocon tlatlatla lilizque: in amo çan ieehoatl ticte quj mattinemjzque, tico vppa viz que, tique expavizque, ticnanap pavizque: çan iehoatl ipan ton tixpoa, tontoiolpoa, toconjx toca, ipan tontlaneiocolia: in aiamo neci, inaiamo panj oalmotlalia: inoc tlapachiuhtica, mo cuj litica, mocujcujlitica, inaiamo teyolli pan, inaiamo teiollo quj na mj quj, inaiamo teiollo contoca, inaia mo teiollo contoca, y naiamo te iollo itlan qujca, teiollo ipan iauh tlatolli: cam jiecpa omocuj cuj tlacueptinen, in jx qujch omjto: ipampa in ca nj çan ixco tonquj ca, tocon chocholhujtiqujca, tocon chuech cholhujtiqujca.
column4: a u inju o mjto tlakpak: injk amo san ilius tlatoli tokon nemj tiske, on mijtos, on motetequj matis, ipan tontlatepeoaske, tontlatequj te peoaske, tokon tlatepeoaltiske, tokon tlaaaqujlizque, tokon tlatlatla liliske in amo san ieejoatl tikte quj mattinemjske, tiko vppa vis ke, tike expaviske, tiknanap paviske san iejoatl ipan ton tixpoa, tontoiolpoa, tokonjx toka, ipan tontlaneiokolia in aiamo nesi, inaiamo panj oalmotlalia inok tlapachiutika, mo kuj litika, mokujkujlitika, inaiamo teyoli pan, inaiamo teiolo quj na mj quj, inaiamo teiolo kontoka, inaia mo teiolo kontoka, i naiamo te iolo itlan qujca, teiolo ipan iau tlatoli kam jiekpa omokuj kuj tlakueptinen, in jx qujch omjto ipampa in ka nj san ixko tonquj ka, tokon chocholhujtiqujca, tokon kuech cholhujtiqujca.

column4: A oh injoh o mjto tlacpac: injc amo çan iliojz tlatolli tocon nemj tizqoe, on mijtoz, on moteteqoj matiz, ipan tontlatepeoazqoe, tontlateqoj te peoazqoe, tocon tlatepeoaltizqoe, tocon tlaaaqojlizqoe, tocon tlatlatla lilizqoe: in amo çan ieehoatl ticte qoj mattinemjzqoe, tico vppa viz qoe, tiqoe expavizqoe, ticnanap pavizqoe: çan iehoatl ipan ton tixpoa, tontoiolpoa, toconjx toca, ipan tontlaneiocolia: in aiamo neci, inaiamo panj oalmotlalia: inoc tlapachiohtica, mo coj litica, mocojcojlitica, inaiamo teyolli pan, inaiamo teiollo qoj na mj qoj, inaiamo teiollo contoca, inaia mo teiollo contoca, y naiamo te iollo itlan qojca, teiollo ipan iaoh tlatolli: cam jiecpa omocoj coj tlacoeptinen, in jx qojch omjto: ipampa in ca nj çan ixco tonqoj ca, tocon chocholhojtiqojca, tocon choech cholhojtiqojca.

column3: Aiocmo vmpa ton tlavica: aiocmo toeoniehoailhuja y nomoteneuh, injc no non qua tlatollo toque, izquj teme tonalti: yc çan nj can ommocentlalia, on motecpichoa, on monechicoa, on mocen quj xtia, on mototoqujlia, ti quj mon nenetzolla lia, ti quj mon nenetechcaloa, ti quj mon nenetech tlalia: ic çan on nene tzolcate, nenetechcate, nenetech catiuh ticate, moquequetzticate, mototocati cate, mototoqujliticate: ynjz quj teme njcan cencalpan tequj ppa neque: in iehoatl vme calli: ey cuetzpalin, navi coatl, macujlli mjqujztli, chiquacen macatl, chicome tochtli, chicuei atl, chicunavi ytzcujntli, matlactli ocoma tli, matlactli oce malinalli, matlac tli omome acatl, matlactli omey oce lutl.
column4: aiokmo vmpa ton tlavika aiokmo toeoniejoailjuja i nomoteneu, injk no non kua tlatolo toke, izquj teme tonalti ik san nj kan ommosentlalia, on motekpichoa, on monechikoa, on mosen quj xtia, on mototoqujlia, ti quj mon nenetsola lia, ti quj mon nenetechkaloa, ti quj mon nenetech tlalia ik san on nene tsolkate, nenetechkate, nenetech katiu tikate, mokeketstikate, mototokati kate, mototoqujliticate: injs quj teme njkan senkalpan tequj ppa neke in iejoatl vme kali ei kuetspalin, navi koatl, makujli mjqujztli, chikuasen makatl, chikome tochtli, chikuei atl, chikunavi itskujntli, matlaktli okoma tli, matlaktli ose malinali, matlak tli omome akatl, matlaktli omei ose lutl.

column3: (62) I njc cepoalli omatlactli v mey capitulo: vncan moteneoa ynjc caxtolli vnnavi machiotl, yn itoca ce quauhtli: quil amo qualli in tonalli, auh in ipan tla catia, mochachamaoanj, yoa chicaoque, aiac ixcotlachia, a tle y pan tlatta, atle y pateitta: yoan quil in cihoa, anotle ypa tlacia, yoan cenca tlavil qujxtianj, tentlaveliloque,
column4: (62) i njk sepoali omatlaktli v mei kapitulo vnkan moteneoa injk kaxtoli vnnavi machiotl, in itoka se kuautli kil amo kuali in tonali, au in ipan tla katia, mochachamaoanj, yoa chikaoke, aiak ixkotlachia, a tle i pan tlatta, atle i pateitta yoan kil in sijoa, anotle ipa tlasia, yoan senka tlavil qujxtianj, tentlaveliloke,

column1: .de fo.61. ix quauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil y ni quac, oaltemoia y na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlaueliaia in cone totonti, yc amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia y ni quac.(63) I nce quauhtli: y njn cequauh tli, mjtoa amo qualli tonalli, no vncan temoia, in qujntoca iotia cihoateteu, quilmach y njuh on mjtoa caxoxocoio, cateiccaoan yn vncan temoia, iece cenca vella mauhtiaia, y pampa quil cenca ihjio que, tlaveleque, tetlavelique, amo ellelceuhque, amo icnooaque, njman aixnamjquizti, y njc teca maviltianj,y njuh omjto quez quican: y njuh conitoa ini quac hin, njma aiac vel petlauhtinenca inpipiltototi, cenca malhujloia, y pampa cenca tlaquauh vncan tetech quineoaia, tennecujlooaia, tempatziooaia, ix necujlio oaia, ixcatziooaia, iacane cuiloaia. et. auh injc cenca qujn maviztiliaia in vncan inchielpa, y niz quica cicihoateu calco, in tlatlaxilacalpa, tetlatla xilacalloc, tetlatlazilacaltian, totoltzetzelolo, tlatoltzetzelolo, tla ixalhujlo yn vtlica, yn vmaxac, y ninepanivjian vtli. Jna qujn in vic pamonetoltia in qujn quentiz qujntla quentiz, qujn chichivilia y njn nextlaoal, in cihoa teteuitl a matl, tlaool xaoalli, oolpeiaoac, vmpa qujmo que quentia y niz qujteme, tecpantoque, y nimixip tlaoan iooalnepantla, ca njc on xellivi, iooalli impeoa tlamanili lo, auh iquac mocaoa y ie ne pantlatonatiuh, yie tlaqualizpa, auh ina qujn amo qujntlaquentia, can atzintli, tlaqualtzintli inco manaia, in contecpanaia, ano co iztac copalli, copal xalli, in tlaqualli iehoa quj movevenja qujmocuilia, quimotechtia intel pupuchti, telpuchtequjoaque, yoan titiachcaoa, in vmpa tla pixtoque cihoateucalco, in vmpa ceiooal oyxtocoque, otocoque, auh ynocactivetz, y noneca caoa loc tlamanalo, njman ic peoa i tlatlatoiavililo, catechachan, ca teca calitic yn muchioa, aocac o temamati, aocmo onnem amacho,

column3: ix quauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil y ni quac, oaltemoia y na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlaueliaia in cone totonti, yc amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia y ni quac.
column4: ix kuauti, amo pinaoanj: au kil i ni kuak, oaltemoia i na kike tepitoton sijoateteu: au kintlaueliaia in kone totonti, ik amo kinoalkixtia ia in quj iaoak, amono ki maltiaia i ni kuak.

column3: ix quauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil y ni quac, oaltemoia y na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlaueliaia in cone totonti, yc amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia y ni quac.
column4: ix kwawti, amo pinaoanj: aw kil i ni kwak, oaltemoia i na kike tepitoton cihoateteu: aw kintlaweliaia in kone totonti, ik amo kinoalkixtia ia in quj iaoak, amono ki maltiaia i ni kwak.

column3: ix quauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil y ni quac, oaltemoia y na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlaueliaia in cone totonti, yc amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia y ni quac.
column4: ix cuauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil i ni cuac, oaltemoia i na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlahueliaia in cone totonti, ic amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia i ni cuac.

column3: ix quauhti, amo pinaoanj: auh quil y ni quac, oaltemoia y na quique tepitoton cihoateteu: auh quintlaueliaia in cone totonti, yc amo quinoalquixtia ia in quj iaoac, amono qui maltiaia y ni quac.
column4: ix qoaohti, amo pinaoanj: aoh qoil y ni qoac, oaltemoia y na qoiqoe tepitoton cihoateteo: aoh qointlaoeliaia in cone totonti, yc amo qoinoalqoixtia ia in qoj yaoac, amono qoi maltiaia y ni qoac.

column3: (63) I nce quauhtli: y njn cequauh tli, mjtoa amo qualli tonalli, no vncan temoia, in qujntoca iotia cihoateteu, quilmach y njuh on mjtoa caxoxocoio, cateiccaoan yn vncan temoia, iece cenca vella mauhtiaia, y pampa quil cenca ihjio que, tlaveleque, tetlavelique, amo ellelceuhque, amo icnooaque, njman aixnamjquizti, y njc teca maviltianj,y njuh omjto quez quican: y njuh conitoa ini quac hin, njma aiac vel petlauhtinenca inpipiltototi, cenca malhujloia, y pampa cenca tlaquauh vncan tetech quineoaia, tennecujlooaia, tempatziooaia, ix necujlio oaia, ixcatziooaia, iacane cuiloaia.
column4: (63) i nse kuautli i njn sekuau tli, mjtoa amo kuali tonali, no vnkan temoia, in qujntoca iotia sijoateteu, kilmach i nju on mjtoa kaxoxokoio, kateikkaoan in vnkan temoia, iese senka vela mautiaia, i pampa kil senka ijjio ke, tlaveleke, tetlavelike, amo elelseuke, amo iknooake, njman aixnamjkisti, i njk teka maviltianj,i nju omjto kes kikan: i nju konitoa ini kuak jin, njma aiak vel petlautinenka inpipiltototi, senka maljuloia, i pampa senka tlakuau vnkan tetech kineoaia, tennekujlooaia, tempatsiooaia, ix nekujlio oaia, ixkatsiooaia, iakane kuiloaia.

column3: (63) I nce quauhtli: y njn cequauh tli, mjtoa amo qualli tonalli, no vncan temoia, in qujntoca iotia cihoateteu, quilmach y njuh on mjtoa caxoxocoio, cateiccaoan yn vncan temoia, iece cenca vella mauhtiaia, y pampa quil cenca ihjio que, tlaveleque, tetlavelique, amo ellelceuhque, amo icnooaque, njman aixnamjquizti, y njc teca maviltianj,y njuh omjto quez quican: y njuh conitoa ini quac hin, njma aiac vel petlauhtinenca inpipiltototi, cenca malhujloia, y pampa cenca tlaquauh vncan tetech quineoaia, tennecujlooaia, tempatziooaia, ix necujlio oaia, ixcatziooaia, iacane cuiloaia.
column4: (63) i nse kwawtli i nhn sekwaw tli, mhtoa amo kwali tonali, no vnkan temoia, in qujntoca iotia cihoateteu, kilmach i nhw on mhtoa kaxoxokoio, kateikkaoan in vnkan temoia, iese senka vela mawtiaia, i pampa kil senka ihhio ke, tlaveleke, tetlavelike, amo elelsewke, amo iknooake, nhman aixnamhkisti, i nhk teka maviltianj,y nhw omhto kes kikan: i nhw konitoa ini kwak hin, nhma aiak vel petlawtinenka inpipiltototi, senka malhuloia, i pampa senka tlakwaw vnkan tetech kineoaia, tennekuhlooaia, tempatsiooaia, ix nekuhlio oaia, ixkatsiooaia, iakane kwiloaia.

column4: (63) i nce cuauhtli i nhn cecuauh tli, mhtoa amo cualli tonalli, no vncan temoia, in qujntoca iotia cihoateteu, quilmach i nhuh on mhtoa caxoxocoio, cateiccaoan in vncan temoia, iece cenca vella mauhtiaia, i pampa quil cenca ihhio que, tlaveleque, tetlavelique, amo ellelceuhque, amo icnooaque, nhman aixnamhquizti, i nhc teca maviltianj,y nhuh omhto quez quican: i nhuh conitoa ini cuac hin, nhma aiac vel petlauhtinenca inpipiltototi, cenca malhuloia, i pampa cenca tlacuauh vncan tetech quineoaia, tennecuhlooaia, tempatziooaia, ix necuhlio oaia, ixcatziooaia, iacane cuiloaia.

column4: (63) I nce qoaohtli: y njn ceqoaoh tli, mjtoa amo qoalli tonalli, no vncan temoia, in qojntoca iotia cihoateteo, qoilmach y njoh on mjtoa caxoxocoio, cateiccaoan yn vncan temoia, iece cenca vella maohtiaia, y pampa qoil cenca ihjio qoe, tlaveleqoe, tetlaveliqoe, amo ellelceohqoe, amo icnooaqoe, njman aixnamjqoizti, y njc teca maviltianj,y njoh omjto qoez qoican: y njoh conitoa ini qoac hin, njma aiac vel petlaohtinenca inpipiltototi, cenca malhojloia, y pampa cenca tlaqoaoh vncan tetech qoineoaia, tennecojlooaia, tempatziooaia, ix necojlio oaia, ixcatziooaia, iacane coiloaia.

column3: Jna qujn in vic pamonetoltia in qujn quentiz qujntla quentiz, qujn chichivilia y njn nextlaoal, in cihoa teteuitl a matl, tlaool xaoalli, oolpeiaoac, vmpa qujmo que quentia y niz qujteme, tecpantoque, y nimixip tlaoan iooalnepantla, ca njc on xellivi, iooalli impeoa tlamanili lo, auh iquac mocaoa y ie ne pantlatonatiuh, yie tlaqualizpa, auh ina qujn amo qujntlaquentia, can atzintli, tlaqualtzintli inco manaia, in contecpanaia, ano co iztac copalli, copal xalli, in tlaqualli iehoa quj movevenja qujmocuilia, quimotechtia intel pupuchti, telpuchtequjoaque, yoan titiachcaoa, in vmpa tla pixtoque cihoateucalco, in vmpa ceiooal oyxtocoque, otocoque, auh ynocactivetz, y noneca caoa loc tlamanalo, njman ic peoa i tlatlatoiavililo, catechachan, ca teca calitic yn muchioa, aocac o temamati, aocmo onnem amacho,
column4: jna qujn in vik pamonetoltia in qujn kentis qujntla kentis, qujn chichivilia i njn nextlaoal, in sijoa teteuitl a matl, tlaool xaoali, oolpeiaoak, vmpa qujmo ke kentia i nis qujteme, tekpantoke, i nimixip tlaoan iooalnepantla, ka njk on xelivi, iooali impeoa tlamanili lo, au ikuak mokaoa i ie ne pantlatonatiu, yie tlakualispa, au ina qujn amo qujntlaquentia, kan atsintli, tlakualtsintli inko manaia, in kontekpanaia, ano ko istak kopali, kopal xali, in tlakuali iejoa quj movevenja qujmocuilia, kimotechtia intel pupuchti, telpuchtequjoaque, yoan titiachkaoa, in vmpa tla pixtoke sijoateukalko, in vmpa seiooal oixtokoke, otokoke, au inokaktivets, i noneka kaoa lok tlamanalo, njman ik peoa i tlatlatoiavililo, katechachan, ka teka kalitik in muchioa, aokak o temamati, aokmo onnem amacho,

column4: Jna qojn in vic pamonetoltia in qojn qoentiz qojntla qoentiz, qojn chichivilia y njn nextlaoal, in cihoa teteoitl a matl, tlaool xaoalli, oolpeyaoac, vmpa qojmo qoe qoentia y niz qojteme, tecpantoqoe, y nimixip tlaoan iooalnepantla, ca njc on xellivi, iooalli impeoa tlamanili lo, aoh iqoac mocaoa y ie ne pantlatonatioh, yie tlaqoalizpa, aoh ina qojn amo qojntlaqoentia, can atzintli, tlaqoaltzintli inco manaia, in contecpanaia, ano co iztac copalli, copal xalli, in tlaqoalli iehoa qoj movevenja qojmocoilia, qoimotechtia intel popochti, telpochteqojoaqoe, yoan titiachcaoa, in vmpa tla pixtoqoe cihoateocalco, in vmpa ceiooal oyxtocoqoe, otocoqoe, aoh ynocactivetz, y noneca caoa loc tlamanalo, njman ic peoa i tlatlatoiavililo, catechachan, ca teca calitic yn mochioa, aocac o temamati, aocmo onnem amacho,

column1: .de fo.62. iehoatiqujntlaoanilia, qujntlatoia vilia ynvevetque, y nilamatque, ic mochochoquiztlapaloa, me ella quaoa et. A uh mjtoa y naqujn vncan tlacati, atlacacemelle, intla oqujchtli, tiacauhti, oqujchti, a quentlatta, a quen tlatlatta, aiac ixco tlachia, çan jioqujchio, y tia cauhio inconpopoa, y njxco qui mana, njman aiac quj motlacal toca, motepanaviltoca, aiac tle compoa, motepololtoca, atle on tepoa, cenca izmoquixtia, yoa njma atentlacatl, vel tepapa tzoa, tepapatzaoa, te tlitlivia, tequiquinatza, miitleoa, mo quaquacuecuechoa, motla tlamachiztia, motlatlamachi toca, motlatlanitztia, move vellatoltoca, moieiectlatoltoca, amotepanavillanj, momama chotla, te mamachotla, moie iectoca, a teiectoca, tete patz tlatoa, motetencuepa, tlatla tolcuepa, tlatlatolmalacachoa, much y chivil, much quj mopa njtia, much qui molhujltia, mu ch vel itech muchioa intlatla uelilocaiotl, y nehi iujntiliztli, y navil quiz caiotl, auh in que man intlaotlatlatziviti vico, ca laqujlo, iao mj quj etc.(64) Can ienoiuhquj intla cihoatl, vel tentlaveliloc, camatlaveliloc, ahtentlacatl, tenxaxacal, cama tlatecoa, cenca ipac, cenca ivel mach y ntentlavelilocaiotl, vel tepa pacanj, tenovjiantocanj, tepac co tlaoanj, iuh qujnma chichi aiac vel qujiacaolinia, qujia ca peionja, yntlaca itechonaci, njma qui tle cavitiquica, ytech mopiloa, qui teteuhtzitzquja, quixtataca, qujx momotzoa, qujx cocotona, qujx cocototza, qujxcujcui, quix namo ia, quitztzeltilia, quitzotzona, quixtitipitza, quitzitzilitza, qui quatitipitza, quiquatzitzilitza, iuhqujntequaiztatlapana, te quamomotzoa, tequacacamoa, tequacacapi, tequavivilana, tequavivitla, teiacatzotzona, te iacachachaquanja, tetlantzo tzona, tetlan pepetla, tetena ana, teitztzotzona, tetlatzatzaianilia, tetlatetetzomuchilia, qujtetetzomo tza, achchiqujtlalia, cececotl quj vica, quj tzeltilia, yntetilma, in teuj pil, teix namoia. (65) I njc cempoalli ommatlac tli onnavi capitulo, vncan mjtoa, moteneoa: in tlein quj

column3: A uh mjtoa y naqujn vncan tlacati, atlacacemelle, intla oqujchtli, tiacauhti, oqujchti, a quentlatta, a quen tlatlatta, aiac ixco tlachia, çan jioqujchio, y tia cauhio inconpopoa, y njxco qui mana, njman aiac quj motlacal toca, motepanaviltoca, aiac tle compoa, motepololtoca, atle on tepoa, cenca izmoquixtia, yoa njma atentlacatl, vel tepapa tzoa, tepapatzaoa, te tlitlivia, tequiquinatza, miitleoa, mo quaquacuecuechoa, motla tlamachiztia, motlatlamachi toca, motlatlanitztia, move vellatoltoca, moieiectlatoltoca, amotepanavillanj, momama chotla, te mamachotla, moie iectoca, a teiectoca, tete patz tlatoa, motetencuepa, tlatla tolcuepa, tlatlatolmalacachoa, much y chivil, much quj mopa njtia, much qui molhujltia, mu ch vel itech muchioa intlatla uelilocaiotl, y nehi iujntiliztli, y navil quiz caiotl, auh in que man intlaotlatlatziviti vico, ca laqujlo, iao mj quj etc.
column4: a u mjtoa i naqujn vnkan tlakati, atlakasemele, intla oqujchtli, tiakauti, oqujchti, a kentlatta, a ken tlatlatta, aiak ixko tlachia, san jioqujchio, i tia kaujio inkonpopoa, i njxko ki mana, njman aiak quj motlakal toka, motepanaviltoka, aiak tle kompoa, motepololtoka, atle on tepoa, senka ismokixtia, yoa njma atentlakatl, vel tepapa tsoa, tepapatsaoa, te tlitlivia, tekikinatsa, miitleoa, mo kuakuakuekuechoa, motla tlamachistia, motlatlamachi toka, motlatlanitstia, move velatoltoka, moieiektlatoltoka, amotepanavilanj, momama chotla, te mamachotla, moie iektoka, a teiektoka, tete pats tlatoa, motetenkuepa, tlatla tolkuepa, tlatlatolmalakachoa, much i chivil, much quj mopa njtia, much ki moljultia, mu ch vel itech muchioa intlatla uelilokaiotl, i neji iuntilistli, i navil kis kaiotl, au in ke man intlaotlatlatsiviti viko, ka laqujlo, iao mj quj etk.

column4: A oh mjtoa y naqojn vncan tlacati, atlacacemelle, intla oqojchtli, tiacaohti, oqojchti, a qoentlatta, a qoen tlatlatta, aiac ixco tlachia, çan jioqojchio, y tia caohio inconpopoa, y njxco qoi mana, njman aiac qoj motlacal toca, motepanaviltoca, aiac tle compoa, motepololtoca, atle on tepoa, cenca izmoqoixtia, yoa njma atentlacatl, vel tepapa tzoa, tepapatzaoa, te tlitlivia, teqoiqoinatza, miitleoa, mo qoaqoacoecoechoa, motla tlamachiztia, motlatlamachi toca, motlatlanitztia, move vellatoltoca, moieiectlatoltoca, amotepanavillanj, momama chotla, te mamachotla, moie iectoca, a teiectoca, tete patz tlatoa, motetencoepa, tlatla tolcoepa, tlatlatolmalacachoa, moch y chivil, moch qoj mopa njtia, moch qoi molhojltia, mo ch vel itech mochioa intlatla oelilocaiotl, y nehi iojntiliztli, y navil qoiz caiotl, aoh in qoe man intlaotlatlatziiiti vico, ca laqojlo, yao mj qoj etc.

column3: (64) Can ienoiuhquj intla cihoatl, vel tentlaveliloc, camatlaveliloc, ahtentlacatl, tenxaxacal, cama tlatecoa, cenca ipac, cenca ivel mach y ntentlavelilocaiotl, vel tepa pacanj, tenovjiantocanj, tepac co tlaoanj, iuh qujnma chichi aiac vel qujiacaolinia, qujia ca peionja, yntlaca itechonaci, njma qui tle cavitiquica, ytech mopiloa, qui teteuhtzitzquja, quixtataca, qujx momotzoa, qujx cocotona, qujx cocototza, qujxcujcui, quix namo ia, quitztzeltilia, quitzotzona, quixtitipitza, quitzitzilitza, qui quatitipitza, quiquatzitzilitza, iuhqujntequaiztatlapana, te quamomotzoa, tequacacamoa, tequacacapi, tequavivilana, tequavivitla, teiacatzotzona, te iacachachaquanja, tetlantzo tzona, tetlan pepetla, tetena ana, teitztzotzona, tetlatzatzaianilia, tetlatetetzomuchilia, qujtetetzomo tza, achchiqujtlalia, cececotl quj vica, quj tzeltilia, yntetilma, in teuj pil, teix namoia.

column1: .de fo.63. chioaia in quj montlapaloa ia in mjxiuhque: yoan inoc cequj in muchioaia, in vncan onoca mjxiuhquj. (66) A uh njcan mjtoa: inj quac aqujn tlaotlacat piltontli: in ocon matque yoailoque, in onmachoc, ino tepan ocenman, ino tepan onmotecac. Ni man ic nenechicolo, necenqujxtilo, inj tlacaiooan, inj cuj tlaxcolloc eoa, viloa, pipiliooa in quj tlapalozque, injx co, ijcpac, tlachiazque piltontli. I nj quac oncalacque, ocie achto concuj in nextli: ic onmotlanquanexvia, onmomamatiloa: yoan noqujmon tlanquanexuja injn pilhoan, inoc co culti, anoço in ie movilana, coione nemj, in ie moquequetza, in ie imjc xi caana inoqujchpipiltotonti, in cioapipiltotonti, intelpupuchpipil, telpucatoton, ichpupuchpipil, ichpu catoton: novian quj ntla tlalilia in nextli, injz qujcan in cacaliuhian, inj mj hilpi caiocan, in jn queque iul titech, in jn molicpi y tech, y njntzin tenpan, injn cujtlacaxiuhian, injn quech tepultitech, inj macolpan: occenca iehoatl injn tlanquac. I uh mj toa, qujlmachic amo tlan quananatzinjzque: auh intlaca mo yuh muchioa, tlanquanana tzinjzque: yoan nanatzinjz, injz quj çan in cacaliuhian. A uh yoan navilhujtl in vel qujpia tletl: aque man cevi, xotlatica, oalantica, oa oalantica, mopipitztica, vel qujcpe oa, vel ic peuhtica: yoan aiac vel on tlecuj. A uh intla aca ontlecujzne quj tletlecujc: amo quj maca, injc amo quj tleiocujlizque piltontli, ino tlacat: ixquj chica in on tlamj navil hujtl: anoço inoc izqujlhujtl caltiz que.(67) I njc cempoalli on caxtolli ca pitulo: vncan mjtoa yn tlein muchioaia, y ni quac quimal tiaia impilhoan, yoan injc tlaqualoia y ni quac qujnto camacaia: yoan in tlatolli in qujtoaia vevetque, in quilhui aia, piltontli: yoan intena.(68) A uh ini quac maltia, caniooa tzinco, tlavizcalpa, iquac y nooal moma tonatiuh, quixic ven quaqua lia impipiltotonti tzatzatzitiui, y hi caoaca, ynvtlicapa, quiaoacpa, motlatlaloa, ic quinotztiui, in tlein o tocaiotiloc piltontli, injuh ie omoteneuh, cecca qujnanamoia, in xic ventli, iz quitl in quicequi, heeio, que eiotia, mocaietl, xicaltica quimana. Yoa mjtoa iuh tlamanca intla aca ipa otlacat y njc cemilhuitl vmpeoa to nalli (camjecca omito). yntla qual can njma iciuhca co naltitivetzi,

column3: I nj quac oncalacque, ocie achto concuj in nextli: ic onmotlanquanexvia, onmomamatiloa: yoan noqujmon tlanquanexuja injn pilhoan, inoc co culti, anoço in ie movilana, coione nemj, in ie moquequetza, in ie imjc xi caana inoqujchpipiltotonti, in cioapipiltotonti, intelpupuchpipil, telpucatoton, ichpupuchpipil, ichpu catoton: novian quj ntla tlalilia in nextli, injz qujcan in cacaliuhian, inj mj hilpi caiocan, in jn queque iul titech, in jn molicpi y tech, y njntzin tenpan, injn cujtlacaxiuhian, injn quech tepultitech, inj macolpan: occenca iehoatl injn tlanquac.
column4: i nj kuak onkalakke, osie achto konkuj in nextli ik onmotlankuanexvia, onmomamatiloa yoan noqujmon tlankuanexuja injn piljoan, inok ko kulti, anoso in ie movilana, koione nemj, in ie mokeketsa, in ie imjk xi kaana inoqujchpipiltotonti, in sioapipiltotonti, intelpupuchpipil, telpukatoton, ichpupuchpipil, ichpu katoton: novian quj ntla tlalilia in nextli, injs qujcan in kakaliujian, inj mj jilpi kaiokan, in jn keke iul titech, in jn molikpi i tech, i njntsin tenpan, injn kujtlakaxiujian, injn kech tepultitech, inj makolpan: oksenka iejoatl injn tlankuak.

column3: (68) A uh ini quac maltia, caniooa tzinco, tlavizcalpa, iquac y nooal moma tonatiuh, quixic ven quaqua lia impipiltotonti tzatzatzitiui, y hi caoaca, ynvtlicapa, quiaoacpa, motlatlaloa, ic quinotztiui, in tlein o tocaiotiloc piltontli, injuh ie omoteneuh, cecca qujnanamoia, in xic ventli, iz quitl in quicequi, heeio, que eiotia, mocaietl, xicaltica quimana.

column1: .de fo.64. auh qujn non qua, contlalilia oc conchololtia, y njc quitlatlaqualia, pillaqualo, pillaoano; auh intla caie moveliti, qui ni pa caltia yn Ey tonalli, y nj uh nican neci ipa ce quauhtli, y na qujn tlaipa otla cat, qui ni pa caltizque in Ey olin, ie hoa in ca tlacococavia y tahoan y naoa incanicnotlaca, incaqui tzacuia icnoiotl, atletzin in polivi ni, intecentlaliloni, intenechico lonj, iccan cococatzin, cococaiotica, icno tlacaiotica conaltia y njnco neuh, ipapa in çan quitototztive tzi, quitototztiquica, in aocmoco vecatlaca, couecatilia, conechca tilia, conechcatlaca, cocholol tia. auh intla motlacamati, mo cuiltonoa tetahoa, in vncan qui quanj, qujn ce vmpa quimatti vi y ni pa chicome tonalli, y quac caltia, yoan quicocolaquja im piltontli, y pampa y nj uh omjto muchipa quiqualittaia. yn tonalli, y quac quivejchioa in tecoanotzaliztli, atlioa, tlaqua lo, novjiampa, xoxochitlano, oalhuj in xochi cauhque, neque quecalo, nepopotzolo. auh in piltontli quitlapaloa in vevetq, ynilamatque, yoa ininatzin mixiuhquj, Quilhuja. Noxhuj uhtze, otiquihjiovi, oticciauh, ca oti oalmovicac intlaltic pac, oti motlalticpac quixti, tiquittaz, ticmatiz, ticiehecoz, in tecoco, in tetolinj, intlaihjoviliztli, cateto neuhca, techichinatzcan, tetoto neuhcan, techichichinatzca, tetoneuhian, techichinatzian, y notioalla, cococ yieoaia, teic notlamachtican, aco titolhujltiz, titomaceoaltiz, aco achitzinca timitztotlanevizque: catimixjp tla, timpatillo, timezco, tintla pallo, tintzicuevilo inmotechiuh caoa, in mocoltzitzinoa, y mach tooa, ynmopiptooa, in machco colhia, ynienechca mantivi, ynocuelachic, ynocemilhujtl, ontlapieco, yn vncan timonoltitoc, otiquihjiovi, oticiauh nox huj uhtzi ne, caomitz oalmioali intotecujo, njma ic compepetla, comapepetla, ic quinextia, y njc cotlacotla piltontli. Nima noic conotza contlapaloa yni natzin mixiuhquj, Quilhuja. column3: Noch putze, nochputzine, cioapille, cioa piltzintle; oti qui hjiovi, oticiauh, cao queteltzin mitztlalloti, mitztlalcavi incozcatl, in quetzalli, y njc otima paticatca, caotlalticpacquiz, ace no nonqua y na montlaotlanamjc tizque, cao an motlallotique, que qujmonequiltia intotecujo, acoce
column4: Noch potze, nochpotzine, cioapille, cioa piltzintle; oti qoi hjiovi, oticiaoh, cao qoeteltzin mitztlalloti, mitztlalcavi incozcatl, in qoetzalli, y njc otima paticatca, caotlalticpacqoiz, ace no nonqoa y na montlaotlanamjc tizqoe, cao an motlallotiqoe, qoe qojmoneqoiltia intotecojo, acoce

column1: .de fo.65. milhujtzintli, tictotlanevizque, ti coz cateuhtlamatizque, timacuex teuhtlamatizque, maoc y vjia, ma oc iocuxca, maoc xomomalhuj, ma omocaxanj, ma tomonevjiavi, ma camoxomo pupuxcanequj, may vjian intioalmimatiz, intemaz caltz inco mitzoncalaquizque, auh matocomoxiccavili in piltzin tli, maxocomocuitlavi, maoc mocuchpan xocomamatto, ma tocotetzoponj, matococochpa cho, matoconcoch cauh, maca tehoatl toconeviavi, macaictoco quelo, ca oqujmomacavili intote. Yc canachitzin ic contlapaloa, injc amo quitzonteconeoazque.(69) I njc cempoalli oncaxto lli oce capitulo: y techpatla toa y njuh mocoanotzaia, yoan injuh catca tlatecpa tli, yoan injuh tlaoanaia.(70) A uh intlaco anotzalti, iecuel ie, ne quequecalo incoame, nete teco, calacoa, tlaixnelivi, tla ixmoiaoa, neix pololo, neix nanamico, tlaixtomaoa, tla tlacivi, yciooa, netetequipacho lo, cencentlamatli ipa ney hix que tzalo, netetequjmaco, iacattiuh, inteyie macac, teyiemaco, tey ietilo, yietlatilo, njma contoquilia yntexochimacac, texochitia, te xochimaca, conteaquia inic pac xochitl in xochicozcatl, teic pac xochitia, texochicozcatia, teix pamomamana y nj iecaxitl, tla chichinalotoc, tlanecutoc, tlane co, tlaaviaxtoc, tlavevelixtoc: auh njma ieiciauh in tetlamacac, qujtocativi, in tetlanamjctilique, intlanapaloque, tetlamaca, te vipana,tepilotiuh, tecem pilo tiuh, njma ie ic tlaqualo, achto pa, ontlatlatlaca, catepa netla cavilo, ic tla quanja yntetlavical hoa; auh nj ma ie no ic iauh in teamacac, çan ie no ivi tevipan tiuh, tecempilotiuh, aiac quix caoa, vel mixpepetztza, conte tequilitiuh in aquavitl, y njc mo neloa cacaoatl, ica hatlioa, tea atla cavilo, qujmatlacavjia, y nte tlavicalhoa, in viconj, in tlacaoa nj, in quit quinj netlacavilli, vnca achitzinca ompacoatoc, nepielo toc, vellamachotoc innepieloian, in tecoanotzaloian: auh in ce qujn in amo cenca tlavelmati, vellama ti, movelmati, ynatica, tlaqual tica, xochitica, yictica et. can motla vellaloa, mo quetzteoa, moquetztiquica, choloteoa, ma coma, motlaqual coma, tlatla

column3: milhujtzintli, tictotlanevizque, ti coz cateuhtlamatizque, timacuex teuhtlamatizque, maoc y vjia, ma oc iocuxca, maoc xomomalhuj, ma omocaxanj, ma tomonevjiavi, ma camoxomo pupuxcanequj, may vjian intioalmimatiz, intemaz caltz inco mitzoncalaquizque, auh matocomoxiccavili in piltzin tli, maxocomocuitlavi, maoc mocuchpan xocomamatto, ma tocotetzoponj, matococochpa cho, matoconcoch cauh, maca tehoatl toconeviavi, macaictoco quelo, ca oqujmomacavili intote.

column4: (70) a u intlako anotsalti, iekuel ie, ne kekekalo inkoame, nete teko, kalakoa, tlaixnelivi, tla ixmoiaoa, neix pololo, neix nanamiko, tlaixtomaoa, tla tlasivi, isiooa, netetekipacho lo, sensentlamatli ipa nei jix ke tsalo, netetequjmaco, iakattiu, inteyie makak, teyiemako, tei ietilo, yietlatilo, njma kontokilia intexochimakak, texochitia, te xochimaka, konteakia inik pak xochitl in xochikoskatl, teik pak xochitia, texochikoskatia, teix pamomamana i nj iekaxitl, tla chichinalotok, tlanekutok, tlane ko, tlaaviaxtok, tlavevelixtok: au njma ieisiau in tetlamakak, qujtocativi, in tetlanamjktilike, intlanapaloke, tetlamaka, te vipana,tepilotiu, tesem pilo tiu, njma ie ik tlakualo, achto pa, ontlatlatlaka, katepa netla kavilo, ik tla kuanja intetlavikal joa; au nj ma ie no ik iau in teamakak, san ie no ivi tevipan tiu, tesempilotiu, aiak kix kaoa, vel mixpepetstsa, konte tekilitiu in akuavitl, i njk mo neloa kakaoatl, ika jatlioa, tea atla kavilo, qujmatlacavjia, i nte tlavikaljoa, in vikonj, in tlakaoa nj, in kit kinj netlakavili, vnka achitsinka ompakoatok, nepielo tok, velamachotok innepieloian, in tekoanotsaloian: au in se qujn in amo senka tlavelmati, velama ti, movelmati, inatika, tlakual tika, xochitika, yiktika et.

column4: (70) A oh intlaco anotzalti, iecoel ie, ne qoeqoecalo incoame, nete teco, calacoa, tlaixnelivi, tla ixmoyaoa, neix pololo, neix nanamico, tlaixtomaoa, tla tlacivi, yciooa, neteteqoipacho lo, cencentlamatli ipa ney hix qoe tzalo, neteteqojmaco, iacattioh, inteyie macac, teyiemaco, tey ietilo, yietlatilo, njma contoqoilia yntexochimacac, texochitia, te xochimaca, conteaqoia inic pac xochitl in xochicozcatl, teic pac xochitia, texochicozcatia, teix pamomamana y nj iecaxitl, tla chichinalotoc, tlanecotoc, tlane co, tlaaviaxtoc, tlavevelixtoc: aoh njma ieiciaoh in tetlamacac, qojtocativi, in tetlanamjctiliqoe, intlanapaloqoe, tetlamaca, te vipana,tepilotioh, tecem pilo tioh, njma ie ic tlaqoalo, achto pa, ontlatlatlaca, catepa netla cavilo, ic tla qoanja yntetlavical hoa; aoh nj ma ie no ic iaoh in teamacac, çan ie no ivi tevipan tioh, tecempilotioh, aiac qoix caoa, vel mixpepetztza, conte teqoilitioh in aqoavitl, y njc mo neloa cacaoatl, ica hatlioa, tea atla cavilo, qojmatlacavjia, y nte tlavicalhoa, in viconj, in tlacaoa nj, in qoit qoinj netlacavilli, vnca achitzinca ompacoatoc, nepielo toc, vellamachotoc innepieloian, in tecoanotzaloian: aoh in ce qojn in amo cenca tlavelmati, vellama ti, movelmati, ynatica, tlaqoal tica, xochitica, yictica et.

column1: .de fo.66. totivi, popolocatiuj, tlatetotiuj, tla tlanauhtiuj, tlanauhtiuj, tlanauh pactiuj, ic oallatepachoticate, mo xixicoticate, y no motlalito incha, y njncalitic; auh intla oi ttoque in iuh oquizque, in cano qualantia que, quini muz tlaioc occeppa quj nana, quj mo ncjc xiana, quj niol ceuja, ini quac ie apeoalco, incane chioalo, iollalilo, pa paquiltilo, auh in cihoa cantlayia, aco chiantzo tzolatolli, anoço chianpinolli in quia, in qujnmaca, nec panj, anoço chilpanj, chilcoz panj, chil tecpimpanj, chilchopanj, aio oa chpanj, auh y noioac in vevet que, y nila matque, tlatlaoana, mohololoa, mocecentlalia, y mjx pan quioalquetza y nin tlaoana ia, y njtoca xoch comitl, yoa y nin tlaoancax, inj ntetlaoa, inte tlamamaconj, achto ie vmpeoa intetlaoanti, in tetla mamacac, nj ma ieic iauh y nj iacac, in tlaiacac, y nj iacaioca, ictevipa tiuh, tecempilotiuh, icom moca oa in icuitlapilco, in tlacuitla pilco, in tlatzaccan, quioalteca ti manj in vctli, aco izta vctli, anoço aivctli, tlachioal vctli, y notlaliloc ochichioaloc ic pilla oanoz, ontla cacaco in xaioco mjc, in oc comjc, intlate movilcomjc, auh in tetlaoanti intla qui mjtta qujn tlaoantia, yn amo ivinti, ina moia manja, in ca nitztoque, ix pepeiontoque, ie nocuelie copuch ilochtia, tlaopuchcopa quipeoal tia. q. n. in vnca oqui cauh, intla tzaccan, intlacuitlapilco, icne vn can quipeoaltia, y njc tetlamamaca, y njc tetlaoantia, ic qui cueptiuh, quj papatlatiuh initetlaoatiliz: ic necui catilo, netlaoculcujcatilo, nechoquiz cuicatilo, anoço çan cuica cacamolo, nocactle queoa, necujcapanauilo, nece meltilo, necece meltilo, ne ella quaoalo, nechoquiz tlapalolo. auh inaca cantetencuicatica, y hich taca cuj catica, aiac ica qui chiuh tica: auh ce qujn çan qujxcavia in pactoque, im papactoque, vevetz catoque, camanalotoque, vetz quiz tequittoque, iuhqujn inxilla qua quauhti, ommimjctoque in veutz ca, y nonoitla quicacque, in tevetz quiti, tevetz quiceuh, iuhqujn tla nanalco. O y vin in muchioaia coaiotl inte coanotzaliztli, intece tlaliliztli, tenechicoliztli, teceviliz tli, teittotiliztli. et. Y ni quac aca quitlaqualiaia in piltzintli, y njc tlacocolaquja, tlacocolaqui loian nepielo.(71)

column3: totivi, popolocatiuj, tlatetotiuj, tla tlanauhtiuj, tlanauhtiuj, tlanauh pactiuj, ic oallatepachoticate, mo xixicoticate, y no motlalito incha, y njncalitic; auh intla oi ttoque in iuh oquizque, in cano qualantia que, quini muz tlaioc occeppa quj nana, quj mo ncjc xiana, quj niol ceuja, ini quac ie apeoalco, incane chioalo, iollalilo, pa paquiltilo, auh in cihoa cantlayia, aco chiantzo tzolatolli, anoço chianpinolli in quia, in qujnmaca, nec panj, anoço chilpanj, chilcoz panj, chil tecpimpanj, chilchopanj, aio oa chpanj, auh y noioac in vevet que, y nila matque, tlatlaoana, mohololoa, mocecentlalia, y mjx pan quioalquetza y nin tlaoana ia, y njtoca xoch comitl, yoa y nin tlaoancax, inj ntetlaoa, inte tlamamaconj, achto ie vmpeoa intetlaoanti, in tetla mamacac, nj ma ieic iauh y nj iacac, in tlaiacac, y nj iacaioca, ictevipa tiuh, tecempilotiuh, icom moca oa in icuitlapilco, in tlacuitla pilco, in tlatzaccan, quioalteca ti manj in vctli, aco izta vctli, anoço aivctli, tlachioal vctli, y notlaliloc ochichioaloc ic pilla oanoz, ontla cacaco in xaioco mjc, in oc comjc, intlate movilcomjc, auh in tetlaoanti intla qui mjtta qujn tlaoantia, yn amo ivinti, ina moia manja, in ca nitztoque, ix pepeiontoque, ie nocuelie copuch ilochtia, tlaopuchcopa quipeoal tia.
column4: totivi, popolocatiuj, tlatetotiuj, tla tlanauhtiuj, tlanauhtiuj, tlanau pactiuj, ik oalatepachotikate, mo xixikotikate, i no motlalito incha, i njnkalitik; au intla oi ttoke in iu okiske, in kano kualantia ke, kini mus tlaiok okseppa quj nana, quj mo ncjc xiana, quj niol seuja, ini kuak ie apeoalko, inkane chioalo, iolalilo, pa pakiltilo, au in sijoa kantlayia, ako chiantso tsolatoli, anoso chianpinoli in kia, in qujnmaca, nek panj, anoso chilpanj, chilkos panj, chil tekpimpanj, chilchopanj, aio oa chpanj, au i noioak in vevet ke, i nila matke, tlatlaoana, mojololoa, mosesentlalia, i mjx pan kioalketsa i nin tlaoana ia, i njtoka xoch komitl, yoa i nin tlaoankax, inj ntetlaoa, inte tlamamakonj, achto ie vmpeoa intetlaoanti, in tetla mamakak, nj ma ieik iau i nj iakak, in tlaiakak, i nj iakaioka, iktevipa tiu, tesempilotiu, ikom moka oa in ikuitlapilko, in tlakuitla pilko, in tlatsakkan, kioalteka ti manj in vktli, ako ista vktli, anoso aivktli, tlachioal vktli, i notlalilok ochichioalok ik pila oanos, ontla kakako in xaioko mjk, in ok komjk, intlate movilkomjk, au in tetlaoanti intla ki mjtta qujn tlaoantia, in amo ivinti, ina moia manja, in ka nitstoke, ix pepeiontoke, ie nokuelie kopuch ilochtia, tlaopuchkopa kipeoal tia.

column3: q. n. in vnca oqui cauh, intla tzaccan, intlacuitlapilco, icne vn can quipeoaltia, y njc tetlamamaca, y njc tetlaoantia, ic qui cueptiuh, quj papatlatiuh initetlaoatiliz: ic necui catilo, netlaoculcujcatilo, nechoquiz cuicatilo, anoço çan cuica cacamolo, nocactle queoa, necujcapanauilo, nece meltilo, necece meltilo, ne ella quaoalo, nechoquiz tlapalolo.
column4: q. n. in vnka oki kau, intla tsakkan, intlakuitlapilko, ikne vn kan kipeoaltia, i njk tetlamamaka, i njk tetlaoantia, ik ki kueptiu, quj papatlatiu initetlaoatilis: ik nekui katilo, netlaokulkujkatilo, nechokis kuikatilo, anoso san kuika kakamolo, nokaktle keoa, nekujkapanauilo, nese meltilo, nesese meltilo, ne ela kuaoalo, nechokis tlapalolo.

column1: .de fo.67. I njc cempoalli on caxtolli omvme capitulo: vncan mo teneoa in cujcujcaliztli catca in quenjn muchioaia, yoa injuh tecoanotzaia in veve intin tlatoque, yoan in pochteca, y njuh noma ax can quichioaia.(72) Auh in axca ie ic tlamanj y ni quac aca y pampa teco anotza ypiltzin, ie mitoa tlaquaate quja, tlaquatequiloia tetlatla qualtilo, canie muchioaia, çan ie iuh coatioaia, çan ie iuh te coanotzaloia y noc cequj y pan co oaiotl, tetlacamachiliztli, tete moliztli. Jc çan njcan tepiton on monextia, in tecoanotzaliztlato lli, tel intlatoca, iin pilpa, impi llova, tec pilpan, y na noco cana netlaca machoian, necuiltono loia, tlatlamepa, impuchtla, in puchtecapa, toltecaio pan, ce centetl injcnetquioaia, y njc tla manja, y njc tlamanca, y njc co oatioaia, netlacamachoia, ne coachioaloia, in cana vel movey chioa, vel mo occa, tzitzica, ca catzca, aonneaquilo, ahmixi mati, yntla coa notzali, vel neque quecalo, nepopotzolo, ne xo xo colo, ahujc xoquiooa, acan veli, in ne tlaliloia, inieloaia, intetlaliloia, occenca iehoan intequjuh, innecui tlavil, y mix in tequjuh, vel inne cuitlavil, vel mixpetztza, mixpe tzoa, quimi icaniantia, quinte te quippantia, qujncococoltia in techixque, inte tlalique, y njc iehoan vellachia, teiximati, in ca paic ooallaque coame, tlacoano tzalti, tecooaoa, ie hoan vel qui teilhuja, ynic inca nechioaloz, y njc vel namicozque, aiac ilca oaloz, y pan tlacotoniz, much intechaciz, yn nemactiz, y njx quich icotlatequililoque, in chiel tilo, y njn caoytoloc, yiemacoz que, miietizque, yietilozque, moxochimacazque, moxochitiz que, xochimacozque, tla quaz que, atlizque, motlauhtizque, motilmatizque, moquentizq, motlaquentizque, motlalpilizq, momaxtlatizque: auh catepa ymellel onquicaz achitzinca, omitotiz que, ontlatotonizque, yn xochitl, y njietl, in tilmatli, in maxtlatl, y njc conjx tlaoa, co oaiotl, ontlaiolpachivitia, injc a mo itolozque, ca ca moiolitlacoa,

column3: I njc cempoalli on caxtolli omvme capitulo: vncan mo teneoa in cujcujcaliztli catca in quenjn muchioaia, yoa injuh tecoanotzaia in veve intin tlatoque, yoan in pochteca, y njuh noma ax can quichioaia.
